situation: i really was starting to believe that, finally i can relax in solitude.
dialogue: as the day was coming to an end, i was begging to believe that my solitude was perfect.
well in some ways solitude is nice.
yes if you take it in portions.
label: hopeful
response: true everything is nice in bits. too much of anything does get tiring.

situation: i felt very upset that i had a lot of chores to do at home and did not see my boyfriend.
dialogue: but i needed to be responsible.
be responsible about what?
well, about getting daily chorses done, work first,  play later.
label: guilty
response: i understand. i have to get work around my house done today too, before i can go out.

situation: a car backed into me last week. they left a nasty dent in the front of my car.
dialogue: i got backed into last week by another car.
oh no, sorry to hear, hope you are ok.
i am fine, but they left a nasty dent in the front of my car. now i have to get it fixed, which is a hassle.
label: angry
response: i agree. hope the car will look good again.

situation: kind of feel bad, i do not really have a family so it sucks being basically an orphan with no one to go to if something goes wrong
dialogue: meh i kinda feel bad, i wish i had family members to talk to
sorry to hear that. did you try to talk to a friend?
friends are cool but its not quite the same as a family member, a spouse would be but i do not have that either!
label: lonely
response: i understand

situation: i was embarassed when i wore two different pairs of socks to work.
dialogue: yah, two colored socks is crazy.
i agree, where did you find them?
lol, mixed up in my drawer.
label: embarrassed
response: oh i see, ha! i would have just worn them like that to be more fashionable!

situation: when i was travelling in a ghat road at night
dialogue: when i was travelling alone in a car at night in ghat road suddenly some boulders fell on the road
was it an accident?
no the boulders fell 50 meters infront of me , luckily i was going slow and suddenly stopped
label: terrified
response: oh ! thank good ness! that was close

situation: i ate too many macadamia nuts the other day, i do not feel sorry, too much.
dialogue: i ate so many macadamia nuts today, i do not know how to feel about it.
do you especially enjoy macadamia nuts or just eating?
it the only nut that i can eat, that is why i cannot help overeating.
label: guilty
response: it must be difficult living with a nut allergy. do you overeat on macadamia nuts regularly?

situation: its so bloody hot here, its unbearable
dialogue: its so hot outside, 30c. its borderline impossible to deal with
it is awful out there. it is been in the 100's here in tx

oh no, texas is basically in a desert is not it. for me on top of heat i also get some 3 wasps a day flying into my apartament and looking around, i just got one earlier and had to kill it to get rid of it. very annoying, apparently wasps love it though
label: annoyed
response: that sucks! i hate wasps and most other bugs, so i feel your annoyance.

situation: i am starting work at the school again soon. i am looking forward to having good students this year
dialogue: i start back at work in a couple of weeks.
what job did you apply to?
i am a teacher, so i have been off this summer. i am looking forward to having 12th graders again this year.
label: hopeful
response: somehow i suspect that theyre not looking forward to having you though :p (no offence) i cannot remember anyone that enjoyed high school. its a good job though! literally backbone of society

situation: i always trust my mom.
dialogue: i always trust my family like my mom to give me good advice.
yeah that is always comforting.  mom's are awesome
do you ever disagree with your mom?
label: trusting
response: not really.  we usually tend to think alike.  why do you ask?

situation: i was really pissed off when i found out my best friend slept with my girlfriend. i was shaking all over!
dialogue: i was really pissed off when i found out my best friend slept with my girlfriend. i was shaking all over!
i am sorry to hear that
yeah well. what you gonna do. that is life.
label: angry
response: :( did you stay friends with him?

situation: i had recently applied for my masters in computer sciences in very prestigious unviversities
dialogue: i had recently applied for graduate masters in very prestigious universities but initially i was worried whether i get admission or not
did you get admission?
yeah i thought the competition was tough and i may not get admitted, but luckily i was admitted
label: joyful
response: that is great news, well done.

situation: i was so tired when i went to change the bird food, the bird water bottle cracked on the ground
dialogue: i hate when i am tired.
me too, especially when it is still the middle of the day.
or in the case here, morning
label: anxious
response: oh yes, you are right. i am in the same boat right now!

situation: i ate a lot of pizza and i feel so good right now
dialogue: i ate 3 pizzas just earlier and i feel so good and relaxed now, almost tranquility
i think i am missing something, you said you feel more that ok after 3 pizzas???
yeah i know right, a lot, and i am pretty thin so i shouldnt feel ok, but i totally do feel great .
label: content
response: it is definitely some kind of anomaly.

situation: yesterday i ate a delicious dinner it was all i hoped for that meal.
dialogue: sometime ago i was really hungry and decided to treat myself to some well reviewed restaurant, well it was all i hoped for.
what did you eat there?
onion soup with croutons.
label: anticipating
response: ooooh onion soup sounds really good, onions do taste incredibly well if cooked well with the correct dish

situation: i was extremely disgusted when a close friend of mine threw up on my baby. he was really drunk at a party we were at
dialogue: i was extremely disgusted when a close friend of mine threw up on my baby. he was really drunk at a party we were at
i would have flipped and never talked to him again. i am so sorry my god what did you do?
what else can i do? i washed my kid clean and got the hell out of there
label: disgusted
response: i do not know beat him up,. throw a drink at him, the sky is the limit!

situation: i just finished my bulletin board at work. it looks nice and i am glad to be finished.
dialogue: i just finished making my bulletin board at work.
cool, how did it come by?
i am happy with it. hopefully my students like it too.
label: content
response: if you put so much work into it, i am sure they will

situation: i was so angry when i found out that my girlfriend cheated on me. do not know how i can forgive her
dialogue: i was so angry when i found out that my girlfriend cheated on me. do not know how i can forgive her
i am so sorry! i would have a hard time forgiving that betrayal of trust. how long have you been together?
3 years
label: furious
response: wow. i hope that you can work it out, but i would understand why you would not want to.

situation: i really miss being a child. that feeling of innocence and all the missed fun comes to me especially during holiday time
dialogue: i really feel nostalgic around christmas
really? well, who doesnt!
true. there is something about that holiday that makes us wanna be kids again
label: nostalgic
response: i actually feel like a kid even now during christmas

situation: i was pleasantly shocked when my dad bought me my first car. it was a graduation present
dialogue: my dad gave me the greatest gift ever on my graduation
wow, what was it?
a brand new ford car, i was thrilled
label: surprised
response: woohoo! you are one lucky child!

situation: when i moved to new york after getting a new job, i was looking forward to my new life. i was feeling good about that change
dialogue: i felt really good about my change to new york after getting a job
no way! i just moved from ny to fl. you are going to love ny tho, its an awesome state. congrats on the job!
thank you so much. i moved from idaho. so this is very new to me, all this
label: hopeful
response: oh yeah sounds like its super new to you especially if you are in the city. i was in the middle of no where so pretty much felt like idaho where i lived in ny. :p

situation: i felt let down by girlfriend when she moved away from my place without consulting with me. i was feeling blue
dialogue: i felt heartbroken when my girlfriend moved away without telling me first
i would too why would she not tell you!? did yall break up?
we had a fight, i never knew we were broken up though
label: disappointed
response: that sounds like poor communication on her part maybe its better for you she moved. :/

situation: i wason my way home and it started to rain and i had a flat tire and i was stuck! as soon a i went to go call aaa to get assistance a random person stopped and asked if i needed some help which i did so he changed my flat free of charge.
dialogue: hi there it was a hard day when this incident occured.
what incident was that ?
i was driving home and it started to rain
label: joyful
response: what happened then ?

situation: i always feel sad around the holidays. my dad passed away around christmas
dialogue: my dad passed away around the time of christmas. it always casts a shadow over my holidays
i know what you mean, it sucks when those "dates" linger over us even if we try not to think about them.  i am so sorry to hear that!
yeah. i know it is time to get over it. but certain memories are so haunting
label: sentimental
response: its not time to get over it, you are not doing any wrong its okay to "feel" things. i hope people around you give you a lot of love!

situation: i look after my dog as if he is my child. i cannot even properly explain how i feel about him
dialogue: i feel like my dog is my child time after another. love him so much
i understand what you are saying, pets are always close to our hearts
very true, do you have any pets?
label: caring
response: yeah, i have 2 german shepards

situation: i was so scared when i went to watch conjuring in the theatres. that is one scary movie!
dialogue: i was shaking when i was watching conjuring in the movies
is it a scary movie?
it is a terrifying movie. have not you seen it yet?
label: terrified
response: no i never heard of it

situation: i always feel like i should never hurt my parents. yesterday i got so angry, but i kept my mouth shut and came away
dialogue: yesterday i was so angry at my parents. but i kept my mouth shut and came away. i cannot hurt them, i feel so faithful
yea that is probably the best choice to make
i always think all those hard times they had bringing me up
label: faithful
response: i can understand that

situation: i was so grossed out to see someone vomit in the streets last night. i think he was drunk
dialogue: some guy threw up on the street last night right before me. i was grossed out
yuck, that is terrible. i would be grossed out too. what did you do?
i got the hell out of there right away!
label: disgusted
response: i am sure you did. guess he could not make it to the trash can.

situation: i found some pictures from when my family and i used to go on vacation together.
dialogue: i saw some pictures recently of when my family and i went on vacation when i was little.
oh that is really sweet!
yeah, it made me sad to see it because they i live so far away now.
label: nostalgic
response: oh no. i hope you feel better

situation: i love thinking about fond memories with my family
dialogue: i love thinking about fond memories with my family
those are great are not
do you have a large family?
label: nostalgic
response: sorry(those are great are not they?) i do not but we always had sunday breakfast for many years. those memories are to be cherished and repeated

situation: my dog does not bark unless he sees strangers.  my roommate moved out last weekend and lately my dog has been barking/growling at our basement door.  i am the only person living in the house.
dialogue: my roommate recently moved out of my house so now it is just me and my dog.  my dog is really nice and does not really bark unless he sees a stranger coming up to the house.  lately he has been sitting at the top of the steps to the basement and growls/barks.  however, there are no windows to the basement and he would not be able to see into the basement.  i have no idea why he has been barking at that door lately.
wow that is a lot to take in.  get a muzzle
i am not bothered by him barking.  as someone who watches a lot of scary movies it is more of a worry factor that someone is down there than anything.
label: terrified
response: i can understand that

situation: i got a job offer at another company that pays more.
dialogue: i got a job offer at another company that pays more, but i turned them down because i have been with my current company for ten years.
do you think it was the right decision?
definitely, my company always treat's me right. they have not gave me a reason to want to leave.
label: faithful
response: that is great. maybe you will get a raise too

situation: i felt shy when i dropped my groceries in the parking lot
dialogue: i felt shy when i dropped my groceries in the parking lot
why is that
because there were soda cans rolling all around the parking lot and i was scrambling to pick them all up
label: embarrassed
response: oh i can understand that

situation: the other day an intruder broke into my home.
dialogue: the other day an intruder broke into my home. i had to hide in the closet while i called the cops.
that must have been terrifying
it was, the whole time i was shaking and breathing heavily.
label: terrified
response: i do not know what i would have done

situation: my doga won first place in the dog show.
dialogue: my doga won first place in the dog show. that is my girl!
awesome! what kind of dog isa?
she is a pekingese. when they handed me the trophy i just could not stop smiling. she is the best dog i could ask for.
label: proud
response: i do not think i would have been able to stop smiling either! that is so awesome!

situation: i was happy this morning when i received an email from my grandma
dialogue: i was happy this morning when i received an email from my grandma
that is nice, is she technologically savvy?
not really but she tries haha
label: joyful
response: well it is nice she is making the effort!

situation: i love reading old letters from family members
dialogue: i love reading old letters from family members
i do too. i have a box filled with them. how old is your oldest?
i have some old ones from the korean war
label: nostalgic
response: wow!

situation: i have everything ready for back to school supplies for my son. i also have his outfit picked out for the first day of school.
dialogue: i have everything ready for back to school supplies for my son to start school.
that is good. now you do not have to worry about it.
that is true! i also have his outfit picked out for the first day of school.
label: prepared
response: wow, your son is lucky to have a parent who is on top of things!

situation: i bet my cousin that i could beat him at a game of basketball.
dialogue: i bet my cousin that i could beat him at a game of basketball. he is horrible at playing so i knew i could beat him.
what did you bet?
i bet him $1000 because that is how good i am. i had no doubt in my mind i could win. i ended up obliterating him and taking his shoes too.
label: confident
response: that would be awesome! did your cousin pay you?

situation: i was sad to hear my mom is in the er again
dialogue: i was sad to hear my mom is in the er again
oh no, i am sorry to hear that. i hope she is okay.
me too, she has heart problems unfortunately
label: sad
response: i am so sorry. i hope she is able to get some relief and rest.

situation: my son said his first word the other day.
dialogue: my son said his first word the other day. my little man is going to be smart just like his pop's.
oh man! that must have been great to hear! what did he say?
he said poop. when i heard it i jumped up with joy. that is my boy!
label: proud
response: that is so funny! that is one of those things you will definitely remember forever!

situation: im envious of my friends who are at the park right now while i am stuck inside
dialogue: im envious of my friends who are at the park right now while i am stuck inside
oh i can understand that! i would also like to be outside; it looks like such a beautiful day! at least it is almost the weekend!
thats true, i will be outside in an hour or less!
label: jealous
response: that is great! are you going to join your friends at the park?

situation: walking through a dark trail
dialogue: i was walking through a trail to get to my house last night and it was pitch black. i was afraid a bear or something might get me
you should have taken a flashlight just in case.
i was gonna use my phone but it died, so i just sprinted for like half an hour.
label: afraid
response: hey at least you got a nice workout in!

situation: i felt sick after eating too much ice cream last night
dialogue: i felt sick after eating too much ice cream last night
i had ice cream too! sorry you got sick
its my own fault i went past my limit
label: disgusted
response: ha, at least it was good

situation: took my dog to the park
dialogue: i took my pup to the park last weekend and he had fun meeting other dogs and their owners!
that is always fun! does your pup do well with other dogs?
yeah he is a golden so he is happy no matter what. he will go up to people and not leave until they pet him.
label: caring
response: mine does the same thing. goldens are so adorable.

situation: peed the bed
dialogue: so i was drunk coming back from a party and woke up to find i peed the bed. first time in like 24 years.
lol, it happens to us all
yea you cannot help but feel like a stupid little kid or something, at least i did.
label: ashamed
response: haha true

situation: i felt dumb when i lost my receipt
dialogue: i felt dumb when i lost my receipt
that sucks did you need to return something?
yes some printer ink
label: embarrassed
response: that stuff is pretty expensive. maybe you can sell it on ebay or something.

situation: drunk guy puked on me
dialogue: so i was on the bus back from a party and a drunk guy barfed on me at a stop. most of it got on my jacket and he did not even apologize.
oh wow! i would have been so disgusted and outraged! what did you do?
well i did not want to start a fight or anything, so i just took it off and held my nose the rest of the ride. then i washed it like 6 times
label: annoyed
response: that must have been a terrible experience. i am not sure that i would be able to wear that jacket again.

situation: i got back into uni and am feeling more confident
dialogue: i cannot wait for college in the fall! i left 2 years ago and am back feeling more confident in my studying abilities.
i hope you do really well
thanks anything youre looking forward to?
label: prepared
response: going to see some old friends this weekend

situation: i was happy with myself for working hard this week
dialogue: i was happy with myself for working hard this week
good job what did you work hard on?
my job and at the gym
label: proud
response: nice keep it up!

situation: got back into uni
dialogue: i got back into college after 2 years off and i am pretty proud of myself.
that is awesome!  what are you studying
ya thanks it is mechanical engineering i have 2 years left.
label: proud
response: was it hard to go back or are you enjoying it?

situation: rainy day spent at home
dialogue: so last weekend it poured rain all day and i chilled at my house by myself. pretty boring.
i do like the rain though
it is relaxing, the only thing is that you cannot do anything outside really. had some plans but they got canceled.
label: lonely
response: i am sure you will have plans again

situation: saw a dude with a porsche
dialogue: i saw a dude driving a porsche down the street of my city. was definitely jealous
i would have been to. i always wonder how people make the money necessary to buy vehicles like that.
yeah i am thinking this guy must be a ceo or something. if i had the money i would buy one for sure.
label: jealous
response: same here. i saw a ferrari at the supermarket the other day. i was jealous, and i also thought about how i would be worried something would happen to it (if it were mine).

situation: yesterday i ate a whole pizza by myself.
dialogue: yesterday, i ate a whole pizza by myself!
i take you do not have issued with you weight.
no, i just did it because nobody thought i could.
label: impressed
response: ok, then.if it was a 1 thing only, no problem.

situation: this guy at school follows me around.
dialogue: this guy at school keeps following me around. he followed me all day yesterday. i think he want's to be my friend.
is he acting creepy at all?
it is getting to that point. i wish he would just stop. i have enough friends already.
label: annoyed
response: have you tried to talk to him at all and see what his deal is?

situation: i am proud of my dogs
dialogue: i am proud of my dogs behaing around new visitors
that is good you have well-behaved dogs, did you train them?
not on purpose, but they have learned from right and wrong from me
label: proud
response: well it is good you are doing something right.

situation: i went on a airplane the other day.
dialogue: the other day i went on a airplane and had a panic attack the whole time. i am not good with heights.
oh no! what did you do to bring yourself down? (from the panic attack)
i had to cover my head with a blanket, and picture myself somewhere else. that is how bad it was.
label: terrified
response: i am sorry. that sounds bad. flying always makes me nervous but i usually make it ok.

situation: i do not have a lot of friends. in a mom's group i go to, all the mom's seem to click but i do not.
dialogue: i do not have a lot of friends.
well we are friends are not we? i do appreciate you as one.
thanks. in my mom's group, i feel like a lot of the moms are friends but i am not friends with any of them.
label: lonely
response: you wanna maybe go to the bar with my other friends this weekend? they will probably like you. tim likes some things you do.

situation: we were in a small fender bender the other day.  now when i am driving, i am scared that i will be in an even worse wreck.
dialogue: i was in a small fender bender earlier this week. now i am scared that i will be in an even worse wreck.
oh i hate it when i get those kind of thoughts but eventually you recover and do not think about it.
i hope so. i am driving and i just get so scared.
label: apprehensive
response: just relax more you got this and it was just a fender bender.

situation: i did all this nice stuff for my son.  then when we got home he threw a temper tantrum at naptime.
dialogue: i took my son out and did a bunch of nice stuff for him.  he was great until we got to naptime.
naptime is a good thing though is not it
it is but he threw a huge temper tantrum at naptime.
label: disappointed
response: well that is never good

situation: for mother's day, my son had to fill out a paper in school.  he put on there several times mommy says a lot of bad words.
dialogue: for mother's day, my son had to fill out a paper in school that asked a bunch of questions.
that does not sound too fun
i read it when he got home and alot of his responses involved mommy said a bad word!
label: embarrassed
response: oh wow, the kid is a snitch

situation: i was upset i woke up so late today
dialogue: i was upset i woke up so late today
it happens, everyone does it
yeah that is true, not the end of the world;
label: sad
response: i am sure you will fix it

situation: i am annoyed at my neighbor's loud lawnmower
dialogue: i am annoyed at my neighbor's loud lawnmower
have you spoken to him about it?
nope its happening right now
label: annoyed
response: are you going to do anything about it in the future?

situation: i was able to find a new job after being fired.  i felt like it was an improvement over my last one
dialogue: i was able to find a new job after being fired
congratulations i am glad, hopefully you will like it more than your last job
it turned out to be better than my last one for the most part
label: proud
response: im glad to hear that

situation: i went to a restaurant and ordered some pizza.  when i received the pizza, a cockroach crawled across one of the slices
dialogue: i went to a restaurant and ordered some pizza
what kind of pizza?
bacon and sausage pizza.  unfortunately, it also had a cockroach crawling across it when i picked it up
label: disgusted
response: what! i hope u got your money back

situation: i was nervous about my car overheating
dialogue: i was nervous about my car overheating
why is that?
it was over 100 degrees outside and i was low on antifreeze
label: anxious
response: did your car end up overheating?

situation: a supervisor i did not like got fired.  i have a new one coming soon to replace him
dialogue: a supervisor i did not like got fired
that is great! but what did they do that you did not like?
he and i never got along, seemed like he tried to sabotage me
label: hopeful
response: well looks like that did not work out for him in the end. what finally got him axed?

situation: i felt upset about losing my friend's blu ray i borrowed
dialogue: i felt upset about losing my friend's blu ray i borrowed
did you replace it?
not yet i am still looking for it
label: guilty
response: do you think he will get angry?

situation: i was walking down the sidewalk at night.  i thought i saw the same car following me from a distance
dialogue: i was walking down the sidewalk at night and thought i saw someone following me
did you start walking faster?
yeah, tried to get out of there
label: afraid
response: hopefully you made it out safely

situation: my two neighbors really love each other. the man always opens door for her. they hold hands when walking.
dialogue: my neighbors really look out for each other
that is good to hear. what happened that made you think so?
they always holding hands and smiling
label: caring
response: oh ok. that sounds like they really get along well. it is nice to have good neighbors.

situation: i was worried when i heard my friend was in the hospital
dialogue: i was worried when i heard my friend was in the hospital
oh no!  was he ok?  i hope it was nothing serious!
no he has already been released thankfully
label: afraid
response: that is good to know!  you all have a lot to be thankful for!

situation: i am trusting that me neighbor will pay me back. my neighbor borrowed some money last week
dialogue: i loaned my neighbor some money. hopefully he pays it back today
i would hope so too or else the relationship would be awkward.
yes that is true, to say the least
label: trusting
response: i hope it was not too much money just in case.

situation: im getting stoked for the weekend
dialogue: im getting stoked for the weekend
what you you have planned?
nothing! that is why i am excited
label: excited
response: really?? it sounds like there was something going on.

situation: i was cleaning out the refrigerator and i found a bowl of something that went bad.
dialogue: i cleaned the refridgerator out the other day and i found something that had gone very very bad.
oh that is never a good situation. it happens to the best of us though. i need to clean my fridge
i put it off too long this time. it was pretty stinky, my dogs thought i was nuts for throwing food away.
label: disgusted
response: i am sure they were thinking waste not, want not. haha

situation: i was reading through some of my old school papers.  it transported me to a different time and place
dialogue: i was reading through some old school papers
oh yeah? find anything interesting?
it made me think about how far i have come since.  i also felt like i was in a different time and place reading them
label: sentimental
response: ah, nothing quite like that feeling. i remember when i was on the school newspaper. good times.

situation: my friends went out to a party.  they did not invite me along
dialogue: my friends went out to a party
are you going, too?
they did not invite me for some reason
label: lonely
response: oh no, that sucks. would you have wanted to go though?

situation: my roommate left a bunch of dishes in the kitchen.  i wish he'd clean up after himself
dialogue: my roommate left a bunch of dishes in the kitchen
well, that is not cool.
i wish he'd pick up after himself
label: annoyed
response: does he do that stuff often?

situation: i was busy with a work related project.  a co-worker stepped in and helped me out
dialogue: i was busy with a work related project
oh? what kind of project?
presentation, a co-worker came in and helped me out
label: grateful
response: oh that is nice of them!

situation: i put in extra hours at work.  i hope my boss appreciates me more
dialogue: i put in extra hours at work
that is good, do you get paid over time?
yeah, i would like for my boss to notice and promote me at some point
label: hopeful
response: i think if you keep it up you will get the recognition you want soon.

situation: i was taking a stroll at night and saw a group of guys up ahead.  i ended up just turning around
dialogue: i was taking a stroll at night and saw a group of guys up ahead
was everything okay? what were they doing?
i ended up turning around, who knows what they were up to
label: apprehensive
response: true, you never know these days.

situation: i accidentally dropped my phone in the toilet.  surprisingly, it still worked
dialogue: i accidentally dropped my phone in the toilet
is your phone waterproof?
my case was, as the phone still worked
label: embarrassed
response: you are so lucky! my phone would have been done..

situation: i have been able to stick to a consistent workout routine for the past few weeks.  i look so much better as well
dialogue: i have been consistently working out the past few weeks
that is great! are you seeing results?
absolutely, i feel so much better too
label: proud
response: i bought a spin bike but i have not used it yet

situation: i took some food from my roommate.  he left cookies out in the open
dialogue: i took some cookies my roommate left out in the open
maybe they were left for you.
i think he meant to save them
label: guilty
response: he cannot save them out in the open. what kind were they?

situation: a friend forgot his phone at the library.  i rushed back and grabbed it for him
dialogue: a friend forgot his phone at the library
did he get it back? i hate it when that happens.
i went back and grabbed it for him
label: caring
response: you are a true friend indeed. i bet he is very appreciative!

situation: a friend of mine was having a hard time finding a job.  after months of hard work, he finally got an interview
dialogue: a friend of mine was having a hard time finding a job
did he eventually find one?
after months of work, he at least got an interview
label: proud
response: that is making progress.

situation: it took me until i was 30, but i finally graduated college with my bachelors in chemistry. i am so happy to have fulfilled this goal.
dialogue: i recently graduated college, i am so glad i finally got it done!
congratulations!  what do you plan on doing?
next stop is hopefully pharmacy school. okay, maybe not completely done.
label: proud
response: that is a great goal to set for yourself.

situation: i recently had a bad health scare. i was on pins and needles waiting the result of a skin biopsy.  luckily, it was not cancer.
dialogue: i recently spent a couple of restless days awaiting the results of a skin biopsy.  i had a weird mole come up out of nowhere.
i am sorry to hear that. i hope the results will be good.
i got them back yesterday, and it was good news.  no cancer!
label: grateful
response: it is good new.

situation: last year, someone was kicking on our front door late at night. i looked out the window apprehensively to see it was my cousin.  she was drunk and had knocked but we hadn't answered.
dialogue: awhile back, our whole household was awoken by someone kicking hard at our front door.
was it an intruder?
no, it was my drunk cousin,.  she had tried knocking and we did not hear her.
label: afraid
response: what a surprise haha

situation: i was upset i woke up so late today
dialogue: i was upset i woke up so late today
i did too. did you go out last night?
nope i just stayed up late
label: disappointed
response: well i stayed up late too. drinking beer and playing vidos games

situation: i got hired at apple.
dialogue: i got hired for my dream job at apple! i cannot wait to start!
holy goodness! that is so cool. what will you do there?
i will help design the new iphones. it is going to be so much fun!
label: excited
response: oh my god! that is something to be proud of, congrats!

situation: i spent the whole day in bed looking at the ceiling.
dialogue: yesterday was my day off and i spent the whole day in bed looking at the ceiling. my friends and family did not even call or check up on me.
i am sorry you are feeling like this.  maybe you should reach out to someone
it is like they only call me when they need something. the only friend i have is myself.
label: lonely
response: i am sorry that you are going through this

situation: i rode a roller coaster.
dialogue: the other day i got on a roller coaster for the first time, and i almost pooped my pants because we were so high up.
oh wow, now that is funny! i have only been on one roller coaster and it was rather small, but i loved it!
this roller coaster was one of the biggest in the world and i am not good with heights.
label: afraid
response: oh wow! i would love to go on a much larger coaster than the one i road. but it might be scarier than i imagine.

situation: i could not believe how good my nephew is at little league
dialogue: i could not believe how good my nephew is at little league
how old is he?
label: surprised
response: they are still cute at this age and they make a lot of progress.

situation: i ruined my date with a beautiful woman.
dialogue: the other day i was on a date with a beautiful women and i accidentally spilled wine on her dress.
oh no! well hopefully she was not too upset, then you will know how her character is
she hasn't returned any of my calls. i feel horrible.
label: ashamed
response: oh no! well, honestly if she cannot deal with one mistake, then it is no good anyhow. but maybe it was something else. sometimes people just do not click.

situation: first time at a karaoke bar.
dialogue: yesterday was my first time at a karaoke bar. i started to get all tense when my friends kept telling my i should go on stage to perform.
i feel you! i do not like to perform in front of people either. did you decline?
no, i ended up going through with it. i was worried that they would boo me at first because my singing is horrible, but i guess everyone was too drunk to care.
label: apprehensive
response: oh you can be as bad as you want there, it just matters if you are having fun

situation: i finally purchased the house of my dreams.
dialogue: i finally purchased the house of my dreams. we barley finished moving in yesterday.
wow , i bet it was a long day of moving, but i can imagine the joy you must feel inside you, congratulations !
thanks. i did it all by myself too. all that saving finally paid off!
label: proud
response: i used to move furniture for my old job, so i bet it was a lot of heavy lifting, its so exciting to finally have your own place

situation: i feel i will do well on my test next week
dialogue: i feel i will do well on my test next week
i hope you do! what is the test on?
chemistry!
label: confident
response: oh man. that was a difficult subject for me after physics. are you a science major?

situation: im envious that my friends are off work all weekend
dialogue: im envious that my friends are off work all weekend
i understand how lonely it can be when your schedule does not fit with your old friends.
yeah true but i cannot blame them
label: jealous
response: you can make new friends. its just part of the human experience. everything is temporary

situation: i recently lost my dog.  i had him for 12 years.
dialogue: i recently lost my dog, he died.  i had him for 12 years.
oh no. i am so sorry to hear that!
thank you. he was the sweetest thing.
label: sad
response: dogs are with us for such a short amount of time. kinda wish they lived as long as us.

situation: i appreciated all the help i got from my friends last week
dialogue: i appreciated all the help i got from my friends last week
friends can be so awesome!
i definitely agree
label: grateful
response: what did they help you with?

situation: i was lonely when my family left for the weekend
dialogue: i was lonely when my family left for the weekend
i am sorry to hear that. where did they go?
mexico. i had to work.
label: lonely
response: oh man, sometimes it is hard to strike that work life balance.

situation: im nervous about an interview next week
dialogue: im nervous about an interview next week
who is the interview with?
a possible employer
label: anxious
response: are you going to wear a suit?

situation: im scared that we will go to war soon
dialogue: im scared that we will go to war soon
war would be terrifying. what makes you think we will?
just general unrest and instability globally
label: afraid
response: yea. seems to be more of that lately.

situation: im frustrated by all the other drivers on the road lately
dialogue: im frustrated by all the other drivers on the road lately
what have they been doing?
just generally driving poorly and not using signals
label: annoyed
response: do you honk at them?

situation: i saw a guy lift a car.
dialogue: i saw a guy lift a car, he was so strong
wow. he must be really strong! why'd he lift the car?
it was a strong man contest.  he was not that big either, just really strong.
label: impressed
response: oh i have heard of those contests. must be exciting to see.

situation: i was shocked by how many people showed up to protest
dialogue: i was shocked by how many people showed up to protest
what is the protest for?
free speech
label: surprised
response: what happened? why were they being limited?

situation: i found a spider in my bathtub
dialogue: i found a spider in my bathtub
they do love to surprise ya, do not they?
yes! i do not kill them if i do not have to.  they eat bugs.
label: surprised
response: interesting. i did not know that. so did you end up taking it outside?

situation: i used to take my children to disney when they were little. we always had a great time.
dialogue: i used to take my children to disney world when they were young, we always had a great time.
family time is so precious. are your kids still with you?
no they are grown.  they are in their twenties now, i miss them.
label: sentimental
response: they grow up so fast sometimes.

situation: i was fired from my job.
dialogue: i was fired from my job.
i am so sorry to hear that!
i was crushed, did not even see it coming.
label: devastated
response: did they say why?

situation: sometimes i wish i could go back to being a teenager.
dialogue: sometimes i wish i could go back to being a teenager
why do you say that?
it was so much easier then.  no responsibilities.
label: nostalgic
response: yea, i totally get ya on that.

situation: sometimes i just wish i could be a hermit and never deal with people.
dialogue: sometimes i just wish i could be a hermit and never deal with people
man, are you me? people been annoying lately?
yes! try to walk through walmart, people are so rude!
label: annoyed
response: here i was hoping a walmart would open in my area. guess it is a good thing there is not one.

situation: i am so excited i get to go to disney in october!
dialogue: i am so excited i get to go to disney in october!
oh which disney? sounds exciting!
disney world! this will be my 6th time.
label: excited
response: what is your favorite thing to do there?

situation: some one ran into my car and drove off!
dialogue: some one ran into my car and drove off
that would make me so mad!  what did you do?
i called the police and my insurance company.  people just have no respect.
label: furious
response: yeah, it bothers me when people do not take responsibility for their actions.

situation: went on a first date. turned out i had chocolate on my face half the date.
dialogue: went on a first date last night. i had chocolate from the appetizer in my beard the entire time.
lol. why did not she tell you?
i do not know. she was strange. i did not notice until i went to the restroom right before i left.
label: embarrassed
response: so you are not gonna see her again?

situation: just had my first cup of coffee in over a year. it made my soul happy.
dialogue: it is been over a year since my last cup of coffee. today was the day i taste the sweet juice of the god's again.
why did you stop?
to show my self i had self control. i was drinking like 5 cups a day.
label: joyful
response: wow. i drink dr pepper like coffee.

situation: someone stole 20$ off my desk at work. my office is private.
dialogue: so i have a private office at work. someone broke in the morning and stole $20 off my desk.
why would you have twenty dollars on the desk
for the vending machine at lunch. i lock my wallet up took 20 out put on my desk. had to run to the bathroom. came back and it was gone. i share my office with no one.
label: angry
response: oh. that is terrible.

situation: got a haircut today. i am a beautiful man.
dialogue: got a fresh cut today. my hair is on fleak. tots i am beautiful.
tots?
totally
label: confident
response: congratulations on your hair.

situation: i have recently visited a 800 year old city, the architecture there is so beautiful.
dialogue: wondering around an 800 year old city, i cannot help myself but to enjoy it is architecture and atmosphere.
where is that
i have been there sometime age, it is in ukraine, kiev.
label: afraid
response: oh id love to visit there one day when its a more stable area

situation: when my first child was born i have never experienced so much happiness in my life.
dialogue: i never thought i could love someone as much as my little baby girl.
i know! it is almost an unexplainable feeling is not it?
yes, it is so hard to describe honestly!
label: joyful
response: but it is also the best feeling ever! enjoy every moment!

situation: i checked out a used car that seemed like it was a good buy, but up close it turned out to be awful.
dialogue: man i cannot believe i almost bought that thing!
what did you almost buy?
i saw this great used car in a print ad, and went to the dealership, but when i got there, it was all ratty and crappy looking!
label: disappointed
response: ah, yea, i have had the once or twice. when you buy used you have to go in with the mindset of haggle down, find a decent one, or leave

situation: the heavy rain yesterday night, brought up some good memories.
dialogue: for some reason heavy rain at night brings up some good memories for me.
i love heavy rain, it just really soothes me.
yes, the sound that it makes when the windows are open.
label: nostalgic
response: i know! also the thunder is so cool to listen to.

situation: i remember feeling not quite right a day ago, but as day progressed i felt better.
dialogue: i was not feeling right a few days ago, but i guess i am alright now.
i did a research on a cancer vaccine
well i meant my mood, not my health in general.
label: sad
response: oh sorry for the mix up

situation: today, i was just people watching and it made me so happy.
dialogue: as i was people watching today i suddenly felt very happy.
what happened to you?
that is a thing, nothing really, i guess i just relaxed for a bit.
label: joyful
response: ok. i hope you are now fine?

situation: i was watching my cat sleep today, and wished for a moment to be him.
dialogue: have you ever wish to switch places with your cat for a day or two?
never. i hate cats personally
how about, dogs?
label: jealous
response: i have come to hate them too unfortunately. constant noise

situation: when i visited the old capital after the earthquake i did not expect for many temple to be intact.
dialogue: after the earthquake  i visited the old capitol, and saw still intact temples.
oh, that is so sad. what earthquake?
it was a 8.6 i believe, but it happened like 2 years ago.
label: surprised
response: oh, that is a big one. i bet it caused a lot of damage

situation: i was watching some stray dogs the other day, one of them was full of ticks i felt sorry for her.
dialogue: i watched a stray dog yesterday that had a lot of tick, i felt bad for her.
aw that is so sad! did you help it?
i did not, i do not know why, maybe because i hate ticks.
label: sentimental
response: i guess that is fair, but i probably would've taken it to the vet.

situation: heavy clouds make me feel bad for some reason.
dialogue: for some reason i never liked cloudy weather.
me neither. it is why i hate living in london
oh i do not know how you guys do it, you must have artificial sun at home?
label: sad
response: nope. we just remain miserable year round

situation: when i listed to the guitar yesterday i felt some tears coming out.
dialogue: i was listening to a guitar play the other day, and it made me cry a little.
music can be so touching to the soul.
yes, especially when you do not expect it to be.
label: sentimental
response: who was the artist of the song?

situation: few days ago my room smelled like a bathroom i even had to get incense.
dialogue: i had to get some incense few days ago, because my room smelled bad.
i like incense. did you find the cause of the bad odor?
yes, it some plumbing problems.
label: disgusted
response: oh well i hope you can fix it soon

situation: i had an insight the other day, that it is okay to be afraid, as long as you are not afraid of that.
dialogue: i realized a while ago, that it is good if you are not afraid of fear.
what made you realize that? you cannot live in fear
yes, but if you do not run away from it, there will not be any fear.
label: terrified
response: it is good to face your fears

situation: sometime the thought that come into my mind make me red.
dialogue: i had some thought come into my mind, and they turned me red.
oh was it a bad or naughty thought?
it was a crazy though actually, but thank god i did not act on it.
label: embarrassed
response: what was it? was it really that crazy?

situation: no matter how much we fought with my siblings, i am ready to be there for them, if they need me.
dialogue: we grew up fighting a lot with my sibling, but i still love them.
i think that happen in a lot of families.
yes, you are right, but we still need to forgive.
label: caring
response: i understand. you were the only one getting hit?

situation: i felt furious when my brother got my new car into an accident last month, it was badly damaged
dialogue: i was really pissed off when my brother ran my new car into a tree last month
ooh my god he hurt himself
thankfully he did not. the tree was uprooted and the car really got damaged as well.
label: angry
response: so bad i can imagine that loose he made to you

situation: i was so scared when i went to watch the new conjuring movie in the theatres at night. the movie was terrifying.
dialogue: i was terrified when i watched the new conjuring movie!
how was it ?
it was really scary!
label: afraid
response: wow i can only imagine

situation: i have faith in the majority of our country that they will start cutting away this massive divide. we need to come together as a nation.
dialogue: i would like to believe our country would come together sooner or later
thats a good thought to have
yeah, i mean. we are all the children of the same nation. time to stop the fight.
label: trusting
response: i totally agree with that

situation: i felt really embarrassed when my grandma walked in on me and my girlfriend the other day. was so awkward!
dialogue: my granny walked in on me and my girlfriend the other day
oh nice
it was really awkward though. i mean,what do you do at that moment!
label: ashamed
response: wait til she leaves and continue

situation: i work in the oilfield a a field geologist.  my work requires me to be away from my family for days, and sometimes weeks at a time.  i feel very isolated and miss home.
dialogue: i often am gone from my home and family for days or even weeks at a time.  i work on remote locations, looking for oil and gas.
sounds like an interesting job.  i am sure it is taxing on the family though.
it is difficult feeling isolated.  i miss them a lot.
label: lonely
response: in the end is the trade off worth it?

situation: i was so thrilled to see robert downey junior the other day. he was so awesome and nice
dialogue: i saw robert downey jr the other day. such an awesome experience
i am so jealous. he is one of my all time favorite actors.
he is so charming and electrifying in person as well. such a nice guy
label: excited
response: were you star struck?

situation: i felt sick when a friend drunkenly threw up on me. i stood there speechless for a moment
dialogue: so get this, my friend once threw up on me after getting drunk
oh no. what did you do?
i was grossed out! i rushed off there immediately
label: disgusted
response: i would have done the same as well

situation: i was irritated to find out my phone company was billing me for things i did not use. i never get the time to follow up on that
dialogue: my phone company was billing me for stuff i did not use
oh no. i am sure you did not feel great when you found out
i was extremely irritated actually
label: annoyed
response: i would be too. hopefully that gets resolved soon

situation: i felt really self assured when i stepped into my job interview the other day. i was totally prepared as well
dialogue: i felt really good about myself when i stepped in for my interview last week
that is exactly the way you are supposed to feel. did you get the job?
yeah, i got it!
label: confident
response: good for you! congrats buddy

situation: i am really looking forward to my future. i just got a new job at a local firm
dialogue: i just got a new job at the local firm
oh yea congrats. what will you be doing
i will be handling the sales section of the firm. so excited about the future
label: hopeful
response: that sounds like a good career

situation: i found my old friend working at my new firm. i was pleasantly shocked
dialogue: i recently found out that my old long lost friend works at my new firm
thats really cool. how did he react?
it is a girl actually, and she was really surprised as well.
label: surprised
response: this is such an awesome coincidence buddy

situation: i was so scared when i went to watch the conjuring movie. i went at night and alone, such a bad idea
dialogue: i was so afraid when i was watching the new conjuring movie
oh yeah, i hear that it is really scary
it was. and i went at night, alone. was such a bad idea
label: terrified
response: oh no. but it gave you such a memorable experience as well, right?

situation: i was so angry when i found out i missed my invitation for a job application through mail. i felt like throwing a punch at the wall
dialogue: i was so angry when our mail service lost a job invitation for me
oh so sorry to hear that. what did you do?
i lodged a compliant. but a missed chance is missed itself
label: furious
response: i hear you. do not worry, things will be ok soon enough

situation: i got in my first bad car accident. the other person ran a red and slammed into the side of my car.
dialogue: a few weeks ago i got in my first real car accident.
i am sorry to hear that.  you were not hurt were you?
i am mostly okay. just a little whiplash. i have never been in more than a fender bender before, so it was not a fun experience.
label: terrified
response: were you at fault?

situation: i always have a sense of pride when i watch my kids. their each achievements warm my heart
dialogue: i always get a sense of pride watching my children
aww. that is so sweet. i bet every parent feel that way
true. i feel like they are my parents who were born as my kids
label: proud
response: oh no. i feel sorry for you buddyt

situation: i was so scared when i went to watch the conjuring movie! the theatre was so silent other than the terrifying sounds coming from the screen
dialogue: i went to see the new conjuring movie in the theater. it was such a terrifying experience
oh wow. is it really as scary as the reviews say it is?
that and much more! especially if you choose to go and watch it alone at night
label: afraid
response: damn, sounds like such a stunning experience

situation: i was so grossed out when a friend of mine threw up on my dress at a party. i was stunned
dialogue: i was so grossed out when a friend threw up on me
i can image, that is pretty disgusting.  what your friend sick or drunk?
he was drunk out of his mind on whiskey. i told him to cut back many times. of well.
label: disgusted
response: you can only do so much.  next time i would just let him drink on his own.

situation: i was so grossed out when a friend of mine threw up on my dress at a party. i was stunned
dialogue: i was so grossed out when a friend of mine threw up on me
oh lord. how did it happen?
we were at a party, he drank way too much and did it.
label: disgusted
response: god. that is really disgusting, yes

situation: i start back at work soon. the beginning of the school year always has me on edge.
dialogue: the school year starts again soon, which means i have to start working again.
that sucks.  how long have you been a teacher for?
this will be my 4th year. i love it, but the beginning of the year is always pretty hectic.
label: anxious
response: yeah i would imagine.  the months off for summer is nice though.

situation: i once gave my credit card to a stranger. he wanted to pay for some medicines
dialogue: i gave my credit card for a stranger to use once
why would you do that?
i felt sorry for the person, she looked trustworthy. and she needed to pay for some medicines for a friend who had accident
label: trusting
response: so, why did not you just pay for them your self?

situation: i felt so alone in my new apartment. i have just moved to a new city for a job
dialogue: i felt so lonely in my new apartment
sorry to hear that. why were you alone?
i have just moved away from my family to a new city for work. so.
label: lonely
response: i hear you. socialize, get new friends. you will start adapting

situation: my friend once threw up on my face at a party. i was so stunned and grossed out
dialogue: my friend threw up on my face once
oh dear lord. was he sick or something?
he was drunk actually, a lot
label: disgusted
response: haha. sorry, i could not help but picturize it.

situation: i felt really nervous when cops pulled me over last week. i thought i was in trouble
dialogue: well, not too bad. i felt really nervous the other day though.
oh no, what happened?
the cops pulled me over, i thought something was wrong
label: anxious
response: holy. what did they want?

situation: i wanted to set all the ingredients at the cooking table last night before i cook. i like seeing it like that
dialogue: i wanted set all the ingredients at the cooking table before i cook last night
i see. any specific reason for that?
i just like to be prepared and organized. that is me.
label: prepared
response: it is really good to have that level of discipline

situation: i wanted to set all the ingredients at the cooking table last night before i cook. i like seeing it like that
dialogue: i want the ingredients all on my table before i cook
same here.  it helps make cooking go smoother.
there is something so nice about being prepared fully
label: prepared
response: agreed.  no sense wasting time while cooking by looking for odds and ends.

situation: i thought about my childhood when i went to a comic book store the other day. felt and smelled so familiar.
dialogue: i thought about my childhood when i went to a comic book store earlier
i bet you did. felt nostalgic huh?
haha. yeah. so much childhood packed into a room
label: nostalgic
response: that is really innocent and sweet of you my friend

situation: i felt like i was with my family when i went to the beach last week. reminded me of those times when we used to go together to see the ocean.
dialogue: i felt like i am with my family again when i went to the beach couple days ago
aww. did you used to go as a family to the beach?
yeah. we took off on the car, all our family and we used to make a whole day out of it
label: nostalgic
response: such a sweet story. so happy just to hear that from you

situation: i was stunned to see how beautiful angelina jolie is. i saw her the other day in a restaurant
dialogue: i was in awe to see the beauty of angelina jolie. met her at a restaurant recently
wow! she is my absolute favorite!
mine too. she is a timeless beauty
label: impressed
response: so true.  i was so jealous of brad pitt over the years

situation: i felt really alone at miami when i moved there. i had moved out of my family home for a new job.
dialogue: i felt really alone in miami when i moved there first
aw. sorry about that my friend. have you made any friends?
a few. i had moved away from my family for a job. cannot ever replace them, right?
label: lonely
response: so true. family is everything!

situation: i was so angry when my brother spoiled my favorite dress when we were kids. he cut animal shapes into it.
dialogue: i got so mad when i saw my brother ruining my favorite dress
oh no, what did he do?
he cut animal shapes into it. when we were kids
label: angry
response: aww, you got to admit that is so cute as well

situation: i felt so happy seeing my high school friends last month. we were at our reunion
dialogue: i was so happy to see my high school friends at our reunion
that is really sweet my friend. it is nice to see old friends
true! all those old memories started rushing in
label: joyful
response: aw, i am missing my high school now that you said it

situation: i am so envious of all those guys who have a sports car. i have always loved sports cars while growing up.
dialogue: i feel such envy when i see guys with sports cars
haha. do you love sports cars that much?
oh yeah. i collected pictures of all the sports cars out there as a child, growing up
label: jealous
response: such passion for cars. wish you can buy one soon mate

situation: a competing firm offered me a job for higher salary if my ditch my current firm. but i did not, i feel satisfied with my situation now.
dialogue: a competing firm offered me a job for higher salary, if i cheated my firm. but i respectfully declined
how much better did it pay?
5k. but i am satisfied with my current firm
label: content
response: that is not too much, i think you made a good choice

situation: i felt so alone in the new city i moved in to. i moved there from my family.
dialogue: i felt so lonely in miami when i moved there from my family
sorry to hear that my friend. why did you move?
i got a new job in here, so.
label: lonely
response: i see. do not worry, you will own your new city soon enough

situation: i felt so alone in the new city i moved in to. i moved there from my family.
dialogue: i felt so alone in my new city
i am sorry to hear that, why did you move there?
thanks, you too
label: lonely
response: i am sorry to hear that, why did you move there?

situation: i felt a warm sensation of childhood when i went to a comic book store the other day. felt like i was a child all over again
dialogue: i felt so happy when i went to a comic book store the other day, felt like i was a child again
did you end up buying anything?
yeah, i bought quite a lot stuff
label: nostalgic
response: well is it close to where you live? that would be cool to go back often

situation: i always make sure to assure myself that i am going to win before i get on to go to an interview. it is important to feel that way for me.
dialogue: i always make sure to self assure myself before i go for an interview
that is a good tactic actually, it boosts your confidence
yeah, and confidence is key in winning those right
label: confident
response: very true. we should believe in ourselves for others to do that

situation: i was filled with despair when my grandma died. she was always the one i relied upon.
dialogue: i was so terribly sad when my granny passed away.
oh my god, sorry to hear that my friend. were you guys close?
yeah, very much. she was the one who looked after me.
label: devastated
response: how sad. find peace knowing that she is in heaven now

situation: my wife was very sick.
dialogue: my wife was sick all last week, so i had to stick by her side.
what did she get sick off , i am sorry to hear that your a great to your wife
she caught a very bad cold. i brought her soup everyday and tended to her every need.
label: caring
response: when i get married i want to be like you , and take care of my loved one

situation: i had to give a presentation at school.
dialogue: i gave a long, drawn out presentation at school the other day. i found the task to be very daunting.
that sounds tough.  how do you think you did?
horrible, my palms were sweaty the entire time. i hate talking in front of large crowds.
label: anxious
response: me, too, i am sorrry you had to go through that.  at least it is over now, right?

situation: my friend got accepted into harvard university.
dialogue: my friend got accepted into harvard university. that is my dream school. i do not understand how someone as dumb as him can get accepted there, and i am stuck at community college.
maybe they know a friend who knows a friend.
that is what i am thinking, it is not what you know it is who you know.
label: jealous
response: yep, that is the way of the world, especially with universities to.

situation: i recently ordered earphones from online
dialogue: i recently ordered earphones online but i receive duplicate product
a duplicate? like a fake?
yes i received a fake product , the make of earphones is very well known brand
label: surprised
response: that  sucks.  i would be very upset.      you have to be careful who you order from online.  some times if the price is too goot to be true its a fake product.

situation: i was driving home from work yesterday after a long day and i realized just as i pulled into my street that i had actually left my bag in the office with my purse, phone and house keys!  i had to travel 40mins back to the office to get them and then 40mins back home again.  i was sooo annoyed and cross with myself!
dialogue: i had the worst day ever yesterday.  i had just finished a long, hard day at work, i had driven the 40 minutes home, was just driving into my street and realised that i had left my bag with phone, purse and most importantly my house keys back in the office!
oh no that is so frustrating! what did you do?

well i wanted to cry and scream, i was so cross with myself but unfortunately as i live alone i just had to drive the 40 minutes back to the office to get them then another 40mins back home.  where i swiftly had a little glass of wine to help.
label: annoyed
response: ah yes, a glass of wine might help to make that feel better. still, what a pain. lousy end to a lousy day.

situation: i did not expect my grandma to send money with my birthday card.
dialogue: i was shocked to see $200.00 included with the card.
was it some fraudulent transaction posted on your account?
no not at all, she justed wanted to make sure i had a good birthday.
label: surprised
response: so, it was your partner who used you card

situation: recently i went for a wildlife safari
dialogue: one month back i went for a wildlife safari , where i was attacked by a wild boar
oh no! was anyone hurt?
ya i had bruises on my leg
label: afraid
response: that is pretty scary.  did the boar survive the ordeal?

situation: my husbands brother was getting married.  my husband was bestman so i wanted to get the most perfect dress.  i spent weeks searching online and in the shops.  i finally found it, tried it on and fell in love with it but could not buy it as i did not get paid until the following week.  the next day my husbands sister called in to see me. she had been shopping and had also found the perfect dress for the wedding.  she took it out and showed it to me and i nearly dropped with shock. it was the exact same dress.  if jealousy could kill she would have been dead on the spot!
dialogue: my husbands brother was getting married.  i searched online and in every shop to find the perfect dress.  i finally found it, tried it on and loved it.  i could not buy it until the following week as i had to wait to payday so i left it over in the store.  the next day my sister in law called in.  she had been shopping and had also found the perfect dress.  she took it out of the bag to show me and i discovered it was the same dress! could not believe it.  oh how i resented her at that moment.
that is very intense. i am sorry you had to experience that.
oh if envy could kill she would have been dead on the spot.  needless to say i got over it and found another dress but just at that moment on that day.
label: jealous
response: that is good. time heals all wounds and can be a powerful cure to pain and disdain.

situation: we got everything ready for the yard sale, but i just could not part with my kids baby items.
dialogue: i never can get myself to give away their baby items.
you are telling me you are a hoarder?
lol no i just cannot part with items that mean a lot to me like my kids baby things like first shirts ect.
label: sentimental
response: everyone is nostalgic one way or another.you are fine

situation: i was walking down the street in my lovely new flowing summer dress.  i thought i was just gorgeous.  suddenly there was a gust of wind which blew my dress up round my ears and i succeeded in flashing my underwear to the whole street.  i was mortified!  so embarrassing.  i got a cheer fromm a group of lads while i had a big red face and tried desperately to pull my dress back down.  i then ran home.  i told my friends and was finally able to laugh about it and see the funny side but at the time i just wanted to run and hide forever!
dialogue: i was walking down the street yesterday in my brand new summer dress.  i though i was gorgeous! suddenly a big gust of wind came and blew my dress up around my ears! where i succeeded in flashing my underwear to the entire street.  oh the embarrassment.
oh my goodness! that is terrible. did anyone see? my face would be bright red.

oh my face was very red indeed and yes unfortunately i got a hugh cheer from a group of lads who witnessed it all.  i was so mortified i just ran home.  later though i chatted about it with my friends and was finally able to laugh about it.
label: ashamed
response: i am sure this will be one of those times where you cringe when you think back on it! i am sure you made those guy's days though

situation: i decided to watch the horror film 'insidious' the other night.  my husband was away for the weekend and i was alone.  i sat with a glass of wine and watched the whole thing.  it was a great story but it did scare me a few times.  after the film, i switched everything off and headed to bed.  it was then that i started hearing noises and seeing shadows and had myself convinced that someone or something was in the house.  of course it was all my vivid imagination but at the time i frightened the life out of myself.  i ended up sleeping with all the lights on!
dialogue: i so get how you feel because i decided to watch insidious the other night on my own.  i scared the life out of myself afterwards because i thought i kept seeing shadows and hearing noises and had myself convinced someone or something was in the house with me!
that is crazy! i am glad there was nothing there.
oh no just my vivid imagination.  i do love a good horror but usually i watch them with my husband.  i am clearly not as brave on my own!
label: terrified
response: some horror movies are so great that they make you consider your own environment.

situation: i helped out a doctor's office that is located within my office tge medical assistant was not good at phlebotomy and old comes over and ask me for my help i had no problem helping . during christmas they dropped off a gift for the providers and myself . i was totally surprised.
dialogue: i helped a doctor's assistant over a couple of months
that is great. i bet it was wonderful experience.
it was she was not really good ans i had no problem helping
label: surprised
response: that is cool. taking that experience into the next phase will be pivotal.

situation: my car had a accident recently
dialogue: my car had a small accident recently
i am sorry to hear that.did you get hurt.
no it was a minor accident , but car got damaged little
label: disappointed
response: do you have full cover?

situation: i was a little nervous to go to walmart today with all the police that were there.
dialogue: i never did find out why there were so many police cars there today.
where did this happen?! were there any other people with you?
in town, i had my kids with me to buy school supplies.
label: afraid
response: did it happen while you were in the store? i hope that your kids did not see anything too disturbing.

situation: i was helping clean out my parents' house the other day and found all my old high school year books.
dialogue: i found my old high school yearbooks that other day.
oh that is pretty cool. what did you think?
i think that i did not appreciate not having to worry about adult stuff back then!
label: sentimental
response: yeah, we were blissfully unaware of the real world in those days. it must have been nice to reminisce.

situation: latey it seems life has been nice and routine.
dialogue: i am feel pretty mucky things have been pretty stable at home.
that has got to feel good!  you must feel very happy and relaxed!
yes i am and thankful since i have 3 young kids at home,
label: content
response: cherish this time you have, because you never know when it could change!

situation: i got a gift card to a restaurant i have been wanting to try for a long time.
dialogue: i got a gift card to a restaurant i have been wanting to try for a long time.
what restaurant is it for?
it is a local non-chain greek restaurant. it is fancy and supposed to be very good.
label: excited
response: sounds good. i love mom n pop restaurants. so much better than big popular restaurants.

situation: i went on a blind date.
dialogue: i went on a blind date last week. honestly, i did not know what to expect at first.
that sounds really interesting. were there any good matches?
it was alright, but it was hard to find common ground at first.
label: anxious
response: well at least you are putting yourself out there. a lot of people give up on finding love.

situation: going to the dentist
dialogue: i have a dentist appointment tomorrow. i think i have a cavity.
oh no, i hate cavities. are you brushing your teeth everyday?
yes, but i think i am genetically hosed when it comes to teeth. i really hate it.
label: apprehensive
response: dang, that sucks. i hope you can find a solution for that

situation: my son got a perfect sat score
dialogue: my son scored a perfect 1600 on the sats!
wow, you must be proud! he might cure cancer next!
i am proud. and he may eventually cure cancer, but i would settle right now for him cleaning his room!
label: proud
response: geniuses do not do chores my friend.

situation: i went to my moms funeral yesterday.
dialogue: i went to my moms funeral yesterday, but surprisingly i was not sad at all. i was at peace because she accomplished a lot during her time here on earth.
i am so sorry to hear about your mom. it is good that you are at peace with it, though.
yeah, she is in a better place now.
label: content
response: but a part of her is still here in you.

situation: my whole family is out of town
dialogue: my husband and sons left town for weekend.
they left you all alone? i bet you feel lonely.
yeah, it was cool for a while, but the house is way to quiet now
label: lonely
response: i know that feeling. i like to keep the tv on to drown out the silence

situation: someone eating my food
dialogue: so, i bought myself a box strawberry frosted pop tarts last week. today i went to go have one for breakfast.gone!
whoever ate it all is evil!
i need to interrogate everyone in this house. i am so angry. you do not mess with mom's pop tarts!
label: angry
response: i know right. i would be so furious!

situation: my neighbor was having a party last night and would not let me sleep.
dialogue: my neighbor was having a party last night and would not let me sleep. i felt like going out there and giving him a piece of my mind!
i would do it! try to be calm about it at first and see how he responds.
no, next time i might snap. they never show any consideration for anybody on the block. they do whatever they want.
label: angry
response: yeah, something should be done about it!

situation: i told a friend i was too busy to have lunch. but that was a lie
dialogue: my friend wanted to go to lunch today. i told her i was busy, but really i just did not want to go.
i have done that before when i was just annoyed with them. do not feel bad!
well, i do feel a little guilty, just sitting here on my couch watching tv
label: guilty
response: who cares! i always like to think of satisfying myself first before others!

situation: the sewer backed up into our house
dialogue: so.the sewer line backed up into our house last week.
oh no! that is a smelly situation to be in. what did you end up doing to fix it?
it was truly disgusting. we had to have a crew of plumbers come in and dig up our yard.
label: disgusted
response: what a pain! i bet that cost a fortune. did they end up repairing all the portions of yard that they had to rip up?

situation: my brother got out of prison.
dialogue: my brother got out of prison yesterday! it felt so good to see him after such a long time.
that must have been a great reunion! who was happier, him or you?
definitely me, i gave him a big bear hug when he walked out those gates.
label: excited
response: he was lucky to have you waiting there for him!

situation: my parents lent me money for a car repair
dialogue: the transmission in my car died last week. such an expensive repair
ugh, i hate when unexpected expenses arise.
fortunately, my parents offered to loan me the money to fix it.
label: grateful
response: well, that was nice of them. i hope you take them out to dinner after you pay them back.

situation: friend lost weight on a diet, i did not
dialogue: my friend and i both did a low-carb diet last month. she lost 8 pounds. i gained 2!
wow, great for her! i am confused as to how you ended up gaining though!
i dunno. water weight? she looks so good now. i am really envious.
label: jealous
response: well, keep at it and you will get where you want to be. it really just comes down to how many calories you take in vs. how many calories you burn per day.

situation: won $100 on a scratch off card
dialogue: on a whim today, i bought a scratch off card at 7/11
please tell me you won a lot of money.
not a lot $100. but that is $100 more than i had when i woke up this morning. i was so surprised i did one of those annoying girly squeals at the check out counter
label: surprised
response: lol that is how i would of reacted too. one hundred dollars can buy you a lot of stuff.

situation: my kids spilled juice on my brand new white carpet.
dialogue: my kids spilled juice on my brand new white carpet. i told them not to brink food, or drinks in the living room. when will they learn?
oh no! that is infuriating. did the stain come out?
yes, but i had to spend extra money to get the carpet shampooed. i gave them a spanking that they will never forget. i am not putting up with this no more.
label: angry
response: hopefully they remember

situation: had food between my teeth
dialogue: i had a salad for lunch yesterday, then went shopping at the mall. when i got home around 7pm i discovered i had a huge piece of spinach between my front teeth!
did you brush it right out?
i did. but dozen of people had already seen it. i was mortified. no one told me!
label: embarrassed
response: maybe you could give them a call on the phone and tell them about your feelings?

situation: my friend invited me to a pool party, but i cannot swim.
dialogue: my friend invited me to a pool party, but i do not know how to swim. i told her i would think about it.
you could go to the party. and then learn how to swim!
i am not sure, i might just stay in the shallow part of the pool.
label: apprehensive
response: yea, and you can bring some water toys to play with!

situation: lost a lot of weight before a wedding i attended
dialogue: i went to a wedding this weekend. i have recently lost a ton of weight so i bought a new dress for the occassion.
awesome! i bet you felt proud at what you accomplished. did you have this goal in mind for a while?
yes. i have wanted to be healthier, but i also wanted to look hot and feel confident at this event.
label: confident
response: how much total weight did you lose, and how long did it take?

situation: going on vacation soon
dialogue: i am leaving for vacation on wednesday!
that is awesome.  i wish i could go.  where are you going?
on a cruise to havana. i am so excited!
label: excited
response: cruises are awesome.  you get to eat as much food as you want.  you will probably put on like 10 pounds

situation: remembered to bring an umbrella
dialogue: i got caught in a huge rainstorm last week. it was a deludge.
aww man, i hope you brought your raincoat.
thankfully i had remembered to put an umbrella in my bag before i left the house.
label: prepared
response: that is good, you do not want to get soaked and catch a cold.

situation: my brother in the army showed up at my football event.
dialogue: my brother in the army showed up at my football event yesterday. i was not expecting him to come. i thought he was still stationed in iraq.
that is amazing. you must have been so surprised and happy!
totally, i was in shock.
label: surprised
response: did you get a video of it?

situation: saw a man eat a ridiculous number of eggs
dialogue: once, at a waffle house near memphis, i heard a man order 15 eggs over-easy.
gee, he must have been really hungry! that is a lot of eggs!
i stayed to watch to see if he'd eat them all. he did. i was very impressed.
label: impressed
response: wow. that is unbelievable. i wonder how his cholesterol is.

situation: tsa made me pull down my pants at the airport yesterday.
dialogue: tsa made me pull down my pants in front of everybody at the airport yesterday. they thought i was a bomb threat.
oh dang, that really sucks. i cannot believe tsa would go that far, it must've been super embarrassing.
yeah, i will never show my face there again.
label: embarrassed
response: dude, you should definitely report it someone or the company because you could probably get something out of it.

situation: riding a roller coaster
dialogue: i rode the largest roller coaster i have ever ridden this summer.
oh yeah, what was it called? i really love roller coasters!
millenium force, in cedar point. it was utterly terrifying.
label: afraid
response: i saw that one on tv. it looks absolutely nuts. i hope to visit cedar point one day!

situation: waiting for college acceptance letters
dialogue: i am waiting to hear back from a few colleges about scholarships.
