situation: over the weekend there was a large spider crawling in my car i was so petrify.
dialogue: the bugs that creep me out the most is those eight legged spiders i seen a huge one in my car this weekend.
i have never liked spiders.
me either i screamed so loud i be afraid thy may crawl on me i would freak out.
label: terrified
response: you should always have bug spray on you at all times.

situation: i hear something tapping outside my bathroom door. i do not know what it is and i am really scared.
dialogue: i hear something tapping outside my bathroom door. i do not know what it is and i am really scared.
that is really scary. are you home alone?
yes! i do not have a gun or anything!
label: terrified
response: i am sure you are fine. i bet it is just a tree branch or something like that. maybe a neighbor could go look for you.

situation: i received a promotion at my job i am so thankful for this opportunity.
dialogue: i got a new position at my job more money and also happy to be recognized for my hard work.
yay, a promotion is always amazing.  when do you start?
i actually started today it was a lot of information to take in but it was such a joy.
label: grateful
response: that is amazing, financial stability can be a life changer.

situation: i hate going to walmart.  people just walk right out in front of you and do not even say excuse me!
dialogue: i hate going to walmart. people just walk right out in front of you and do not even say excuse me!
maybe they are very eager to go a certain item.
maybe. it is that hunter gatherer mentality.  get it before everyone else.
label: annoyed
response: true, because regretfully i act that way sometimes too.

situation: i like to relax on the weekends. it is nice not having anything to worry about.
dialogue: i love being lazy on weekends. it is nice to just relax and have nothing to worry about.
yeah i hear you! do you like to read or watch tv?
both! i spend more time watching tv though. how about you?
label: content
response: i like to do both as well. tv if i am feeling lazy, reading if i feel more ambitious.

situation: my car got soaked from the rain i sat in my seats and got my pants wet and had to walk in the gas station i was ashamed it looked like i wet myself.
dialogue: i can be so forgetful i left my windows down in my car and my seats was full of water.
oh no! how did you dry them?
they are still air drying what makes it worse i sat in the sets and it looked like i wet myself a little embarrassing.
label: embarrassed
response: oh that sounds awful! but at least no one stole anything from your car.

situation: i found a hair in my pizza, and now i cannot eat.
dialogue: i found a hair in my pizza, and now i cannot eat
did you take it back that is so disgusting.
i called them and told them about it. they said the next pizza would be free. i said no thanks.
label: disgusted
response: i would not want another either it takes one time for me to find hair, bug etc and i am done with the restaurant.

situation: i packed for a long road trip, and had everything i would need to hopefully avoid excessive stops.
dialogue: i recently went on a long trip by car. for the first time, it was not stressful because i packed everything i needed for it to run smoothly.
that sounds great! i really pays off to be prepared.
yes it does. i was able to eliminate several meal breaks which cut over three hours off my trip time!
label: prepared
response: that sounds like some efficient planning! i hope you enjoy your trip!

situation: besides my cats being with me i am always alone at home all the kids are grown and moved out.
dialogue: ever since my kids left and went to college i am such a loner.

yes you are right at least i have my cats to keep me company so i am not to much alone.
label: lonely
response: good for you. you can also call your friends to hang out if you have close ones

situation: i did not get to see my favorite character when i went to disney world.
dialogue: i did not get to see my favorite character when i went to disney world.
oh no, i am sorry. did you stay long?
i was there for 4 days.  i wanted to see cinderella but i kept missing her.
label: disappointed
response: maybe she was around, but it was not time for the ball yet.

situation: i arranged a dinner date for me and my husband for his birthday i cannot wait for that night.
dialogue: i have a special dinner arranged for me and my husband this week.
that is wonderful. he will be so excited when he finds out!
yes he will it is his birthday and we can have a night alone no kids just a nice dinner.
label: prepared
response: i hope you guys have a great time. just the two of you.

situation: i went to my first concert last month i seen beyonce i was so amazed such a good show.
dialogue: i went to my first official concert last month i was so amazed it was a surprise to even go there.
concerts can be a lot of fun! will you be going to another one?
yes if they can outdo queen bey we saw beyonce and she put on a awesome show a night to remember.
label: surprised
response: i have never been to a beyonce concert. always sold out! i am glad you got to see her.

situation: i am really pleased with my job performance lately.  i will be getting that promotion for sure.
dialogue: i am really pleased with my job performance lately. i will be getting that promotion for sure.
congratulations! good to hear your hard work is paying off.
yes i am delighted and kinda proud of myself.  i have worked very hard.
label: content

situation: i have put in so many hours at work hoping to get a promotion. fingers crossed it works!
dialogue: i have put in so many hours at work hoping to get a promotion. fingers crossed it works
yeah i hope you get it! i am sure they will recognize the extra time you've been doing.
i really hope so. i have worked 60+ hours a week for the last 6 months.
label: hopeful
response: wow, i hope you are getting paid for all that extra time!

situation: i felt let down by my girlfriend when she decided to move some money out of our joint account. she never told me about that.
dialogue: my girlfriend moved some of our mutual money without letting me know

not really. i do not know what she used it for, she has not told anything to me so far
label: disappointed
response: i know it sucks, but i think you should have an open conversation to your girl about this

situation: im so mad! i cannot find my hair brush!
dialogue: im so mad! i cannot find my hair brush!
that is a tragedy! where do you think you left it? did you check your pockets?
i have checked everywhere.  i think my dog may have snatched it.
label: angry
response: interesting. i hope you do find it. i do not know how you brush your hair.

situation: my husband has been texting a woman he works with.
dialogue: my husband has been texting a woman he works with
how does that make you feel?
very very bad, and suspicious.

situation: i always get all the ingredients on the table before i start to cook. i want to know that i am all set for it
dialogue: i want to see all the ingredients on the table before i start to cook
oh, so you always prepare well huh?
yeah, i am one of those people who want to know everything is set before starting something

situation: i am so happy that i am going to be a grandma
dialogue: i am so happy that i am going to be a grandma

dialogue: i am not going to be able to see my favorite band when they come to town

def leppard.  they are going to be with reo speedwagon and tesla too.

situation: i went to a comic book convention last month. standing among all those super heroes and fantasy world, i felt like i am a kid again
dialogue: i went to a comic book convention last month

situation: i caught my husband looking at another woman
dialogue: i caught my husband looking at another woman
oof that sucks.
yes.  i was not too happy about it.

situation: i am looking forward to this season of the lakers. with lebron coming in, i really think this will turn out to be a fantastic season for them
dialogue: i am really looking forward to this season of the lakers, with lebron coming in

they are on cloud 9! with such a legend on their team, who would not be, right?

situation: im feeling blue because my days and nights are mixed up.

situation: i felt really alone when my dog passed away last month. he was always by my side all the time.

he was old. he was my childhood dog and he was always with me all the time

situation: i am so thankful for my family.  they are the best!

yeah. he always plays pranks, but this one made me furious. i went to him and gave him a punch so that he learns to respect animals
label: furious

dialogue: my cat vomited in the floor and i stepped in it!

situation: i am ready for school to start! i cannot wait to teach my first class.

i gave him a punch right away. that is no way to treat animals.

congrats

situation: i am really looking forward to lebron playing in lakers. this season is going to be legendary for the lakers.

i have to testify as a witness.

situation: i ate eggplant for the first time, and i hated it.

situation: i was so angry when i saw my brother lighting a firecracker tied to my dog's tail. i have never been that angry in my life.
dialogue: i was so mad when i saw my brother lighting up a firecracker tying it to my dog's tail

situation: i was so heartbroken when my dog passed away last month. she was my childhood dog

situation: i want to see all the ingredients neatly lined up on the table before i start to cook. i am very through that way

situation: i felt really alone in florida when i moved there. i had gotten a new job and it was my first time away from family.

situation: i am scared that i will not be able to get up tomorrow morning.

dialogue: we had record rainfall in my town this past spring causing a lot of flooding.
oh no. floodwaters can be devastating. was there a lot of damage?
yes, there was, the town was very damaged. we had sandbagged around our home and managed to save our house.
label: prepared
response: good thing you were prepared.

situation: one of my coworkers took credit for a job i had done last month. they told our boss it was their idea, when they did not even work on the project.
dialogue: i got into a argument with a coworker of mine this past month.
did yall make up
no,  he had taken credit for my work with our boss.
label: angry
response: that is not good

situation: i had a big fishing trip planned for last weekend. it ended up raining all weekend, so i did not get to go.
dialogue: i had a big fishing trip planned for this past weekend, but it got rained out.
will you get to make it up?
does not seem like it. my job makes it very difficult to schedule time off.
label: disappointed
response: i am sure you will find time

situation: a friend of mine during college got invited to try out for a major league baseball team. he ended up making their minor league team.
dialogue: a friend of mine got to try out for a professional baseball team.
oh wow, how did he do
he made their minor league team, and if he does well, maybe the pro team.
label: impressed
response: that is so cool

situation: last week during a presentation i knew i was going to do well.  i had spent weeks learning the material.
dialogue: last week i had a big presentation at work, which i knew i was going to do well on.
that sounds like something that could really show off your talents.
i sure did, i had spent weeks learning the material, and really impressed my boss.
label: confident
response: that is great! hope your hard work pays off.

situation: i went to a comic book convention the other day. among all those people, i felt like a child again.
dialogue: i went to comic-con this year. i felt like i was a child all over again
how expensive is that to go to?
depends on where you live. i spent 1000 bucks on it
label: nostalgic
response: that is not too bad if you had a good time though

situation: i felt so alone after my dog trevor passed away. he was always by my side over these years
dialogue: i felt so alone after my dog trevor passed last year
the loss of a pet is heartbreaking. i know how you feel. how old was trevor.
he was 9. his time hadn't come, but i guess life is that way sometimes.
label: lonely
response: life is hard. but remember he did not die he went to his forever home.

situation: i was feeling alone in the city of miami after i moved there. it was my first time staying away from family
dialogue: i was feeling so lonely in miami after i moved there
sorry to hear that.  have you since been able to overcome your loneliness?
i think so. i have made some friends. it was my first time being away from family
label: lonely
response: i understand feeling like a duck out of the pond.  glad to hear you've made progress.

situation: i am really nervous about my upcoming job interview. i am concerned i might screw it up
dialogue: i feel so nervous about my upcoming job interview
do not feel nervous, you need to be confident!
i know. but i have this feeling inside me that i would screw up
label: anxious
response: it is hard to push that feeling away sometimes, i know.

situation: i am so thrilled about lebron joining the lakers. finally something to get us all riled up!
dialogue: i am so hyped about lebron  joining the lakers!
that is exciting! i am guessing you are a lakers fan?
yeah i am! we finally have something that unite and rally us behind our team for a season
label: excited
response: what team was he on before?

situation: i am feeling so nervous about my dad going to check his heart tomorrow. i really hope no bad news comes off it.
dialogue: i am feeling so nervous about my dad getting his heart checked tomorrow
i understand that, i will pray for you
thank you so much. i am just hoping not to get any bad news
label: apprehensive
response: that makes sense, i wish you both the best of luck and health!

situation: when i look at my kid doing exceedingly well in his academics, i have such a warm sensation in me. i wish he becomes the best
dialogue: when i look at my son doing great in studies, it makes me so proud!
how old is he?
he is 13. he has been a straight a student always.
label: proud
response: wow, great job so far, kep up the great parenting!

situation: i went to watch the annabelle movie in the theatres. it was so scary and i was kicking myself for going alone at night
dialogue: i went to watch the annabelle movie in the theatres. it was a terrifying experience
was not that out a long time ago? it must've been super scary if you still remember it.
yeah, it has been a while. i went at night, alone. so you can imagine the impact!
label: terrified
response: wow, i would not have been brave enough to do that!

situation: i always feel such envy when i see someone driving a red sports car. it has always been my dream to own one.
dialogue: i always feel a bit of jealousy when i see someone driving around in a red sports car
yes, it is hard to see people with things you cannot afford to buy for yourself.
i feel that way about red sports car only though. i have always dreamed of owning one as a kid.
label: jealous
response: yes, i like the color red as well. i have actually own a couple red sports cars.

situation: i just took my last finals in college. i spent the entire night studying so i knew the material very well.
dialogue: i just took the last of my college finals and i stayed up all night studying the material.
it is great to be thorough and prepared. are you expecting to perform well?
i know i did well, i had the material all memorized and knew the answers to all the questions.
label: prepared
response: that is nice, i wish you the very best for your results!

situation: i was super irritated when my boss kept pulling my hair for fun. he does not seem to realize how irritating it can be.
dialogue: i was super irritated when my boss kept pulling my hair for fun!
i can see why! that is highly inappropriate.
he seems to think otherwise for some reason. i am thinking about reporting him to the hr.
label: annoyed
response: you should. he is obviously at the very least flirting with you and at worst harassing you

situation: i am going out to dinner with my wife to a place we have not been to since i proposed to her. i cannot wait.
dialogue: i am going out to dinner with my wife to a place we have not been to since i proposed to her. i cannot wait.
oh wow, that is going to be such a sweet experience!
i hope so. it ended up being the best restaurant we ever went to and it will be nice to rekindle out early romance.
label: excited
response: that is very true. i sincerely wish you both to have a wonderful time!

situation: i always get sad thinking about my mom. she passed away when i was 12.
dialogue: i always feel down and blue when memories of my mom come in my mind. she passed when i was 12
i am so sorry to hear that. do you have things of hers that remind you of her often?
yeah. i have kept a collection of her things, just so that she always stays in my life.
label: sentimental
response: that is beautiful that you have those things of hers. mothers are very special people.

situation: i was so excited to go to flower & garden festival at epcot this year. i could not wait to try all the food and see the beautiful gardening.
dialogue: i was so excited to go to flower & garden festival at epcot this year. i could not wait to try all the food and see the beautiful gardening.
i have been to that, it is such a wonderful experience. you are going to love it!
i absolutely love going to disney and the festivals at epcot are such a great experience each time. we go to food & wine each year and the seminars are my favorite part! it is so exciting!
label: joyful
response: you seem to have a great taste in spending your free time. i wish you get to have a splendid time in there!

situation: i was heartbroken when my dog trevor passed away last month. i shut myself off from the outside world for days.
dialogue: i was heartbroken when my dog trevor died last month.
i am sorry to hear about that. how did he die?
he was ran over by a truck. i cannot even try to imagine that
label: devastated
response: yeah i bet.  i am sorry for your loss

situation: i hurt my back and cannot mow the grass so it is getting long and everyone elses lawn look so nice. it is embarrassing.
dialogue: i hurt my back and cannot mow the grass so it is getting long and everyone elses lawn look so nice. it is embarrassing.
how did you hurt your back?
i really do not know. i woke up at it was tight then it just kept getting worse as day went on. its been a week now.
label: ashamed
response: ohh wow! i hope it gets better for you

situation: a friend of mine borrowed my lawn mower. he ended up bringing it back broken.
dialogue: a friend of mine borrowed my mower this past weekend, which he brought back broken.
did you ask him to replace it?
he said it was not his fault and it just stopped working. of course the blade is bent, so i think he might be lying.
label: annoyed
response: i agree with you there, i would ask him to pay honestly

situation: my local animal shelter donated a dog to me because of my service connected disability. it was such a nice surprise
dialogue: my local animal shelter donated a dog to me because of my service connected disability. it was such a nice surprise
that is nice. how  do you like the dog?
he is my best friend and i think he needs me as much as i need him.
label: grateful
response: that is so sweet. my apartments do not allow pets

situation: i love when i go somewhere and for some reason or another it reminds me of my childhood. it makes me feel so good.
dialogue: i love when i go somewhere and for some reason or another it reminds me of my childhood. it makes me feel so good.
that is for sure, especially a smell that just throws you back
omg yes! sometimes it is a sound or just a feeling you get for no reason. it is like comfort food .lol
label: nostalgic
response: exactly, sometimes i just smell a good barbeque and that brings me back to those summer days as a kid, life is great sometimes

situation: i was suppose to go on vacation last month with my family. i ended up catching the flu and could not go with them.
dialogue: i was suppose to go on vacation with my family last month, but i caught the flu and could not go.
that stinks.  i am sorry to hear that
yeah, i was looking forward to sitting on the beach and relaxing.
label: disappointed
response: i bet! it seems like fun

situation: i am celebrating me and my wife's 5 year anniversary tomorrow and i am excited about it.
dialogue: i am celebrating me and my wife's 5 year anniversary tomorrow and i am excited about it.
congratulations. fun plans?
just going out to dinner and then a romantic night at the beach.
label: joyful
response: awww. i am jealous

situation: when we moved into our house, we found a small kitten that someone had dumped. we took it in and now he is 9  years old.
dialogue: years ago when we moved into our home, we found a young kitten that had been abandoned.
awww. did you keep it?
yes, we did. he was so cute we took him in, and now he is 9 years old.
label: caring
response: that is great. i know he appreciates it

situation: i feel very ready for my college exam.
dialogue: i feel very ready for my college exam.
that is great. i hope you do well!
thank you. i think it will be easy!
label: prepared
response: good luck!

situation: my rabbit died last year, i miss her to this day.
dialogue: my rabbit died last year, i miss her to this day
how old was it
i had her for about 10 years.
label: sad
response: they live that long ? interesting

situation: i asked my boss for a raise. i am pretty sure that i will get it.
dialogue: so i asked my boss for a raise today.
how'd that go?
it went well, i am pretty sure that i will get it!
label: confident
response: well congratulations! that must have been nerve-wracking.

situation: my neighbor bought a new car. now i really want one myself.
dialogue: so my neighbor just bought a new car. i swear, he always gets really expensive stuff to show off how successful he is.
that stinks. maybe he is going through something that only new stuff can solve
maybe. but still. now i feel like i need to buy one myself.
label: jealous
response: do it! i bet you deserve it

situation: last year my wife got into an accident and we only had one car and i was so worried we would not have a car to get to work
dialogue: last year my wife got into an accident and we only had one car and i was so worried we would not have a car to get to work
did you make special arrangements so things went smoothly with one car?
we did not have many options but the other persons insurance ended up taking care of it all so we got a rental and the car got fixed but i was so scared .
label: terrified
response: well i am glad it worked out

situation: i found drugs in my son's room. i am beyond infuriated!
dialogue: last night i found something in my son's room that made me so mad!
what did you find?!
drugs! i found drugs. i cannot believe this.
label: furious
response: oh no, are you going to talk to him about the dangers of drugs?

situation: a tv show i like is getting another season. i was not expecting it, so i am pretty happy.
dialogue: do you remember that show i was telling you about the other day? it is getting a new season!
remind me, which show was that?
the one with the three cops that can never agree with each other but end up solving the cases anyway. i am so happy about this news!
label: joyful
response: that is so cool!  i am gonna have to check it out

situation: i found an old picture of me with my grandmother. it brings back good memories.
dialogue: i was going through some boxes today, and i found a really old picture of me with my grandmother.
that is nice. are you going to hang it up?
yeah, definitely. it brings back really good memories.
label: sentimental
response: great, you've found an old treasure.

situation: my girlfriend broke up with me recently. now i am very lonely.
dialogue: my girlfriend broke up with me recently.
i am sorry. how long had you been together?
we were together for 3 years. i cannot stand being alone.
label: lonely
response: just try and get through each day, one at a time. do not think too far ahead.

situation: i keep hearing noises coming from the basement. i want to go check it out, but i am somewhat afraid.
dialogue: i keep hearing noises coming from my basement.
that sounds scary.  are you going to investigate?
i want to, but i am a bit scared. maybe i should take something with me to defend myself, just in case.
label: afraid
response: if this were a movie, i would be yelling at the screen for you to leave the house and not go down there.

situation: my son failed a really important test. now he might not be able to graduate, and i am really disappointed in him.
dialogue: i cannot believe this! my son failed a really important test.
i am so sorry to hear that.  is he planning to retake the test?
i sure hope so. otherwise he might not be able to graduate.
label: disappointed
response: what test?

situation: the other day i dropped my son off at school.
dialogue: they other day was my son's first day of school, and when i dropped him off it brought back so much memories.
that is great. is that your only son?
yes, he is my only son. i cannot wait until he get's his first girlfriend like i did in middle school. those were the days.
label: nostalgic
response: i am sure the memories will be great

situation: i just found out that i have been walking around all day with a hole in the back of my pants. i cannot believe that no one told me.
dialogue: so i have been walking around all day with a huge hole in the back of my pants. i just found out about it.
oh wow! hopefully no one saw it
if they did, no one told me about it! so embarrassing.
label: embarrassed
response: i am sorry about that. i have gone through that before. laughter can be good medicine sometimes

situation: a new game that i have been looking forward to is coming out soon. i have been saving up money for it, and i cannot wait!
dialogue: so that new game that i have been looking forward to is coming out in a few weeks!
what is it called ?
oh, i am sure it is not one that you've heard of. i am pretty excited though, i have been saving up money for it for a few months now.
label: excited
response: okay, well i guess i am happy for you then.

situation: i caught my neighbor letting his dog poop on my lawn.
dialogue: yesterday, i caught my neighbor letting his dog poop on my lawn. i had a few choice words for him.
that is understandable.  how receptive was he to your complaint?
he was not to happy about me confronting him. i told him if it happens again it might get physical.
label: furious
response: oh, so it got pretty serious.  i guess he needs to learn to respect boundaries.

situation: when going through some boxes, i found some of my childhood toys. they brought back memories of a happier time.
dialogue: i was going through some boxes in my attic today.
did you find anything?
yeah, i found some old toys from my childhood. so many memories came flooding back into my mind.
label: nostalgic
response: i bet that was very nostalgic for you.

situation: my coworker got the promotion that i was trying for. i feel like i deserved it more.
dialogue: i cannot believe that my coworker got the promotion that i was going for. this is ridiculous.
that is a hard hit to take.  why do you suspect they got it?
i honestly have no idea. i was definitely more deserving of that position.
label: angry
response: so what are you going to do about?  are you going to start looking for another place to work?

situation: i made a big mistake on a project for work. now i am afraid that it will hurt my career.
dialogue: i am so ashamed of myself. i made a big mistake on a project for work.
what did you mess up?
it was something for an important client. now i am afraid this is going to screw up my career.
label: ashamed
response: i am sure you will be fine.  have you made many similar mistakes in the past?

situation: i bought a used car a few years ago and found 500 dollars tucked in the back seat!
dialogue: i bought a used car a few years ago and found 500 dollars tucked in the back seat!
wow, that is nice. i hope you treated yourself to something extravagant!
oh i spent it on a few things. i was just surprised someone did not find it when it was being cleaned.
label: surprised
response: i guess they did not do as good a job as they should have,. wish my car dealership had missed a few hundred bucks!

situation: i am going camping this weekend. i am going to make sure that i have all of the supplies that i need.
dialogue: i am going camping with my kids this weekend.
how fun! in a tent or an rv?
in a tent. i just have to make extra sure that i pack all of the supplies that we'll need.
label: prepared
response: do not forget a first aid kit! we always need those on camping trips!

situation: on my way home today there was someone in the fast lane going so slow in front of me.
dialogue: on my way home today there was someone in the fast lane going so slow in front of me.
ugh, that is so annoying.  how long did you have to follow behind them?
about 5 miles. there was too much trafic in the slow lane, could not get over
label: annoyed
response: i hope you were not late for anything important!

situation: i was watching television and came across a bunch of old cartoons that i watched when i was a kid. i sat and watched them for a while, because they reminded me of my childhood.
dialogue: i was watching television earlier today when i came across a channel that was showing a bunch of cartoons that i loved when i was younger.
memory lane right there! which cartoons?
it was a whole bunch of different ones from the 90's. man, they really reminded me of my childhood.
label: nostalgic
response: very cool i have not seen the older style cartoons myself in years.

situation: i keep getting phone calls with someone making strange sounds on the other end. it is creepy and i do not know what to do.
dialogue: i keep getting strange phone calls. it is creeping me out.
that would creep me out too what kind of calls??
the person on the other end just keeps making really weird sounds until i hang up. i am not sure what i should do about it.
label: terrified
response: alright that would creep me out too. block the number or change yours! weird.

situation: my boyfriend kept claiming he was not drinking, but i found out he was lying about it. i found a bunch of empty liquor bottles in his room.
dialogue: my boyfriend told me he quit drinking, but i just found a bunch of empty liquor bottles he hid in his room.
uh oh. are you going to confront him about it?
absolutely, but it probably will not go well. he needs help but he will not accept it.
label: furious
response: well i hope that he actually listens to you this time and gets help.

situation: i am getting a promotion at work! i have been working toward it for a while now, and it has paid off!
dialogue: yay! i am finally getting a promotion at work!
congratulations, that is awesome! i hope you are getting a raise too!
yeah, a raise will definitely come with it. i have put a lot of work into this, and it finally paid off!
label: excited
response: hope you treat yourself to celebrate, you deserve it!

situation: i am up for a promotion at work soon. several other people are up for the same promotion, but i am hoping that i am picked.
dialogue: so i might be up for a promotion soon at work!
that sounds amazing! when will you find out?
soon. there are several other people trying to get the same position, but i am pretty hopeful that things will work out in my favor.
label: hopeful
response: you sound positive so i am sure you will get it!!

situation: a guy pulled a realy big knife out on my husband at a gas station once.
dialogue: we went to get gas one night and my husband and an altercation with some guy, guy pulledoutabig knife in the storeand by our car at the gas station.
omg, that is so scary! are you okay? did you call the police?
yes we called the police he was arrested!
label: terrified
response: that is good to hear! people are crazy

situation: i envy my friend who is off work today
dialogue: i envy my friend who is off work today
i bet.  it is nice to have a day off every now and then
it definitely is
label: jealous
response: i like having days off to do absolutly nothing.  it helps with stress.

situation: my cat keeps climbing up the curtains in my room. i really wish he would stop.
dialogue: ugh, my cat keeps climbing up the curtains in my room.
that is the worst.  is it damaging the curtains too much?
yeah, he is tearing them up. i really wish he'd stop.
label: annoyed
response: is there anything you can put on them or near them to stop him?

situation: recently we decided to rescue another kitten. we were so thrilled to be adding another furry member to our family and save a life.
dialogue: we have decided to adopt another cat from the shelter!
that is great! adopt, do not shop! always a great motto!
agreed, that is my motto! this is a high-kill shelter too, so we'll definitely be saving a life
label: excited
response: that is great, i commend you!

situation: i am nervous for a meeting i have later
dialogue: i am nervous for a meeting i have later
have you prepared enough for it?
yeah i believe so
label: anxious
response: well  i am sure you be fine. just relax.

situation: im happy with my health for the first time in a few years
dialogue: im happy with my health for the first time in a few years
that is good to hear! have you been eating healthy?
yes definitely, and getting plenty of exercise
label: content
response: that is great! keep up the good work!

situation: my dog refuses to eat the food i bought for him. i bought a huge bag of it, so it is rather irritating.
dialogue: i bought some new food for my dog, and he refuses to eat it.
thats strange, my dog will eat anything
yeah, that is what i thought about mine too. i bought a huge bag of the stuff, too. it is so irritating.
label: annoyed
response: maybe he will start warming up to it soon

situation: my coworker gave a really good presentation at work today. i was pretty awed by the work that she put into it.
dialogue: my coworker gave a really nice presentation at work today.
about what?!
oh it was just boring work stuff, about a client. but i was really awed by the amount of work that she put into it.
label: impressed
response: that is awesome. i am glad she did well.

situation: i was working hard, hoping to get a raise after over 6 months of extra work and doing a great job, but it did not happen. my boss kept me at the same pay.
dialogue: i have been working hard and doing a great job for several months, but still no raise.
thats always a bummer when you put in such work and get nothing in return
yeah, especially when my boss promised to pay me more. might be time to quit!
label: disappointed
response: oh i just quit a few weeks ago due to a similar situation actually! never been happier!

situation: im nervous about taking a test soon
dialogue: im nervous about taking a test soon
did you study for it or are you winging it?
i feel pretty prepared
label: anxious
response: do not worry then.  you did you part! i am sure you will do fine!

situation: my roommate is gone for the week. i cannot stand being alone in the apartment.
dialogue: my roommate is gone for the week, on a business trip. it is way too quiet around here.
maybe you should try and have a party?
that is a good idea. i cannot stand being alone in this place much longer.
label: lonely
response: yes being alone is not very fun.

situation: my birthday is coming up in a week. i am going to be seeing friends that i have not seen in years.
dialogue: my birthday is coming up next week. i am really looking forward to it.
what will your new age be?
i will be turning 35. and some friends are coming that i have not seen in years, it will be great to see them again.
label: anticipating
response: you should have a great time, congrats on the new age!

situation: my wife and i got divorced four years ago. the house was very quiet without her and the kids being there.
dialogue: my wife and i got a divorce. the house is so quiet without her and the kids being here.
i went through a similar thing a few years back.  everything seemed hollow to me.  how long has it been?
about two years now and everything still seems very odd to me.
label: lonely
response: if your depressed, speak to someone.  if it is just adjusting to the change, that comes in time.

situation: i lost a really important document at work. i am afraid to tell my boss about it.
dialogue: uh oh. i am in trouble now.
why is it that you are in trouble?
i lost a really important document at work. telling my boss is going to be so embarrassing.
label: embarrassed
response: can you just replace the document?

situation: there was a guy at a place i worked at that was stalking me. he would write me creepy letters, come by to talk to me, and try to follow me home.
dialogue: there is a creepy guy that comes by at work that will not stop bothering me. he writes crazy letters, and keeps calling on the phone "just to chat" with me.
i would be reporting that to the police for sure.
i tried. they said they cannot do anything unless he actually tries to physically harm me, which is insane to me.
label: terrified
response: that is true right. i forgot how stupid the law can be sometimes. that is insane.

situation: my father was diagnosed with stage 4 brain cancer. it only took a few months for him to pass away because of it.
dialogue: my father was diagnosed with stage 4 brain cancer.
oh no! i am so sorry to hear that. that must be very difficult for you and your family.
yes it was. it only took a few short months and my father passed away due to it being inoperable.
label: sad
response: i am so sorry for your loss. i hope that you find peace in this difficult time.

situation: i was starting a new job and so thrilled to be doing something different. i would been at my old job for 6 years.
dialogue: i am starting a new job next week! cannot wait to be doing something different for a change!
that is great. what will you be doing at your new job?
thanks! graphic design mostly. at my old job i was a manager and it was horrible.
label: excited
response: sometimes being a manager is the worst job you can have at a place, you seem to be the one who gets blamed for everything.

situation: i got passed over for a promotion at work. the guy that got it was qualified, but i really wanted the job.
dialogue: recently, i got passed over for a promotion at my job.
aw man, that sucks. promotions usually are not given fairly in my experience. was that the case for you too?
no, the guy that got it was qualified, it is just i really wanted the job. it would have really help my career.
label: disappointed
response: i will keep my fingers crossed for you that you get that promotion next time!

situation: i bought a lottery scratch off ticket and won $5000. i was so happy.
dialogue: i bought a scratch off lottery ticket the other day, and won $5000.
that is amazingly lucky! good for you!
i almost passed out, i have never won so much money before.
label: surprised
response: that is great! i wish i was lucky like that!

situation: i took my cat to the vet because he was not acting normal, and we found out he was going to have to be put down.
dialogue: had to take my cat to the vet. he is got a bad injury on his paw and it hasn't been healing.
awh poor baby. i am sure itll get better now tho! how old is he?
he is 8 years old. they are going to have to put him down turns out he has feline aids
label: sad
response: ugh noooo! that is terrible i am so sorry.

situation: one of my artworks was selected to be displayed in an art exhibition. i felt great about the effort i put in to get to that point.
dialogue: one of my art pieces has been chosen to be put in a exhibition!
i would be so excited! did they pay you for it?
have not been paid for it yet, but people that visit are welcome to put in an offer for anything they see! fingers crossed someone wants mine!
label: proud
response: hopefully! that would be so amazing!

situation: i was outside relaxing watching the kids play in the pool.
dialogue: i was enjoying the morning watching the kids play in the pool.
that sounds like such a fun, peaceful morning. so jealous you have a pool, it is been scorching outside!
well it is only a kiddie pool, kids are very little. it was a very nice morning.
label: content
response: ah okay, nice for the kiddos then. they grow up fast, so hold onto these moments while you can:)

situation: i was really mean to my sister as a child, and i still feel bad about it. she is sensitive and i know it probably still bothers her.
dialogue: as a child, i was mean to my sister all the time and i still feel awful about it.
aw, well when your younger you do not do those things on purpose. i think everyone is mean to their siblings every now and then.
true, but she is very sensitive. i am sure it still bothers her. i try to make up for it today, but i never can take those things back.
label: guilty
response: have you talked to her about it? maybe she does not really think about it anymore.

situation: after tellinh my husband i did not want a gift for mothers day. he still surprised me with a gift and dinner.
dialogue: my husband and i lostour daughter 2years ago and i do not care to celebrate mother's day and he still impressed me with a gift
i am so sorry to hear about your loss. what did he get you?
he got my favorite flower, an orchid a card and made dinner
label: surprised
response: that was very nice of him. i am glad you have a nice husband.

situation: i just went to get an oil change the other day, and after i dropped it off, the mechanic said i did not need one for another 1,000 miles. felt like such a fool.
dialogue: went to get an oil change the other day. turns out i did not need one for another 1,000 miles, and i felt like such a fool.
well better to be sooner than later on something like that. do not be hard on yourself.
agreed, and it had been 5 months so i figured i was due. the mechanic was really condescending which was what made it embarrassing!
label: embarrassed
response: that is so silly its none of his worry. he needs to hush up.

situation: one of my cats managed to lock himself in the bathroom the other night, and i still cannot figure out how he did it. that is pretty amazing for having no opposable thumbs.
dialogue: my cat somehow managed to lock himself in the bathroom last night. i still cannot figure out how he did it.
wow! he sounds like a super smart cat! how did you get him out of there?
he is! well, both smart and dumb haha. had to use a knitting needle to pick the lock!
label: impressed
response: well at least you managed to save him!

situation: i had a coworker at one job that just would not stop talking. she would hold you for 30 minutes, just chatting away about nothing.
dialogue: i have got a coworker with zero social skills, and it is driving me batty. she cannot seem to tell no one wants to listen to her talk for 30 minutes straight.
oh man, i have definitely had a few coworkers like that myself before. what does she even talk about?
if you make a comment on anything, say cats, she will go into a monologue about everything she is ever learned about a cat (most of it wrong).
label: annoyed
response: that is the worst! some people, once they get started, they just cannot stop themselves. it is like opening a can of pringles.

situation: once i went to the employee breakroom to complain about an annoying client to my coworkers, and when i left i saw she had been sitting outside the door the entire time where she could hear. it was humiliating and i felt so bad for her.
dialogue: we had an annoying client the other day, and i went to the breakroom to complain about her to my coworkers (thinking she could not hear).
did it feel good to get it out?
it did at first, until i left the room and saw she was sitting right by the door where she could hear everything! it was humiliating and i felt really bad for her after that.
label: embarrassed
response: oh no, that is awkward! did you get in trouble for it?

situation: i found some orphaned kittens on my stoop. their mother had been hit by a car. i took them in, bottle fed them round the clock, and then found them wonderful homes when they were old enough,
dialogue: i found some baby kittens in my yard, their mother was dead. i nursed them to health and found homes for them.
that is heartbreaking, but you are amazing for doing that. cats are my favorite and i have rescued many animals. it is a lot of work.
they are my favorite, too. i love how independent they are.
label: caring
response: yes, and when they love you it feels special, because they do not love everyone like dogs do. you've racked up a lot of good karma for saving them!

situation: i have got a lot of bills that are overdue, and cannot afford to pay them yet. i am really worried about my financial future right now.
dialogue: finances are not great right now. i have got a lot of bills that are overdue, but i cannot afford to pay them
i am there too. struggling each day. it really gets old.
i am sorry we are both in this situation. it really sucks, and it feels unfair because it is not for lack of effort.
label: anxious
response: yeah, that is right. i have been pushing 70 hours working a week for as long as i can remember. hold out, maybe it will change.

situation: i had to take my cerification test for medical assistant, i studied day and night for months!
dialogue: i was out of school for over a year and thought i forgot everything before taking this big test
you would be so suprised at how much stays all the way in the nooks and crannies of your brain when you take a break!
i know it was nerve wrecking but studying all the time and i mean al the time paid off
label: confident
response: i am glad it paid off for you, you must be super proud!

situation: i lost my job a few years ago due to cut backs, they were not making enough money. that job was everything to me.
dialogue: a few years back i got laid off from my job because they were losing too much money. it broke me, i really loved that job.
oh no, i am so sorry. what did you do?
to be honest, i fell into a pretty deep depression. no one wanted to hire me. it was tough.
label: devastated
response: that is tough. that must have been quite the trying time. did you eventually find work?

situation: im stoked to go see some old friends tomorrow night
dialogue: im stoked to go see some old friends tomorrow night
good, how long has it been since you saw them last?
about a year and a half!
label: excited
response: i hope you all have some fun.

situation: i look forward to fall every year, and cannot wait for it to come this year in particular. it is been unbearably hot where i live.
dialogue: i am so ready for fall it is been incredibly hot all summer, and i need my favorite season to hurry up & get here!
oh yes, fall is definitely my favorite season as well! i love fall scents!
me too! wearing comfy sweaters, snuggling up with a hot drink, and fall smell on the air.cannot wait for it!
label: anticipating
response: it is the best season, by far! plus, halloween!

situation: somehow i had a fruit fly infestation in my apartment the other day. i think it is because i had some old vegetables i did not throw away. it was gross.
dialogue: a bunch of fruit flies appeared in my apartment out of nowhere the other day. i think it is because of some old veggies in my fridge. totally gross.

oh man, those things are awful and reproduce like crazy.  we left our house for a week and came back to tons of them everywhere! the best trick is putting a little apple cider vinegar in a jar, a drop of dish soap on top of that and cover it with cling wrap and put holes in it.  they will gravitate toward it and you will catch a bunch! just keep changing it every few days.
thanks for the tip, i will try that! i cleaned out the fridge and most of them seemed to just go away. i have no idea where they go but do not really care either as long as they are gone!
label: disgusted
response: seriously, gone is good.  they do have bacteria on them and lay their eggs on fruit and veggies and the larva burrow into the fruit or veggie so its good you trashed it all. glad you are free of them!

situation: i am getting married next year, and i am really looking forward to it. i am hoping it is going to go well, and we'll get to have everything we want to have.
dialogue: i am getting married next year! hoping everything goes smoothly and we get the wedding we want to have.
that is so exciting! it can be stressful and expensive planning a wedding.
boy are you right about that. i was really excited during the early planning stages, but it is been stressful ever since.
label: hopeful
response: it really gets stressful when you get down to the last minute. you are always so worried you are going to forget something.

situation: my friends threw me a baby shower that i did not know about.
dialogue: my friends went ahead and gave me a baby shower that i did not know about.
oh that was nice of them
yeah, they had told my husband about it so he could get me there.
label: surprised
response: haha that is pretty fun

situation: i have got a pet hamster that hasn't been doing well. i am scared that he might not live much longer.
dialogue: i have an adorable hamster that does not look like he is doing well. he is on the old side for hamsters, and i am worried he will not live much longer.
oh no, i am sorry to hear that. i hope that he gets to feeling better. how old is he?
thank you, me too! he is a little over 2 years old. i would hate to lose him, but they usually do not live more than 2-3 years.
label: afraid
response: oh i see, i can understand your concern. perhaps he will live longer than most hamsters!

situation: i started back at my old job recently. a lot has changed but i was also really looking forward to it as i love the work.
dialogue: i went back to work for my former company recently. they laid me off a few years ago when things were tough. coming back was a little scary but i was thrilled!
that is awesome!  i would be really excited if i were in yyour shoes!
yes, that is exactly how i felt. i suspected they'd been in trouble for a while so when they asked me to come back and help them out it felt really good.
label: excited
response: i hope you go far in your job!  good luck!

situation: im upset that my neighbor's dog is sick
dialogue: im upset that my neighbor's dog is sick
that is quite upsetting. do you know what ails it?
no they are at the vet now
label: sad
response: well i certainly hope that the dog gets to feeling better. are you close friends with this canine companion?

situation: i had spent ages organising a lovely romantic weekend away for me and my husbands 10th anniversary.  i had a whole spa day organised, then a great concert that night, to class dinner, everything organised.  i had also booked my parents in for babysitting for the weekend.  i was so excited as we never spend any time alone together.  however the day before we were due to go my 2 year old daughter woke up covered in spots.  as the day went on she got more and more, with a roaring temp and we realised she had chicken pox.  she got a pretty bad dose of them and of course wanted no one but her mum and dad so are weekend away was not to be.  i was so devastated but hey, kids always come first.
dialogue: well i had spent the good part of a week organising the best weekend away with my hubby for our 10th wedding anniversary. spa day, great dinner, concert and of course the parents were booked to mind the kids for the weekend.  however all did not go to plan.
oh no, what happened? hopefully the whole weekend did not get ruined!

well unfortunately the day before we were due to go my little 2 year old daughter woke up covered in spots.  as the day went on more and more appeared and she had a roaring temperature.  we realised she had chickenpox.  she was feeling so miserable and of course all she wanted was her mummy and daddy.  it was a bit depressing and part of me was devastated but our weekend away was not to be.  sure kids always come first do not they?!
label: disappointed
response: poor little thing, chicken pox are the worst. on the bright side, you still got to spend your anniversary with your husband, just not, you know, in the way you hoped. hope you guys get to have a make-up weekend soon!

situation: my neighbor bought a new tesla, it is beautiful. i get a little mad every time i see it in the parking lot, especially as i am riding past it on my beat up bicycle.
dialogue: my neighbor has a brand new tesla and every time i look at it i get so envious. i know it is stupid, i should be happy for him that he has such a cool car.
wow that is nice.  what do you drive?
well that is the thing, i do not. i bike everywhere. do not get me wrong, i love my bike and it is a great way to stay fit.
label: jealous
response: you have to think of the positives.  just because they have a new car does not mean their life is great.  they could be watching you wishing they were fit and healthy like you are.

situation: i am happy my package just arrived
dialogue: i am happy my package just arrived
oh that is nice
im glad it came earlier
label: joyful
response: yea i would be to

situation: i am feeling nostalgic today
dialogue: i am feeling nostalgic today
why is that?
i found some old keepsakes in the basement ealier
label: sentimental
response: nostalgia is a weird feeling.

situation: i have a fun weekend coming up, and i am really looking forward to it! i have not had much fun lately so i cannot wait to enjoy myself.
dialogue: i have got a fun weekend coming up, and i am really looking forward to it!
nice, what do you have planned?
going to the drive-in, out to eat, and probably minigolf. nothing particularly special, just have not had fun in awhile!
label: excited
response: sound great, i am happy for you!

situation: a project of mine was mentioned in a national news story. i was not expecting it, and it made me feel really good to see my work referenced in a publication i respect so much.
dialogue: i recently had a project of mine recognized in a national publication!
wow!  that must feel great!  you should be proud of this accomplishment.  people can go their whole lives without ever being published!
it felt amazing to be recognized for my work, and in a publication i respect to boot!
label: proud
response: congratulations!  i wish i could be published.

situation: i am planning a trip to disney. i plan on writing everything that i could need out so i do not forget it.
dialogue: i am going to disney next year. i want to write a list of everything to bring.
what are some things you will bring?
i am not really sure. i think if i write things out that i could possibly need i will not forget anything.
label: prepared
response: it is a good idea to write thing down that you might forget.

situation: thanks have been rough for me financially, but my family and fiance have been helping support me through this. i am thankful i have them around to help me.
dialogue: things have been rough for me lately, but thankfully i have got family and a fiance that are helping me through it.
what is wrong? are you okay?
i am in a lot of debt thanks to my car needing expensive repairs, and have not been able to afford it. it is pretty depressing not being able to pay your bills :/
label: grateful
response: i am so sorry. i hope you get all the help you need.

situation: the rain today is frustrating
dialogue: the rain today is frustrating
we have been getting a lot of rain as well. i have to mow my lawn so much.
im not a fan of it at all
label: annoyed
response: yeah i know what you mean. i cannot wait for the rainy season to end.

situation: this old lady ran a stop sign the other day and almost hit me when i was in the crosswalk on my bike. i wish people would pay attention to pedestrians.
dialogue: the other day i was riding my bike and this woman ran a stop sign, nearly hitting me. thank goodness i was paying attention and was able to stop in time.
oh my goodness, i have almost gotten hit while on a bike before and it is terrifying. i am so glad you are alright!
i wish people would pay more attention. i try to do my best to follow the rules of the road both when i am on my bike and in a car.
label: annoyed
response: ditto. it is not hard to do, and so many lives would be saved if people would just follow the rules. i will send good vibes out so nothing bad happens to you in the future!

situation: my boyfriend proposed to me when i was not expecting it. i thought he'd never propose, so it was exciting!
dialogue: my boyfriend proposed to me, and i accepted! i thought he did not want to get married so it was a welcome surprise.
wow, congratulations! have you guys set a date yet?
thank you! we are hoping to get married sometime next year, but man weddings are expensive. it may be further off than i would like!
label: surprised
response: oh i feel you, i used to work in the wedding industry. it is crazy how much it costs even for the most basic wedding.

situation: i ate like a pig on my birthday, and while i enjoyed myself, i think i gained a few pounds from that day alone! i should not have eaten so much and i regret it.
dialogue: i just had my birthday and i ate way too much. had a good time, but boy do i feel bad for all of that food. i am supposed to be eating healthier!
i know exactly how that happens. sometimes the food is just too good to pass up.
no kidding. had free refills on a root beer float too, and how could i say no to that?
label: guilty
response: well i say go for it. it is only your birthday once a year. the other 364 days can make up for it.

situation: i am pleased with the day i am having today
dialogue: i am pleased with the day i am having today
glad to hear you are having a good day. wish every day was like that.
me too but we would not appreciate the good days if it were not for the bad
label: content
response: that is true. it puts things in context.

situation: we read the bible to our son every night.  sometimes he will use his leanings and relate them to life.
dialogue: every night before bed, we read the bible to our son. i love when he relates what he learned to real life.
that is really awesome! that is so important to be involved in his life like that.
it is. and shows that he is listening.
label: proud
response: it does! kids can understand things about the bible that most adults overlook.

situation: our mailman keeps leaving packages outside of the building instead of putting them in the entryway. the other day it rained and my package was ruined, and a few times my things have been stolen.
dialogue: our mail carrier keeps leaving packages outside instead of putting them in the lobby.
that is frustrating, especially if the weather is not ideal
exactly! it rained the other day and my package was totally ruined.
label: annoyed
response: that is unfortunate, i am sorry that happened!

situation: my friend was housesitting for me and left my front door open when she checked the mail. my cat got out and was hit by a car.
dialogue: my friend left my front door open when she was house-sitting for me. my cat snuck out and was killed.
that is not good. are you mad at your friend?
i was really upset at the time but once i had some time i realized it was an honest mistake. she felt really bad about it.
label: furious
response: are you going to get another cat?

situation: spending time with friends during christmas always makes me happy. i am really looking forward to it this year, we are so close to december!
dialogue: i cannot wait for it to be christmas already. just thinking about that time of year makes me really happy.
i feel the same way as well!  i get really excited thinking about decorating and giving gifts!
exactly! and the food, and friends. all of it is just so lovely.
label: joyful
response: i agree!  everything that surrounds christmas makes me smile and feel content.  it makes me thankful for everything good in life!

situation: i woke up  another day
dialogue: each day waking up i cannot believe how lucky am i just to be alive.
that is a great outlook i think. we often lose focus of that very important fact.
yes, i do not need anything. i have something to eat and a roof over my head. i really cannot ask for anything more.
label: grateful
response: that is inspiring to me. i will try to think more like that as well whenever i get stressed in life.

situation: i went running for the first time in months. i could not believe it. i was able to run a full 8 miles with out taking a break.
dialogue: i went running for the first time in months. i could not believe it. i was able to run a full 8 miles with out taking a break.
8 miles!? that is very impressive.  i bet i could barely make it a mile!
yes, my first time out in 60 days. i impressed my self.
label: surprised
response: have you been a long time runner before that?

situation: just gave my wife access to my credit card. i am worried but excited i can trust her. do you ever have issues trusting people.
dialogue: just gave my wife access to my credit card. i am worried but excited i can trust her. do you ever have issues trusting people?
i can relate to that!  yeah, my wife with my credit card,!
it is taken me 11 years to get to this point. last time i let her have at it. she bought us a trip to mexico on my credit card.
label: trusting
response: haha, i can understand the hesitation then.  but was the vacation at least worth the money?

situation: i have been at my current job 5 years. i am at the point i can go into upper management but i am afraid. maybe i am just comfortable now. i do not know.
dialogue: "i have been at my current job 5 years. i am at the point i can go into upper management but i am afraid. maybe i am just comfortable now. i do not know.
that is something that takes a lot of contemplation, because it is such a big decision to make. will the extra money be worth the extra work?
an extra 40k a year but it would be highly stressful. currently i have the highest ratings in the usa, i am sure any new employer would want me to bring them up to that stage as well.
label: apprehensive
response: oh wow, an additional 40k is a lot! i would be willing to put up with quite a bit for a pay increase that large.

situation: i took my wife surfing for the first time today. within an hour she was riding waves, color me impressed!
dialogue: i took my wife surfing for the first time today. within an hour she was riding waves, color me impressed!
oh wow, i think it'd take me much longer to not bust my butt! that is impressive!
yes,  i was surprised. i have been at it my entire life and never seen anyone pick it up so quickly. she is not even athletic.
label: impressed
response: maybe she is more athletic than you think! she might be better than you soon. better watch out!

situation: a friend of mine bought a new car.  it was a model i had my eye on for some time
dialogue: a friend of mine bought a new car
awesome! what kind?
tesla, i have had my eye on the model for some time
label: jealous
response: oh man those are super nice! all electric is pretty neat

situation: a friend of mine got a new high paying job.  i did not think he could do it but he somehow pulled it off
dialogue: a friend of mine got a new high paying job
that is good on his part, how do you feel about it?
i thought it was amazing he got it, seemed like a tough job to land
label: impressed
response: that is awesome, and i agree, the job market is tough now a days.  high paying or not.

situation: a co-worker of mine was late delivering materials for a project.  i wish he'd care more
dialogue: a co-worker of mine was late delivering materials for a project
oh that is no good. any special reason why they were late?
the guy just does not seem to care
label: annoyed
response: that is a bad attitude to have. i hope he can straighten up a bit if we wants to keep working there.

situation: going to the doctor for the first time since 2001 tomorrow. i am dreading telling the doctor how long it has been since my last visit.
dialogue: going to the doctor for the first time since 2001 tomorrow. i am dreading telling the doctor how long it has been since my last visit.
it will be okay. it is always hard making that step, but it is good for your health to do it.
i am only going because my insurance gives me a gift card for going. i am in perfect health. but still ashamed.
label: ashamed
response: i wish my insurance would give me something like that! it is good to go anyways.

situation: im scared of this big test tomorrow
dialogue: im scared of this big test tomorrow
have you studied for it?  always helps to prepare!
yes i have, still nervous though
label: afraid
response: good luck, i am sure you will do fine!

situation: my wife and i are on a diet together for the last month. we have been doing great but today on my way home from work i stopped for ice cream and did not tell her.
dialogue: my wife and i are on a diet together for the last month. we have been doing great but today on my way home from work i stopped for ice cream and did not tell her.
hey everyone trips up a little. what you need to remember is that you and your wife made a commitment and you should follow through on that.
yea i know. the real issues is that i want to stop again from more tomorrow.
label: guilty
response: it is ok to have a cheat day everyone once in a while, but you cannot give in. be strong!

situation: i just turned in my dissertation. i am scared it will not pass and all my work toward my masters will be for nothing.
dialogue: i just turned in my dissertation. i am scared it will not pass and all my work toward my masters will be for nothing.
you only get to do it once?

yes, you turn it in then go in front of a board of people. in my case 10 people. if they do not like it i cannot go one to work on my phd and will need to write another. this one has taken 2 years to write.
label: afraid
response: oh no. i hope it goes well for you. that is a lot of hard work.

situation: i finally got a new raise at my job.  i have never been happier honestly
dialogue: i finally got a raise at my job
congrats!
i was pretty happy, it was long overdue
label: joyful
response: was it more than expected?

situation: i recently sent an email i should not have after a night of drinking. i woke up in a panic after and hoped it was a dream but nah, i really did send the email. i feel so foolish.
dialogue: the other day i was drinking and sent an email i should not have. i felt so stupid when i woke up and realized what i would done.
that has happened to me, but with texts though
yeah i have done that, too. the funny thing is i am usually pretty eloquent even when i am drunk so i do not think the recipient even realized i was drunk when i wrote it.
label: embarrassed
response: did you apologize?

situation: my car has been having problems.  i am worried it will not make it in the future
dialogue: my car has been having issues lately
what is wrong with it?
engine issues i think, not sure if the car will make it
label: apprehensive
response: can you fix it?

situation: got on the scale today. i have only been on a diet 2 weeks and i am down 17 pounds.
dialogue: got on the scale today. i have only been on a diet 2 weeks and i am down 17 pounds.
that is great news. have you also been working out?
not really. i average 10 miles a day walking at work but did that when i was fat as well. i cut out all processed foods and drinks.
label: surprised
response: has it been easy or hard to do that?

situation: a friend left some candy out and i took some.  i feel like paying him back for what i took
dialogue: i took some candy a friend left out
did they notice it was missing?
not yet, i plan on compensating my friend for what i took
label: guilty
response: well at least you are attempting to be honest about it.

situation: i just realized today i have not been home to where my family is from in  a little over 10 years.
dialogue: i just realized today i have not been home to where my family is from in a little over 10 years.
ohh wow! are you excited?
no i am not going. i do not have time and my family dose not talk to me. i just miss home.
label: sad
response: ohh that stinks. i do not blame you though

situation: recently this strange man was following me around the store, and then followed me out to the parking lot. he kept asking me dumb questions, i could not tell if he was just awkward or sizing me up to rob me or what.
dialogue: the other day this creepy guy followed me around the store and chased me out to the parking lot. he just would not take a hint.
that is very creepy, did he say anything to you?
yeah that is what made it weird, it was kind of like he was trying to hit on me but just awkward. but he was really pushy about it.
label: terrified
response: those are definitely the scary types, they do not recognize social cues at all.

situation: a close friend said she was having problems with her knee.  i hope she goes to a doctor soon
dialogue: a close friend said she was having problems with her knee
ouch!  did she hurt it or is it a degenerative thing? i hope she can find help with physical therapy.
hopefully she will see a doctor soon about it
label: anxious
response: oh good.  hopefully she will try to fix it with physical therapy first.  some doctors love to do surgery right away when its not necessary.  recommend that she get a second opinion.  hope she resolves it!

situation: a co-worker stole my lunch i believe.  i ended up having to skip a meal
dialogue: a co-worker stole my lunch
i have never understood that, it is not like they cannot afford to eat since they have a job! do you know which coworker it was?
not entirely sure, i marked my lunch so they knew it was not theirs
label: furious
response: next time bring your lunch in a biohazard bag, maybe they will leave it alone.

situation: a now ex-friend of mine revealed a very private secret i told her in confidence not only to our mutual friends but the entire internet! i could not believe she did that to me.
dialogue: a friend of mine revealed a deep dark secret i told her in confidence to everyone.
what did you do?
i blocked her and sent her a long text explaining how angry and disappointed i was. i did not know what else to do.
label: furious
response: you definitely cannot be too careful these days

situation: every single time i go in the office bathroom someone comes in and needs something. if i do not go to the bathroom no one comes in all day.
dialogue: every single time i go in the office bathroom someone comes in and needs something. if i do not go to the bathroom no one comes in all day.
how do you know no one goes in if you are not in there?

because i work in the same little office alone all day. today i did not use the bathroom no one came in. yesterday i went twice and each time i went i had someone waiting on me when i got back to my desk.
label: angry
response: ok

situation: my cat peed on my bath mat yesterday. i did not realize it until i stepped out of the shower today and it was already wet.
dialogue: i discovered my cat peed on my bath mat when i got out of the shower today and the mat was wet.

oh no! that stinks. i have never had a cat specifically because i have never been good with the idea of being able to train them. plus it seems like you just get the one personality, and they never grow to like you. but i am biased.
it is funny you say that, i actually like that about cats. they are independent and not too needy, which sort of describes me! i love my cats. the peeing on my bath mat aside.
label: disgusted
response: yeah, i know they definitely suit some people. i actually now technically have one. my roommate wanted to get one, and i felt too bad to say no. and he actually is a pretty nice guy, mostly because he is been affectionate from the start. so, we'll see how it goes! sorry again about your mat.

situation: i recently got the courage to approach a potential client and set a rate for work that is way higher than what i normally charge. i guess i was just feeling good and knew i do good work!
dialogue: i got the courage to contact a potential client the other day and set a rate for my work that is higher than i usually charge.
wow good for you! i hope that it works out for you!
thanks! the work is not terribly exciting but it felt good not having to negotiate knowing the client wanted me to do work for them.
label: confident
response: yeah and i bet the higher paycheck will make the work worth it.

situation: someone hit my car and fled the scene.  i wish i could find the person
dialogue: someone hit my car and fled the scene
what! first of all, are you alright?
yeah, i am fine, the car was parked
label: furious
response: oh, well that is something, at least. i cannot believe people are such cowards, though.

situation: i am promoting two staff members on sunday. they work hard and are great people.
dialogue: i am promoting two staff members on sunday. they work hard and are great people.
that is great. do they know?
they have no clue. they know i ask them to do more then others but are clueless. i am excited for them and the also the stress load they will take off of me.
label: caring
response: well that is awesome. i bet they will not let you down in the new positions either

situation: i am running my first marathon sunday. i am scared that maybe i did not train hard enough.
dialogue: i am running my first marathon sunday. i am scared that maybe i did not train hard enough.
i have never run a marathon
no better time to try then now.
label: anxious
response: you can try your best and if you do not finish there is always the next one

situation: just finished my master's degree now time to take on a phd
dialogue: just finished my master's degree now time to take on a phd
congratulations!  what are you getting your phd in?
astrophysics
label: proud
response: oh geeze, i did not know i was talking to a genius.  how long is the program?

situation: i start my last year of my masters program friday. i am scared i feel like i am all ready behind.
dialogue: i start my last year of my masters program friday. i am scared i feel like i am all ready behind.
have you tried to talk to your teacher?
no it is mostly i feel behind on my thesis. when i started they told us keep up or drop out. i should have known, it is one of the hardest schools to get into.
label: anticipating
response: what school is this you are talking about?

situation: i am spent all summer getting ready to write my thesis. i cannot wait to get time to start.
dialogue: i spent all summer getting ready to write my thesis. i cannot wait to get time to start.
that is pretty cool that you are motivated and excited to start it. most people would be scared and procrastinating. you will do great.
i need to get it over. i need to start paying back student loans. it is the last thing i need to do before i can get hired as a ad professor.
label: prepared
response: sounds like you have a plan laid out. it also sounds like you've already accomplished so much. you should be very proud. i am with you, i have over $40,000 in student loans. such a crazy pressure on someone right when they graduate. good luck!

situation: i have to get all the attention from my boyfriend i get a little envious when he spend more time with others.
dialogue: i love to be snuggled up with attention and time with my boyfriend when he does not i get sad and jealous.
i can understand that.
i know he has to spend time with others but i get envious i want every minute spent together i am spoiled.
label: jealous
response: you must love him very much, that is good.

situation: i do not have many friends at my new school
dialogue: i am at a new school and i will not have any friends
aw, it takes time! making friends is not always so easy so give it a little bit of time
yes, but how do i even talk to people i do not know?
label: lonely
response: the best thing to do is join clubs and get involved. you generally make friends by association!

situation: i felt very greata few weeks ago when i helped an elderly women with bagging her groceries
dialogue: i felt very great a few weeks ago when i helped an elderly women bag her groceries
that is really nice of you to do, not a lot of people help others like that anymore
yeah that is true most people do not.  i love helping those in need it is a great feeling
label: hopeful
response: same with me if i ever see someone that could use my help, i will most likely bring it to you

situation: i lost out on a job promotion
dialogue: i cannot believe i did not get that promotion at work

ah dang. sorry that happened to you. it stinks too because a lot of the time that stuff is just decided by who is liked more, or who has better connections, and not actual merit. if you are good, i am sure you will get recognized at some point.
agreed, it is a popularity contest!
label: disappointed
response: well, keep a good attitude. if you like the work and the job, hopefully that will be enough.

situation: i cannot believe that my wife cheated on me!
dialogue: my wife cheated on me! it is absurd!
that is very sad to hear i am sorry that happened to you
thank you, what should i do about it?
label: furious
response: i would suggest moving on time heals all wounds

situation: i was very happy last week when i helped an elderly women bag her groceries
dialogue: i was very happy last week helping an elderly women bag her groceries
did she say thank you?
yes she did thank me
label: joyful
response: what a lovely woman, and you are lovely, too!

situation: my neighbor's dogs started barking early this morning. they woke me up, which i am not happy about.
dialogue: ugh, my neighbor's dogs would not stop barking this morning!
that is the worst! what did you do?
well i will tell you what i did not do. i did not go back to sleep, due to the noise. i think i am going to have a word with him later.
label: angry
response: that sounds like a good idea. i hope you solve the problem quickly!

situation: i miss the days of youth where we were carefree
dialogue: remember when we were young and could run through the fields of flowers? i miss it.
yeah, those were better times. brings back good memories.
maybe we can relive such times through our children.
label: nostalgic
response: well, maybe yours. mine just want to sit inside and play on their phones all day.

situation: i have this one co worker who is so lazy and it just makes me so irritate because i have to do extra work.
dialogue: i do not understand why people come to work to just not do their jobs i have a coworker like this.

oh man.i have had those too.and where i am the one getting crap even though i do my job and everyone elses.i hate sitting around at work.i either want to work or go home. i hope your boss knows your co-worker is lazy?
we are on the same page i have to pick up their slack and it just irritates me to the upmost it is like just quit please or give me a raise for doing double work.
label: annoyed
response: i agree and frankly if your boss does not see this and does not give you praise then i would quit as well or contact human resources! this kind of stuff is not acceptable.

situation: i thought the dessert was amazing
dialogue: the desert was incredible! the taste! the look! the feel as i ate it!
sounds like you ate a delicious dessert, what did you eat?
