it was chocolate ice cream dipped in crushed cookies, marshmallows, and chocolate sauce which had frozen to a crisp!
label: impressed
response: that sounds delicious i love chocolate cake i think that would be my favorite dessert

situation: my mother has become rather sick. i am going to let her stay at my house so i can care for her.
dialogue: i think i am going to move my mother into my house with us.
o? that is a brave and noble decision.
yeah, she is been pretty sick lately. i want to make sure she is here where she can get all of the care that she needs.
label: caring
response: that is hard but great of you to do, good luck.

situation: i cannot wait to go to costco tomorrow
dialogue: i am going shopping tomorrow, it will be so much fun!
where will you be shopping?
i think i will go to costco and walmart.
label: anticipating
response: nice! do you have anything in specific you want to buy?

situation: my avocado went bad this morning!
dialogue: i am so sad, my avocado was moldy this morning!
hahah it whas happened to me it the worst thing
it really is!
label: disgusted
response: did you still eat it? or did you throw it away

situation: my family threw me a surprise birthday party last month i was so amazed when i walked in.
dialogue: my family is the best they through me a surprise birthday party.
that is nice of them! people stopped doing that for me once i got older. i miss them
i was amazed they even did that but very grateful i have not had anything in a while also so you was not alone your family will do something and you will enjoy it.
label: surprised
response: well, i am happy for you it shows that they care

situation: i was very shocked when i learned that  my wife cheated on me
dialogue: i was shocked when i found out my wife cheated on me
that is horrible!  i am so sorry to hear that.  why would she do that?
i am not sure what should i do though ?
label: surprised
response: it depends, if you love her, you could try to work it out.  or you could cheat on her too

situation: my friend taught his dog to do some really cool tricks. i am in awe of how quickly he responds to the commands.
dialogue: my friend taught his dog some tricks. it is really fun to watch!
o yea? i
it is amazing how quickly the dog responds to the commands. my friend must really know what he is doing.
label: impressed
response: i am trying to teach mine tricks myself* i think that is fun to watch!

situation: i cheated on a test at school. i really feel like i should come clean about it to my professor.
dialogue: i was taking an important test in one of my classes the other day. i am ashamed to say that i cheated.
i have cheated on occasion. it is never right but it is easy. at least you are ashamed of it.
yeah. i am thinking about coming clean about it to my professor before he finds out on his own.
label: guilty
response: that is your decision to make, but i think it would at least put you in control of the situation.

situation: i am going to my favorite restaurant tonight. i am thinking about ordering something that i have not eaten before, but i am not sure if i should.
dialogue: my wife and i are going out to one of my favorite restaurants tonight.
that sounds fun. is it a special occasion?
not really, just felt like going out. i am thinking about ordering something i have not had before, but. i do not know. i am weird about trying new foods.
label: apprehensive
response: i understand. sticking with what you know seems safer.

situation: i bought a used car a couple months ago and i have to say it is holding up really well for a 6 year old car. it is like new.
dialogue: i bought a used car a couple months ago and i have to say it is holding up really well for a 6 year old car. it is like new.
you must be loving it
i am, you never know what shape a used car really is until you have it for a while.
label: impressed
response: true that, you cannot be too sure until you use it

situation: i have a performance review coming up at work. i am really sure that i will receive a glowing review, and possibly a raise.
dialogue: i have a performance review coming up at work in a couple of weeks.
tough week ahead. do you think you have met your expectations thus far?
oh yeah. i am pretty sure the review is going to go well. i might even get a raise!
label: confident
response: sounds good. your supervisor must proud of your work and your displayed high self-esteem

situation: i just got notice that my mortgage payment has gone up this year and i am so mad about it.
dialogue: i just got notice that my mortgage payment has gone up this year and i am so mad about it.
oh no! that has so happened to me before! it was only by a couple dollars a month but i so needed those couple of dollars at the time. i would be maaaddd
i am, it went up 20 dollars.
label: furious
response: call the bank and get it fixed asap! that is got to be so annoying for you!

situation: i recently hit a $200 scratch off lottery ticket.  the ticket was given to me by a friend.  i was super stoked.
dialogue: i do not play the lottery, ever, but a friend recently gave me a scratch off ticket.
i buy those like twice a year and never win.
i won $200!
label: excited
response: wow! that is awesome! what did you do with it?

situation: i caught my girlfriend kissing her ex at a party the other night.  she seemed to really be in to it.  i got pretty upset.
dialogue: my girlfriend and i were at a party friday night. i could not find her anywhere, and got worried.
where was she?
in a spare bedroom with her ex, laying on the bed and kissing him.
label: jealous
response: does she have a new ex now?

situation: i caught my girlfriend kissing her ex at a party the other night.  she seemed to really be in to it.  i got pretty upset.
dialogue: she sure does. i am not putting up with that,.
i would not put up with it either
i love the rain.  it makes everything feel fresh.
label: jealous
response: i love when the rain his the soil in the open field , the smell of wet dirt is just refreshing

situation: im stoked to go to the park later today
dialogue: im stoked to go to the park later today
i bet you are. what are you going to do?
take my dog to the park and meet up with some friends!
label: excited
response: sounds like a real good time i hope you enjoy it

situation: i felt bad about sleeping in today
dialogue: i felt bad about sleeping in today
why is that
i fell behind on things i needed to get done
label: guilty
response: you will be alright buddy

situation: i feel like a have accomplished a lot this summer
dialogue: i feel like a have accomplished a lot this summer
what have you done this year if you do not mind me asking?
ive gotten a lot of work done and spent time with friends and family
label: proud
response: that is great, well there is still time to go this year!

situation: i am happy about the beautiful weather today
dialogue: i am happy about the beautiful weather today
i love it when it is nice out. are you going to do something outside?
yes, i am going to the park later this afternoon!
label: excited
response: that sounds great. a nice long walk in perfect weather. there is hardly anything better.

situation: my brother bought a new car. i feel that he just did it to make me feel inferior.
dialogue: my brother just bought a new car.
are you excited for him or jealous?
well, i cannot help but feel like he only did it to make me feel inferior.
label: jealous
response: i feel you! i know its hard having siblings sometimes! go buy a toy car and park it on top of his.

situation: i got an phone call from someone i used to know. it was threatening in nature, and i am scared.
dialogue: i got a threatening phone call. and now i am scared.
can you report the caller?
i should be able to. i recognized the voice, it is someone that i used to know.
label: afraid
response: be sure to do it, otherwise they could keep harassing you

situation: i have studied and i am ready to take my test soon
dialogue: i have studied and i am ready to take my test soon
what class is it for?
chemistry
label: prepared
response: i never took chemistry. do you feel prepared for the test?

situation: i am thankful for my supportive family
dialogue: i am thankful for my supportive family
that is great.  have they always been as supportive as they are now
yes i have been very fortunate
label: grateful
response: nice.  what do you do for a living

situation: i went out to the garden and there were a ton of mosquitoes, i could not even do any gardening.
dialogue: i went out to the garden and there were a ton of mosquitoes, i could not even do any gardening.
have you thought about spraying your garden?
i thought about it but they were coming from the grass around it and i am worried the dog would get sick if i sprayed the grass
label: annoyed
response: perhaps there is an all natural remedy you could try

situation: i was shocked how nice the weather has been the past couple days
dialogue: i was shocked how nice the weather has been the past couple days
same here, i am in texas.  where are you located
in the midwest!
label: surprised
response: nice! i used to live in st. paul, mn.  weather's like a tundra which is why i am down here

situation: i was mowing the lawn today and it started storming out of nowhere!
dialogue: i was mowing the lawn today and it started storming out of nowhere!
were you able to get inside fast?
no. i was in the middle of the yard and it was sunny, next thing i know it is pouring down rain and i am soaked.
label: surprised
response: oh wow! that would be annoying!

situation: im envious of my friends who are off work today
dialogue: im envious of my friends who are off work today
how did they get off work midweek?
thats just their normal schedule
label: jealous
response: that would be nice but not fun that you do not have the same days off.

situation: we go on vacation once a year as a family. when the time gets near and we have all of our stuff together i am normally looking forward to it.
dialogue: we go on vacation once a year as a family.
where is your favorite place to go?
i just love going, when it gets closer to when we are leaving i look forward to it.
label: excited
response: i can imagine, i hope you have a great time this year

situation: my son starts kindergarten this week. i got an email saying that he may have a substitute teacher until they hire someone.
dialogue: my son starts kindergarten soon. he is my first one.
i remember when my first child started, i was a nervous wreck.
they sent out an email saying that he may end up with a substitute teacher until they hire someone.
label: surprised
response: so they do not even have teachers yet? wow, that is crazy.

situation: i have felt lonely recently because i never go out and have no friends
dialogue: i have no friends and i am lonely
have you tried getting out and meeting new people?
no, it is difficult to meet people in my area because i like in a farm. i only talk to the animals
label: lonely
response: what about online friends?

situation: my friends went to dinner without me.  i thought they'd call for sure
dialogue: my friends went to dinner without me
that would hurt my feelings. are you alright?
i am fine, just disappointed mostly
label: lonely
response: i totally understand that. i am sorry.

situation: i woke up and saw my car had a flat tire.  i wonder what happened
dialogue: i woke up and my car had a flat tire
that sucks! did you have a spare on you?
no, but i was able to get it towed easily enough
label: surprised
response: that is good to hear.

situation: a co-worker was having problems finishing a project.  i stepped in and helped him
dialogue: a co-worker was having issues finishing a project
that is understandable. what kind of project was it? were you involved?
it was a major work project, i stepped in to help him
label: caring
response: that is so generous of you. it is people like you that make the work week bearable!

situation: i was really apprehensive when i went to university at the age of 30. i was scared that i would not be able to connect with the younger students, and that i would not be smart enough to do well. i was also unsure if it would advance my career.
dialogue: i was really apprehensive about going to university at the age of 30.
that is okay, i am 25 and still in college. how did it go for you?
it went pretty well! i got great grades and made friends despite the age difference.
label: apprehensive
response: that is awesome. i am glad it worked out well for you.

situation: once i was stranded hours from home in a snowstorm. i was with a stranger who suggested i come to her house and warm up until the storm passed. i trusted her and went with her.
dialogue: once i was stranded hours from home in a snowstorm. i ended up going to a stranger's house to wait it out
oh wow. i would have been so scared. more of a stranger than the storm
well, she was really nice and we had been waiting together in the snow for awhile, so i felt i could trust her.
label: trusting
response: well that was nice. how long were you stuck there

situation: i was looking at advertisements of 80s toys recently and felt weirdly overwhelmed with emotions. especially when i spotted a toy i hadn't thought of in years, like boglins. i had all of the he-man and she-ra toys and watched too much television!
dialogue: i was looking at advertisements of my childhood toys recently and felt strangely overwhelmed with emotion.
did the ads bring up good memories i hope?
yes! especially the ads for toys i have not thought of in years, like boglins.
label: nostalgic
response: i have absolutely no idea what boglins are, but i am sure they were awesome!

situation: once when i was a kid i got caught in a riptide with my sister. i was so scared! fortunately i was a strong swimmer and was able to get us to shore.
dialogue: once when i was a kid i got caught in a riptide with my sister. it was very scary!
sounds frightening! was this off the coast of a beach or something?
yes, martinique beach in nova scotia. the currents are very strong.
label: terrified
response: that is one of my greatest fears. did you have to swim sideways from the current to escape?

situation: i am on a diet but i ate burger king for lunch i feel so  ashamed i cheated.
dialogue: i suppose to be on a committed diet but i kind of cheated today.
well, i can understand that. it is very hard to be on a very strict diet, without a break here and now!
it is my coworkers said they was going to burger king and i could not resist i feel so bad and guilty.
label: guilty
response: well, i am sure you are disappointed, but all you can do now is just get back on the diet again and try to be more dedicated. it is hard, i know!

situation: i start school in 2 weeks i am so ecstatic to get back in college.
dialogue: i been out of school for about 5 years i am finally going back to college.
is this a career change?
yes i am going for nursing i cannot wit i am over joyed going to be hard work but i got this.
label: excited
response: oh hey, i am a nursing graduate! it will be difficult at first, but you will get the hang of it.

situation: our family dog passed and my mom was so wrecked it hurt her really deep.
dialogue: we lost our faily dog she had been with us since i was 15 years old.
aw, that sucks. did you give her a proper burial?
yes we did my mom loved her so much especially when me and my brither moved out she is hurt and down so bad.
label: devastated
response: awwww, i am so sorry. have you thought about getting a new pup?

situation: i started a new job last month i was very nervous on my first day.
dialogue: starting a new job can be different on my first day last month i can say that was me.
yea, a new job is useless pretty stressful.
i would say i was more nervous then anything i think the new setting was over whelming but a month later i feel a lot better now.
label: apprehensive
response: it will be ok in the end.

situation: i had to call the insurance company after a car accident and i was worried about all the questions they would ask. it made me very nervous
dialogue: i had a car accident the other day!
oh that is a real bummer. were you hurt?
yeah it was! no luckily nobody got hurt thanks. the worst part was actually having to talk to the insurance company
label: apprehensive
response: ok glad you did not get injured. i hope your car gets fixed.

situation: my divorce was settled. i was able to keep my house and all my possessions.
dialogue: i got divorced a few years agi
sorry to hear that
thanks, it is ok though! it got settled and i am happy
label: content
response: well that is good. you never know what to say in that situation

situation: i was doing a big clear out recently and came accross a big old suitcase in the attic which happened to contain all my childhood toys, medals, photos, school reports everything! my mum must have gathered them up over the years.  it was lovely to sit and look through them all, bringing back all the memories of school, childhood, my teenage years.  it got my feeling so nostalgic.
dialogue: i was clearing out my attic recently and came accross an old suitcase stuffed full of all my childhood toys, medals, school reports, photos etc!
that must of been fun to go through.

it was brilliant.  my mum must have gathered it up over the years.  i spent hours going through it all.  it made me feel so nostalgic.  i think its a great idea though, i might start doing it for my kids.
label: sentimental
response: that is cool. is your mother still alive?

situation: i was in a break room for about an hour by myself.  i was about to go insane.
dialogue: man that was hard to deal with today.
what was?
i had a lull in work and the store was empty, and there was nobody in there for an hour.  i was about to go insane.
label: lonely
response: really? did you manage to cope?

situation: my 19 year old cat died recently. i was devastated. i still think about him a lot.
dialogue: my 19 year old cat died recently. i was devastated.
im sorry to hear that
thanks. i still think about him all the time.
label: sad
response: you ever ever plan to get another ?

situation: my one friend started a business from scratch with just a few thousand dollars and now he is making a million a year in business and that makes me very in awe of him
dialogue: you know i have a friend that has a very successful business that he started with only a few thousand dollars
really, how did they do it?
they started an irrigation sprinkler business with just a few contracts and its blown up and now he is handling large companies
label: impressed
response: amazing! well done to him.

situation: i figured out why my air conditioner was not working earlier. i felt very pleased with myself! and now it is not hot in my home anymore.
dialogue: i figured out why my air conditioner was not working earlier. i was very pleased with myself.
well done, at least you will sit in your room excited and relaxed now
exactly. it was so dang hot today, too.
label: proud
response: heat wave is getting so terrible theses days. i even watched on cnn that the whole of new south wales is experiencing a drought, so sad

situation: i kept getting stuck behind a man on his phone in the grocery store yesterday. somehow he managed to always be in the same aisle as me, and always take up all the space. he was really loud, too.
dialogue: i kept getting stuck behind an irritating man while grocery shopping yesterday. he was so loud and always in my aisle.
that sounds unfortunate. you must have been so annoyed with him!
i was! he had an uncanny knack of blocking me and taking up the whole width of the aisle.
label: annoyed
response: people like that should just do shopping online instead of ruining the experience for everyone else!

situation: i saw a little homeless girl a while ago, it made me feel like a father.
dialogue: when i see little homeless girls i feel like a father.
do you have daughters of your own?
no i do not, and probably never will.
label: caring
response: why is that?

situation: i was once stuck in traffic for like 2 hours.
dialogue: i was stuck in traffic the other day for so long, when it was supposed to be clear.
yea traffic sucks
unless there is good music playing.
label: surprised
response: well yea that is true

situation: walking around at autumn nights makes me remember good old days.
dialogue: when i go for a walk in autumn, it brings up some good memories.
same here. it reminds me of my childhood for some reason.
yes, the smell especially.
label: nostalgic
response: exactly, i am overcome with nostalgia and get tears of joy sometimes.

situation: i remember that i could not wait to go on vacation last year.
dialogue: last year i hardly could hide my impatience to go on vacation.
i bet! did it turn out nice?
yes, i had a good time.
label: excited
response: that is good.. i cannot wait for my vacation!

situation: i saw a kid beat up a dog the other day, i felt angry.
dialogue: i have seen a kid beet up a dog once, it got me very angry.
that is terrible! did the dog survive?
yes, the dog turned out to be fine, kid said he was training he her to be stronger.
label: furious
response: maybe someone should train the kid to be stronger.. by beating him up!

situation: yesterday i felt like i am really an alright human being.
dialogue: sometimes i feel like i am really an alright person.
what i do is to write all the good things i did within the week, i think you should do the same
it is a good idea, but we should also write our mistakes, to not repeat them in the future.
label: proud
response: i agree with you buddy

situation: the last vacation i took i had to pack luggage for a family of 6 and get the rental car and plane and hotel arrangements and it all went smoothly
dialogue: my last vacation we went to florida and a lot of prep work went into getting everything ready
you must have prepared really well. did the trip go well?
yes the plane ride was smooth and no delay's and we got a nice rental van
label: prepared
response: sounds like the trip went well. i am glad you enjoyed it!

situation: i knew a friend once, i always though that he would become somebody good, but i was wrong.
dialogue: have you know somebody growing up who was supposed to become a great human being, but they turned out something else?
all the time
i really wonder why this things happen.
label: disappointed
response: its just life

situation: i was super psyched when we got our puppy about 6 months ago the kids could not wait for me to bring him home and he is so much fun and very cute
dialogue: you know recently we got a new puppy he is a goldendoodle and is a lot of fun
nice, what breed is the puppy?
he is a goldendoodle which is a poodle and golden retriever mixed
label: excited
response: i have never heard of such a breed. must be so cute!

situation: i was really happy the other day when i found out i have enough pages in my passport.
dialogue: i had to cross the border once with very few pages in my passport once.
i do that all the time. i live on the mexican border. what border did you cross?
i think i was flying to philippines, but they let me in, which was a relief.
label: joyful
response: glade all was well

situation: recently i appeared for job interview in tesla
dialogue: last week i attended a job interview with tesla
cool! how did it go?
it went well above my expectations
label: confident
response: great! i hope you get the job. i will be rooting for you!

situation: i watched a guy pick up the back of a pick up truck showing off for some of his friends. it was quite the sight.
dialogue: while i was eating dinner last week, my wife and i watched a guy pick up the rear end of a newer pick up truck.
he sounds pretty strong. any reason in particular that he did that?
my guess would be because he was drunk. it was still quite the sight to see.
label: impressed
response: no kidding. definitely some quality entertainment for dinner time!

situation: my wife and i having been saving all year and finally are going on vacation next month. this will be our first vacation together.
dialogue: so my wife and i after saving all year are going on our first vacation together next month.
that must be so exciting!
my wife is so happy. she has never seen the ocean before.
label: excited
response: i hope you both have a great time!

situation: i went into an interview for a job and i went over everything days before so i knew what to say.
dialogue: i went on an interview for a job.
oh how does it go
i thought i did pretty well because i practiced days in advance, looked up information and everything, but i did not get it.
label: confident
response: its ok you tried your best

situation: recently my sister got married
dialogue: one month back my sister got married and she shifted to another state along with her husband
well that is great and sad all at the same time. how far away did she move?
we live in texas she moved to newyork area, since then i am missing her presence in the home and feeling little low
label: sentimental
response: aw well that is normal. i am sure she did not want to leave. every day will get a little easier.

situation: last year during a bad storm a tornado touched down across the street from our house. it sounded like a freight train from the basement.
dialogue: last year during a bad storm, a tornado touched down right across the street from our house.
oh my goodness, that sounds terrifying.
it was. we were in the basement and it sounded like a freight train was going over the house.
label: terrified
response: i am glad that you are okay.

situation: my family and i recently moved to a new house.  during the move, we found a box full of our first child's baby toys.  my wife and i spent quite a while going through the baby toys of our 12 year old, a little teary-eyed
dialogue: my family and i recently moved, and we found a box of our oldest child's baby toys from 12 years ago.
i bet that was quite the blast from the past
it was!  it was a bit bittersweet, though. they grow up too fast.
label: nostalgic
response: yes they do. mine are already out of college

situation: we were packed up and ready to go visit my family in another state.
dialogue: we packed up everything in the car to go visit my family.
oh, are you going on a trip?
we went on vacation to see my family in another state. i was very happy to be going.
label: joyful
response: that sounds like a fun time.

situation: for my anniversary at my job, all my coworkers threw me a party. i had no idea until i walked into the office at lunch.
dialogue: last month for my 20th anniversary at my job, my coworkers threw me a party.
that is so nice of them!
i had no idea till i walked into the office with my boss on lunch. i was completely shocked.
label: surprised
response: i am so happy for you! congrats!

situation: we recently spent a weekend at the local lake.  work had been hectic, and family had been challenging.  it was so peaceful to just sit on the sand and enjoy the sun.
dialogue: i recently spent a full weekend relaxing at the beach.
really?
yeah.  it was great to get away from work and family pressures for just a bit, and to enjoy some peace and quiet.
label: content
response: that is fun

situation: my cat i have had for the last 14 years got sick and passed away last month. i lost a great friend.
dialogue: last month, my cat sam passed away. he was 14 years old.
oh no! i am so sorry! it is so difficult to lose a pet.
he was more than a pet, he was truly my best friend.
label: sad
response: i hope in time you are able to feel better.. and that your heart will be filled with happy memories.

situation: on my birthday my wife presented with a gift
dialogue: last week i had my birthday and my wife presented astonished me with her gift
that is awesome! happy belated birthday! what did she get you?
she presented me my dream bike its ducati
label: surprised
response: sweet! i really like ducati's they are beautiful bikes.

situation: a group of bad storms passed through here last week. there were tornadoes all over the place.
dialogue: last week, there was a front move through our area that produced many very powerful storms.
did it rain a lot?
it really did. also, there were over 20 confirmed tornado touch downs in my county alone.
label: terrified
response: that must be really scary to go through.

situation: we were going to a pumpkin patch and i allowed my sister in law to drive my car.
dialogue: i was going to a pumpkin patch with my sister in law, and i let her drive my car.
that sounds like fun! what happened?
i was not feeling good so she drove, but she drives kind of fast. usually i do not let anyone drive my car.
label: trusting
response: yeah- i understand that. i do not let anyone drive my car, either. i hope everything worked out okay!

situation: a stranger bought me groceries last sunday. i felt overwhelmed and thankful. i am going to embroider her something as a thank you.
dialogue: a stranger bought me groceries last sunday. i only know them through an online forum.
that seems like it would be a little awkward to me.
they saw a post i would made about losing my job and messaged me. i am going to embroider them something as thanks.
label: grateful
response: well, they sound like they are actually just a nice person trying to help you out, that is really nice.

situation: i was cleaning out the attic and found a bunch of old photo albums. it was great seeing some of my great past memories.
dialogue: i was cleaning out the attic and found a bunch of old photo albums.
that is always a nice find.
yes it was. it was really great seeing all of those fun times with my family from the past.
label: nostalgic
response: i bet it was! i love looking at photo albums

situation: i have a friend that began to learn guitar a few years ago. i hadn't heard him play until two days ago, and his skill level blew me away.  he has become quite the guitar master in a short amount of time.
dialogue: i have a buddy who decided to take up playing guitar a few years ago.
that is nice. did you start playing guitar with him?
i tried,.  i recently heard him play for the first time in over a year.  his skill levels astounds me.
label: impressed
response: that is good.

situation: i work from home and sometimes it makes me a bit sad to know that i am here alone.
dialogue: i work from home and sometimes it makes me a bit sad to know that i am here alone.
i am also working from home from time to time. i could feel some time lonely.
i am sorry to hear you are in the same boat sometimes. do you have any advice on how to make it feel less lonely?
label: lonely
response: i usually get out after finishing work to feel less lonely.

situation: once on my way to work i slipped getting off the bus. i just laid there on the ground until the bus drove away. i wanted to hide in a cave forever.
dialogue: once on my way to work i slipped and fell after i got off the bus and everyone stared at me. i laid there until the bus drove away because i felt so humiliated.
oh, that must have been so embarrassing.
the sad thing is i do stuff like that all the time
label: embarrassed
response: i am sorry it happens to us at times.

situation: i bought a scratch off ticket on the way to work last week and won $500 on it. the most money i have ever won on one.
dialogue: i stopped at a gas station on the way to work last week and got gas and a scratch off ticket and won $500.
congratulations! that is so cool!
yes, it is the most money i  have ever won on a lottery ticket. it was very shocking.
label: surprised
response: i hope you have fun with that money.

situation: last week at work, one of my coworkers took credit for a job that i had completed. i went straight to my manager to get it straightened out.
dialogue: last week, one of my coworkers took credit for a job i had completed. i had to get to the manager to get things straightened out.
i cannot believe your coworker would do that to you! did your manager listen?
yes he did. he knew that the other guy had been at a different job site, i will still not very happy about the situation.
label: furious
response: i would not be either. are you going to try to talk to your coworker about it?

situation: i took my kids to disney world last week for vacation they was so enliven.
dialogue: school starts back next week so last weekend i took my girls to disney world.
oh wow! i bet you all had a blast!
yes we did they loved it it was such a thrill and the shows and rides was so fun.
label: excited
response: they will really appreciate that when they are older and look back on it.

situation: last year it rained so much that my basement flooded. a lot of photos and other things were destroyed that i can never replace.
dialogue: last spring, it rained so much my basement ended up flooding.
oh god, what do you do at that time
well, i did my best to save what i could. a lot of irreplaceable things were destroyed however, photos among other things.
label: sad
response: how did you feel at that time

situation: i was out in the yard and i found a rabbits nest with a bunch of babies in it right in the middle of the yard!
dialogue: i was out in the yard and i found a rabbits nest with a bunch of babies in it right in the middle of the yard!
oh wow! are the babies ok?
they are fine. i put some tree branches over it to give it some protection from predators and the elements
label: surprised
response: good thinking. i am sure the parent bunnies appreciated that.

situation: all my cucumber plants died this week due to too much rain
dialogue: all my cucumber plants died this week due to too much rain
oh man. what a bummer!  i love cucumbers and hummus!  do you have anything else you are growing that survived?
my tomatoes and peppers are doing really well for starters.
label: angry
response: oh good, i am glad the entire garden did not get ruined.  i would love to plant a garden one day soon since i went vegan plant based about 3 months ago.  happy tomato eating to you!

situation: the neighbor's trash can had blown over and there was garbage all over the road
dialogue: the neighbor's trash can had blown over and there was garbage all over the road
oh what a mess. i would hope that they picked it up.
they did as soon as they got home and saw it
label: disgusted
response: well at least they cleaned up after. i would have been more annoyed if they didnt.

situation: im happy with what all i have accomplished this summer
dialogue: im happy with what all i have accomplished this summer
could you tell me what you have done?
i put a lot of work into my small business i am starting and spent a lot of time with friends a family so far
label: proud
response: that sounds great, i hope you succeed.

situation: i am so happy, my jalapeno plants are producing so many peppers.
dialogue: i am so happy, my jalapeno plants are producing so many peppers.
that is great news! congrats! my garden is not doing great this year. do you grow anything else?
i grow a few other things. green beans, tomatoes, cucumber, melons, and a few other things
label: joyful
response: yum. i wish i had a green thumb.

situation: i could not believe how beautiful the weather was when i woke up today
dialogue: i could not believe how beautiful the weather was when i woke up today
that is awesome, it is very hot where i live, so i am jealous!
it has been really hot here too
label: surprised
response: well i am glad you get to enjoy some nice weather for a change!

situation: i was shocked at how bright and sunny it is today
dialogue: i was shocked at how bright and sunny it is today
where exactly are you cos it rained all through in my area?
midwest
label: surprised
response: ok i am at the south east

situation: last week, someone during the night drove off the road and destroyed a large section of my fence. it is going to be expensive to have it replaced.
dialogue: last week in the middle of the night, someone drove off the road and took out a large section of my fence around my yard.
ohh wow! that is not cool
they did not stick around or anything and it is going to be pretty expensive to have it all replaced.
label: angry
response: i wish people would take responsibilities for their own actions

situation: i dropped my grocery bag in the parking lot and it spilled everywhere
dialogue: i dropped my grocery bag in the parking lot and it spilled everywhere
oh man! hopefully nothing broke!
nope but i did have to chase down a few cans that rolled away
label: embarrassed
response: at least it sounds like you recovered everything!

situation: i felt bad when i cut someone off in traffic this morning
dialogue: i felt bad when i cut someone off in traffic this morning
he accused me of stealing from him
who did
label: guilty
response: sorry, that was an error! any way over to your conversation.who did you cut off that made you feel bad?

situation: im envious of everyone who is outside enjoying the sun right now
dialogue: im envious of everyone who is outside enjoying the sun right now
yea i hear ya.  i am stuck here at work for another day too.
same here, but the weekend will be fun
label: jealous
response: i just hope it does not rain this weekend.

situation: im worried about an upcoming test
dialogue: im worried about an upcoming test
what is the test on? have you prepared for it? i bet you will do better than you think!
yes i have studied quite a bit, thank you!
label: afraid
response: good for you! i bet you will do amazing. best of luck!

situation: one time i went to a restaurant to eat by myself. i felt sad and lonely
dialogue: i have no friends. one time i went into a restaurant and ate by myself. everyone laughed
i feel the same one and lately it seems to be getting worse. i have never been brave enough to go eat alone.
yes, that is why i am in front of my computer all day.
label: sad
response: i get that. i work all day then come home to the same routine everyday.

situation: i envy everyone outside right now enjoying the weather
dialogue: i envy everyone outside right now enjoying the weather
me too! i am stuck inside at work and hearing about how great it is out there.
im looking out the window waiting to go out
label: jealous
response: haha, same! just one more hour for me. hope you can enjoy it soon!

situation: a good co-worker of mine lost his job.  it is a shame because i enjoyed working with him
dialogue: a good co-worker of mine lost his job
that is not good, what happened
his boss felt he was under-performing.  it is a shame because he was fun to work with
label: devastated
response: that is never a good thing, i hope they land on their feet

situation: a co-worker of mine was able to complete a complicated project quickly.  i did not think he was that good at his job
dialogue: a co-worker of mine was able to complete a complicated project quickly
how did they do that?
he was more skilled than i thought
label: impressed
response: oh, well that is a nice surprise though!

situation: i went to pizza hut and the worker did not wash her hands i was so sicken i just walked out.
dialogue: i get so mad when workers do not wash their hands in restaurants i had this happen to me recent i left the place immediately.
that is nasty, how do they get away with that?
right i was so sicken i said yes this will be the last time i go to this pizza hut it is like would you want someone to do you and your food that way.
label: disgusted
response: exactly, i would report them, so nasty

situation: my car has been acting strangely lately.  i hope it does not break down on the road
dialogue: my car has been acting strange lately
how so?
strange noises and grinding, i hope it does not break down
label: anxious
response: i hope so too, get it checked out!

situation: i bought a lottery ticket and did not win anything
dialogue: i bought a scratch lottery ticket for $20 and did not win anything
sorry to hear that. it would really upset me to be in that situation!
thanks, i will buy another one!
label: disappointed
response: i hope you win that one! good luck!

situation: after my granddad passed i kept his necklace it means so much to me even though i get emotional over it.
dialogue: my granddad means so much to me i still wear his necklace even though he passed.
i am sorry for your loss, at least you got some time together
yes and thank you i know he is close in spirit i get emotional sometimes but the memories we had was great.
label: sentimental
response: i feel that way about my grandma, it is sad that by the time we are born they are so old

situation: i was so hungry for lunch today i ordered panera through uber and they took over a hour i was so upset with the services.
dialogue: i thought the service uber was good but i had a bad experience today was so upset.
i think lyft is better
i will have to try them my panera was over a hour late and my lunch was over once it arrived.
label: disappointed
response: i would hate that

situation: a friend of mine is moving away.  it is a shame because we were close for a few years
dialogue: a close friend of mine is moving away
where to?
out of state, it is a shame because we were good friends
label: sad
response: oh, i am sorry to hear that, why did they move away?

situation: a friend was able to build a desk in just a few hours.  i feel like it'd take anyone else half a day at least to do it
dialogue: a friend of mine was able to build this complicated desk in a few hours
they sounds very complicated
he is very talented with tools, it'd probably take anyone else half a day at least
label: impressed
response: that is nice to have

situation: a friend of mine is coming to visit.  we are going to have a lot of fun when he arrives
dialogue: a friend of mine is coming to visit
having friends over is always nice!
yeah, he is a good friend, it will be a lot of fun when he arrives
label: excited
response: i bet. hope you all have a fantastic time!

situation: a friend who i hadn't seen since school started work at my job.  he was the last person i expected to see
dialogue: a friend who i hadn't seen since school started work at my job
how do you feel about that?
he was the last person i expected to see
label: surprised
response: are you guys in good relations?

situation: i found some old school papers of mine.  i thought about how far i have come as a writer
dialogue: i found some old school papers of mine
did it bring back a lot of old mermories?
yeah, i have come a long way
label: sentimental
response: thats good that you have progressed

situation: a co-worker has been flirting with me at work.  i have rejected her advances since i have a girlfriend
dialogue: a co-worker has been flirting with me at work.  i turned her down though since i have a girlfriend
she is a crappy person, flirting with someone who is in a relationship. good on you- stand up guy
it is been hard though, i have had many girls interested in me lately
label: faithful
response: lol- well poor you. i have always had guys doing the same and it means nothing to me. if i am in a relationship.or heck even when i am not.i do not get interested in random people generally. i have to know who someone is.remember that- what lasts is who someone is..someone you want to grow old with.bodies will not last.

situation: one time while i was waking up in the middle of the night, i saw a little girl sitting beside my bed.
dialogue: one time while i was waking up in the middle of the night, i saw a little girl sitting beside my bed
that must of been weird. who was it?
it was a doll someone put next to me
label: terrified
response: was it suppose to scare you?

situation: i have been in a relationship for 4 years
dialogue: i have been faithful to my relationship with my boyfriend
thats awesome
yah, we are always happy
label: faithful
response: well i hope it lasts forever

situation: i have an exam in september
dialogue: i have an exam in the next month and am prepared for it
that is good! i guess you studied a lot?
yah, been studying for a while now.
label: prepared
response: that is good. i am sure you will do great on it.

situation: the driver was sneezing horribly
dialogue: i took a taxi and the driver was sneezing right to my side
ouch, that sounds pretty gross!
yah, it felt so distigusting
label: disgusted
response: i would avoid that taxi driver again if you have the chance.

situation: imagine,i started working out two months ago,only to weigh myself and i have gained some weight.
dialogue: imagine,i started working out two months ago,only to weigh myself and i have gained some weight
i hope it was maybe the weight of the muscle that the scale was picking up.
i hope so,i  got a little discouraged.but i will keep working out
label: disappointed
response: yes, do not let that stop you. also pay attention to what you eat as well. it is even more important than the exercise portion.

situation: recently i have been feeling that i do not need a company to feel wholesome.
dialogue: i have been feeling pretty wholesome recently.
i do not know whether that is a good or bad thing. which is it?
it is good, i just meant that i can be by myself and feel alright.
label: lonely
response: that is great! it is definitely a good thing when you can be yourself.

situation: last week i smelt something on the way home that was very disturbing.
dialogue: about a week ago on the way home i smelt something so bad that it made me anxious.
what was it i wonder?
i do not even want to remember that smell.
label: annoyed
response: it must've been nasty like puke

situation: in the past and present i always try to stay positive.
dialogue: i always try to stay positive no matter what.'
i like that philosophy. here lately, has it been easier or harder to stay positive?
let's put it that way, even when it is harder i still remain positive.
label: faithful
response: i like that, how long have you felt this way about life?

situation: yesterday was such a sunny weather, that it kept me happy all day.
dialogue: anytime the weather is sunny i feel happy.
wow, its good to warm
yes, warmth is better than cold.
label: joyful
response: it is easier to walk around when its sunny also

situation: the police officer tried to harass me
dialogue: am so frustrated by the police officer who tried to harass me
what exactly did he do
he tried to take my driving licence by force on over speeding claims which was not true
label: angry
response: yes, some people have to stay away form law enforcement jobs.

situation: next month my wife and i are going on vacation. it is our first vacation since we got married.
dialogue: next month my wife and i are going on vacation to hawaii.
wow! i bet you two are very excited!
we are, it will be our first vacation together since we got married.
label: excited
response: that is wonderful. our first vacation after getting married was full of fun, sun and adventure. those are the best!

situation: i damn certain sure this time round i will pass my statistics retake exam.
dialogue: i damn certain sure this time round i will pass my statistics retake exam
you sound very confident. that is good
i cannot imagine getting a fail for a second time.
label: confident
response: i know what you mean. just believe in yourself

situation: my neighbor recently began renovations on his home. i do not mind it, except he starts hammering on stuff at 5 am on the weekends.
dialogue: last week my neighbor began making renovations on his home.
is he being too noisy?
yeah, that is the problem. on weekends he likes to start hammering and sawing at 5am.
label: annoyed
response: i see how that can be annoying, have you asked him to stop doing that?

situation: the day i got accepted into nursing school was the best day of my life.
dialogue: the day that i got accepted into nursing school was just an ordinary day.
you were not excited about it?
well i had been waiting for weeks and was unaware, but at the end of a stressful day i checked my mail and the letter came in to let me know if i got in or not.
label: excited
response: i understand. stress is a definite mood killer

situation: about a month ago i had an eye surgery, and now i cannot wait to see 100%.
dialogue: i had an eye surgery recently now i am anxiously waiting for perfect vision.
ive always wanted to have the eye surgery. i am ready to get rid of my glasses and contacts
just do i already know it the best thing i have done for my body.
label: anticipating
response: im glad you feel happy about it

situation: how do you feel about the world?
dialogue: i have hope for the future
it is good to believe in good things.
that is right in the end everything will be fine
label: hopeful
response: yes, i like your attitude.

situation: for some reason the sound of the fan brings up some good and old forgotten memories.
dialogue: any time a hear a sound of a fun i become reminiscent of good old times.
it is true there is nothing like the good old days
of course, only for the people that lived through them
label: nostalgic
response: i am glad you were one of them!

situation: i am still waiting for my new passport book.
dialogue: i applied for a new passport now i am waiting for it, how it gets here soon.
i know how you feel. do you have a big trip planned once you receive your passport?
yes, i have some big plans to fill those blank pages.
label: anticipating
response: i hope you enjoy your adventures!

situation: after my wife and i got divorced, i was confused for a while. the house seemed so empty without her or the kids here.
dialogue: last year, my wife and i got a divorce after being married 8 years.
i hear you. i had the same experience after just 5 years
it was so strange without her and the kids here at the house.
label: lonely
response: i understand. she took my daughter with her

situation: i have an exam in two days and i am very excited
dialogue: i have an exam soon i believe i am gonna do great in it
what subject are you trying to pass?
maths
label: confident
response: i love math, good luck with your exams than.

situation: i do not usually feel arrogant, but today for some reason i did even act that way.
dialogue: i was acting like a arrogant peacock today.
why were you acting like that?
i do not know, woke up in too good of a mood i guess.
label: proud
response: i am glad you were in a good mood.

situation: i cannot really say that i get off balance that easy, but that guy really made me feel negative.
dialogue: a few days ago i have met a couple of people that got me feeling negative things, even though i do not even know them.
did they say or do anything specifically to you that made you feel that way?
not really, maybe just a bit, it is how they said it i guess.
label: angry
response: i understand how that can make you feel a certain way. unfortunately, there are those types of people around every corner.

situation: my coworkers threw me a 20th anniversary party at work last week. i had no idea it was going to happen.
dialogue: last week at work, my coworkers threw me a 20th anniversary party at our company office.
oh wow! 20 years at your job! you must be well liked there.
i like to think i am. i had no idea this was going to happen.
label: surprised
response: it must have been a wonderful surprise for you.

situation: i will never forget the day after my 28th birthday. it already was raining and thundering that morning and the news that came after shocked me.
dialogue: my mom called me the day after my 28 birthday. not to wish me happy birthday, but to delivery awful news.
oh my goodness, what was the terrible news?
she called and told me our brother had been in a terrible accident and that we needed to come to the er immediately.
label: devastated
response: i am so sorry, i hope your brother ended up being okay.

situation: i have not had any sleep for the past three days only to come back home and my neighbor is having a loud party.
dialogue: i have not had any sleep for the past three days only to come back home and my neighbor is having a loud party
dang, that is not good. what did you end up doing??
i stormed into his house like a mad man,i was not having it.that had to stop.
label: angry
response: oh wow. did the police get called? i hope you did not get in trouble.

situation: i cannot wait to go on my holiday
dialogue: i am eagerly anticipating the break from the routine of business
yeah? what is changing?
i am going on a holiday soon!
label: anticipating
response: brilliant. here are you going?

situation: as a nursing student and future nurse i will be in a professional where i will help people while they are hurting the most.
dialogue: as a nursing student i am able to look forward to take care of people when they are feeling bad.
that is so generous of you. the world could use more people like you.
yes during on of my clinical rounds i was able to handle pediatric patients which i felt so happy to do.
label: caring
response: caring for both the young and the old. any hospital would be lucky to have you on staff!

situation: i forgot my friend's birthday date
dialogue: i forgot my friend's birthday date
oh my, how did she react?
she was confused because i showed up a week late
label: embarrassed
response: ha! do you feel bad about it?

situation: after having 4 interviews none of the employers had called me after 1 week which stressed me out.
dialogue: looking for a new job can be stressful.
it certainly can. what type of job are you looking for?
well i went on 4 interviews to work in a clinic and all went well, but they have not called me back and its been a week now.
label: anxious
response: maybe they had lots of other candidates to see

situation: i spend all day in bed yesterday, i feel bad for that.
dialogue: have you ever felt guilty for sleeping all day?
yes! i feel like the day escaped me. have you done that recently?
yes, i am thinking to do it again today though.
label: ashamed
response: it is friday, that would be a nice way to start the weekend!

situation: my sister is going on a holiday
dialogue: i am so jealous because my sibling is going on a holiday and i have work to do
ugh i can imagine. but your time will come, be patient!
yeah but i really need a break
label: jealous
response: have you tried yoga? it can help in the meanwhile till you get a proper vacation.

situation: i was very worried the they told me i needed heart surgery.
dialogue: yeah i went into the hospital with chest pain and the doctors came in and told me i needed to have emergency surgery.
oh no! did you get the surgery?
i did and what an experience. i was alone in the hospital getting prepped for a major surgery not knowing if i was going to make it.
label: afraid
response: but you have recovered now. right?

situation: after several attempts to have a baby my wife and i are finally expecting.
dialogue: we both want a boy, but a girl at this point would be perfect as well
are you pregnant?
yes after several attmpts me and my wife are finally expecting. this news is the best that i have heard!
label: joyful
response: congratulations! that is brilliant news

situation: taking finals exams can be stressful that is why i studied everyday up until testing day.
dialogue: i got my final exam results the other day and i did really well.
good job! do you feel proud of yourself?
yes very. those longs nights i stayed up getting ready helped.
label: prepared
response: hard work always pays off! keep it up.

situation: i had to get it off my chest that i have been cheating on my wife.
dialogue: i walked into the room while she was cooking and was very quiet. i felt bad about what i did.
what did you do?
well i went out with old college buds and got trashed and slept with another woman.
label: ashamed
response: man! that is pretty bad.

situation: my sister is going for surgery
dialogue: am so nervous my sister is going for surgey
i hope it goes well for her
we hope so too
label: afraid
response: good luck!

situation: i did not study for my test and i felt i bombed it, but when i checked my grade i made an a!
dialogue: i did not study for my test and i felt i bombed it, but when i checked my grade i made an a!
awesome! glad that you did well on the exam!
i agree. i was so not expecting that. i am still boggled by it, but it made my day.
label: surprised
response: now you can celebrate this exam result! always feels good to accomplish something like this.

situation: recently a man tried to break into our house.  it was late at night, and he was kicking the door.  my entire family was scared as we waited for the police to show up.
dialogue: a man recently tried to break into our house late at night.
oh wow. that is some scary stuff! what happend?
it was about 3am. he was kicking our front door repeatedly.  my kids and wife were terrified as we waited for the cops to come.
label: afraid
response: did they catch the person?

situation: i lied to my mother about my results
dialogue: i feel guilty for lying to mom that i had passed my exams
you should not like to your mom. i think you should tell her the truth about what really happened.
yah, i will tell her when she comes back from work
label: guilty
response: that sounds like a great idea!

situation: i felt very unpleasant last week when i fell to the ground my first time skateboarding
dialogue: i felt very unpleasant last week when i fell to the ground skateboarding and lots of people saw it happen
oh no! you have to have a tough mentality when you do that as it can be rough to have people see you fail
yeah it was bad but i kept practicing and eventually learned pretty quick
label: embarrassed
response: that is good! practice makes perfect and if everyone stopped when they failed, we would not have as much as we do today

situation: a coworker took credit for a work i  had done. i had to go to my manager to get it straightened out.
dialogue: last week at work a coworker tried to take credit for a job that i had completed.
that is terrible. did you let others know that you had completed the job?
i talked to my boss and get it all straightened out, but it was still a really crazy situation.
label: annoyed
response: i could imagine. some people stoop low to take credit for what others do.

situation: i needed help after i had surgery with household chores and my best friend promised to take off work and help which she did she is always so true to me.
dialogue: i recently had surgery and needed help around the house and my best friend volunteered to help me.
what kind of surgery was it?
i had knee surgery so my normal household chores is hard to keep up but she kept her word and she has helped 2 a week since she is so true to her word i have a great friend.
label: faithful
response: that is awesome! its great to have friends their for someone.

situation: my dog chewed my favorite pair of shoes last week i was so irate with her.
dialogue: my dog chewed my favorite pair of shoes up last week.
oh no! did you scold him?
no she got me with those eyes but i was very irate with her for a few days and she knew it.
label: furious
response: i would be angry too, but it is hard to get mad at doggos.

situation: i start my new job in 2 weeks a little nervous but i am self assured i will be just fine.
dialogue: i finished college this summer and now i am on to a new job in nursing i am nervous.
congrats to you!  what kind of nurse are you looking to be?
i will be a rn i think i am over thinking the new role but i am self assured i will do great this is my passion.
label: confident
response: i have no doubt that you will be a great rn!

situation: my brother paid for his college tuition out of pocket debt free no loans i am so influenced by this i want to do the same.
dialogue: college is the top way to get in debt but my brother paid all his tuition out of pocket.
that is awesome, what is his secret?
he worked 2 jobs and prior to starting he saved money i am very influenced by his method i am going to give it a try so i can be debt free as well.
label: impressed
response: being debt free can be a great feeling

situation: last year my wife got laid off from her job. my boss heard about it and ended up giving me more hours so we did not have such a massive loss of income.
dialogue: last year my wife got laid off from her job.
i am sorry to hear that. does she have a job now?
at the time it happened, my boss found out about it and gave me more hours to make up for our loss of income till she got another job.
label: grateful
response: well that was nice of your boss. its great to have good people in this world

situation: my girlfriend is moving in this weekend
dialogue: my girlfriend is moving in this weekend.  this is the first relationship i have had that actually will be living with me.
are you excited for it?
i am very excited for it.   i am ready to start this next chapter in my life and hoping everything goes well after the move.
label: excited
response: i hope this is the true love for you

situation: i had a job interview and was anxious to get it over with.
dialogue: i have a job interview coming up later this week.  i feel confident about it but would love for it to be over
you got this just be yourself and professional obviously and do not over think it.
that is my plan going into it.  it would be awesome if i got the job but if not i am happy where i am at too
label: anxious
response: you will get it happy thoughts only and if not something better is in store.

situation: i always help my daughter study for her college exams it makes me so pleased to be such a big help.
dialogue: i love to help my daughter with her school work and exams.
it sounds like you are a great parent.  does she appreciate all the help you give?
thank you and yes she does the memories together just pleases me so much i cherish these moments.
label: content
response: she will definitely appreciate it when she gets older too.  i still remember my dad helping me with math homework and cannot thank him enough for the help he gave me throughout the years.

situation: after being married to my first wife for 8 years, i found out she was having an affair behind my back. it was not a very good time for me.
dialogue: after being married for 8 years to my first wife, i found out she was having an affair behind my back.
i am sorry about that. how did you find out?
she came out and told me about it. it was one of the worst times in my life.
label: angry
response: that stinks. are you still with her or did you leave her?

situation: my dog just learned how to ring the bell on the doorknob when he needs to go out
dialogue: my dog just learned how to ring the bell on the doorknob when he needs to go out
whoa that is really cool. did you train him to do that?
i put the bell on the door so it would ring when it opened and he got used to that, so now he associates the sound with having to go out.
label: surprised
response: that is amazing. must be a very smart dog.

situation: i had a dinner date with a old friend but i was so tired that i told her i had a emergency the last minute now i feel so guilt-ridden.
dialogue: i canceled a dinner with a old friend because i was just so tired had a long work week.
i understand! as we get older, it is hard to do it all everyday!
it is i just feel a little guilt-ridden because i told her i had an emergency instead of telling her the truth because she would have tried to talk me into still coming out.
label: guilty
response: it happens, but definitely be honest as you would want someone to be honest with you

situation: last month my car broke down and i had no way to get to and from work. a friend of mine let me borrow his car for almost the entire month.
dialogue: last month my car threw a rod and needed to have the engine overhauled, leaving me without a way to get to work and back.
oh no, are you able to afford the repair for it?
well, a friend of mine let me borrow his car for a entire month while mine was repaired. he just tossed me the keys and said bring it back when your done.
label: grateful
response: what a great friend you have. definitly get him a gift when you are done.

situation: i working to save enough money to take my wife on a vacation to vermont next year. i hope i can save enough.
dialogue: i working to save enough money to take my wife on a vacation to vermont next year. i hope i can save enough.
i hope you can too. how is it going?
i am about half way there. i want to save enough to rent a cottage on one of the lakes up there so i still have a ways to go.
label: hopeful
response: that is great! i have faith that you can do it.

situation: i racked up a lot of money on my credit card shortly after paying it off.
dialogue: i paid off my credit card before buying my house.  i did not realize how expensive owning would be and after some repairs i owe more than i started with on my card.
that is really good! do you think you are ever going to use the card again?
i am hoping i will not have to.  unless something major comes up i am not planning on putting anything on credit again.
label: ashamed
response: that is wise. i too am trying to pay off my credit card debts. after that, i am cutting them up.

situation: i was walking out of my room and the lights were off.  all of a sudden a bat flew at me.
dialogue: i was with some friends and went up to my room.  it was late at night and the lights were off.  when i left my room a bat flew at me and landed on my leg.
that would have really scared me.
it did scare me.  i let out a scream.  one of my friends went to school for wildlife.  he captured the bat and let it outside which was great.
label: terrified
response: i bet you are thankful that your friend was there.

situation: i ate the entire cake
dialogue: i brought home a cake for my family, but i ate all of it! ugh.
all of it??? oh no. how bad do you feel right now?
uhm, i feel awesome in my tummy, but bad in my heart
label: guilty
response: haha i bet.  i am sure they were looking forward to it.

situation: my roommate would leave his dogs poop bags inside the house at times.
dialogue: my roommate was very forgetful.  he would sometimes leave his dogs poop bags inside instead of bringing them out to the garage.
ewww.
it was gross.  all of a sudden you would smell something and then notice the bag sitting there.
label: angry
response: why would it be in the house to begin with? does the dog poop in the house?

situation: tv people happy family
dialogue: i was watching tv and saw people with a happy family. it breaks my heart.
you are having trouble with family ?
my family is not close, it is depressing.
label: jealous
response: mine is not either. are you married?

situation: i am going to the movies tonight
dialogue: i am so hyped, i am going to the movies!
awesome! what are you going to see?
not sure yet, i will have to ask my friends
label: excited
response: whatever it is, i hope you have a good time!

situation: i broke my leg
dialogue: i broke my leg, it is so upsetting.
oh no!  how'd you do that?
i fell off a roof!
label: angry
response: what were you doing on the roof?

situation: i decided to go fishing last week, and did my research on the lake and weather conditions.  i was confident that we'd catch something that day.
dialogue: we decided to go fishing last week.
did you catch anything?
no!  and i was so confident that we would!
label: confident
response: did you at least have fun?

situation: my daughter graduated
dialogue: my daughter graduated high school!
congrats! you must be proud!
i am, thanky ou!
label: proud
response: my daughter is only in eigth grade we have a while to go

situation: i believed my father would not let me down.
dialogue: i believed my father would not let me down.
that is good to feel that way. you do not want to feel like someone close to you would let you down. did it work out for you?
no, he totally bailed on me, as usual.
label: trusting
response: oh i am sorry. that is sad. remember that it is not your fault. i would think of the people who have been there for you.

situation: moving scares me!
dialogue: i am about to move and i am terrified! what if it has bugs? or mold? or something else i do not know about?
oh gosh, you also scared of bugs?? that is my worst fear
yes! i cannot imagine them crawling on me when i sleep :/
label: terrified
response: i would have a heart attack!

situation: i remember baba's perogies
dialogue: i remember eating my baba's pierogies as a child, so yummy.
i have no idea what those are!
they are ukrainian pasta, kind of like stuffed pasta.
label: nostalgic
response: oh ok. i like ravioli is it like that?

situation: i am so sad i have no pierogies.
dialogue: i am so sad i have no pierogies.
what are pierogies? a type of food?
they are ukrainian dumplings.
label: disappointed
response: ah nice, i love dumplings, what are in them?

situation: my milk went bad
dialogue: the milk i drank this mornign went bad!
that is no good, did you throw it out?
yes, but not before i drank some. :/
label: disgusted
response: hope you do not get sick!  that would be a bad start to the weekend.

situation: my cat got cancer and had to be put to sleep.
dialogue: i once had a fluffy cat named leo, but he got lymphoma and i had to have him put to sleep.
oh, i am so sorry. it has to be the most difficult thing to have to do. i had to do that with my gorgeous lab i still miss him!
i am sorry to hear about your lab as well. they are very sweet dogs.
label: sad
response: indeed they are. and so are many cats the farm i used to live on has a ginger tom. he is quite the character and used to visit me regularly!

situation: earlier this week when i got my yearly review i found out i got a raise and will hopefully at some point be able to take over the helpdesk.
dialogue: i was so happy!  i have been working so hard for this company since i started so this is a great sign in my opinion!
did you get a promotion?
not yet but i did get a raise!  if the company takes over i will get to be in charge of the helpdesk though!
label: excited
response: wow, great job!

situation: school
dialogue: i am really scared to go back to school.
oh no!  what has you scared?
it is all new to me, i have never done it before
label: anticipating
response: it will be okay i promise.  first few days will be weird but you will slip in no problem once you adjust to your schedule.

situation: my mother died
dialogue: my mother died, i am a mess.
oh dang that is so horrible
thank you
label: devastated
response: it gets better with time but it must be hard

situation: i was driving by the old building where hastings used to be and just stopped.  i miss that store and all the time i spent in there with my old friends sand coworkers.
dialogue: i really miss hastings.  i spent so much time in that store when i first started college.  both just hanging out and working.
i remember that store! i loved going shopping there, was it your first job?
it was not my first but it was my most favorite retail job i had
label: nostalgic
response: yeah, i bet, it looked like a fun place to work.  especially for a college job.

situation: i hope i do well in school
dialogue: i pray i can do well in school
are you having any specific problem areas?
not yet, but i have not started yhet
label: hopeful
response: okay. i hope you do well too.

situation: i met a guy that had recently purchased an excursion.  i want one of those vehicles!
dialogue: i have really wanted a ford excursion for a long time.
interesting, those things are huge, do they even make them any more?
they have not made them for quite a few years.  but i met a guy that just picked one up in the last few days!
label: jealous
response: do you have a large family, or do you just like the idea of a large suv?

situation: i am scared to go to the cottage
dialogue: i am scared to go to the cottage
it is a big change. what is scaring you?
i do not like bugs!
label: apprehensive
response: i hate bugs too. you should exterminate before you move in

situation: i am sad my cousin is moving away
dialogue: i am sad my cousin is moving away.
is it really far?
yes, another country
label: disappointed
response: oh no. i am sorry to hear that

situation: i left my room at night and a bat flew at me.
dialogue: i had some friends over and went upstairs to my room.  all the lights were off and when i left my room a bat flew at me and landed on my leg.
well, that would be terrifying! were you afraid that a vampire was there?
hahahaha, that piece hadn't crossed my mind although it should have with all the vampire movies i had seen!  i let out a scream and one of my friends captured the bat and let it outside to be free.
label: afraid
response: well, that would be very creepy! they would hear my scream in the next town over!

situation: i was totally ready for my garage sale
dialogue: i was totally ready for my garage sale
you were ready? that is good to hear.
yes and we made $1026.25!
label: prepared
response: aweomse.  treat yo self.gif

situation: i had a job interview and wanted to just get it over with.
dialogue: i have an interview coming up.  its for a position that someone else already has but i need to do this interview to get my name out there and let the higher ups know i want to move into management.
are you prepared?
i am prepared for it.  i will be a lot happier once it is over.
label: anxious
response: i bet. good luck to you

situation: recently, i was the only person in the office.  i had a large project to get done, and only talked to people on my way to the bathroom that day.
dialogue: i went to work the other day, and i was the only person in the office.
where you supposed to be there? if so, then that is a nice feeling.
yeah, everyone else was just gone.  it was nice for a while, but got a bit lonely.
label: lonely
response: oh i see. that could make the time go slow also.

situation: school starts back up next month. i am excited about my classes.
dialogue: i am starting back at school next month. i am excited about getting back into my classes.
that is great. what classes are you taking?
i am a computer science student. the one i am most excited about is microprocessors.
label: excited
response: that is pretty cool. are you going to go towards hardware or stick with programming?

situation: my dog just died in my arms
dialogue: my dog just died in my arms.
did that happen tonight?
no, it was a few years ago.
label: devastated
response: well, it must've been something you said.

situation: my step-daughter turned 16, and i am not confident in her driving abilities.  she gets too distracted by her phone.
dialogue: my step-daughter just turned 16 in the past week.
did she have a party?
we are actually having it this coming weekend.
label: apprehensive
response: does she have her license yet?

situation: my girlfriends dog is not getting potty training.  one week she will be great.  the next week the only place she does not go to the bathroom is outside.
dialogue: i watch my girlfriends dog every once in a while and she just is not getting potty training.  she is a little over 5 months old and some weeks she does a great job and the next week she will go to the bathroom everywhere but outside.

that is super frustrating! i have only ever had outside pets so i cannot really offer advice, but it is one of those things where your anger is all misplaced because you know you cannot really be upset with the dog since it does not know any better.

i do understand that part too.  i actually got a puppy a couple months before her so i went through this all.  i just wish her puppy listened as well as mine because he took a couple months as has been doing great since.  i know it will click eventually.i just wish shed hurry up
label: angry
response: it will be well worth it when she gets the hang of it, but urgh. bathroom problems are why i do not think i want a kid anytime soon!

situation: i was shocked by my present
dialogue: i was shocked by my present.
you got a present? how lovely! what was the occasion?
it was my anniversary.
label: surprised
response: well, happy anniversary! what was your present?

situation: humanity sickens me
dialogue: humanity is the worst.
i agree. did something happen?
no, just frustrated
label: ashamed
response: i am sorry. not everyone is bad.  just a lot of people.

situation: my mom bought me a gift for my birthday
dialogue: my mom spent a lot of money buying me a computer for my birthday
that was nice
yes, i love my mom and i will give her something even better for her birthday!
label: grateful
response: do you have anything in mind?

situation: my roommate would not wash any dishes.  the sink would be overflowing.  he also would not rinse the food off so it we constantly had flies/rotting food smells in the kitchen.
dialogue: my old roommate never did any dishes.  he also did not wash any food off the plates so we had a sink full of dirty dishes and rotting food at all time.  it was miserable living there.
so, i take you left to live someplace else?

haha yes, i ended up saving up then moving out and buying my own place.  i will not miss the flies sitting around the kitchen and he is still just as messy.now its on his own though instead of with other people.
label: disgusted
response: just remember to never invite you ex-roomate to your new place, ever!!!

situation: i was one of three people in the running for a promotion at my job. i ended up not getting the job and a person with less experience got it.
dialogue: i recently tried to get a manager's job in my company, two others and myself were the last three in the running for the job.
very nice, congrats on making it that far. i actually was in the same situation about a week ago.  how do you feel you match up to the others?
i had much more experience than both of them, but ended up not getting the job. i am still pretty upset about it.
label: disappointed
response: i would be upset too.  however, i would not get discouraged though.  there may be another opportunity even better that comes along soon.

situation: i was proud when my little brother graduated from college.  he had to work hard but he got through it.
dialogue: my little brother graduated not too long ago.  he had to work hard but he made it through college
that is great, it is good to see people finish what they start. you must be very proud.
i was.  i know how hard it was for him so it was great seeing that hard work pay off in the long run.
label: proud
response: well, hopefully there will be nothing but great things for him in his future.

situation: i was proud when my brother graduated college.  he had to work hard but he got through it.
dialogue: my little brother graduated not too long ago.  he had to work hard but made it through it.
i am so glad to hear that.  did he find a job?
he did!  he actually just started a new job that he loves and is related to his degree.
label: proud
response: that is good to hear.  what will he be doing?

situation: my girlfriend is moving in this weekend.  it will be great finally living together.
dialogue: my girlfriend is moving in this weekend.  it will be great finally living together.
oh that is wonderful! how long have you two been dating?
we have been dating almost a year.  i am just excited to take this next step in the relationship.
label: joyful
response: it is a huge step, congratulations!

situation: my girlfriends aunt recently died.  although i never met her due to a falling out with that side of the family my girlfriend and her sister were devistated.
dialogue: my girlfriends aunt just died.  she was not close to her but is still devastated because of the impact it had on her sister.  i am doing whatever i can to help them both.
sometimes deaths affect us even when we are not really close.
that is very true.  i know she feels bad for not keeping as close contact as she could have with her aunt now.
