dialogue: i am so excited to get my paycheck in.
getting paid is always a good thing. were you waiting to get something special?
my boss said there might be the possibility of a raise this month.
label: faithful
response: you deserve one. did you get it?

situation: i was driving and someone cut me off in traffic
dialogue: i was driving and someone cut me off in traffic
i hate it when that happens! were they driving fast at the time, it could have been quite dangerous.
not too fast, it was still irritating though
label: annoyed
response: i can imagine, at least you got out of the situation safely

situation: i picked up a 2nd job last year and today made my last student loan payment
dialogue: i picked up a 2nd job last year and today made my last student loan payment
that is awesome. i think it is great that you stepped up to repay your loans!
yes, i am so thankful it is done. it has taken me 15 years. now only 15 more for my wife's loans
label: grateful
response: oh man, well i hope that it was worth it to take out those loans.

situation: i have lived alone for the last 10 years some day's i think i should get a dog.
dialogue: i have lived alone for the last 10 years some day's i think i should get a dog.
that is such a long time to live in loneliness. i suggest you do, dogs are great companions
i was thinking i will go to resume and adopt who ever has been their the longest.
label: lonely
response: sounds like a great idea! that would be very nice of you to give a dog a home

situation: just found out my wife is pregnant.
dialogue: just found out my wife is pregnant
wow, congratulations!  are you guys excited?
excited and terrified
label: surprised
response: i know the feeling!  my son is a year old so i remember it well haha.

situation: went to the barber today. i am one beautiful man.
dialogue: went to the barber today. i am one beautiful man.
you get a new trim?
i went old school. last a bet now i have a mullet with lighting bolts on the side and a stash.
label: confident
response: that is awesome, bet you look straight out of 1990s.

situation: i met up with an old friend from school.  we talked about the way things used to be
dialogue: i met up with an old friend from school
what did you guys get up to?
we just talked about the way things used to be
label: nostalgic
response: what do you miss the most?

situation: my husband never cooks. today he cooked my favorite food.
dialogue: my husband cooked me my favorite food today! he never cooks!
that is awesome. what did he make you?
bacon egg and cheese on toast! it was amazing! he makes the best fried eggs.
label: grateful
response: that sounds yummy. i am glad you had that special treat.

situation: i was impressed by how fast the dog ran.
dialogue: i saw a dog running earlier, it was insane how fast she went!
do you know what kind of dog?
miniature pinscher!
label: impressed
response: those things can really fly on the ground.

situation: last time i got really drunk, i told my girlfriend that i thought her best friend was really attractive. i felt so embarrassed the next day, but she forgave me because she knows i would never do anything wrong.
dialogue: last time i got really drunk, i told my girlfriend that i thought her best friend was really attractive.
oh no! i bet she was mad as heck
actually, she was not. she knew i was drunk, and she had been talking about involving another partner in the bedroom.
label: ashamed
response: oh hey! if it works out for you have fun

situation: i found a roach in the my house today
dialogue: i was sweeping the living room today and found a roach! ugh.
gross! out of all the bugs that i find in my house, those would be the worse.
i know! i feel like i need to bomb my house!
label: disgusted
response: knowing roaches, they'd probably survive it, seeing as they can pretty much survive anything!

situation: my little brother passed his summer school this year. he did not believe in himself but my family encouraged him and he did it; i am so happy for him.
dialogue: my little brother was sad and did not think he would pass his summer school this year.
oh no! did he pass?
he did and i am so happy for him!
label: proud
response: that is great! hopefully he will do good in school this year and not have to go to summer school again!

situation: i have an interview with my boss tomorrow. i have compiled all of my work from the past month.
dialogue: i have an interview with my boss tomorrow about my performance. i have compiled all of my work from the past month as well as great reviews from our clients!
that is great. maybe a promotion or a raise in on the horizon?
i am hoping for both! but i will take just the raise!
label: prepared
response: well i hope that it goes well for you!

situation: i have a interview monday for a higher position at my job i am more then positive i will get the promotion.
dialogue: i am interviewing for a higher position at my job i am so excited.
nice! i hope you get this job if you worked hard for it
i have and thanks so much i know i got this i am positive of that all my hard work will pay off and i am going to do great on monday for the interview.
label: confident
response: just have faith in your abilities and the rest will come by itself

situation: my daughter is a chef and after seeing her cook a big family dinner this weekend i am so moved on how far she has come.
dialogue: my oldest is a chef and it is moving to see how far she has grown the past year.
i am sure its always fun to view the progress of your creations.
it is and me and my family got to see those great creation this weekend she made us a fabulous dinner.
label: impressed
response: that sounds nice, having someone prepare a meal for you can be fun.

situation: i went out with a friend last september, we had some sushi and a small chat, and i really liked that time we spent together.
dialogue: about the same time last year, i went out with a friend for a sushi, it was a very pleasantly spent time.
oh yea. whats happened since then
not much really, we just had a small chat, but it just felt really satisfying.
label: content
response: oh well that sounds pleasant

situation: i went for a run tonight despite feeling super depressed these past two weeks. i am feeling happy that i pushed myself onto the right track.
dialogue: i went for a run tonight despite feeling super depressed these past two weeks.
did it feel good to get back out?
it felt amazing, i am so happy i was able to push myself onto the right track.
label: proud
response: how far did you end up running tonight?

situation: i passed my midterm exam it had 200 questions and i only missed 7 i was so stun.
dialogue: i took a big end of the semester exam it had 200 questions i was so nervous.
how did you do?
i was so stun to see i only missed 7 out of 200 i was so happy to have aced my test.
label: surprised
response: oh wow! congrats! that is great!

situation: when i was growing up i was always told that being emotional, is something that is reserved only for the girls.
dialogue: when growing up, i was repeatedly told that emotions are for the girls, but now i know that emotions are a big part of everybody's lives.
it is it is something we all have as humans it is not defined by gender show off your emotions proud.
yes, and it is a good news for us all.
label: sentimental
response: it really is why would someone make you feel like it was for girls only especially being young but you are great now.

situation: my husbands brother stole $500 from us let's talk about someone being beyond mad more like furious.
dialogue: my brother in law stole from me and my husband i am so mad.
he should be ashamed for himself, did he say why he did it?
no we have not seen him or he will not return none of the family calls he took our $500 and disappeared,
label: angry
response: well, on the other hand you can think of this situation, as if you just paid $500 to a person to never bother you again.

situation: my husband is in the service so when he is away i sleep in his shirt to feel close to him it is so dear and tender to me.
dialogue: my husband is in the service and he leaves when on active duty i be missing him so much.
have you hugged him recently?
no he has been gone for 5 months now i cannot wait to hug him though so for now i sleep in his shirts it seems like the closet i can get and it is so dear to me to wear it.
label: sentimental
response: i am sorry to hear that, he is a brave man.

situation: yesterday i felt so great, that i was ready to face any challenges that life could throw at me.
dialogue: yesterday i woke up in such a great mood, that i was ready to face any problem or opportunity.
did something ruin it?
nothing really, except some indigestion much later in the day.
label: prepared
response: well that is not too bad

situation: i remember the first time when i realized that people can lie.
dialogue: do you remember your first time realizing hat people can actually lie?
i cannot think of a certain moment that the idea clicked. it seems like i have always known they can.
lucky you, i have a sharp memory of that moment.
label: disappointed
response: what was that moment for you?

situation: i walked around our area seminar for the job with my shirt inside out and pants zipper down it was so awkward when several people brought it ti my attention.
dialogue: so itt was me who spent hours in a work seminar with my zipper down and shirt on backwards.
i am sorry but i am laughing. i bet you were so embarrassed.
it is pretty funny now but at the time i was red face it was awkward i know lot's of people noticed it.
label: embarrassed
response: i would imagine. just own it and wear it like a badge.

situation: an hour ago i was so happy that the wi-fi finally started working again.
dialogue: my wi-fi just started working again, that makes me very happy.
its nice to have the internet
how did people live without it just a couple decades ago?
label: grateful
response: i cannot even imagine

situation: anytime i just sit down somewhere sunny and have some sunflower seed with me i feel so happy.
dialogue: sunflower seed and sunny weather is a good combination for a relaxed day do you afree?
sounds very relaxing to me, as long as my allergies do not act up.
that is right we have to keep those in mind.
label: content
response: i always keep some propolis pills with me just in case.

situation: i usually can stand up for myself  in any situation, including the one that happened yesterday.
dialogue: yesterday, i was in a situation where i had to stand up for myself.
what happened that made you have to do that?
just some drunken guy, tried to attack me.
label: confident
response: oh goodness!  are you ok?

situation: when it rained yesterday, i still thought that there is a chance for some sunny afternoon.
dialogue: i knew there is a chance for some sun later in the day, when i went out yesterday.
i enjoy sunny weather too.
yes, how do people live in those cloudy cities like seattle?
label: hopeful
response: they must enjoy the rain.

situation: now that i know that soon i will need to move to a different city, i feel a bit down.
dialogue: i am moving to a different city soon, i feel a bit depressed about that.
oh no, i am sorry hun. i hope you are at least moving for a good reason like better opportunities.
yes, it should at least be better for me financially.
label: sad
response: well there is at least one positive. maybe you could try joining some meet up groups to help you acclimate.

situation: i am ready to take on the world today.
dialogue: have you ever woken up like like you are ready to conquer the world today?
i do almost everyday i feel like that is a great mindset to have to make your day successful.
i am glad we have this in common, many people are so negative in this world.
label: prepared
response: they are but to just be able to continue throughout another day is a great feeling.

situation: i love going to places like the museum and art galleries i attended a art show last month and it was so lovely i was moved by the paintings.
dialogue: i love going to museums and art galleries the art and sculptures is a sight to see.
i agree, do you have a favorite artist?
i love vincent van gogh his paintings are so moving and a lot of the art shows are close to his creativeness.
label: impressed
response: yes, he is great no wonder his work is so expensive.

situation: i walked into a room to take a test for work. i was not worried though. i knew i would do well since i would studied so much.
dialogue: i recently had to take a test for work. i knew i would do well because i was prepared.
that is good. did you find out the results of the test?
not yet. i should find out within the next week.
label: confident
response: good luck on the exam!

situation: there were things in my life that can only be described as the work of higher power.
dialogue: some things in my life can only be described by word providence.
what does providence mean?
means something extraordinary, like higher power.
label: faithful
response: okay, tell me more about that.

situation: i usually do not feel this emotion, but when i saw my brother picture on instagram today, i felt good for him.
dialogue: i feel happy for my brother that he is a good photographer.
that is great. does he do photography as a job or a hobby?
just as a hobby. but he is good at it.
label: proud
response: maybe he can turn it into a career and make a lot of money!

situation: i am going on  a family vacation cruise but we are no where near arranged in packing etc to go on this trip.
dialogue: i have a cruise planned for me and my family labor day weekend.
that sounds wonderful!  i have never been on a cruise, i bet you are excited and ready to go!
me either it will be a first for us all i am very excited only thing we are not arranged and ready yet we still have lot's to do.
label: prepared
response: i know that feeling all too well.  too much to do and not enough time to do it all, and certain things you cannot do until the week of.  hopefully you will get it all done and then you guys will have a great time!

situation: my dog was stolen while we was out shopping i have been so down and heart broken ever since.
dialogue: our family dog was stolen a week ago and our home have not been the same.
wow what kind of dog did you lose?
a teacup yorkie i miss her so much i have been so heart broken since they stole her while we was out shopping. had to be someone who was watching us and waited until we left.
label: sad
response: that is so tragic i have 3 dogs myself, do you have flyers up?

situation: my girlfriend's cat constantly walks over my head in the middle of the night for no reason. apparently she does not do it when to my girlfriend ever, and only acts up when i am there. i am pretty ticked off.
dialogue: my girlfriend's cat randomly walks over my head in the middle of my sleep.
oof, i hope that does not wake you up
it does, and i get so upset. apparently she does not ever do it to my girlfriend, only when i come over.
label: annoyed
response: maybe it does not fell very comfortable with having you over and does not have any other way of expressing itself

situation: my girlfriend and i have birthdays 8 days apart. we exchanged gifts somewhere in the between and it made me so happy, it kind of felt like christmas in the summer!
dialogue: my girlfriend and i have birthdays 8 days apart.
that is cool.  do you celebrate both of them on the same day?
we do! exchanging gifts makes it feel like christmas in the summer and it made me so happy.
label: joyful
response: haha i bet.  that is pretty awesome!

situation: today at work i let a coworker draw my blood, knowing she is a novice in the field. i felt i could let her do it since she has been doing good with patients.
dialogue: so today i let my co worker draw my blood knowing she is a novice!
oh no. did something bad happen?
it actually went well. i felt i could give her the benefit of the doubt considering she has been doing really well recently.
label: trusting
response: that;s great. i have always been nervous no matter who drew my blood.

situation: today at work i addressed a male as mrs. since the first name was frances. my face turned red as he walked up to doorway.
dialogue: i went to call a patient back to be seen and i addressed them as mrs and the person that walked up was a male.
oh no. how'd they react?
he did not get upset. he said it happens alot, but i can feel my face get red!
label: embarrassed
response: i would be super embarassed, too!

situation: my dad came home really drunk one night and wanted to get into a physical fight with everyone. i had to call the cops and hide in the bathroom until they came over; i was so scared.
dialogue: my dad came home from a bar really drunk one night, and started instigating fights with everyone in the household.
wow, that is horrible, i hope he calmed down after and apologized to everyone
unfortunately, no. despite him scaring everyone, he did not care.
label: terrified
response: yikes, i would definitely stage an intervention with the rest of your family, let him understand it is not okay

situation: when i was a kid, my friends brought their beyblades to school to play. my parents could not afford one and so in that time i felt bitter towards my friends.
dialogue: when i was a kid, my friends brought their beyblades to school to play
i remember those
they were awesome and i wanted one so badly, but my parents could not afford it. i felt very bitter towards my friends for a while after.
label: jealous
response: i never had one. i did not know they were expensive

situation: today at work was my review and i was happy because the doctor has been complimenting on my work.
dialogue: i had my review today at work! it went really well since the doctor has been giving me compliments!
that is great! i hope you keep getting good reviews like that.
yeah i am very happy to know what comes next, since i will find out how much of a raise i will get from this. i cannot wait!
label: excited
response: that is awesome. how much do you anticpate the raise to be?

situation: my girlfriend recently found herself a new hobby in sewing. she made a few dresses within a month as well as an amazing cosplay. i was really surprised she could pull it off in such a short time!
dialogue: my girlfriend recently found herself a new hobby in sewing
oh that is cool, is she good ?
she is super talented. she made a few dresses and cosplay within a month.
label: impressed
response: oh that is cool

situation: i worked really hard to get into a program that i wanted to be in. unfortunately, it was too difficult for me and i had to change majors; i was pretty upset with myself.
dialogue: i put a lot of effort and time into getting into a college program i wanted to be in.
oh that sounds like it will be very rewarding!
unfortunately, i had to switch majors; the program was too difficult to stay in and my mental health was deteriorating.
label: disappointed
response: a tough situation but at least you were able to realize and adapt!

situation: my sister leaves her clothes all over the living room. i get so irritated and i always tell her, but she seems to very lackadaisical.
dialogue: my sister leaves her clothes all over the living room.
oh god. the living room is shared. she should just leave the messiness in her room.
i agree completely! i get so irritated and i always tell her to clean up after herself, but she seems so very lackadaisical.
label: annoyed
response: how old is she?

situation: my girlfriend's cat is sick with cancer. i do not think she is going to make it for much longer and i am really shaken up by it.
dialogue: my girlfriend's cat is sick with cancer.
i am so sorry to hear that. how old is the cat?
only a couple of years old. it is so upsetting to think that she will not make it for much longer.
label: sad
response: all you can do is make sure she is not in too much pain as she goes.

situation: i went on a date last night and he kept looking at the hot girl at the table next to us.
dialogue: last night my date decided to keep checking out the hot girl at the table next to us.
i hope you walked out right then and there!
i didnt. i kept on with the date. she was very pretty and well dressed. she drove a nice care. i was kind of envious of it.
label: jealous
response: ah that was really disrespectful of her though. that is not someone you would want to date long term.

situation: the new girl at work has very little experience, so i was very shocked at her well done performance.
dialogue: the new girl at work is doing really well considering she has not experience. i am shocked!
that is good to hear. she should be a big help a lot quicker than normal then.
i agree! everyone including me were quite shocked byt it.
label: impressed
response: that should bode well for her and her future there though, so it was a good surprise!

situation: i decided to start dating again after being single 1 year. i miss having someone.
dialogue: after a year of being single i decided to start dating again.
how has it been going?
its very boring since  i am usally home by myself alot. now that iim starting to date it will not be so boring.
label: lonely
response: that is good, hopefully you find your soulmate.

situation: i went to the zoo yesterday and one of the tigers decided to go crazy with the ring leader!
dialogue: a tiger decided to act crazy at the zoo yesterday while the ring leader was doing a performance on stage!
oh god. did anything happen?
everybody was screaming and leaving the place! it was very scary for everyone! i did not stay to find out.
label: terrified
response: well, i hope nothing bad happened!

situation: i watched wimbeldon for the first time.
dialogue: i watched wimbledon for the first time. those tennis players are so good!
i watched it too! my favorite is federer. who is yours?
i like watching serena williams. do you watch every summer?
label: impressed
response: i have for the past 10 years! it is one of my favorite sports to watch.

situation: i have been doing so well at work. i feel my yearly review that is coming up will be very good.
dialogue: my yearly review is coming up and i have been doing well this year.
that is great. do you thiink you will get a raise?
i really think i will. i do not expect less than that. i have confidence in it.
label: anticipating
response: confidence is super important

situation: my boyfriend came home from his trip early.
dialogue: my boyfriend came home from his trip early. i was not expecting him home for another two days!
that is great! you must be happy!
i was! it was very unexpected and exciting. although, i was hoping to have time to clean the place up before he got home.
label: surprised
response: how come he came home early?

situation: i took my neice to volunteer at the local shelter last weekend. she had alot of empathy for the homeless and needy.
dialogue: i took my neice to volunteer at a homeless shelter this past weekend. she showed alot of compassion and love for the homless and needy.
that is really thoughtful of you. do you typically do things like that?
well i volunteer to help abused and battered kids. i wanted to show her things like this. i know she can be a good loving person.
label: caring
response: perhaps i should find the local shelter in my community and do the same. i have never done that before and i feel like i should be giving back to those less fortunate in some capacity.

situation: my boyfriend came home from his trip early. i was not expecting him for another two days. i was excited to see him.
dialogue: my boyfriend came home from his trip two days early!
yay! do you guys have free time to spend together now?
yes. i am very excited since i have not seen him in two weeks.
label: surprised
response: that sounds great, you should make him dinner to surprise him back!

situation: traffic in dallas can be so frusterating! to think todays traffic was because 2 people decided to argue in the middle of the intersection and block everyone.
dialogue: i was so upset today because 2 people decided to block traffic because of an argument.
how long did that last for?
for a good 45 minutes. at that it was during rush hour. everybody was so mad at them.
label: annoyed
response: why did not you tell them to move?

situation: i moved to a new state a few years back.  now my childhood best friends and i are in different parts of the country and i do not know anyone where i am.
dialogue: a few years back i moved to a new state.  now my childhood best friends and i live in different parts of the country and i do not know anyone really where i am.
you must really miss them.
i really do.  i mean we are in constant contact over the internet through instant messaging and video calls.  but it is not often that we all can get together and see each other in person.
label: lonely
response: yea. seeing each other on a screen definitely cannot beat being with each other in person.

situation: my boyfriend came home from his trip two days early. i was not expecting him for two more days. i am very excited.
dialogue: my boyfriend unexpectedly came home from his trip two days early!
did he catch you doing something crazy?
no, thankfully i was just eating.
label: surprised
response: that is good

situation: today was my coworkers last day of work. we both got along so well.  i am upset she is leaving us.
dialogue: my coworkers last day of work was today.  i am so upset she is leaving.
that is so sad. do you have any other friends there?
yeah i do, but she was the one i was closest to. yes i was very sad.
label: sad
response: i am so sorry for you. perhaps you can hang with her after your workdays?

situation: i get to start my vacation starting friday. i cannot wait!
dialogue: i cannot wait for friday! i go on vacation to new york!
new york is a fun place to visit.
i agree. i never been there so  i am so happy!
label: excited
response: you will have a blast.

situation: my hair dresser decided to try a new product on my hair. the end result was me having to shave all my hair off!
dialogue: so my hair dressed ruined my hair!  i am so mad!
oh no! was it too short for your liking?
actually i had to shave my head off. she used new product that burnt my hair!
label: furious
response: yikes! i would ask for a refund for sure

situation: i have been doing very well on my diet and last night i decided to eat a whole large pizza by myself!
dialogue: so i lost 20 lbs onmy diet and last night i ate a whole large pizza!
wow! well a cheat day here and there might be okay! haha
i agree. i feel bad for doing so!
label: guilty
response: right, but i would say once is not too bad as long you stay on track.

situation: i remember when my friends were helping me move out of our hometown.  we were riding in the moving truck and had to drop them off and say goodbye and we all felt terrible.
dialogue: i remember when my friends were helping me move out of our hometown.  we were riding in the moving truck and it came time to drop them off and say goodbye.  we all felt terrible.
i would feel terrible too. where did you move to?
i moved to a town about 30-45 minutes away, but at that point we were so used to seeing each other every day of our lives.  it was hard to get used to.
label: sad
response: i have moved almost half a dozen times in my life before, so i completely understand. those were rough times.

situation: the manager at the store was very rude and mean to the employees. i cannot believe what i saw and heard!
dialogue: the manager the store was very mean and rude to the employees. i could not beleive it.
that sucks, imagine being in an environment like that all day, i would go crazy
i agree. it made me sick to my stomach seeing it. i feel bad for them!
label: disgusted
response: i guess some people are just really rude, no matter what position you put them in

situation: i was driving at night in downtown and the gps told me to make a right, which was a very dark and scary road.
dialogue: last night my gps asked me to make a right down a dark and scary road.
it is hard to trust a gps. i have heard a lot of stories about people being steered the wrong way. please tell me you did not do it.
i was very nervous and doubting to do it. i actually did and it was not that bad
label: apprehensive
response: i am so glad that it did not turn out bad for you.

situation: i finally told my friend i was into him. i was so embarrassed to do it. he rejected me.
dialogue: i finally told my friend i was into him. he did not take it too well.
what did he do , how did he react ?
he rejected me and told me not to every call him again.  i am so embarrassed. i should have known better.
label: ashamed
response: well he is the one missing out and  i am sure your very worthy of attention from some better.

situation: i went to my nieces performance last night and she placed 5th place. i was so sad about this.
dialogue: last night my neice placed 5th at her dance performance. she was so upset and so was i
why was she upset? depending on how many people entered, fifth could be really good.
there were 30 girls. we worked very hard and felt she would place top 3 but what an outcome it was to be 5th.
label: disappointed
response: that is still really good! she did better than 25 other people.

situation: i feel relaxed and at ease when i got off work friday with no plans for the weekend. i cannot wait to do nothing for two days.
dialogue: i am very excited to not have any plans this weekend. it is going to be so nice to relax for two whole days.
nice! i bet you cannot wait! do you anticipate to releax or do things to catch up?
just relaxing this weekend.
label: content
response: very nice! i bet its going to be a good happy weekend.

situation: my best friend has won those taco bell playstation 4 giveaways twice so far.  i wish i could have his luck sometimes.
dialogue: my best friend has won those taco bell playstation 4 giveaways twice so far.  i wish i could be that lucky sometimes.
dang, and here i thought i was lucky winning a free soft drink in that contest. maybe we have to pool our efforts together and try to win us something big?
i know, man just got together and buy like 50 boxes and cross our fingers.  and another thing was he got it on his first try both times.
label: jealous
response: why stop at 50? we ought to get 100! we need to show your friend and evil corporate taco bell who is boss and nab us some consoles!

situation: my nephew is learning how to drive and asked to use my car to take the driving test this weekend.
dialogue: my nephew asked me to use my car this weekend for a drivers ed class.
did you let him?
we have been practicing together in my car , so i feel i can let him.
label: trusting
response: you are good to allow him to borrow the car.

situation: this weekend  i am going to go sky diving with my best friend and i hate heights!
dialogue: i am planning on going sky diving this weekend!
wow, i really like to do that. i hope you will enjoy it.
i do not know. i hate heights, so i am very nervous about it
label: afraid
response: ah ok. if you try once you will be alright next time.

situation: my roommate left leftovers in the refrigerator for a week. the dishes were moldy.
dialogue: my roommate leaves leftovers in the fridge and they get moldy.
that sounds revolting! have you said anything to him about it?
no. i am not very confrontational. and our lease is up in two months anyway so i am just going to wait it out.
label: disgusted
response: that sounds like a good plan. perhaps you should request a formal resume from any potential roommates for your future abode.

situation: i was studying at the library and the lady was smacking her gum across the table from me.
dialogue: i was at the library today and was trying to study, but this lady across the table was smacking her gum very loud.
did you ask her to stop it or did you have to move away from her?
well the library is very small so limited seats so i had to sit there and listen to it. i was so frusterated
label: annoyed
response: that was very rude of her to do that, some people just have no manners.

situation: this weekend i will be in a marathon. i have worked so hard these past few months for it.
dialogue: so this weekend  i am going to do a marathon. i have worked very hard to get myself ready for it
that is so exciting! have you run a marathon before?
i never have. i think all this time i been practicing will pay off.
label: prepared
response: that is good, i hope you do well! how did you prepare?

situation: my boyfriend came home from his trip two days early. i was very excited to see him.
dialogue: my boyfriend came home from his trip two days early!
what a nice surprise! did something happen or did he miss you!?
his business trip wrapped up a few days earlier than planned.
label: surprised
response: i see.i bet you and him are happy to be able to spend a little time together.

situation: i cannot even fall asleep waiting to go on our vacation.
dialogue: i doubt i will get any sleep waiting for tomorrow.
i am sorry to hear. why is that?
i am finally getting to take the kids to disneyland!
label: excited
response: oh, well that is a fine thing indeed! i would be  jumping up and down!

situation: i had to go out of town by myself for three weeks. it was hard not being able to talk to anyone i knew.
dialogue: i had to go out of town by myself for three weeks. it was hard not being able to talk to anyone i knew.
sounds pretty lonely. did you meet or make some friends while out of town?
no, i was too busy focusing on work while i was there.
label: lonely
response: ah i see. staying focused is hard, especially when your lonely.

situation: my neice and i were distraught because she worked so hard to get into nursing school and did not get in.
dialogue: my neice did not get into nursing school.she worked so hard for this. i feel bad for her.
that is horrible! is she going to try again?
yeah she is. she is going to retake some classes she made a b in. the look on her face after she found out was pricelss.
label: devastated
response: it must have been awful to see that in someone you care about. i am glad she is not giving up.

situation: i will be going to new york next week. i cannot wait!
dialogue: i cannot wait for this weekend!  i am leaving for new york!
wow , that is great. you must be loving it
yeah i cannot wait. i never been, so i cannot sleep thinking about it.
label: anxious
response: you must get a good sleep now to enjoy the new york later

situation: my coworkers and i bought 200 dollars worth of lottery tickets. we are all crossing our fingers we win!
dialogue: my coworkers and i got $200 dollars worth of lottery tickets.
nice! were they scratch offs?
for the powerball. we are all crossing our fingers!
label: hopeful
response: i will cross mine too! i hope ya'll win it big.

situation: i feel asleep while driving home last night. i almost hit a pole but my phone rang and i woke up!
dialogue: last night while driving home i fell asleep at the wheel.
omg.that had to be so scary.
yes it was. my phone rang and that is what woke me up.  i am so lucky to be here today.
label: grateful
response: i am so glad that you are. now no more driving when your sleepy.

situation: my upstairs neighbors make a ton of noise at all hours of the night. it makes it difficult for me to sleep.
dialogue: my upstairs neighbors make a ton of noise at all hours of the night. it makes it difficult for me to sleep.
that really sucks. maybe you should try egging their door? or just break in and pretend you are bigfoot while they are trying to sleep.
i am not trying to get arrested! i think i will just wait things out until i move in two months.
label: annoyed
response: i would go with the bigfoot option. you can get a costume on the cheap on ebay nowadays. i have used that tactic countless times and it has never failed!

situation: i got my bonus coming up on this paycheck. i have been saving money for a new car and i think i can finally get one!
dialogue: i am expecting a good bonus to be on this check coming up. i can finally go buy a new car!
that is some exciting news. do you already know what kind of vehicle you want?
yes! very exciting! yes i had my eye on one all year. i cannot wait
label: excited
response: christmas is coming early. you will have to take me for a ride.

situation: i was sure i would do good on this exam coming up. i studied so hard for it.
dialogue: i studied so hard and prepared for this exam tomorrow. i bet i will make no less than an a
i am sure you will. good luck for you!
thanks! it will be a breeze.
label: confident
response: whats kind of exam is that?

situation: i have a very hard time taking tests. when i know i have an important exam coming up, i worry for weeks in advance.
dialogue: i have got a big test coming up and i am so worried!
do not be. i think you will ace it.
i hope so. i usually do better than i expect to, but that still does not make it any less scary.
label: anxious
response: exam's are always scary. we just need to take the mind out of it

situation: my bank has called me three times a day ever since i applied for a mortgage. it is been a week and they show no signs of slowing down.
dialogue: my bank has called me three times a day ever since i applied for a mortgage. it is been a week and they show no signs of slowing down.
why not block the calls?
i want them to be able to get in touch with me if something important comes up.
label: annoyed
response: have you asked them to stop calling about this topic?

situation: my upstairs neighbors make a ton of noise at all hours of the night. it makes it difficult for me to sleep.
dialogue: my upstairs neighbors make a ton of noise at all hours of the night. it makes it difficult for me to sleep.
have you spoken to him?
no, i do not like to be confrontational. i am moving in two months anyway, so i am just going to wait it out.
label: annoyed
response: maybe you should buy some earplugs.

situation: i watched wimbledon on tv over the summer for the first time. those tennis players are so good!
dialogue: i watched wimbledon on tv over the summer for the first time. those tennis players are so good!
i love tennis. will you watch the us open?
maybe. i hadn't considered it yet.
label: impressed
response: it is a great tournament, you should watch.

situation: : my bank has called me three times a day ever since i applied for a mortgage. it is been a week and they show no signs of slowing down.
dialogue: my bank has called me three times a day ever since i applied for a mortgage. it is been a week and they show no signs of slowing down.
so are they telling you good news?
not yet. i just filled out the prequalification online. i have not officially applied yet.
label: annoyed
response: oh okay. well hopefully they give you a chance to breathe and decide what you want to do.

situation: my mom said she was going to make me a mystery dinner. i believe in her!
dialogue: my mom said she was going to make me a mystery dinner. i believe in her!
ooh how nice! do you have any guesses as to what she may be making you?
nope! she was going to make something completely different from what she usually makes!
label: trusting
response: well i hope it is good! your mom sounds like a great person to have a fun surprise for you like that.

situation: i met my wife online 7 years ago and cannot see myself with anyone else, ever.
dialogue: i met my wife online 7 years ago and cannot see myself with anyone else, ever.
you are so lucky to find someone special online. that can turn out so badly sometimes for some people.
oh i know. i got lucky, we found out we lived really close to each other so we met up and it has been great ever since.
label: faithful
response: that sounds like fate? being that both of you lived close to each other.

situation: i bought my daughter a cell phone for her birthday
dialogue: my daughter has worked very hard to keep her school work finished, her room clean, and the dishes washed. i bought her a cell phone for her birthday this year. she is becoming a responsible young preteen
wow, watching kids grow up is hard. how has she been with the cell phone?
she has been good so far. we are trying to limit her access to it to just a few hours per day. she also had to "turn it in" at night before she goes to bed.
label: trusting
response: that is great parenting! you have to trust that your children will make the right choices.

situation: i have been having a lot of anxiety lately. i made an appointment with a psychiatrist
dialogue: i have been having some anxiety lately and made an appointment with a psychiatrist. i kept going back and forth about if i wanted to actually go
you should go, otherwise the condition could get worse.
i ended up going. i am really glad i did. she has been a huge help for me.
label: apprehensive
response: that is great news! fortunately doctors are there to help us and i am glad they have helped you!

situation: i had a septic tank issue and called a guy that i found a business card from and had him come out. he did not have hardly any equipment with him and sounded like he did not know what to do.
dialogue: i had a septic tank issue and called a guy that i found a business card from and had him come out. he did not have hardly any equipment with him and sounded like he did not know what to do.
oh my goodness that sounds so bad! did they charge you for the visit?
no. i just asked what it would cost to fix then told him i could not afford it to get him to leave.
label: apprehensive
response: you made the right move. they at least have to show up with that giant truck that sucks the tank dry.

situation: just now i ate a half a big bag of peanut m&ms. i tried to resist, but could not
dialogue: i bought a big bag of m&ms and i could not resist it
if i had a bag of m&m's right now i would eat them for sure!
well that is what i just did, so far i have eaten half of it
label: ashamed
response: maybe save the other half for later.

situation: i told my girlfriend about my self harm habits. i normally would not have told anyone but i had faith in her.
dialogue: i told my girlfriend about my self harm habits a little while ago.
how did she reacted to the admission to self harm?
she was really sad, but she appreciated the fact that i told her.
label: trusting
response: now that your girlfriend knows the problem,  the both of you can work on solutions and support together.

situation: my friends wanted to bring me to laser quest for my birthday. i was not sure if i would like it, but we ended up just staying at his place and had fun nonetheless.
dialogue: my friends wanted to bring me to laser quest for my birthday.
is that like a laser tag place? that sounds like a lot of fun! what do you think?
yeah exactly. i was not sure if i would like it or not and i was a little unwilling to try it out.
label: apprehensive
response: i have played laser tag a few times. i think you will have a great time! it is very high paced and noisy but that is half the fun.

situation: i spent all of summer doing everything but studying for my final exam. i am pretty sure i am going to fail it and i feel awful about myself.
dialogue: i spent all of summer doing everything but studying for my final exam
oh that sounds worrisome, do you think you will pass?
i am fairly certain i am going to fail and i feel awful about myself, but i just cannot get myself to do it.
label: ashamed
response: i am sad to hear that but human nature is hard to fight. honestly, if you have any alternative options or plans you may have to fall back on them.

situation: my friends and i had spent all day troubleshooting a new pc build that we had just completed. it turns out that the motherboard or processor were defective, and we had to deconstruct it to send those pieces in for a return. it was so frustrating.
dialogue: my friends and i had spent all day troubleshooting a new pc build that we had just completed.
that sounds intensive! how did it go?
it went awful. it turned out that the motherboard or processor were defective and we had to deconstruct it to return both pieces. so much wasted time!
label: devastated
response: i bet that was so defeating! i am sorry to hear that. i wish there was better quality control with some of these companies that deal in parts.

situation: i found an injured spider with a leg missing in my bathroom a few days ago. instead of killing it like so many people do, i brought it outside and hoped for the best.
dialogue: i found an injured spider with a leg missing in my bathroom a few days ago.
did you save it or kill it?
i saved it. i brought it outside and hoped for the best.
label: caring
response: it is missing a leg so its probably dead unfortunately.

situation: i passed two trials that a company put me through and i felt so good. i think i am going to get the job!
dialogue: i passed two trials that a company put me through and i only have three left.
ooh, i bet you cannot wait to finish!
you got that right! i am feeling pretty happy about my performance and i think i will get the job!
label: content
response: i hope you get it! good luck!

situation: i spent hours studying for a final exam. i was expecting to pass, but did not think i would get a 91!
dialogue: i spent hours studying for a final exam.
how did they go? did you pass?
it went amazing! i expected to pass but i did not think i would get a 91!
label: anticipating
response: wow! congrats, you should totally be proud of yourself.

situation: i found an old stamp booklet my girlfriend and i filled out before we started dating. i felt so warm and fuzzy on the inside.
dialogue: i found an old stamp booklet my girlfriend and i filled out before we started dating.
that is very sweet! i bet it brought up a lot of feelings inside you.
definitely. i felt so warm and fuzzy on the inside, and so did she when i sent her a snapchat of it.
label: sentimental
response: you guys sound like you have a solid relationship. it is always great to find those little pieces from the early days.

situation: i am pretty sure a girl at the convention was hitting on me. however, i have a loving girlfriend and i would never cheat on her.
dialogue: i am pretty sure a girl at the convention was hitting on me.
did you get her number?
nah. i have a loving girlfriend and i would never cheat on her.
label: faithful
response: good man, i have a lot of respect for that.

situation: for my camping trip, i brought with me my tent, camping chairs, mattress, sleeping bag, pillows, med-kit, bug spray, food and beer. never have i ever felt so ready for anything in my life.
dialogue: for my camping trip, i brought with me my tent, camping chairs, mattress, sleeping bag, pillows, med-kit, bug spray, food and beer.
that sounds like quite the checklist. i am glad you brought the beer you might need it haha!
oh yeah definitely. never have i ever felt so ready for anything in my life.
label: prepared
response: well i bet you are going to have a great time. with that haul i do not see how you could not!

situation: i saw a man slap his dog on the sidewalk a few times while i was on the bus. i was so angry, i wanted to hop off the bus and yell at him for being an idiot.
dialogue: i saw a man slap his dog on the sidewalk a few times while i was on the bus.
holy cow! did you call him in?
i should have, but last time my girlfriend did that the police ignored it. i was so angry.
label: furious
response: oh man!  do you have a dog?

situation: i just had a window replaced.  my wife had to meet him since i was busy, so i trusted he would do a good job in my absence.
dialogue: i just had to replace one of the window panes in my house.
how come? and was it a pain to replace it?
i am not sure what happened.  i had to have a guy come out to replace it, and could not meet him, so my wife had to.
label: trusting
response: i hope he did a good job!

situation: when i was a kid, all my friends had yu-gi-oh cards but me. i kind of envied them.
dialogue: when i was a kid, all my friends had yu-gi-oh cards but me.
how come you did not collect them? i loved them myself.
i think my parents found them expensive, otherwise i cannot think of any other good reason. to be honest, i kind of envied my friends.
label: jealous
response: well, they are expensive and you did not really miss much.

situation: i took up running and i started seeing a huge improvement in my cardiovascular endurance. i felt so certain that i would hit my 5km goal in no time!
dialogue: i took up running and i started seeing a huge improvement in my cardiovascular endurance.
nice, was it hard to start?
unimaginably hard. but once i got into it i could not stop. i am feeling pretty certain that i will hit my 5km goal in no time.
label: confident
response: wish i could run close to 5km, i would struggle with 100 meters.

situation: my younger brother was playing an old gamecube game that i loved to play back when i was a kid. he brought back such great memories.
dialogue: my younger brother was playing an old gamecube game that i loved to play back when i was a kid.
that is cool. man, those tiny disks were easy to lose. what game?
he was playing paper mario and the thousand year door. what an awesome game! it brought back so many great memories.
label: nostalgic
response: that is awesome. i get nostalgic about old games as well.

situation: my buddy drank way too much at a party and puked all over my favorite jacket. i felt so sick i thought it was going to be my turn next.
dialogue: my buddy drank way too much at a party and puked all over my favorite jacket.
that sounds horrible, did you wash it or throw it away?
i washed it and it came out surprisingly. but at that time, i felt so sick seeing what was happening to my jacket that i thought i was going to puke next.
label: disgusted
response: that is a really rough story, you should make him pay for another one.

situation: a few months ago, a good friend of mine that i look up to attempted suicide. thankfully he survived and is doing much better now, but i just felt so shaken up by the whole thing.
dialogue: a few months ago, a good friend of mine that i look up to attempted suicide.
damn, is he ok now?
thankfully he is. he is doing much better, but the thought still shakes me scared to this day.
label: anxious
response: did he go to the doctors for help? anyway i am glad he is ok.

situation: i drank too much and passed out a few months ago. apparently people were trying to wake me up by shaking me and i would not get up. after that scary story, i decided to limit how much i drink at parties.
dialogue: i drank too much and passed out a few months ago.
oh no! was it a fun night?
it was, but it got scary at some point. apparently people were trying to wake me up by shaking me and i would not get up.
label: terrified
response: oh heck! that had to be really scary for them! glad you are okay though!

situation: i found my old yearbooks in a closet while i was packing up to move. it is weird to see how far my friends and i have come in the past years.
dialogue: i was packing up my house to move, and found my old yearbooks! it is so weird to look back and see how far everyone i knew in high school has come.
aww, that sounds interesting!  are you in touch with many people from high school?
a couple people. fewer as the years go by, unfortunately.
label: sentimental
response: i get that.  it is weird when i forget the name of someone i knew for years.

situation: my brother went on a low-calorie diet and began shaking everyday. i was a little scared for him, but i knew he'd be fine once he changed his diet to a proper one as the doctor recommended him to.
dialogue: my brother went on a low-calorie diet and began shaking everyday.
poor thing!  is he felling better now?  i hope he quit that diet.
he quit the diet a while ago as recommended by his doctor. i was a little scared but i knew it was just side effects of a bad diet.
label: afraid
response: thank god he is ok.  there are very dangerous diets around, better be guided by his doctor.

situation: i remember the first time i let my brother drive my car. i usually do not like people driving my car, but he is such a good driver so i knew i had nothing to worry about.
dialogue: i let my brother drive my car for the first time yesterday.
were you nervous?
no, he is such a good driver. i knew i had nothing to worry about.
label: trusting
response: that is awesome.  i am glad he did so well.

situation: last week i woke up to a really cute text from my girlfriend and a funny message from my brother. i felt so thankful and appreciative of my situation and of their existence.
dialogue: last week i woke up to a really cute text from my girlfriend and a funny message from my brother.
that is lovely! i love waking up to awesome texts.
yeah! i had a moment of realizing how lucky i am to be in the position i find myself in, and felt really thankful for my life and the people a part of it.
label: grateful
response: that is so wonderful to hear.

situation: my girlfriend spent a few days in the woods with no cellular service with her parents. i missed her so much.
dialogue: my girlfriend spent a few days in the woods with no cellular service with her parents.
how did that make you feel?
really lonesome. i missed her so much.
label: lonely
response: i bet. i am not great at being away from my boyfriend.

situation: ever since i have been on these anti anxiety and depression medication, i have been able to socialize a lot more. i am really surprised with how much i have improved.
dialogue: ever since i have been on these anti anxiety and depression medication, i have been able to socialize a lot more.
that is great! what have you been doing to socialize?
just talking to more people in general. for example, at a convention i was volunteering at.
label: impressed
response: what kind of convention?

situation: i volunteer at a dog shelter every weekend. it is great to be able to help out all of the cute dogs!
dialogue: i volunteer at a dog shelter every weekend.
that is such a sweet thing to do.
thank you, they are so cute!
label: caring
response: dogs are probably my favorite pet. maybe i should take up volunteering for a dog shelter one day.

situation: i am still upset over lil peep's death. he died too young and his music really resonated with me.
dialogue: i am still upset over lil peep's death.
lil peep died? when.
november of 2017. almost a year ago.
label: sad
response: damn, him and xxxtentacion we are really good.

situation: my dog sheds so much i have to vacuum my room practically every 4 days if i do not want little tufts of fur everywhere. i am so irritated, but it is not his fault and i love the big goof.
dialogue: my dog sheds so much i have to vacuum my room practically every 4 days if i do not want little tufts of fur everywhere.
i love puppies! but they definitely are a lot of work in terms of their hair.
you are right. i am just so irritated, even if it is not his fault and i love the big goof.
label: annoyed
response: i understand. our puppy sheds a ton too and he is not even that hairy of a dog

situation: my brother and a bunch of our friends planned to go to a 15-person cottage in july. i could not wait for all the fun and games we would experience!
dialogue: my brother and a bunch of our friends planned to go to a 15-person cottage in july.
oh my, that sounds like an absolute blast!
it was. at that time, i could not wait for all the fun and games we would experience!
label: excited
response: did you stay for long? that would be a great vacation.

situation: one time when i was in kindergarten, i needed to go to the restroom. the teacher did not let me, so i peed myself
dialogue: one time when i was in kindergarten, i needed to go to the restroom. the teacher did not let me, so i peed myself
oh no! did you get in trouble?
yes, they called my parents and i was sent home. i got spanked
label: ashamed
response: aww, i am sorry. hope that teacher learned a lesson

situation: the last time i went on vacation i had to find a good cat sitter who could be relied on to remember to come by each day to feed the cats.
dialogue: last month i went on vacation and had to find someone to cat sit. it was a relief to find someone that i could trust to come by each day and not forget.
it is wonderful peace of mind to find someone you can trust with your fur babies! did you have a nice trip?
yes, i was able to go visit my stepdaughter on the other side of the country. the sitter sent pictures occasionally, so i did not spend my trip worrying.
label: trusting
response: aw, that was so nice! i would love to find a cat sitter like that!

situation: my son recently turned 4.  it is hard to watch him grow up so quickly.
dialogue: my son had his 4th birthday a couple of weeks ago.
how did it go? what'd you get him for a gift?
he got a remote control excavator, and had a lot of fun at his party.  it is crazy how fast he is growing up, though.
label: sentimental
response: it seems like all those years just flew by, huh. at least now he is getting old enough to start remembering all these great times!

situation: i did not feel like coming to work today.  but i got up and went to the office anyway.
dialogue: it is really hard to get motivated on fridays.
are you feeling zapped from the week?
yeah, there is a lot going on.  i ended up heading to work anyway.
label: faithful
response: i am sorry to hear that. i hope you do not have to work through the weekend!

situation: i bought a bunch of dumbbells, and a workout bench but i have barely used them. i do not feel too good about myself.
dialogue: i bought a bunch of dumbbells, and a workout bench but i have barely used them.
i feel that pain. do you not have the motivation or just do not know what to do?
i do not have the motivation. i know the workouts i should be doing but also struggle with proper form a bit.
label: disappointed
response: i get that. well if i could give any advice it would be make sure you have proper form over anything. do not worry about heavy weight if your form is garbage.

situation: i have a impacted wisdom tooth. i need to go to the dentist but i am apprehensive about it.
dialogue: i have a impacted wisdom tooth. i need to go to the dentist but i am apprehensive about it.
how much pain are you on a scale of 1-10?
on bad days it is about a 6
label: apprehensive
response: dang that sounds bad! i know you might be frightened of going but i think you should go. you will be better off for it.

situation: a few years ago, i was invited to rockfest by my older brother and his friends. i love punk-rock bands but it was my first show and i was a little scared to go.
dialogue: a few years ago, i was invited to rockfest by my older brother and his friends.
that was nice of them! i bet you felt really cool hanging with them. how did it go?
yeah it was awesome! i was a little scared at first but within a few hours of arriving there it turned into a total blast!
label: apprehensive
response: that is awesome! i love festivals, they are always great to unwind and even just walk around talking to people.

situation: i have not been following my healthy eating regiment as strictly as i should. even though i do not need to lose any weight, i want to be healthy and cheating on this diet makes me feel bad.
dialogue: "i have not been following my healthy eating regiment as strictly as i should.
why not, have you have many temptations?  i know how difficult it can be at times to eat healthy, i struggle to do it too.
yeah. carbs like pasta and bread get me every time.
label: ashamed
response: i know, fresh bread is a big temptation to me, and what about sweets and desserts, do you have a weakness for those too?

situation: i told my best friends about my suicidal thoughts. i knew i could have faith in them, and they were super supportive.
dialogue: i told my best friends about my suicidal thoughts.
it is really a good start to recognized that you should talk about it. we all need someone to just listen once in awhile.
yeah you are right. i had faith in them and they ended up being really supportive.
label: trusting
response: oh that is a good friend. i hope your feeling better now.

situation: one time i thought about getting dominoes pizza, but then i remembered i was loyal to pizza hut
dialogue: one time i thought about getting dominoes pizza, but then i remembered i was loyal to pizza hut
i like dominos better
it tastes pretty good now, but i still like the oily goodness of pizza hut!
label: faithful
response: dominoes, imo, has better prices and better pizza. i do not like all that oil

situation: one time my mom brought me lunch all the way from her work!
dialogue: one time my mom brought me lunch all the way from the restaurant where she works!
that is thoughtful of her. nice to know that your mom was thinking of you in the middle of the day.
yup, she is the best! i shall make it up to her one day!
label: caring
response: take her out to dinner! that would be a treat.

situation: one time i was at the grocery store and i accidentally walked out with a item without paying for it
dialogue: one time i was at the grocery store and i accidentally walked out with a item without paying for it
oh no! you must've felt ashamed. did you return it?
yes, i got caught and had to walk back in shame!
label: embarrassed
response: hopefully they were understanding that it was accidental?

situation: i walked into work very late and the clinic was very busy. i was so embarrassed.
dialogue: i was very late to work today and they were so busy with patients.
did you get wrote up or a lecture when you got their.
well i will find out tomorrow. i know better than that is what she told me, especially on fridays, when we are the busiest.
label: ashamed
response: its always best to be on time , i hope they understand no one is perfect.

situation: my boss tells me i need to go to school to become a doctor instead of nurse, but i feel its alot of time and money to do so.
dialogue: my boss told me to go to school to become a doctor instead of a nurse. i felt like it was a compliment.  i am worried about how much and how long medical school will take.
the journey there is always the toughest, its years of practice and studying but in the end it will be totally worth it
i agree. i guess i will weigh my options, its just i am getting old and watn to start a family too, so i do not know.
label: apprehensive
response: with whatever you decide in life just know that you are a very skilled and intelligent person!  i am sure you will find your path in life eventually with time

situation: i got in a heated argument with my friend about religion and it made me question my beliefs.
dialogue: my friend and i got in an argument about religion today. it made me question my faith.
wow,  that was serious then
yeah. i want to stay true to my beliefs, but she made some very valid points.
label: faithful
response: ok,  so what is your plan now?

situation: when i started college i moved to a new state where i did not know anyone.
dialogue: i remember back when i started college. i moved to a new state where i did not know anyone and i had no idea what to expect.
wow that sounds scary. did you make good friends?
yes, i did eventually. there is something to be said for living in a dorm at a time when you want to meet new people and fit in.
label: apprehensive
response: yes it can be really helpful! i went to school 3 hours from my home and it was still hard to meet new people

situation: today i had a patient who found out she could not have babies. she has been trying for 6 months now.
dialogue: today i had to tell a patient about her lab results. come to find out she could not have babies. she was very upset.
oh, that must have been a hard thing to do. i would hate to be the one to deliver such a bad news.
yeah i felt bad. she started crying so much. its like her world ended there.
label: devastated
response: so sad..that makes me want to cry, too, just hearing about her reaction.

situation: i love going back to visit the house i grew up in.
dialogue: whenever i go back to my hometown i love driving by the house i grew up in. i have such great memories.
i bet it does! do you go by there often?
i get to visit about once a year. i always wish that i knew who lived there now so i could see the inside of the house.
label: sentimental
response: i bet it is much different than it was back when you lived there.

situation: i failed one of my classes' finals. i definitely did not feel good about it when i found out i failed.
dialogue: i found out some bad news the other day.
oh no can you tell me? it is okay if it is too private.
i just got back my grade for my final for my class and i failed it. i studied real hard, but unfortunately it did not seem to matter.
label: ashamed
response: oh my gosh i am so sorry that really sucks. can you talk to the professor and try to make it up or find out what you did wrong?

situation: someone twisted what i said earlier today to make it seem like i was saying something else. i felt really bad, even though they were lying.
dialogue: someone twisted what i said earlier today to make it seem like i was saying something else. i felt reall ybad.
oh no why would they do such a thing
they were angry and wanted to be aggressive.
label: ashamed
response: definitely does not excuse what they did.

situation: some lady i knew kept trying to hit on me knowing that i had a girlfriend. i knew i would never do anything like that though.
dialogue: some lady i know tried to hit on me even though she very well knew i am in a relationship!
that is not cool. i bet it felt awkward.
it really did but i would never do something to jeopardize my relationship.
label: faithful
response: you are a stand up person!

situation: i spent this evening with my family.  this makes me realize how blessed i am.
dialogue: i had a nice quiet evening at home tonight.
nice, silence is golden
well, my family was here, too.  toddlers do not make life quiet, but they make me feel fulfilled.
label: content
response: full of what?

situation: i was supposed to go to a meeting today.  however, i skipped it.
dialogue: there was a meeting scheduled today that i thought was utterly pointless.
oh no, was it one of those meetings that should have been an email?
it definitely was, so i ended up skipping it.
label: ashamed
response: hopefully you do not get in trouble but i definitely know the feeling.

situation: i told a close friend of mine a very big secret. i do not think that they will tell anyone.  i am hoping.
dialogue: i told my close friend a very big secret yesterday.
oh really, were you supposed to tell them?
it was my choice. i really do not think they will tell anyone! they are good people.
label: trusting
response: you can never be to sure now a days, they might post your secret to social media.

situation: one time i was really sure that i was going to ace a test because i studied all night
dialogue: one time i was really sure that i was going to ace a test because i studied all night
did you ace your test?
yup, i was worried during the test too, but i am glad everything turned out okay
label: confident
response: i always worry when i have to take tests. unfortunately, i am horrible with tests. i am glad you aced it!

situation: a friend of mine recently got a decent pay raise, after he got one last year.  i wish i knew what to do to get a raise.
dialogue: a friend at work recently got a raise.  that is the 2nd one in the last year for him!
nice, what a legend and a gentleman
yeah, but i have not had one in 3 years.
label: jealous
response: word, you should ask him what the secret is

situation: my ex boyfriend and i were together for 4 years.  i was faithful to him the whole four years
dialogue: i was totally committed to him in every way i could be.   however he ended up cheating on me
that kind of cold disregard for someone you are supposed to love is totally alien to me, the guilt would destroy me.

it would me too, not only that but he just up and got with her like i never existed to him.   its funny because he always accused me of cheating on him and i had no clue why.  it was him the whole time!
label: faithful
response: yeah freud called it projection, it is too bad people tend to hide their true natures so well.

situation: i had to kick my 18 year old son out of house.    he has been gone almost a month now.
dialogue: he kept doing drugs, and taking things that did not belong to him.  it broke my heart but i did not know what else to do.
it is awful! i know so many families are dealing with similar situation. sometimes we do not know how to help someone close to us. heart breaking.

yes you are right about that.  i dealt with it for a long time and then i just could not anymore.  over and over things would disappear and he would of course always deny it.  he became violent at time to his sister and me and i could not put them at risk.
label: trusting
response: you cannot help him until he wants to really change. sometimes all you can do is pray.

situation: my wife
dialogue: today after coming back from work i saw my wife and she was asking me why are you late with questioning eyes, i told her that i wen't to go and get her favourite meal, i felt so faithful
did she feel bad and apologize after she realized what you had done?
she was joking about it, but she was so happy afterwards and we ate together, it was such a nice day
label: faithful
response: it is good to get to spend time with those you love. i am happy for you.

situation: i trust myself
dialogue: after a long day from work, i was stuck at this math problem, but then i decided to go for a walk instead of working on the problem, i trust my guts, after i had come back from the walk, the solution kicked in and i was able to do the problem
that is inspiring, has that worked for you in the past in the same way?
yes always, it is something that works for me
label: trusting
response: that is so cool, you seem very intuitive

situation: walking at night
dialogue: it was 3am, i was walking at the utter night. i was scared out of my mind. anything could happen, my walking speed increased. and everything i was seeing suddenly became more and more scary
that sounds frightening. did you get home safely?
in the end yes. but the journey was sure hell
label: apprehensive
response: why were you walking so late at night?

situation: i am more content in my life
dialogue: today i realised the small details of my life and i feel more satisfied
nice, what are some things you realized?
that i have everything i wished for.
label: content
response: you do not have me yet 3

situation: one time i bought water and snacks before a hurricane came to wreck my city
dialogue: one time i bought water and snacks before a hurricane came to wreck my city
oh god, how did you . have the courage to even go outside?
my house flooded so i had to get on my roof !
label: prepared
response: that sounds like an adventurous day

situation: one time they put cheese in my hamburger when i told them not to!
dialogue: one time they put cheese in my hamburger when i told them not to!
wow, how could they do that?
they are complete monsters i tell ya!
label: furious
response: someone's gotta put an end to that poor service!

situation: i lied to my mother today
dialogue: i lied to my mother and i feel very uneasy
you should. no matter what you cannot lie to your mom. it will always come back on you.
i just realised this now
label: embarrassed
response: come clean and fix it. it will make you feel better.

situation: confident with my abilities
dialogue: i am beginning to realise in my abilities and i feel so confident in them, i am able to anything
nice! do you have any superpowers?
in a way yes,yes i do the power of my will and mind
label: confident
response: i like your confidence! fighting!

situation: when i drink coffee, memories from my past keep playing in my head
dialogue: when i drink coffee, memories from my past keep playing in my head
oh nice, what kind of memories?
memories of talking to strangers in chatroom. lots of things
label: nostalgic
response: how does this make you feel like?

situation: i have been working on my programming skills and i feel like i can get a new job!
dialogue: i have been working on my programming skills and i feel like i can get a new job now!
that is awesome! you are going to be rolling in the dough with those skills
hell yeah, no more living in mom's basement!
label: hopeful
response: that is exciting. how long have you been learning programming?

situation: a couple of days ago there was a man at the gas pump at our local gas station.  he was  was trying to find a way to get himself some gas so he could get home.
dialogue: from time to time i see an older man around our town driving his lawn mower from place to place.  sometimes i see him at  mcdonalds,or the dollar general store.
an interesting one, what does this make you feel ?

well at first i thought it was cute until i saw him at the gas station the other day.  i overheard him asking someone that was getting gas if he happened to have a little change he could have.  he needed to get home in his lawnmower but did not have the money to do so.   i ended up giving him 3 bucks.
label: caring
response: oh did he say anything afterwards? what happend next?

situation: looking after my cats
dialogue: i believe i am a really caring person, because i always take care of cats and feed them and lately they are more and more close to me
that is so kind of you, i also a have a soft heart for animals.  i happen to be a dog person, but i do have a cat that was my ex boyfriends.
i am a both person ahaha i also have a dog, but he is always so mean
label: caring
response: i cannot say i have had any mean dogs as of yet.  my favorite breed is  a pitbull.   they are so loyal  and sweet although  lots of people claim they are mean and vicious .

situation: holidy
dialogue: towels, clothes, underwear and phone all checked! and ready for my holiday #feelingsoprepeared
where are you going!
to see my baby girl
label: prepared
response: thats awesome i hope you have a good time with her

situation: one time i bought a scratch lottery ticket and i did not win anything!
dialogue: one time i bought a scratch lottery ticket and i did not win anything!
wow, that must've been disappointing.
yes, i was off by one number. i was going to be a millionaire!
label: disappointed
response: oh! so close. just to think about that missed opportunity.

situation: weather
dialogue: every day the weather makes me feel so nostalgic, the colors, the wind all bring back a certain memory from my past
yeah, it is like time passes but the smells and everything stays the same
yes! i am so glad you get it, it is beautiful but also sad at the same time
label: nostalgic
response: yup, and i feel there is a part of us that is eternal as well

situation: one time i went into the public restroom and saw poop smeared everywhere! ew!
dialogue: one time i went into the public restroom and saw poop smeared everywhere! ew!
i think i would leave if i saw something like that.
i left as fast as possible!
label: disgusted
response: did you tell someone about it so they could take care of it?

situation: one time i was so nervous to look at my grade for my final exam
dialogue: one time i was so nervous to look at my grade for my final exam
i feel that way sometimes when i check my bank account, how is school going?
i failed and dropped out! now i live in my parents house doing nothing all day
label: anxious
response: word, college is tough, wishing you the best

situation: my brother did something stupid
dialogue: like who on earth writes var int value = 1, this is so ridiculous i am so annoyed at my brother, after everything i tought him, he does not even know the basics
and got upset with you?
no i was the one who was upset with him
label: furious
response: and why do not you try to teach your brother?

situation: anticipating a great amount of mone
dialogue: i am working so hard, that i can see a pile of money building up for my future
good for you!  i hope it does not stress you out, though.
it does not i am taking regular breaks
label: anticipating
response: that is good.  money is no good if you are not healthy enough to enjoy it.

situation: one time i saw a creepy person run towards me in the night out in the streets
dialogue: one time i saw a creepy person run towards me in the night out in the streets
dang, how fast did you run away?
i froze up because i was terrified. it was just my brother though
label: terrified
response: did you tell him how creepy he is

situation: i will be moving next week and as i was packing found old pictures from when i was in middle and high school. it made me think of those good times.
dialogue: while i was packing my stuff to move, i found old high school pictures. it made me think of all the good times  i had.
that is awesome, what types of photos did you find? anything funny or silly?
well more of my old best friend. i have not seen her i a long time.we went through alot together. it was nostalgic to me.
label: sentimental
response: aww yeah, those are great times that you can never really go back to. sometimes i also wish i could go back in time.maybe you could call her up again and catch up on the last few years!

situation: being alive
dialogue: being alive is so much stress and anxiety, why does it have to be like this? why cannot we just all express our individual selves, instead we are forced to work so that we can eat
it is not fair, eh. having to suppress those feelings day in and day out is significantly harder than the mundane work itself. at least it is comforting know that most everyone feels the same?

yes, it is true we all know this inside out, but we still continue to work on our meaningless lives, the funny thing is we all know but no one is acting, if we all acted we would be living in a much more beautiful and free life, not one which just gives the impression of freedom, that is all there is now, faking but i guess the one thing that is true is my feelings
label: anxious
response: maybe if we were not so attached to being creatures of comfort. some things we just cannot let go of, would not exist without some poor shmuck having to do the dirty work. i guess we are all that shmuck to someone, someway or another.

situation: i watched a movie the other day and it really had me in my feelings. it was about a guy who finally found out who ended up getting reacquainted with his birth mother.
dialogue: i watched a movie the other night that really got me in my feelings.
oh wow, what ovie was it and how did it make you feel?
i do not remember the name. i was watching it with a friend and they put it on but it was about a son who found his birth mother after many years apart.
label: sentimental
response: oh wow that sounds very emotional, i think i would have needed a bucket to catch all my tears.

situation: in myself
dialogue: i am so disappointed in myself, i could have do so much better at work but i guess it was not my day, i was not able to focus
i liked my friend very much and believed that he can not talk negatively about me
what makes you so sure? anything can happen i mean just look at murphy's law
label: disappointed
response: may be you are right. but sometimes, you go with your heart not with the law. murphy's law may not work in every situation.

situation: my grandma got really sick and my family and i had to take care of her. we did whatever we could.
dialogue: my grandma ended up getting really sick this last week.
