oh no, i am sorry to hear that. how is she doing and how are you holding up?
she is getting much better. my family and i did everything we could to take care of her.
label: caring
response: that is great that she has such a great support group and loving family members to support her. i hope she gets well soon!

situation: eating cake
dialogue: i feel so guilty, my sister crying because 'someone eat her cake' that she had been saving for 2 days now, and that someone was non other than me.
oh no, maybe buy her a new cake to make it up to her!
oh wow you are such a genius! why did not i think of that before. there is always a bright side to everything
label: guilty
response: yes there is! maybe throw in a cupcake too, i am sure she will forgive you in a heart beat! i know i would.

situation: in 2 weeks time i will go on a holiday to see my wife
dialogue: words cannot describe how happy i am, in 2 weeks time i will go and see my wife i am so joyful and exciting
i am so happy for you! why have you been apart for the past two weeks?
no we live in a long distance relationship (not for long though) so it is hard for me to see her, but i will be able to see her after 6 months apart
label: joyful
response: awesome to hear that you will get to live with your loved one soon

situation: i was at the store today and i dropped a jar of pasta sauce. it shattered and sauce got all over the floor.
dialogue: i had a terrible experience at the grocery store today.
oh no what happened, are you alright?
yeah, i am alright. but i dropped a jar of pasta sauce and it ended up shattering. sauce got all over the floor.
label: embarrassed
response: oh no that must have been a terrible experience, i hope no one got hurt from the shattered glass.

situation: i did really well this past semester, so  i am hoping my gpa will be at 4.0
dialogue: i aced all my classes this semester, so  i am hoping and thinking my gpa will be a 4.0
that is what i like to hear! what changes did you make this semester to achieve your possible 4.0?
i actually gave more effort this semester, so i will continue to do goo and hope to get into nursing school next year.
label: anticipating
response: wow. that is awesome! you will need  that work ethic in nursing school for sure.

situation: i am having a big party this weekend and everything is ready and paid for. i think i did well on the planning and such.
dialogue: so everything for a party i am throwing this weekend is ready and everything is paid for. i have it ready last week so i would not stress.
it sounds like you are quite the organized person!
yea. i like to have things ready and done prior to make sure everything goes well.
label: prepared
response: i am the same way a lot of the time. it is really a good way to avoid any unnecessary disasters.

situation: me and my girlfriend have been dating for 3 years now.  i am going to ask her to marry me and i have no doubts she will say no.
dialogue: i am going to ask my girlfriend to marry me this weekend! i have no doubt in my mind she will say no
that is so exciting! best of luck to you man! i doubt she would reject such a great guy like you.
thanks! i think we are doing well so i will not be disappointed or sidetracked by a no from her.
label: confident
response: that is great, i would also be surprised if she said no to a man like you!

situation: afraid of not giving too much
dialogue: i am so afraid. afraid that i am not giving too much to the world, what if i parish not having done anything?
i would not worry too much about it. none of it really matters, if we make a difference or not, we all end up dust in the end.
no, i do not believe that, whether you are having a bad day or not if you look at everything clearly you will see there is a next stage, just like birth death is a process
label: afraid
response: if telling yourself that makes you feel better, i found all of that to be much more stressful. to be completely honest with you i think people invented stories about the after life to make them more comfortable with death.

situation: the world
dialogue: the world is such a disgusting place now, i wish i was born back in the 70s
yeah, 70s were incredible, the dancing the cars, the women had style and the music was incredible.
right?! but now is just so bad, i wish i could go back
label: disgusted
response: but we got to make the best of it, pretty soon elon musk will release flying cars and then life will be amazing again.

situation: greatful to be alive
dialogue: today everyone said congratulations to me, as i succeed in making an amazing app, and now i am so greatful to be alive!
congratulations on your success! i bet you worked incredible hard to achieve your goals.
thank you! it is always nice to tell you these things, you do not get jealous and you are just happy for me, thank you
label: grateful
response: there will always be people that are jealous of your success, but it is up to you to be the bigger person and handle it with grace.

situation: so i came home to my dog chewing up my new furniture set that cost me a fortune! i could feel my blood boiling.
dialogue: i came home from work today to a disaster. my dog chewed up the new couch i just purchased.
oh no, can you return it or get a refund?
no i did not purchase insurance. when i saw it my blood was boiling!
label: furious
response: i am sorry to hear that, i would have felt the same way.

situation: so i gave my dog away since school and work keep me busy. i pray the new owner is good to him.
dialogue: i gave my dog away to a family today. i did not have time for him since work and school take alot of it up.
that has got to be rough. at least it has a home now that hopefully has more time.
i agree, but i am praying they will take care of him. hes just a puppy.
label: hopeful
response: i am sure they will be great to him and he will bring them joy as well!

situation: i saw my girlfriend getting real friendly with another guy at the bar. i definitely felt a little uneasy about the whole situation.
dialogue: i saw my girlfriend getting real friendly with another guy at the bar last night
oh no! are you the jealous type?
it definitely had me feeling a little uneasy about the whole situation.
label: jealous
response: oh man! yeah i would of felt the same way!

situation: i have a test next week and i am feeling really good about it. i studied so much over the last week.
dialogue: i have a test coming up next week.
oh no do you feel ready for it?
i am super ready for it! i spent so much time studying over the last week.
label: confident
response: that is great, i believe that you will do amazing!

situation: this math problem is so annoying
dialogue: i am so annoyed! i have been trying to solve this math problem for 2 hours now
oh that sounds really annoying. maybe you can look it up online or get someone to help?
there is not any solution it is a century award i am working on, it is the problem of non-polynomial descent
label: annoyed
response: oh i see, well good luck to you, i hope you will solve it soon.

situation: i am really feeling alright about how my life is going right now. everything is in order. nothing is going amazing but nothing really sucks either.
dialogue: i am really feeling alright about how my life is going right now.
that is great, what has been going on in your life recently?
i have just been getting things done. nothing has been going amazing but nothing really sucks either.
label: content
response: that is good, sometimes that is all you really need to do, get things done  one step at a time

situation: the ads for the new expansion for world of warcraft really makes me remember all the time i put into the game back in high school. i used to stay up all night.
dialogue: the ads for the new world of warcraft expansion really makes me think about when i played it many years ago.
they looked really exciting! does it make you want to play it again?
it does. i put so much time in that game before. i might have to pick it up again.
label: nostalgic
response: if it makes you happy then you should do it! capitalize on that nostalgic feeling while you can.

situation: someone side sideswiped my car last night while i was sleeping and i was not aware until i woke up. it was not a good thing to wake up to.
dialogue: i woke up to something super annoying this morning.
that is always frustrating. what happened?
i woke up to find out my car was sideswiped while it was parked by the curb during the night. no note or anything.
label: furious
response: wow, some people are just terrible! i hate when people do not take responsibility for their actions.

situation: i am really disappointed in my son's actions. he was caught cheating on a test the other day.
dialogue: i am really disappointed in my son's actions that i was told about.
what did he do?
he got caught cheating by his teacher on a test the other day.
label: disappointed
response: oh no. what do you think caused him to do that?

situation: i bought a sandwich the other day and found out after a few bites that it was moldy! it was so awful.
dialogue: i ate such a disgusting thing the other day by accident.
what was it that you accidentally ate?
i bought a sandwich and after a few bite i noticed that there was a bunch of mold.
label: disgusted
response: eww that sounds horrible! were you able to get a refund at least?

situation: i was so afraid when i was pregnant with my first child.  i was nervous and worried about labour.  however i put all my faith in the lovely midwives and everything worked out fine.  i have such admiration for people in that industry as it really is a vocation not just a job.
dialogue: i recently had my first child.  i was absolutely terrified when i went into labour but i put all my faith in the wonderful midwives and everything worked out perfectly!
i am glad it went as planned. i can imagine that to be a very stressful moment.

it really was its just so scary but i had to believe the experience and caring nature of the midwives would get my through it and it did.  i really admire anyone in that career, its not just a job but a vocation.
label: trusting
response: you've really got to be committed to go into work like that. it is not for everybody, i agree.

situation: i started a diet today and as soon as i got home i ate a burger.
dialogue: i started a diet today and just as soon as i get home i eat a burger!
i know how hard diets are to stick to. what foods are you avoiding?
fried foods. i feel bad i did not commit to it the first day.
label: guilty
response: do not be too hard on yourself, it is hard to quit something immediately. just keep trying, i believe in you!

situation: i have to talk to a large group at work tomorrow. i am not looking forward to it.
dialogue: i am so not looking forward to tomorrow.
why not? what happens tomorrow?
i have to talk to a large group at work tomorrow.
label: anxious
response: do not let it worry you too much. just make sure you organize everything you need to present and remember to speak loudly and clearly! you can do it!

situation: i changed my shift to overnight and i get so scared walking to my car since we have a huge parking lot.
dialogue: i changed my shift to overnight and walking to my care gave me the creeps tonight. there was a man standing in the dark.
that sounds creepy! is there any chance someone could start escorting you to your car? there is strength in numbers!
i agree. i had goosbumps all over and chills down my spine.
label: afraid
response: i definitely recommend getting some mace and a pocket knife. stay safe out there!

situation: my brother is going into surgery tomorrow. i am really hoping that everything goes well.
dialogue: my brother is going into surgery tomorrow.
i hope that all goes well. i am sure he will be good as new after!
i am really hoping so! i have been really worried.
label: hopeful
response: i am sure the procedure will go excellently.

situation: my friend is so shy and today she outshined herself by winning a singing contest at school!
dialogue: today my friend had all of is awe, becasue she won the singing contest at work. she is so shy and no one would have ever known she could sing.
that is really cool! i bet people really underestimated that underdog!
i agree! i was amazed with her performance. she did really well.
label: impressed
response: that is awesome! maybe she will come out of her shell.

situation: i have such a fear of heights.  so when my husband kindly bought me a skydiving voucher for my 30th birthday i was slightly anxious and uneasy.  i of course thought of the worst! i travelled up in the plane with the lovely instructors who of course tried everything in their power to reassure me but to no avail. i was so nervous and panicky.  however i am so glad i did it!  after the initial panic when we jumped, it was actually one of the most amazing experiences of my life!
dialogue: i have such a fear of flying, so you can just imagine how i felt when my husband bought us a sky diving voucher for my 30th birthday! he was so excited and i was so nervous and uneasy.
he is a brave man. how was the experience?

well the day came and off we travelled.  we arrived at the place only to find all our friends and family there to cheer us on.  up we went in the plane and of course while the lovely instructors tried to reassure me the whole time, i tried desperately to keep my breakfast down!  however after the nerves and initial panic when we jumped out, it was actually one of the most amazing experiences of my life!
label: apprehensive
response: it sounds incredible! hopefully it helped you conquer your fear!

situation: i almost could have not paid for my tuition this semester, but my boss gave me a bonus. i am so thankful for him.
dialogue: i was so worried that i could not pay for my tuition this semester. thankfully my boss decided to give us a big bonus.
congratulations! worrying about tuition is the absolute worst panic!
yeah and its the last one before i graduate! i can be more thankful for his generosity.
label: grateful
response: you are going to kill it this semester! you are going to be so proud when you are walking down the aisle to get handed your degree.

situation: i was doing a big clear out recently and came accross my high school year book.  it has been many years since i left school and it was wonderul to find it again.  i spent hours going through it and looking at all the people long gone from my life.  such a feeling of nostalgia and some sadness. though it evoked happy memories too especially of prom night and our final year leaving party.  some stories could be told about that!
dialogue: i was doing a big clear out recently and stumbled accross my old high school year book.  it is a long time since i left school and could not believe i even still had it.  such a feeling of nostalgia looking at the old photos and reading the stories.
did you guys write still write notes in each others' books in high school?

yes!  i laughed and sometimes cried a bit reading through those, especially from some old friends that are no longer with here.  it even brought up some great memories of prom and our school leaving party.
label: sentimental
response: it is amazing how many feelings and memories mementos like that can bring back.

situation: so i let my friend use my brand new car to go out of town this weekend.
dialogue: so i just bought a brand new corvette and i let my friend barrow it to go out of town.
that is awesome! hopefully it comes back in one piece.
i agree! she will take care of it. i have faith she will bring it back the way she got it!
label: trusting
response: i think it will be fine. i bet the new car runs well.

situation: my husband went out of town on business and will not be back for 1 month. i get so bored in an empty house by myself.
dialogue: my husband will not be back for a month due to work and  i am here at the house by myself.
i am sure that is tough.  you must really miss him.
yeah i have no pets or children so i am just here in an empty house.
label: lonely
response: do you get nervous being on your own?

situation: woke up last week on saturday morning to find my car had been stolen. i was horrified, completely in shock.  i use my car for work and also for my family so i was completely overcome with emotion.  luckily my husband was there to calm me down.  he did all the practical things like contact the police, my insurance company etc and infact they were able to provide me with a courtesy car the next day.  my insurance company will pay out in a few weeks and i will replace it but at the time it was just such an awful experience to wake up to.
dialogue: i had the worst experience last weekend.  i woke up to find someone had stolen my car! i was in absolute shock just could not believe it.
that is horrible! did you get the police involved?
well yes.  while i was in my daze, absolutely horrified, my level headed husband did all the practical things like contact the police and insurance company etc.
label: devastated
response: yeah i would have felt the same way.

situation: i had to sit in traffic for over 2 hours due to road construction! i was so frusterated!
dialogue: today after a long day at work i sat in traffic for 2 hours due to construction on the freeway!
that is a ton of traffic. i hope they finish their project soon
me too! i get so frusterated because there are no back roads to my house so i have to go through this for the next 2 weeks.
label: annoyed
response: that is unfortunate. i wish we could fly sometimes.

situation: my old high school friend called me out of no where today and we talked about the times we had in school.
dialogue: my old friend suprised me with a phone call today. i have not heard from her since high school.
how lovely!  i such it was so nostalgic to talk about old times together.
yes it was. i cannot wait for our reunion so we can catch up on more!
label: nostalgic
response: that is a brilliant idea.  there is nothing better than catching up with old friends.

situation: i little stray puppy appeared in my driveway yesterday.  i fed him and contacted the local pet shelter.  no one had reported him missing though they took his details incase anyone phoned up.  i have never been much of an animal person but i could not believe how much i felt for this poor wee pup.  i brought him in and since no one claimed him he is now officially one of the family and definitely the happiest, most loyal member.  always pleased to see me and he has just stolen my heart.
dialogue: a little stray pup appeared on my driveway yesterday.  my initial reaction was to contact the local pet shelter.  however no one had reported him.  i decided to take him in, wash him and feed him.  i have never been much of an animal person but i could not believe how much i felt for this poor wee puppy.
awe your such a caring and loving person! are you going to keep it?

i did not think i was but he has won my heart.  no one claimed him, even after posters being put around so yes he has officially become part of the family.  to be honest i was glad no owner came forward, i would never have wanted to give him up in the end he has just stolen my heart!
label: caring
response: the love and care you show him will bring him joy and happiness!

situation: i was really drunk and messed myself
dialogue: i got super wasted. i accidentally messed myself in front of people
oh wow, that must've been a hard situation. especially later when you were more in control again.
yeah. that was the day i decided to no longer drink
label: ashamed
response: that sounds like a good decision. good luck!

situation: my friend who has been living overseas for the last year has finally came back. it is been a great time.
dialogue: i am really excited for this next weekend!
what is happening this weekend? i hope you have some good things planned.
a friend that has been living overseas for the last year or so is going to come back to visit finally!
label: joyful
response: that is awesome! i am very excited for you this is a good event for you!

situation: my friend got in a car crash a few days ago while i was in the car. it was definitely a scary experience.
dialogue: i had a really scary experience the other day.
that is interesting. are you okay?
yeah, i am fine. my friend got into a car crash while i was in the car though.
label: terrified
response: that is bad news. i hope that everyone is healthy and doing well.

situation: when i went camping i ended up getting lost in the woods by myself for a while. it was not a pleasant experience.
dialogue: i went camping the other day and had a rlly bad experience during it.
why what happened?
i ended up getting lost for a bit in the woods which was not fun. luckily, i made it back to my group at some point.
label: afraid
response: oh sounds scary!  i would have been scared.

situation: when i was a teenager i used to borrow my big sisters clothes when she was out.  then i would put them back before she came home and she would never know.  this one time she had bought a new dress.  she had saved all her wages for this dress.  that weekend i borrowed it and of course ripped it on a nail.  the next day when she found out she was so angry.  i felt terrible, so guilty.  needless to say i never did borrow her clothes again!
dialogue: when i was a teenager i used to borrow my big sisters clothes without her knowledge.  one time she had just bought a lovely new dress after saving all her wages.  that weekend i borrowed it and of course ripped it!  the next day when she found out she was so angry and i felt terrible.
oh no! i hope she is forgiven you since then.
oh yes she has, it was a while ago now but at the time the guilt was awful.  needless to say i learnt my lesson and never borrowed her clothes again!
label: ashamed
response: that is probably a good idea.

situation: yesterday was my last day at my job. i will miss everyone. i got so emotional driving home.
dialogue: my last day of work was yesterday. i got so emotional driving home and i cried.
i am sorry to hear you were upset! why did you have to quit?
i am going back to school full time. i was there for more than 10 years. i will miss everyone.
label: sad
response: wow that is a long time! hopefully you can stay in touch with all of your former coworkers.

situation: i caught my boyfriend cheating on me last night. i was so mad!
dialogue: yesterday i found my boyfriend with someone else!
hmmn, really?.i guess you must have felt very bad
i was gonna explode.  i am so fed up with him.  i am so done.
label: angry
response: am so sorry about that, did he apologize?

situation: i remember one time when i wore a halloween costume that i would been looking forward to wearing.  but i spent the whole night covered up in a cape, because i was self conscious of how i looked in it.
dialogue: one time when i was younger i wore a halloween costume that i would been looking forward to show off.  but i ended up covering myself up with a cape, because i was self conscious of how i looked.
aww- i am sorry that happened. why were you embarrassed?
well the costume itself ended up looking great, since my mom made it.  but i hadn't realized how fat i looked when i wore it, so i felt bad.
label: ashamed
response: it is always difficult when you feel self-conscious but i have learned that people rarely judge you as hard as you judge yourself.

situation: i have belives in my family
dialogue: whom do you belive the most
in reference to what?
your trustful person?
label: faithful
response: my husband is my most trusted companion.

situation: of my father
dialogue: my father could not stope any lower, how can someone take money from their own child
that is horrible! i am a parent and i could never take money from my child. did you confront him?
i did many times, but he threatens to kick me out and ruin everything
label: ashamed
response: how frustrating! keep your head held high and be strong. one day you will be able to keep him from taking your money.

situation: i know my wife
dialogue: my wife is always there for me, so i trust her more than anybody and i do not want to have any friends otehr than her, she is my faith
that is really nice, however, to keep the marriage fresh and strong, i think it is important for you to have outside friends.
that is only normie talk, we are both introverted and we hate people
label: trusting
response: haha, well i do know the feeling. i guess if it works for you, then do not change anything.

situation: what a joke i am
dialogue: i am a joke, i am ashemed of what i did
what did you do???
i builied someone because they made fun of my mother, but the person had difficulties walking already and i buillied i cannot believe i did that
label: ashamed
response: well i am sure you will get over it. nobody should make fun of our mothers

situation: the episode did not come out
dialogue: i  waited 3 years for them to realise season 3 and they promised it was to be released today, i was so devastated when i found out that they had to postpone it even more :/ it is just so annoying
stay hopeful! , they will release it sooner or later
i hope so :
label: devastated
response: it is all gonna be fine and you will get what u want.

situation: i keep a stuffed animal i have had since i was young around.  it is still in pretty good condition and reminds me a lot of my childhood.
dialogue: i still have a favorite stuffed animal of mine that i have had since i was young.  it is still in pretty good condition and reminds me a lot of my childhood.
that is so sweet. it is wonderful to have things that bring back these beautiful memories.
yeah, it is.  i always like to keep things that mean a lot to me and this was a gift from my mom so it is even more special.
label: sentimental
response: that really does make it special. i am glad you have that.

situation: when she talked about her feelings i was very emotional
dialogue: a young girl, crying, sadden by the cruelity of our elders, told me about all these feelings i began to cry and became very sentimental
what feelings? what are you talking about
she said that the elder man approached her and told her she is dumb and that made her very sad and upset
label: sentimental
response: oh man, that is rough to hear from someone older than you. is she ok?

situation: my sister has everyting
dialogue: i am so envious of my sister, she has everything i just want to make her life hell
that does not sound very good, but jealousy is a hard thing to deal with
yeah but only i should get everything! no one else
label: jealous
response: other people deserve to have things, too.

situation: fell down on the stairs and my pants fell out
dialogue: i am so embaressed at myself. i cannot believe i fell down the stairs and my pants fell and my behind was exposed to the whole crowd
oh no! when that happens you have to get up and yell, "safe!"
indeed, but this time i was red and yelling in my head
label: embarrassed
response: awww, well it happens to everyone sometimes. just try to forget it.

situation: life is peaceful
dialogue: do not you think life is peaceful? are you content?
eh not really. what about you

i did, espcially today when i woke up, i realised how everything is meaningful and how i cannot just waste my life chasing after money and stupid things like that, so i decided to work hard on becoming free
label: content
response: and what does that mean practically? what will you do differently?

situation: i have known my best friend since i was 4 years old.  when he joined the air force he moved out of state and i was really upset when he left.
dialogue: i have known my best friend since i was 4 years old.  he joined the air force after high school and moved out of state and i was really upset when he left.
oh it is always sad when someone you care about leaves. can you at least keep in contact with him?
oh yeah, we still keep in contact over the internet daily and visit each other every few years.  but i miss when we used to hang out every day.
label: devastated
response: i know. it is hard to say goodbye to people but he is doing a wonderful thing at least.

situation: im scared and anxious about the future
dialogue: the future is so uncertain and yet so certain i am so not ready for what is about to come it fills mee with anxiety and depression just thinking about it
everything is going to be okay. try to relax.
i hope so
label: apprehensive
response: if there is something in particular, try to deal with it head on.

situation: i have been spending a year learning  a new skill and after so much study and hard work it is finally paying off. i am feeling faithful again.
dialogue: i have been spending a year learning a new skill and after so much study and hard work it is finally paying off. i am feeling faithful again.
that is great. may i know what you have learnt
i have been learning to trade on the forex markets.
label: faithful
response: it is challenging i guess. best wishes that you developed skill over it

situation: exam tomorrow
dialogue: i am so prepared the exam tomorrow!
how hard have you been studying? exams are extreme amounts of mental crunch time!
yup but i have been studying since for a year
label: prepared
response: you sound very confident! i wish i had your confidence when i was in school.

situation: at the interview tomorrow
dialogue: tomorrow i have interview and i have done my study so i am feeling confident
i bet you will do great! what job is the interview for?
art design
label: confident
response: that is a great field. my daughter just got a degree in art but she hasn't been able to find a job yet. good luck tomorrow!

situation: the questions  i knew they would be coming up
dialogue: i did so well in that biology exam haha, i anticipated those questions to come up i was so ready
good for you. being prepared is always better than the alternative.
yup! defiently, i am so amazing
label: anticipating
response: do not get too cocky but enjoy your victory you deserve it.

situation: angry at myself for not waking up on time
dialogue: i am so mad at myself, i woke up late again today and missed a very important deadline, even though i set 4 alarms
oh no! you must feel really bad. are you able to fix the problem?
no, i cannot i just need to fix myself as  i am the problem
label: furious
response: please try not to be so hard on yourself! we all make mistakes.

situation: i was hesitant to go to the doctor for a cyst i found.
dialogue: i really hate going to the doctor. i was hesitant about going this time.
why do you need to go to the doctor?
i had a painful cyst and i knew i would have to get a needle.
label: apprehensive
response: oh that is terrible. did they take care of it?

situation: i did not start grad school after telling people that i was going to.
dialogue: i was planning on going to grad school and i told a lot of people. i ended up not going, and i felt embarrassed every time someone asked me about how school was going.
that sounds very uncomfortable. were you honest with them about your change of plans?
yes. without really giving details, i always kind of shrugged off their questions and told them that it did not work out.
label: ashamed
response: right.

situation: i found a picture of my daughter and me from when i took her to a waterfall a long time ago. it brought tears to my eyes.
dialogue: i found a picture of my daughter and me from when i took her to a waterfall a long time ago. it brought tears to my eyes.
oh i bet that was amazing! i have a memory of going to a waterfall with my parents when i was young and it is a nice thing to think back on. does your daughter remember it?
yes she does. of course she does not see the sentimentality of it yet as i do. she is only 23.
label: sentimental
response: one day she will look back and it will mean so much to her! memories with parents are the best ones.

situation: i have a fear of carnival rides, only because i am scared one will break apart mid ride. every time i go with my friends to to local carnival i always trust that the mechanics who assembled the ride did a good job.
dialogue: i have the worst fear of carnival rides, i always think they
i totally understand, i hate carnival rides too, they always feel so rickety. do you have a particular one you fear the most?

(pressed enter too early). i love thrill rides, but i do not trust any carnival ride that gets rebuilt every time the fair opens up, too many horror stories. i mostly hate the ones that spin you a million different directions.
label: trusting
response: agreed, a good theme park is nice because you know they have high safety standards, but those carnival ones scare the crap out of me.

situation: my wife's cousin was sent to the hospital and was placed in a medically induced coma with  something having to do with his lungs
dialogue: my wife's cousin was sent to the hospital and was placed in a medically induced coma with something having to do with his lungs
oh my goodness! that sounds awful! was this recently?
yes. they are not sure what is wrong but his oxygen level is down to 40%
label: devastated
response: i am so sorry to hear that. hopefully he has a good team of doctors that figure out what is going on. are y'all able to visit him?

situation: i was driving on the highway in really thick rain, barely any visiblity. i had a bad feeling something bad was going to happen, and no more than 10 minutes i witness a car crash happen in front of me where a car flipped.
dialogue: i was on the highway during a strong thunderstorm, no visibility. i had a bad feeling someone bad was going to happen and no more than 10 minutes later two cars in front of me crash and one gets flipped over.
that is so scary!  you must have strong intuition
yeah i honestly do not but the whole mood on that highway just felt right for that to happen. a lot of people weaving and having their hazards on for no reason.
label: apprehensive
response: i am so glad you came out of it okay.  i hate driving in bad weather and reckless driving just makes it worse.

situation: walking to a restaurant i did not hold the door for an old lady coming in. i felt so bad afterwards, i hope she forgave me.
dialogue: walking to a restaurant the other day and i forgot to hold the door open for an old lady, felt so bad about it because she was right next to the door too.
it was nice of you to at least think of it. i am sure she was not that upset.
i hope so, i usually hold it open for everybody but i was distracted and did not see her.
label: ashamed
response: it is totally understandable. life can get really busy sometimes!

situation: right after buying a brand new phone i dropped it and shattered the screen. i barely had any time to use it.
dialogue: i bought a new phone recently and not long after i dropped it and shattered the screen, first time this happens and it was just terrible.
oh, that is not good. did you get a warranty for the phone?
no i usually do not since i have never dropped mines but i do get warranty now. it was not a cheap repair either.
label: devastated
response: i am sorry to hear that. i hope that everything works out for you.

situation: i was disgusted when my dog tried to attack another dog.
dialogue: i was disgusted when my dog tried to attack another dog
did the other dog provoke him? i would not stress it too much, its just natural behavior for them, take him to training school.
not really, but he knows better. i think i will get a trainer.
label: ashamed
response: oh then yeah, invest in a trainer. i love dogs a lot but an aggressive dog is very dangerous.

situation: saw an old cassette of my cousins fifteens and i saw my mother before she passed away. i felt nice seeing her again.
dialogue: saw an old cassette of my cousins fifteens and saw my mother before she passed away, felt nice seeing her on video again.
oh i am so sorry but i bet that was very special of you to find.
yeah sadly we do not have many videos of her but the few we have we keep them safe and stored.
label: sentimental
response: i would definitely make digital copies and upload to a cloud or a disk in case something happens.

situation: when i got the score for my final. got a good grade on it and passed the class.
dialogue: i got the scores for my final exam. got a b and passed the class, it was a good day to celebrate.
that is awesome!  congratulations!
yeah, i pampered myself and went with some friends to a japanese sushi place.
label: content
response: nice choice!  getting a b is definitely something to celebrate

situation: when i ordered a new pair of headphones online. they are a high end pair and i could not wait to have them.
dialogue: ordered a new pair of headphones online. they are a really high end pair so i am very excited to finally get them.
that is exciting!  there is nothing like listening to your favorite music with great headphones
yeah, it really is a day and night difference. let's you appreciate the intricacies of a song much better.
label: anticipating
response: i agree 100%.  sounds like it is time to start downloading some new tunes to test out!

situation: my wife is having a hard time after finding out we can no longer have children. i am doing my best to support her and care for her but it is very hard when nothing seems to work.
dialogue: my wife is having a hard time after finding out we can no longer have children. i am doing my best to support her and care for her but it is very hard when nothing seems to work.
oh that is heartbreaking, do you guys already have children?
i do but she does not. which makes it harder i think. all i can do is be there for her and hope time helps her heal.
label: caring
response: i really hope she gets better too, it must be terrible to know you cannot have any kids. you are a good man for helping her cope.

situation: back in middle school i had a crush on this girl and one day in class she was talking to another guy. i think they were just friends but still, it bugged me.
dialogue: back in middle school i had a crush on a girl and one day in class she was talking to another guy. i was jealous for a while but it did not matter anyways. i ended up getting her.
young love, it is such a bittersweet quest.
it is, those were the funnest days. no responsibilities.
label: jealous
response: i know right? i wish i was young again sometimes.

situation: i had a lot of feelings when i found pictures of my dog who has passed.
dialogue: i had a lot of feelings when i found pictures of my dog who has passed.
it is always difficult losing a pet.  i am sure you had a flood of positive memories and sadness than they are gone
it was very bittersweet. she could not work her legs anymore due to age.
label: sentimental
response: you just have to remember what a good life she had with you!

situation: i am very happy where i live. there is nothing else i would want.
dialogue: i moved to my current town one year ago and i really like it here. i am happy and could not think of a better place to live.
nice! why do you like it more than other places you've lived?
it is my first time living in a small town. i love the fresh air. i have also met some great people.
label: content
response: that is good! i have always heard that people are closer friends to each other in a small town.

situation: i very much could count on my mom to always be there for me.
dialogue: i very much could count on my mom to always be there for me.
that is a blessing.  i know a lot of people did not have a mom like that.
me too. i am so thankful for her.
label: trusting
response: is there anything she does specifically for her?

situation: i was upset when i failed my math test.
dialogue: i was upset when i failed my math test
i am sorry. i know how that feels. did you study really hard?
i did, but the material was a hard subject.
label: devastated
response: oh, okay. maybe you should ask your teacher for some extra help or find a study buddy. i hope you do better next time.

situation: i am glad i can trust my husband to always be there for me.
dialogue: i am glad i can trust my husband to always be there for me.
that is sweet! i have a great husband too! how long have you been married?
just under two years. still feel like a newlywed@
label: faithful
response: that is great! we have been married for almost 10 years and i still feel like a newlywed. it is great when you marry your best friend.

situation: i was vacationing in mexico and after arriving to the bus station i needed to take a taxi. the taxi man looked kind of scary but i apprehensively trusted him.
dialogue: hi friend! wow, i was so scared of this taxi driver when i was vacationing in mexico. he looked rather suspicious.
oh gosh! that sounds frightening! did you get out the taxi as soon as you could?
no, i just trusted him. but i wrote all his details in my phone just in case.
label: trusting
response: oh, well that was a smart thing to do. i would've bailed.

situation: i finally bought a back up drive to store my photos on. i spent a lot of time looking at old family photos and organizing them. it made me wish i could go back in time!
dialogue: i was storing all of my old photos on my new external hard drive yesterday. it made me wish i could go back and time and see some relatives again.
i usually love the trips down memory lane, but the sad side of it are the ones who are no longer around. i am sorry.
it is bittersweet! nice to see their faces again, but sad to miss them.
label: sentimental
response: i am right there with you. it makes you shed a tear sometimes too.

situation: i felt bad that i lied to my friend and said i did not care when i really did.
dialogue: i lied to my friend about something and told her something was okay when it really was not
oh. i know lying is sometimes beneficial in some situations. hopefully you did this to protect someone's feelings
i just felt really bad and guilty that i did it.
label: ashamed
response: yeah, i think that means you have a conscience, which is a good thing. if you did not feel bad, i would worry about you!

situation: sometimes a fly gets in my apartment and i hold my cat over my head and we run after it. somehow she hasn't scratched or bitten me during this! i put her right over my face, too.
dialogue: sometimes a fly gets in my apartment and i hold my cat over my head and we chase it. she hasn't scratched or bitten me once while we do this!
that would make a funny video! we have a super friendly, playful cat too.
i love cats. they are so funny and such good company!
label: trusting
response: yes, they are. he is my daughter's best friend. she can do whatever she wants and he is unphased.

situation: i babysat my nephew last weekend. he slept over and was scared so i let him sleep in bed with me, even though he kicks and rolls around
dialogue: i babysat my nephew overnight last weekend. he was scared so i let him sleep in bed with me, even though he kicks a lot.
that was thoughtful, sometimes i think kids fake being scared just to not be alone. hope you did not get kicked too much!
haha i did not sleep a wink. he is only 8. he pretends to be all cool, but he is still very much a little kid.
label: caring
response: kids are interesting creatures that is for sure. i am sure you got some cool uncle points.

situation: my pet dog is always there for me, not matter what, i can count on her.
dialogue: my pet dog is always there for me. no matter what, i can count on her.
i feel the same way about my dog.  they are the greatest!
yes they are they are always happy to see you and they will always there for you
label: faithful
response: i do not know what i would do without my dog.  i am glad you have one that is always there for you!

situation: i had a great breakfast this morning: eggs, bacon, strawberries, tomatoes, and coffee. it was delicious and i felt very relaxed.
dialogue: i had a great breakfast this morning. it was delicious and i felt very happy and relaxed.
nice! what did you have? i am planning to serve breakfast for dinner tonight.
eggs, bacon, strawberries, tomatoes, and coffee. so yummy!
label: content
response: mmmm. that sounds really good! i am thinking biscuit and sausage gravy, hash brown and eggs..

situation: i called someone by the wrong name earlier today. i met them a long time ago and i guess it did not stick properly in my brain.
dialogue: i called someone by the wrong name earlier today. i did not really know them and hadn't seen them in ages.
i hate when that happens. i bet you meant well but you are left looking like a crazy person! i hope they understood.
they were ok with it, but i hope i did not hurt their feelings.
label: embarrassed
response: i think they will get over it. most people understood that not everyone is going to remember every little thing.

situation: my son decided to drop his pants and pee in our front yard when the neighbors were out the other day.  that was a bit surprising.
dialogue: the other day we were in the front yard, and you will not believe what happened!
what happened? the yard always has mysteries!
my 4 year-old just dropped his pants and started peeing in the grass!
label: embarrassed
response: shocking! has your kid done that before?

situation: i got into am argument with my husband and i realized later that he was right but i never apologized.
dialogue: i got into an argument with my husband and i realized later that he was right but i never apologized.
maybe you should find him and apologize right now.
yes maybe i should but my ego gets in the way.
label: ashamed
response: you could just cook him a nice dinner or plan a special date instead.

situation: i am unemployed and struggling right now. i feel really bad when people talk to me about their new houses and clothes and stuff, even though they are not trying to be mean
dialogue: i am unemployed and struggling right now. i feel really bad when people talk to me about their new stuff, even though they are not trying to be mean
i can understand the feeling, i went through a couple of spells like that in the past. i am sure they mean well but you are at a point where you are hurting to get back out there.
yeah! i just want to be able to support myself and not go to the food bank or rely on friends and family
label: jealous
response: you will return to self-sufficiency soon, you just cannot let yourself fall into a pit of self doubt. stay confident.

situation: my dogs attacked my baby goat and she died.
dialogue: i am so sad. my 3 dogs attacked my baby goat and she died last night from the injuries. crying.
aww, that is so sad. i am an animal lover so i understand the pain.
it hurts really bad and i do not know what to do. i think i should give some dogs away to a family with no small animals.
label: devastated
response: that is a really tough decision either way. i wish you the best with it and hope everything improves

situation: one of my love birds had a baby but she is a terrible mother. so i am now taking care of the baby and feeding her everyday. she is so cute!
dialogue: one of my love birds had a baby but she is a terrible mother. so i am now taking care of the baby and feeding her everyday. she is so cute!
ah what a responsibly to take on! you are a great example, is it quite tough?
no. the baby bird just sleeps and eats do it is really easy.
label: caring
response: alot easier than a kitten or a puppy then?

situation: i feel very happy that i moved out in the country. i thought i was a city person.
dialogue: i feel very happy that i moved out in the country. i thought i was a city person but i guess not.
i bet you can see the stars and hear all sorts of wildlife at night.
oh yes. it was hard to get used to at first but now i barely notice it.
label: content
response: all that outside noise can become so soothing if you left it.

situation: i really wanted to go on this fruitarian trip to bali buti could not get off work. my friends went without me.
dialogue: i really wanted to go on this fruitarian trip to bali buti could not get off work. my friends went without me
did you wait until the last minute to ask for time off?
no. my boss is not a very nice person. i think i should find a new job.
label: jealous
response: yeah you might want to look into it then

situation: my dog is feeling sick and i do not know what is wrong.
dialogue: my dog is feeling sick and i do not know what is wrong.
oh no! have you tried taking your dog to the vet?
i hate the vets. they charge so much money. maybe i can google seomthing.
label: sentimental
response: yes, google has a lot of great information for pet care.

situation: i am learning how to do day trading and did my first trade and i won!
dialogue: i am learning how to do day trading and did my first trade and i won
well that sounds like a high stress occupation!
you think? it sure is exciting, at least when i win.
label: confident
response: i am glad you like it. i think it would be hard to get it right every time the way the market is sometimes.

situation: my dogs keep attacking my poor ducks. i do not know what to do.
dialogue: my dogs keep attacking my poor ducks. i do not know what to do
i do not know what you can do. a duck is just a toy that taste good to a dog.
i scream at the dogs and it seems to be working but i never know what can happen in the future.
label: furious
response: dogs gonna do dog stuff. that is just how they do.

situation: i packing to go on an international trip. i hope i do not forget anything.
dialogue: i packing to go on an international trip. i hope i do not forget anything.
that would be bad you should double check before you leave
i feel i cannot fit anything else in my suitcase so i think i have it all. but i will double check like you said.
label: prepared
response: yeah it is better to be safe than sorry

situation: i was ashamed when my dog started barking loudly when i was away.
dialogue: i was ashamed when my dog started barking loudly when i was away.
why were you ashamed? did she disturb the neighbors or something?
yes, my neighbors were very angry.
label: embarrassed
response: i am sorry that happened. you might need to get her obedience training,

situation: i am exciting that my father said he would come and visit me soon. he travels so much and it is hard to get his time.
dialogue: i am exciting that my father said he would come and visit me soon. he travels so much and it is hard to get his time
that is awesome! do yall have any plans?
we are just going to hang out on the farm and hang out with the cows, ha ha
label: hopeful
response: lol maybe yall could find something to bond over

situation: oh how i miss my days when i was in my twenties!
dialogue: oh how i miss my days when i was in my twenties. those were such fun times. to be young and free!
yeah we do not thinnk about how special it was until it is gone
it is so true. we take it for granted. i wish i knew then what i know now.
label: nostalgic
response: yeah we all do but we can only go forward

situation: my cockatiel is feeling sick. i think she might die soon. i wish there was something i could do.
dialogue: my cockatiel is feeling sick. i think she might die soon. i wish there was something i could do.
have you taken her to the vet?
no. there are no vets where i live. i gave her some medicine though but nothing seems to be working.
label: disappointed
response: you might want to look up what is going on online

situation: yesterday i notice people were laughing behind me, when i finally got to my desk, a coworker pointed out that a postage stamp was stuck to the back of my head
dialogue: yesterday i notice people were laughing behind me, when i finally got to my desk, a coworker pointed out that a postage stamp was stuck to the back of my head
that sucks. next time they should tell you instead of laughing!
well looking back its funny, but man, yesterday i wished i could hide, plus i think my boss seen it too
label: embarrassed
response: i am sure it is not so bad. at least you can laugh about it now!

situation: i am up for a promotion at my job. i positive i will get it.
dialogue: i am up for a promotion at my job. i positive i will get it.
that is great! you should celebrate and enjoy this momment
i already have plans to go out to a nice restaurant and celebrate with my family
label: confident
response: that is good! i hope you enjoy yourself

situation: i have a big presentation at my job at the end of this week. i am ready for it.
dialogue: i have a big presentation at my job at the end of this week. i am ready for it
awesome! what is it about?
its about how some customers are not choosing our slow moving products. i have been working on it for weeks. i got it nailed down
label: prepared
response: congrats! i hope it goes well. are you presenting to a board of directors?

situation: a neighbor down the street  just bout a brand new lexus, man, why cannot i get one
dialogue: a neighbor  just bought a brand new lexus,  why cannot i get one
maybe you can save more and be able to get one.
its not just that, this neighbor is always buying expensive things and likes to show them off
label: jealous
response: man that gets to me when someone does that , like they are better than everyone else.

situation: i really miss the holidays when our family got together. holidays are never the same
dialogue: i really miss the holidays when our family got together
the holidays are a great time for that sort of thing. what did your family do together?
just the normal stuff,  but the kids are all grown up.holidays are never the same without having kids around to enjoy it
label: nostalgic
response: i understand what you mean.  i hope you and your family are all able to get together and enjoy each other's company soon.

situation: there is a job promotion coming up. i really do wish i can get it
dialogue: there is a job promotion coming up. i really do wish i can get it
i hope you can have you applied or did you interview already?
i have interview for it and thinking i might get it but you never know
label: hopeful
response: well have you practiced interviewing? with that you can feel so much better!

situation: i thought i was going to get a promotion. i found out i did not get it
dialogue: i thought i was going to get a promotion. i found out i did not get it
i am sorry to hear that. hopefully something better is coming along for you soon.
thank you, i was really depending on this promotion
label: disappointed
response: keep working hard and i think your efforts will eventually be noticed.

situation: my pet dog just pooped all over my rug. she never did that before.
dialogue: my pet dog pooped all over my rug last week. she never did that before
ah that always sucks, did she need to go out or is she sick or something?
i do not know, she never did that before, i do not know if the crap or her behavior got to me more
label: disgusted
response: well it is not as if she did it on purpose dogs always have a reason.

situation: i have a tooth ache. i need to go to the dentist but do not want to.
dialogue: ugh, i have a cavity and i do not want to go to the dentist
oh no, is it painful and disrupting you in anyway?
its painful but the thought of it being pulled kind of freaks me out plus the cost of it.
label: anxious
response: yeah, i know what you mean it does sound very scary, but they do numb your face and usually they do not pull it out, they fill in the cavity!

situation: this past weekend, we did not have anything planned.  i thought we would be able to get a lot done on our house.
dialogue: we did not really have anything planned this last weekend, so were thinking we'd be productive.
what did you do?
well, plans got changed.  it rained like crazy, so we could not work outside.
label: hopeful
response: it has been raining a lot here too. definitely ruins a weekend planned outside of the house.

situation: i wanted to finally finish my dad's father's day gift.  however, i did not have everything and did not get it done.
dialogue: i still have not been able to finish my dad's father's day gift.
so are you making him a gift?
yeah, we are rebuilding a porch swing for him.  but i have had to hunt down some tooling.
label: disappointed
response: do not worry about it you will get it done and he will be proud of it

situation: i have to fly out of town next week. i do not know if i can fly and not looking forward to it
dialogue: i have to fly out of town next week. i do not know if i can, i have cold sweats thinking about it
do you have a general fear of flying, or is there something about this trip?
it s the fear of flying, just the thought of it frightens me
label: terrified
response: have you always had a fear of flying?  i have not ever really feared it, but i do not like it.

situation: today was a big deadline at work.  we have various support responsibilities, so i was worried that it may not go as well as planned.
dialogue: man, i really thought today could be a crazy day.
was it another boring day today?
well, it sort of turned out that way.  there was a big event at work today, and i was not sure how it would go.
label: anxious
response: ohh okay i see, yeah i always get excited when new things happen at work too.

situation: i just fell of my diet by eating a big bag of peanut m&ms
dialogue: over the weekend i  fell off my diet by eating a big bag of peanut m&ms
i know the feeling. hang in there! tomorrow is always a new day
you know the worst part of it, is that i hid it from my partner who is proud of me dieting, i feel bad for it
label: guilty
response: did you hide the wrappers?

situation: i always buy the same brand of yogurt and do not even bother trying other kinds. it is just so delicious and such a good price that i am a loyal customer for life.
dialogue: i always buy the same brand of yogurt and do not even bother trying other kinds. it is just so delicious and such a good price that i am a loyal customer for life
there is very few brands i feel that strongly about. what kind of yogurt is it, i might want to try it?
astro balkan plain! it is not as pastey as greek yogurt, or runny like other kinds
label: faithful
response: i do not think i have ever seen that kind in the store, i will have to look for it next time i go. i do not care much for the runny yogurt, but i like greek yogurt so long as it is whole fat and sweet.

situation: i had a fudgsicle today and it made me think of how fun summers were when i was a kid. we all used to wait for the ice cream bike guy every evening after a long day of playing in the sun.
dialogue: i lost my job because i got diagnosed with a chronic disease. it is a real double whammy loss of income and an incurable disease. i am still angry and upset, three months later.
that is horrible. americas government will not be of help.hopefully you have family?
no i am all by myself
label: nostalgic
response: no cat or dog?

situation: i had a pitbull that i loved dearly named lily.  my boyfriend left a candle burning one night and left the house to go to his sisters.  our house caught fire and lily died.
dialogue: have you ever had a strong attachment and love for an animal?   i have had several.
yes i love animals and have 3 dogs right now.

well then you will understand the love i had for my pitbull named lily.   we had a special bond and when she died it broke my heart.  never leave a candle burning and leave the house.   our house burned and she died of smoke inhalation.  i will never forget her!
label: devastated
response: i am sorry that happened to you and i will take your advice.

situation: once during a snowstorm i had to go to the airport. my taxi driver decided that driving on the highway in the middle of nowhere late at night was the perfect time to tell me all about how he would kill a man.
dialogue: once during a snowstorm i had to go to the airport. my taxi driver decided that driving on the highway in the middle of nowhere late at night was the perfect time to tell me all about how he would kill a man
that sounds super scary, could he tell that your were scared or nervous? how did you escape that situation?
i shrank into myself and prayed for the car to go faster and not crash
label: terrified
response: oh wow, it is fortunate that you managed to get out of that situation alive. i am glad you made it out of that awful situation.

situation: one time there was a homeless guy running towards my car
dialogue: one time there was a homeless guy running towards my car
that sounds a little scary. why was he running towards your car?
he wanted money!
label: afraid
response: did you give him any?

situation: i love pirate peanut butter cookies. i am really stressed today so i bought a box of those cookies and ate an entire sleeve of them. i feel pretty bad because i wrecked my dieting for at least two days.
dialogue: i am really stressed today so i bought a box of pirate peanut butter cookies and ate an entire sleeve of them. i feel pretty bad because i wrecked my dieting for at least two days
aww, i am sorry, but i must say pirate peanut butte cookies do sound good, did they help you feel any better?
in the short term, yes! they are oatmeal and peanut butter
label: guilty
response: ugh, that sounds wonderful, i would do the same if i were stressed i think

situation: one time i saw a person juggle chainsaws
dialogue: one time i saw a person juggle chainsaws
that is amazing. were you impressed?
yes, he did it perfectly and did not hurt himself
label: impressed
response: that must take a lot of practice. i cannot even juggle safe objects so i would likely lose an arm if i tried to juggle chainsaws

situation: i am very ready for school to start!
dialogue: i am very ready for school to start!
me, too!  i work at the registration department at a college and we are very busy until school starts.
there is just something so nostalgic about going to school. reminds me of my childhood.
label: anticipating
response: i think it is the feeling of the beginning of something new.

situation: one time my mom made me lunch when i was too busy working!
dialogue: one time my mom made me lunch when i was too busy working!
wow that is so sweet of her. she must really love you!
i hope so! she always helps me and one day i will return the favor!
label: grateful
response: wow that is fantastic, she is so lucky to have you around because you are such a sweet and caring person.

situation: my friend got a new job and i wish i had it too.
dialogue: my friend got a new job and i wish i had it too.
good for you friend! i am sure you will find something soon. what field of work do you want to be in?
i work in video production. super fun job, but i am tired of the freelance life.
label: jealous
response: that does sound like a really fun job. i also work freelance and would also like something more stable.

situation: one time my family went out to vacation and i was home alone with no friends
dialogue: one time my family went out to vacation and i was home alone with no friends
oh no, they went on vacation without you??
yes, i had to work and could not get time off!
label: lonely
response: oh no that sucks, i am sorry that you had to stay home alone. what did you do to entertain yourself?

situation: my pet cat died recently
dialogue: my pet cat died recently
oh no, i am so sorry to hear that. how are you holding up?
i am doing okay, my cat was old and is probably in a better place now.
label: sad
response: yes, i am sure that your cat is in a better place. if you ever want to talk to someone about it i am always here to listen.

situation: i am ready for my law exam
dialogue: i am ready for my law exam
the big one? the bar? that is a whole lot of schooling and effort culminating in to one test! i imagine you are very excited, but anxious too.
luckily not the bar yet! just the end of summer class.
label: confident
response: ahh. still, another stone set on the road to payoff. i wish you the best!

situation: i knew i was ready for my college exam.
dialogue: i knew i was ready for my college exam.
you study hard?
i did. failed my last so i knew i had to make it right.
label: prepared
response: oh no, i bet you aced this one then.

situation: my brother keeps not washing the dishes!
dialogue: my brother keeps not washing the dishes!
oh no, have you talked to him about it?
yes! he is such a manchild! he does not care about cleanliness!
label: annoyed
response: aww man, that sucks, i am guessing that you end up having to do all the dirty work because he has been slacking off.

situation: i was so mad when my dog got my dinner off the table.
dialogue: i was so mad when my dog got my dinner off the table.
oh i would be pissed. hopefully you had more so you could fix another plate.
i did, but he knows better.
label: furious
response: guessing he did not get anymore food for dinner.

situation: i visited my college campus today and memories came flooding back. i miss it.
dialogue: i visited my college campus today and memories came flooding back. i miss it.
i would imagine so. what a great time of our lives college can be. the world just seems right, being surrounded by your peers, all sharing similar goals.
it was so great. we all just wanted to learn.
label: nostalgic
response: mmhm. i wish i studied more, paid more attention, and joined more clubs. but i guess that is the thing, you are already as busy as it gets, and unfortunately you cannot experience it all.

situation: i think i will pass my college test tomorrow.
dialogue: i think i will pass my college test tomorrow.
that is great, confidence is always a key in success! i believe that you will pass as well!
thank you. i am ready for it to be over with.
label: hopeful
response: yeah i bet! you will do great, i have high hopes in you!

situation: i was a bit upset when my parents could not visit me this weekend.
dialogue: i was a bit upset when my parents could not visit me this weekend.
aw, that stinks. why could not they come?
my dad had to work last minute. i got everything ready for them. oh well.
label: disappointed
response: that sounds really disappointing. hopefully, you will be able to see them soon! i am sure they were excited too.

situation: i was grossed out when i saw someone vomiting at a bar.
dialogue: i was grossed out when i saw someone vomiting at a bar.
oh man, i bet you did. i would have had a gag reflex if i saw some one puking at the bar.
they could not even make it to the bathroom. ugh.
label: disgusted
response: wow they must have had 1 too many drinks if they could not even get to the bathroom. i am sorry you had to see such a disgusting sight

situation: i am very scared of the afterlife.
dialogue: i am very scared of the afterlife
me too, it is so hard not knowing what to expect.
and we do not even know if we have an afterlife.
label: terrified
response: right, no one truly knows until they get there, so scary.

situation: i was very happy just reading a book by the pool today.
dialogue: i was very happy just reading a book by the pool today
what was the book about?
it was about the golden state killer. very errie.
label: content
response: i am glad you were happy reading the book.

situation: i was very nervous for my first day of freshman year in college.
dialogue: i was very nervous for my first day of freshman year in college.
oh, i understand. i also remember mine. do you remember something else about that day?
i could not find my classes. it was almost comical.
label: anxious
response: i imagine it was a big college. what did happen at the end?

situation: one time i won a stuffed animal from the claw machine!
dialogue: one time i won a stuffed animal from the claw machine!
me too! i love that game!
yup, i did it in my first try too!
label: excited
response: i saw a machine one time that you could win live lobsters. they would cook it for you if you won.

situation: i was so happy when my mom came to visit me!
dialogue: i was so happy when my mom came to visit me
nice! how long has it been since you last saw her?
6 months. way too long!
label: joyful
response: man, i hope you two do something fun!

situation: i am scared of spiders!
dialogue: i am scared of spiders!
all spiders or just the poisonous ones?
any of them. i hate all their creepy legs.
label: afraid
response: that is fair i guess, weird fish freak me out more then spiders through

situation: my sister recently got an iphone 8 from the at&t store.  i wish i had one!
dialogue: my sister came over to my house the other day.  she was quick to show off her new iphone 8.
wow, is she an older or younger sibling?
she is 10 years younger than i am, and quite spoiled.  she always has the  nicest things.
label: jealous
response: aww man that sucks, one day your hard work will pay off, so do not let it get to you too much. i am sure she is not intentially doing that

situation: one time i saw a giant cockroach under my desk!
dialogue: one time i saw a giant cockroach under my desk!
omg! i hate cockroaches, they are ugly insects
yes! they are so creepy with how fast and nasty they are1
label: surprised
response: were you able to kill it? what did you do?

situation: i thought it was so cool that my friend did a backflip.
dialogue: i thought it was so cool that my friend did a backflip.
wow! that is really cool. did he land the back flip?
he did! i did not know he could do that.
label: impressed
response: what prompted his back flip?

situation: i forgot to invite my friend to dinner with our other friends.
dialogue: i forgot to invite my friend to dinner with our other friends.
it happens sometimes.  it only becomes a problem if you forget often.
luckily i have not done it too many times.
label: guilty
response: i hope they were pretty understanding.

situation: one time i wanted to eat at burger king, but then i remembered that i was loyal to mcdonalds
dialogue: one time i wanted to eat at burger king, but then i remembered that i was loyal to mcdonalds
i hate burger king! mcd's all the way
your dam right! even if the food is small, it tastes so good!
label: faithful
response: adding mac sauce to a cheeseburger is a game changer

situation: i was upset when i did not do well on a test.
dialogue: i was upset when i did not do well on a test.
that is unfortunate, did you fail the test?
not exactly, but close enough. i will study better next time.
label: sad
response: you got this! i believe in you!

situation: i was so mad when my friend forgot my birthday.
dialogue: i was so mad when my friend forgot my birthday
wow! did you tell them anything?
i did a few days later. they seemed sorry.
label: angry
response: you should stop being their friend!

situation: one time my friend said that i could tell him anything and she would snitch
dialogue: one time my friend said that i could tell him anything and she would snitch
oh, snitches are no fun.
yes, snitches get stiches
label: trusting
response: i would just keep to myself.

situation: when i was a teenager i was extremely angry with my mother.   i often treated her with disrespect.
dialogue: i remember years ago when i was a teenager.  i did not treat her as well as i should have.
who?
oh so sorry, i meant to say i did not treat my mother as well as i should have.  i often treated her with disrespect and disobedience.
label: ashamed
response: well i think as long as you say sorry, she can forgive.

situation: my dog kept barking and waking me up.
dialogue: my dog kept barking and waking me up
i know how annoying that can be.  i love dogs but they certainly get do annoying things at times.
i still do not know why he was barking.
label: annoyed
response: maybe there was something outside or maybe he just wanted attention.   dogs behavior can be hard to figure out sometimes.   good luck!

situation: one time i pooped my pants when i was trying to fart
dialogue: one time i pooped my pants when i was trying to fart
i have done that before. it is not fun.
yup! i had to walk home in shame!
label: ashamed
response: i hope you threw out those pants.

situation: my dog learned a new trick today!
dialogue: my dog learned a new trick today!
ooh, what kind of trick did she learn?
shaking hands! so cute
label: proud
response: aww! i wish i had a dog now!

situation: i am so ready for football season.
dialogue: i am so ready for football season
american football or soccer?
american football!
label: excited
response: okay. i am not really a fan of it.

situation: i could not believe that donald trump won the election.
dialogue: i could not believe that donald trump won the election.
yeah, that was a surprising result.
i still do not know what to make of it
label: surprised
response: does it make you feel like you are living in an alternate reality?

situation: i did not like being alone at home at night.
dialogue: i did not like being alone at home at night.
it can be scary at times. how do you deal with it?
i try to go to bed earlier.
label: lonely
response: that is a good way. i have a dog that makes me feel safe. do you have anything like that?

situation: my family left for the weekend and i am so bored.
dialogue: my family left for the weekend and i am so bored.
you can watch some movies
what should i watch?
label: lonely
response: it depends on your preference. i watch korean dramas.

situation: i have realized that i have it good in life
dialogue: i have realized that i have it good in life
life is always a lot better when the sun is shining.
yes, i appreciate everything, even the sun
label: content
response: when the sun is shining walking and seeing the beautiful sights makes me smile.

situation: i can definiely count on my best friend for anything
dialogue: i can definiely count on my best friend for anything
that is good you have someone to share your happiness and problems with
it is. do you?
label: trusting
response: my best friend is my boyfriend. so i share everything with him

situation: i love volunteering.
dialogue: i love volunteering.
same here! where do you volunteer at?
the humane society. i just love animals.
label: caring
response: that is so generous of you! have you ever thought of joining a volunteer organization?

situation: something terrible happened. i discovered i have cankles
dialogue: something terrible happened. i discovered i have cankles
what are those
it is a terrible disease where your ankles and calves are fused together
label: devastated
response: ??? is it a cancer of some sort??

situation: i love to volunteer for others.
dialogue: i love to volunteer for others
that is excellent! i wish i had the courage to do so, too.
you should try! it is fun!
label: caring
response: i think it would be fun to help someone build a house.

situation: i was nervous for my first day of college.
dialogue: i was nervous for my first day of college.
oh yeah? was it because you did not know if you could do the work, or because of all the hot college girls
just nervous for new beginnings.
label: apprehensive
response: well how did it go? did you do well?

situation: i played with and hugged my dog all day today!
dialogue: i played with and hugged my dog all day today!
that must be nice. i wish i had one.
you should! they need a lot of attention though!
label: caring
response: yes, they do. and lots of care.

situation: i was nervous for my first day of college.
dialogue: i was nervous for my first day of college
what about it made you feel nervous?
just nervous for a new start in life
label: apprehensive
response: yeah i understand. big life changes make me feel uneasy sometimes too.

situation: i found some pictures of my dog i had to put down. i miss her.
dialogue: i  found some pictures of my dog i had to put down. i miss her
i lost my dog last year, i miss her too.
dogs are too good to us
label: sentimental
response: i agree, they are the best.

situation: i realized i am happy with life
dialogue: i realized i am happy with life
that must feel good.
yes, i am starting to appreciate lots of small things in life!
label: content
response: small things like what?

situation: one time my mom gave my brother a happy meal, and i got nothing!
dialogue: one time my mom gave my brother a happy meal, and i got nothing!
wow that is completely unfair!
yup, it scarred me for life. i have mental issues now
label: jealous
response: well i mean sounds like favortism to me. siblings always get the better things

situation: i won 4000 on a scratchoff  lottery ticket one day.   i could not wait to go cash it in.
dialogue: i love to play lottery scratch offs!   i once won 4000 on one.
wow, lucky you. i play those once in a year only
i can understand that, as i usually do not have the money to play to very often.  i could not wait to go cash it in.
label: anticipating
response: i do not play too much because if i do not win, i feel it is a waste of money.

situation: i studied all night for a test. i think i can pass it, even though i was sleepy
dialogue: i studied all night for a test. i think i can pass it, even though i was sleepy
well that is good. what is the subject?
organic chemistry!
label: confident
response: i hate chemistry because i think we should leave all that stuff to nature and just live our lives as the animals we are

situation: one time they gave me ketchup packets instead of spicy sauce. i was so mad!
dialogue: one time they gave me ketchup packets instead of spicy sauce. i was so mad!
wow that is annoying. did you get a spicy packet after?
no, i was pouting all day!
label: furious
response: that is okay, mistakes happen all the time.

situation: one time when i was drinking coffee, all the memories of my childhood kept coming back
dialogue: one time when i was drinking coffee, all the memories of my childhood kept coming back
did you drink a lot of coffee when you were a child?
no, but i like losing myself in my thoughts when drinking coffee!
label: nostalgic
response: i see, that is such a nice way to remember your past,.

situation: one time i studied all week for my final exam! i think i can pass now!
dialogue: one time i studied all week for my final exam! i think i can pass now!
well did you pass or did you fail?
i failed unfortunately, but i liked my optimism!
label: hopeful
response: well i guess you might want to study harder next time.

situation: one time i went to the doctor and i was really anticipating my test results for cancer!
dialogue: one time i went to the doctor and i was really anticipating my test results for cancer!
oh you must love getting cancer results!
well it does get my heart beating fast!
label: anxious
response: that is why i do it, for a great cardio workout. so what were the results?

situation: one time my house started flooding from a hurricane!
dialogue: one time my house started flooding from a hurricane!
and then what happened??
i woke up
label: terrified
response: and then what happened

situation: one time i skipped my friend's birthday party to watch tv
dialogue: one time i skipped my friend's birthday party to watch tv
i hope something good was on
there was! but i felt so bad afterwards. i am a monster
label: guilty
response: yeah you are. what show was it?

situation: one time my mom bought an ice cream from mcdonalds!
dialogue: one time my mom bought an ice cream from mcdonalds!
really? what kind of icecream?
a plain vanilla one. it is rare since their machine is always broken!
label: joyful
response: that is a good one! it is not always broken though. sometimes they are out of ice cream mix because the workers eat it all

situation: one time when i was little, i was scared of going to sleep without a night light
dialogue: one time when i was little, i was scared of going to sleep without a night light
that is a rational fear when you are little. how did you overcome it?
i became depressed and i felt nothing
label: afraid
response: oh that is a bad place to go
