situation: one time there was this really cool person i was talking to on a chatroom
dialogue: one time there was this really cool person i was talking to on a chatroom
oh really? what were you guys talking about?
about topics that really impressed us. it was you 3
label: impressed
response: aww that is so sweet 3

situation: one time a person offered to drive me home when it was raining outside
dialogue: one time a person offered to drive me home when it was raining outside
he must be a good person bit if he is a stranger, is it safe?
it was super creepy, i did not take the offer !
label: grateful
response: that is good safety first

situation: my cat passed away because of old age
dialogue: my cat passed away because of old age
i am sorry to hear that! what was its name?
i called him pizza guy
label: sad
response: that is cute! is there a meaning behind that name?

situation: in all my relationships,i always choose to honest as much as i can. i never want to my partner to stop believing in me.
dialogue: in all my relationships,i always choose to honest as much as i can. i never want to my partner to stop believing in me
that is good! never accept anything less!
exactly,you receive what you get. nothing less.
label: faithful
response: i am rooting for you! get your dream person!

situation: one time i kept waiting for this person to respond to my texts. he never did
dialogue: one time i kept waiting for this person to respond to my texts. he never did
i can imagine how it feel,more so if its someone who never leaves his/her phone down.
yes, i do not like being ignored
label: angry
response: the writing is very clear on the wall. you have been ignored.

situation: i am starting university in two days and i am kind of stressed
dialogue: i am starting university in two days and i am kind of stressed because i will be studying with new teachers and i have no idea what they will be like
wow, that sounds intense! i hope you will find out there was nothing to be stressed about after all!
yeah but i hate having mean teachers , the ones that are not open for different ways of explaining things. so i really hope i will not have anyone like that
label: anxious
response: well i hope you will not have any of those mean teachers! maybe you will have some awesome ones?

situation: school is starting back up soon, i cannot wait to see all my friends again!
dialogue: school is starting back up soon, i cannot wait to see all my friends again!
that is sounds amazing, you
yes, me very happy!
label: excited
response: you did not talk to any of them during summer break? is there anyone specific you are looking forward to see?

situation: i am afraid i will not achieve my goals in life
dialogue: sometimes i get scared because i fear not being able to achieve my goals in life
i feel you. i am still scared even though i am sort of successful now!
it is that fear of not being able to control everything that hurts the most
label: terrified
response: uncertainty is the only certainty!

situation: i like to work with people who are fast on their feet and get things very fast.
dialogue: i like to work with people who are fast on their feet and get things very fast.
have you always felt that way or have changed your view over time?
that is just me,we seem to get a lot of things done within a short period of time.
label: apprehensive
response: well that is a good way of doing things as long are you getting the job right in my opinion.

situation: i will release my project soon
dialogue: i will release my project soon, and i am so excited because i worked insanely hard on it
yes i believe in you
thank you, i am believe in myself and all the hard work i put in this project
label: hopeful
response: your hard work will not fail you

situation: my new car was extremely damaged in a road accident last week being my very first car,i;m shuttered.
dialogue: my new car was extremely damaged in a road accident last week being my very first car,i;m shuttered
i am so sorry. : (
to make it worse,i was the one on the wrong. the insurance is seeming difficult to compensate.
label: devastated
response: well, at least you came out without an injury? or did you.

situation: i like to relax on the weekends. it is nice not having anything to worry about.
dialogue: i am very excited about this weekend. two days with literally no plans and no responsibilities!
dang! what are going to do with all that free time!?
the plan is to just relax. maybe some tv or a book.
label: content
response: nice! well i hope you have a nice and relaxing weekend!

situation: one time i found a cockroach in my hamburger!
dialogue: one time i found a cockroach in my hamburger! omg!
oh my god, that sounds like the most terrifying thing ever! where was this so i know never to go there?
it was at mcdonalds!
label: surprised
response: not surprising. how long did it take you before you were able to eat a burger again?

situation: i hate when i see people cheating on each other
dialogue: i hate seeing all those people breaking their promises just so they can follow their desires and wishes
what kind of promises? who hurt you?
nobody hurted me , it is just seeing people get hurt is kind of annoying for me
label: disgusted
response: what is the worst hurt you've ever seen?

situation: i was happy cause someone asked me for advice on his first move.
dialogue: i was happy because my best friend called me to ask about his first time moving away from home.
wow that sounds like good news!
yeah. he was going to college. he went for a couple years. he did not finish there.
label: trusting
response: i am glad to hear he has moved on with his life! a huge step forward.

situation: once i was going to get fried chicken, but then i remembered i was loyal to only eating vegetables
dialogue: once i was going to get fried chicken, but then i remembered i was loyal to only eating vegetables
wait, you forgot you are vegetarian? that must've been pretty shocking
my girlfriend makes me! and she is always watching!
label: faithful
response: oooo you have to be sneaky with your meat habits, my friend

situation: i love helping people
dialogue: i love helping people, just seeing that smile after you finish helping them makes me so happy!
who have you helped recently?
well, i always help this old man to cross the road.
label: joyful
response: that is really kind of you. does the old man appreciate it?

situation: i can tell my best friend anything!
dialogue: i can tell my best friend anything!
sounds like a great friend! do they just listen or offer helpful advice?
i usually ask her for advice and tell her embarrassing stories because she never snitches!
label: trusting
response: loyal and caring. you've got a winner on your hands!

situation: i am living my best life. i could'not be any happier.
dialogue: i am living my best life. i could'not be any happier."
good to know. and what makes you life so good, huh?
family is doing great, bussines is booming
label: content
response: what if it all comes crashing down on you!

situation: one time i stole something from the grocery store when i was little
dialogue: one time i stole something from the grocery store when i was little
did your mother find out?
no, but the guilt haunted me for a long time!
label: ashamed
response: how have you managed it? have you thought about returning to the store and admitting to it?

situation: there was a race i should have won.
dialogue: there was a race in high school i should have won. i did not see the guy trying to pass me as he was coming out of the last turn.
that sounds unfair. maybe you will get another chance to win.
the funny part was i threw the baton at the end and got my team disqualified for the race.
label: devastated
response: oh wow, well there is always another chance, we all learn on mistakes.

situation: i like to watch tech youtubers in my spare time.  but whenever i see their high end gaming pc setups i long to have something as good for myself.
dialogue: in my spare time i like to watch tech reviewers on youtube.  but whenever i see their high end gaming pc setups it makes me want something as good for myself.
i am not much of a gamer myself. what is your favourite game?
my favorite game is assassin's creed.  it has a great story.  when i see it running on a gamer's expensive pc i wish i could get that performance.
label: jealous
response: you need to save your money to be able to afford it.

situation: i let people so much in my life and they ended up betraying my confidence i had in them.
dialogue: i let people so much in my life and they've ended up betraying my confidence i had in them."
i can sympathize with you. i have had a lot of betrayal in the past. the only thing to do is to continue looking for trustworthy individuals.
i have learnt the hard way,keep your friend circle small.
label: trusting
response: not for naught but, a dog will not ever betray you 3

situation: one time a build a tower of cards that was over 8 layers tall. it fell when someone walked by
dialogue: one time i was building a tower of cards that was over 8 layers tall. it fell when someone walked by
oh my god, did it take a lot of work? and did it annoy you when it fell down?
yes it took me over an hour! i was so mad!
label: devastated
response: maybe this time you can do it somewhere alone?

situation: i am sad because i have no friends and i do not like my own company.
dialogue: do you ever feel lonely? i do. i hate my own company and i have no friends.
same. i hate my life. i sit in front of my computer all day
i do too, it is normal to runaway and sit in front of your computer i guess
label: lonely
response: well i hope things turn out better for you

situation: i am ashamed of always deceiving my family
dialogue: i am ashamed of always deceiving my family.
why do you do it?
i do not do it on purpose , it is them they want me to be a doctor but i do not like medicine.
label: guilty
response: oh i see. what do you want to do instead?

situation: my sibling screamed at me and it really made me feel sad
dialogue: i had a fight with my sibling today and she started shouting at me and it really annoyed me
that is unfortunate. did you make up afterwards?
no, she still does not want to apologise for what she did, but eve she does not i am gonna talk to her today!
label: annoyed
response: that is good. you guys are siblings after all and should try to get along.

situation: the possibility of winning a lottery this time is high for me.
dialogue: the possibility of winning a lottery this time is high for me
hi, what makes you think that?
bruh,my instincts cannot be wrong. i just have this crazy feeling that i might be lucky this time round.
label: anticipating
response: fair enough my friend, would you say your chances are high because of signs of other people winning around you recently?

situation: i am mad at my mother because she did not call me
dialogue: i recently discovered that my father is sick , i tried to contact my mother to see what happened but she did not answer. i am so mad at her because she did not even try to call me again.
could she just be too distraught to pick up a phone? i agree that she owes that much to you but, maybe shes too broken atm
i got really angry and i am so worried about my father. so i am gonna go visit my parents and check on them this weekend.
label: angry
response: hopefully you do not live too far. i know this is a random chat but, i genuinely hope your father is okay. i do not have a dad so, cherish every moment you get.

situation: the best i ever felt was on an island in the caribbean.
dialogue: the coolest place i have ever been was an island in the caribbean. no cars, only golf cars. 100% touristy village.
golf is by far my favourite hobby, this sounds awesome! what island was it?
caye caulker. maybe a vacation for your partner. there is a snorkeling place there. the coolest things though was that it was unlike anywhere i have ever been.
label: content
response: i will have a look at it on my lunch break today! i did snorkelling in the philippines at it was amazing.  that was on the island of coron

situation: one time i was in the office with my shirt off cause the thermostat was messed up.
dialogue: my embarassing moment is when our thermostat was broken and my boss came in, and i had my shirt off. only problem i guess is it would have been weird if he had had a client with him.
ooooof lmao do you work in an office?
yeah, insurance. no client though thankfully.
label: embarrassed
response: thank goodness. you really dodged a bullet on that one

situation: i am going on a holiday in two weeks and i cannot wait
dialogue: i am finally gonna get some rest, i am going on a holiday in two weeks and i really cannot wait!
oh boy oh boy oh boy where are you going??
i am going to greece. i cannot wait to see all the greek gods up close.
label: excited
response: well, i do not want to break it to you, but those guys are fictional..

situation: i was feeling down about something i was scared to share with anybody, until someone very kind promised to listen and not tell anybody.
dialogue: i was nervous about a secret i had but i hated keeping it bottled up.
did the secret negatively affect others?
no, but some kind person came up to me and promised not to tell anybody.
label: trusting
response: i can understand that feeling. well, if it was pretty innocuous there is no harm and keeping confidentialiy

situation: i am looking forward to getting a promotion.
dialogue: i am looking forward to getting a promotion. i have to hire 3 people.
oh wow more responsibility! i bet the pay raise will be welcome
yes, a couple more levels and it will be easier.
label: anticipating
response: sweet! sounds like a good job. how are the bosses?

situation: i love my wife because she is loyal to me and she always takes care of me
dialogue: i love my wife because she is loyal and she always takes care of me.
thats a wonderful thing how long have you been married?
for over 5 years now.
label: faithful
response: very nice its always good to find a faithful and loving woman

situation: when i was younger i was ashamed that i went into a comic book store with a good friend of mine and tried to steal a lot of comic books but luckily i was caught
dialogue: when i was younger i did something i was very embarrassed about
we all make mistakes , what is important is to learn from them! and you were young so it is okay you know?
yeah it was something a stupid kid does, i went into a comic book store with a friend and tried to steal a lot of comics but we were caught and i learned it was bad to steal
label: ashamed
response: it is good that you learned from your mistake!

situation: my wife for the last 10 years has been very loving and trusting and always has remained strong in our marriage and i trust her 100 percent
dialogue: my wife is the best thing to happen to me since sliced bread
that is awesome! tell me about her.
i have been with her for 10 years and she is wonderful mother and wife and always puts her family first
label: faithful
response: aw, that is great to hear about happy marriages! i hope you tell her often how much you appreciate her!  i am sure you are a great husband too.

situation: i came home one day to my cat, muffins, dead.
dialogue: i had a cat that i loved so much and one day i came home and i found out he had been ran over.
oh no! did someone let it out?
they must have. i could not believe what i was seeing.
label: devastated
response: how old was he?

situation: our company is firing people
dialogue: our company is firing people, and everyone is very sad to go
oh no, i am so sorry to hear that. it is stressful. i hope your job is safe?
mine is good, i just feel bad for the people who got fired you know?
label: sad
response: totally. i cannot imagine losing my job. luckily the economy is pretty good, so maybe they will find new jobs quickly.

situation: i am moving out from this house and it is just very emotional
dialogue: i am moving out from this house and it is just very emotional.
why are you moving?
well, my university is in a different city so i am leaving everyone here to follow my dreams.
label: sentimental
response: i would feel emotional too with such a big transition in life. i am sure you will enjoy university though

situation: when my grandparents died, i was extremely upset for a few months.
dialogue: when my grandparents died, i was extremely upset for a few months
were they close to you?
i was really close with my grandpa on my father's side. i used to spend every summer with them when i was as child
label: devastated
response: that makes sense why you got upset but in the end we are all gonna follow them and you never now you may see them again

situation: i really love my wife and kids and it just puts me in a very happy mood i feel like everything is right in the world with them
dialogue: my whole world revolves around my family they make me very happy
that is so heartwarmingly sweet. i know exactly how you feel since my family means the world to me as well.
they are my reason to live for sure, i do not look forward to my kids growing up and moving out
label: caring
response: it is true they grow up so fast. this is why we should appreciate every second we have with them.

situation: i have been in my job for 3 years now, and i feel quite comfortable and happy here
dialogue: i have been in my job for 3 years now, and i feel quite comfortable and happy here
what do you do?
i am a project manager. i started off very junior, and now i have worked my way up in the company
label: content
response: oh wow- do you have a college degree?

situation: when i had to clear out my old bedroom when i left home, i really found it hard to throw away a lot of the stuff in there!
dialogue: when i had to clear out my old bedroom when i left home, i really found it hard to throw away a lot of the stuff in there!
why do you find it hard to throw away old stuff
just thinking of all the good times i had with toys / books etc when i was a child! even though i would not use these things again, it was still hard to throw away
label: sentimental
response: so what are you planning to do

situation: i got really drunk on my birthday this year, and could not remember what i did. it was very awkward meeting my friends the next day
dialogue: i got really drunk on my birthday this year, and could not remember what i did. it was very awkward meeting my friends the next day
oh no, i have had that happen before, it is the worst. i hope it was not too bad for you!
it  was not that bad in the end, but it was the fear of not remembering anything!
label: embarrassed
response: i understand that all too well! i am glad it was not too bad though. i have had some pretty embarrassing things happen while hungover.

situation: i got really drunk on my birthday and was horrible to one of my oldest friends, i felt awful
dialogue: i got really drunk on my birthday and was horrible to one of my oldest friends, i felt awful
did you apologise to him? maybe next time try to not drink a lot so you can control yourself?
i did apologise to him the next day, and i had a lot of making up to do. i do not usually get nasty when i drink alcohol, but this has made me be more careful
label: ashamed
response: i am glad it made you more aware of what you are doing.

situation: the future looks bright though right now things are not going as i had planned.
dialogue: the future looks bright though right now things are not going as i had planned
what are you going to do to change that?
keep doing my best in whatever i do. i am sure all shall be well.
label: hopeful
response: keep your head up high, good positive thinking.

situation: i saw a lonely stray cat looking skinny and scared in an alleyway and i felt so bad for it i wanted to take it home.
dialogue: i found an abandoned cat in an alleyway yesterday.
what did you do to it?
i took it home with me, i felt bad for it.
label: caring
response: you are such a sweet soul. they say adopt and rescue ,do not buy

situation: when i gave a best man speech at my dad's wedding, i knew that i was going to do well and make everyone laugh
dialogue: when i gave a best man speech at my dad's wedding, i knew that i was going to do well and make everyone laugh
i wish i could have heard your speech. it must have been really funny.
i do not think anybody recorded it which is a shame! my dad loved it though which is the main thing
label: confident
response: i hope he had a wonderful wedding. he must have been proud of you.

situation: the last interview i went to, i studied the company, as well as the role. i felt like i had all the info i needed to succeed
dialogue: the last interview i went to, i studied the company, as well as the role. i felt like i had all the info i needed to succeed
did you get the job? or you are still waiting on the response?
i did get the job the company were really impressed with my knowledge of what they did, and my enthusiasm for the role
label: prepared
response: you must be really proud of yourself. that sounds really fulfilling!

situation: i got an a in all my classes, and summer is starting. i am pretty happy with how things are going right now.
dialogue: summer starts next week, and i got a's in all my classes this year.
well if this is not a great start for summer i do not know what is
i would not change a thing in the world right now.
label: content
response: of course you will not, have an amazing summer!

situation: when my ex girlfriend cheated on me, i was so angry
dialogue: when my ex girlfriend cheated on me, i was so angry
oh it can really hurt
at least it was not with a close friend it was someone i did not know. at least i did not have to be angry with 2 people i knew!
label: furious
response: its fair that way

situation: my younger sister who is 14 years is pregnant with her 16 year boyfriend. arrrgh!
dialogue: my younger sister who is 14 years is pregnant with her 16 years old boyfriend. arrrgh
oh no, i am sorry to hear that. you must be very worried about her!
worried least to say,teenage pregnancy with not best formal education. i am lost for words.
label: disappointed
response: oh gosh, all you can do is try to be there for her.  but yes, 14 is so young to be a mother. i would be very upset too. i am sorry.

situation: when i played the new crash bandicoot remastered games, it made me remember the good times in my childhood
dialogue: when i played the new crash bandicoot remastered games, it made me remember the good times in my childhood
must have really brought back good memories. i love nostalgia.
it is great! i am really looking forward to playing the new spyro games too!
label: nostalgic
response: it is a great thing these companies are doing letting you re-live the good old days when you are older!

situation: i was walking in the snow and i accidentally slipped on some ice in front of a bunch of people.
dialogue: today i slipped when i was walking to class on campus.
oh no, how embarassing! did anyone see?
yes! there was like 12 people near me! i could not believe my luck.
label: embarrassed
response: i hate it when that happens! i hope you did not hurt yourself, and that somebody tried to help?

situation: i remember when i submitted my cv to a company, i could not wait to get a response, hoping that it was positive!
dialogue: i remember when i submitted my cv to a company, i could not wait to get a response, hoping that it was positive!
how did it eventually go?
i got the good response i was anticipating. i put a lot of work into my cv, and the application, so i was very happy with the result
label: hopeful
response: congratulations on a new job

situation: i was upset not to get a response back from a company that i applied for a job at
dialogue: i was upset not to get a response back from a company that i applied for a job at
oh no, i am sorry to hear that. that really sucks, maybe you can reapply soon?
i suppose i could, but i am not sure i want to apply again as they did not treat with any respect, and ignored my application
label: disappointed
response: i can understand that. i think the next company you apply for will be your time to shine!

situation: my parents tried to make me eat some gone off food once, it made me really ill
dialogue: my parents tried to make me eat some gone off food once, it made me really ill
oh no! i confess i have done that to my kids!
i have too now that i have kids of my own! i think that the use by dates on food are more of a guideline, and so far they have not got ill!
label: disgusted
response: ha, that is good! mine have not gotten sick from it either. i just hate to waste food!

situation: i took the quiz like a man. i was not scared at all.
dialogue: i had a quiz yesterday and i went through it like nothing.
amazing, did you revise for it, or are you naturally clever?
i studied all week for it. i came prepared.
label: confident
response: that is cool i never had the concentration to study that much

situation: i thought i saw a ghost once in my old apartment, it scared the hell out of me!
dialogue: i thought i saw a ghost once in my old apartment, it scared the hell out of me!
oh man, i would have moved out the next day.
yeah it was not long before i did move out! i never believed in ghosts until then, and it still creeps me out!
label: terrified
response: i do not blame you. i have never seen one before, i would hate to see one.

situation: i got arrested when i was younger, and i was so scared in the back of the police car
dialogue: i got arrested when i was younger, and i was so scared in the back of the police car
oh no. may i ask what you did wrong?
i got caught drinking under age. i got off without being charged, but it was very scary!
label: terrified
response: where did they take you? back to your parents or to the police station?

situation: when my dad told me he was getting married, i was over the moon
dialogue: when my dad told me he was getting married, i was over the moon
were you happy for him? or did you get sad because you did not want that to happen?
i was delighted for him, his new wife is so great for him, and she is always been really cool to me
label: joyful
response: that is great, i am glad she is nice to you.

situation: when i got told that i had a new job, i was over the moon
dialogue: when i got told that i had a new job, i was over the moon
that is wonderful news, congratulations! are you going to celebrate?
i am definitely going to celebrate! it is my dream job
label: joyful
response: i am so happy for you. you should get a nice dinner with your family.

situation: i stole money from my dad once, i felt terrible for ages
dialogue: i stole money from my dad once, i felt terrible for ages
did he find out?
he did eventually, i actually told him when the guilt got too much for me
label: guilty
response: thats good you told him. that is a lot to keep inside. hopefully he was not mad

situation: i cheated on my ex girlfriend, and i felt bad about it ever since
dialogue: i cheated on my ex girlfriend, and i felt bad about it ever since
ohhhh, that is so bad. why did you cheat?
i got drunk i felt really guilty about it
label: guilty
response: oh no, sorry about that. but have you confessed to her

situation: when i proposed to my girlfriend, she said yes! i was so happy
dialogue: when i proposed to my girlfriend, she said yes! i was so happy
well that is great news congratulations, how long have you known each other?
we have known each other for 7 years, and been dating for 5 felt like the right time
label: joyful
response: that is good that you put a lot of effort into it

situation: i can recall a time where i was very drunk at a wedding and i walked into the womans rest room and my face went so red i could not stand it
dialogue: i remember when i was in my 20's i was so drunk that i accidently went into the womans rest room
haha, amazing! did you get shouted at?
no but a lot of people saw me do it and my face went beet red
label: embarrassed
response: that is really embarassing! did any of your friends poke fun at you for it?

situation: i am really waiting on getting my tax returns this year i could use new carpet
dialogue: i need new carpet for my house so i cannot wait to get my income tax return this year
what happened exactly? is it just old and moldy?
no its just 17 years old and needs to be replaced
label: anticipating
response: at least you got your moneys worth! are you going to have it installed?

situation: i have a wonderful set of memories when i was growing up with family vacations and going to cool places like virginia
dialogue: i remember growing up and having some really good family vacations
that is so lovely
yes i had a good childhood with wonderful memories even though we did not have a lot of money
label: sentimental
response: memories are good to be kept in the medulla. good old days. you really had a good time

situation: i remember how very strong i felt when i proposed to my wife that she would accept and make me very happy
dialogue: when i proposed to my wife i knew she was going to say yes i just felt it
aw. when you know, you know. how did you do it?
i was rather cheesy and proposed to her on christmas
label: confident
response: i bet it was really special though! christmas is such a beautiful time of year. when are you getting married?

situation: i have never cheated on my boyfriends, although i suspect they may have cheated on me.
dialogue: in the relationships i have been in i have never cheated, i have suspicions that the guys i was with did though.
that is too bad. do you have proof of infidelity?
not really, but my one boyfriend was always very flirty and liked hooking up with girls a lot
label: faithful
response: it is good that you are faithful. too bad your boyfriend could not be less flirtatious and respect you more.

situation: a new restaurant opened near my house, and it turned out to be really really nice
dialogue: a new restaurant opened near my house, and it turned out to be really really nice
what kind of food does it serve? sounds wonderful!
it is a spanish restaurant, and they serve steaks and fish chargrilled. it is my new favourite place to eat!
label: impressed
response: surf and turf! that is what they called a steak served with seafood. it is very yummy!

situation: i was outside with my kids playing in the pool and i just felt no stress or anything, just very relaxed.
dialogue: i felt totally relaxed when i was outside watching my kids play in the pool.
that is good, i love relaxing outside by a pool.
yeah it was like i had no stress.
label: content
response: that is always a good feeling.

situation: my dog was chewing on dead frog. so gross! i hope it was not poisonous.
dialogue: my dog was chewing on dead frog. so gross! i hope it was not poisonous.
oh man dogs are crazy! my dog killed a cat recently, i hope it is not poison! is he okay?
he seems to be ok but if he start salivating then for sure there is poison. i will have to run to vet!
label: disgusted
response: oh no, you are a good dog owner though

situation: i was ready when it was time to buy a house i made sure my credit was in order and that i had money for a down payment
dialogue: when i bought my house i made sure i had everything all ready including my down payment
sounds like you are doing all the right things. did anything go wrong?
no it took 2 weeks to close and no issues came up
label: prepared
response: oh that is great! congratulations on your knew home! that must be so exciting!

situation: i am so happy today because my peacocks just had 3 babies! they are so cute!
dialogue: i am so happy today because my peacocks just had 3 babies! they are so cute!
that is the coolest thing ever i did not know you could have them as pets
oh yes! i have 3 adult females and one male. i have had them for 5 years. they have names and i can call them and they come running to me. they are cool pets.
label: joyful
response: my kids would love something like that

situation: lately i hav been hearing some big monkeys howling up in the mountain. i hope they do not come down near my house.
dialogue: lately i hav been hearing some big monkeys howling up in the mountain. i hope they do not come down near my house.
monkeys!??? i have never heard monkeys howl.  tell me more.
it is hard to give you an example through text but it does sound like a monster in the mountains. kind of scary! haha
label: afraid
response: where do you live that there are monkeys in the mountains?  i live in florida, the flatlands.

situation: just heard i got the promotion i was hoping for. i think i am going to burst.
dialogue: just heard i got the promotion i was hoping for. i think i am going to burst.
oh that is so exciting! good for you man!
thanks, i thing i am going to celebrate when i get home tonight
label: joyful
response: yeah pop that champagne!

situation: i am on vacation in bali and i want to move here so badly. it is the most beautiful place in the world!
dialogue: i am on vacation in bali and i want to move here so badly. it is the most beautiful place in the world!
that sounds awesome! what is your favorite part of your vacation so far?
i love hiking through the rice fields and the fruit here is out of this world!
label: impressed
response: what kinds of fruit do they have there?

situation: i can remember back to when i was 13 years old and worked on a horse farm in exchange for lessons.  i used to love the smell of the horses and never wanted to wash the smell of them from my hands when i went home.
dialogue: when i was about 13 years old i worked at a horse farm in exchange for lessons.  i would go there every weekend and all through the summer.
that is great that they let you work in exchange for lessons. i bet you have the best memories.

yes i have very fond memories from those days.  i can still remember the smell of the farm and the smell of horses like it was yesterday.  i never wanted to wash the smell from my hands and i would daydream about owning my own horse someday.
label: nostalgic
response: that is awesome. do you own a horse now?

situation: when i was studying for my math finals. spent a couple days studying for it and felt confident when taking the tets.
dialogue: studied for my math finals for days, felt very confident on the day of the test.
that is awesome! yeah i definitely find the more i study, the better i do. funny how that works!
yeah, but theres a balance. study too much and you just burn yourself out
label: prepared
response: true. there has to be a work/school/life balance.

situation: when my dad got sick and i had to stay at home for a week taking care of him
dialogue: my dad got sick for a week and i stayed at home for a week taking care of him
well i hope he gets to felling better.
he is better already but he got a real bad fever during that week
label: caring
response: you should keep an eye on him older people are more prone to getting sick.

situation: i drank all the milk in the fridge and left nothing for anyone else. next week i will buy extra milk for the house.
dialogue: i drank all the milk in the fridge and left nothing for anyone else. next week i will buy extra milk for the house to make up for it.
that is very considerate of you. i know some people that drink it all and do not replace it.
yeah, i have done that before and i got yelled at by everyone. i learned my lesson. haha
label: guilty
response: lol it happens, what is important is that you learned and care enough about your people to internalize the knowledge.

situation: looking through old stuff in the attic and i stumbled across my gamecube. sadly i did not have anything for it but it was nice seeing it.
dialogue: looking through old stuff in the attic and stumbled across my old gamecube, sadly it did not work anymore.
awww, i never had one, but wanted one.
yeah i had good memories playing with my friends
label: nostalgic
response: what were your favorite games?

situation: my old roommate did not clean out his room or the kitchen when he left. the university charged me and the other roommates 100$
dialogue: my old roommate did not clean out his room or kitchen when he left. my school charged the rest of us $100 because of him.
wow, that is terrible. did you get him to pay you all back?
no, he cut off all communication. nobody liked him anyways, he was dirty and rude.
label: furious
response: well good riddance. if you never want to see scum again, just loan them $20.

situation: i was disappointed with the score i got on my final exam. i really expected more.
dialogue: i was disappointed with the score of my final exam. i studied real hard but got a 64% on it.
i am sorry. it sucks when you put time and effort into studying but the grade is bad. could you get help from your teacher or a study buddy?
yea i had a study group i just panicked when i entered the testing room i think. it is not so bad though, i still passed the class.
label: disappointed
response: well that is good news. i hope you do better on your next test.

situation: i live very far away from my family and i miss them dearly. i feel so alone sometimes.
dialogue: i live very far away from my family and i miss them dearly. i feel so alone sometimes.
aw, i know that must be hard having to take care of yourself so far from loved ones that you can depend on.
yes it is quite hard. but it has been my choice to move away. i guess one day i will return but not sure when.
label: lonely
response: that is good that you are keeping your options open and even better that you challenged yourself to leave comfort and travel.

situation: one time in high school i sat in chocolate sauce at school.
dialogue: one time in high school i sat in chocolate sauce! i did not have a sweater to tie around my waste, so i had to borrow one from a friend.
oh no! that is horrifying in high school! i hope you did not get made fun of.
one of the bully kids noticed the sweater around my waste on the warm day and knew something was up. he really tried to embarrass me.
label: embarrassed
response: kids can be so mean. thank god that is all behind us now!

situation: recently moved into a new dorm and when i entered the kitchen was a total mess. month old pile up of dishes and dried up food on the stove.
dialogue: recently moved to a new dorm and when i came in the kitchen was a total disaster. months old piles of dishes in the sink with mold and dried up old food on the stove.
holy crap! is there not a landlord or something you can complain to?

i can but they take forever to come and clean it up. i just talked to the guy who did it and he said he will not do it again. spent  an hour cleaning it all up with a lot of clorox, alcohol, and soap.
label: disgusted
response: i am glad i never had to live with other people. i would not be as patient as you.

situation: waiting for the final grade report to come in for my classes. i was scared that i was going to fail my organic chem class.
dialogue: when i was waiting for my final grade report to come in. i was scared i was going to fail my organic chem class.
did you pass?
yeah, got a 73% on the class. not ideal but better than failing.
label: anxious
response: absolutely. great job!

situation: i feel faithful towards my diet
dialogue: i have complete faith in my diet. it makes me feel great!
i completely agree, having complete control over your diet is amazing and has a ton of benefits
it is easier to maintain than people realize!
label: faithful
response: yeah, and it can be cost effective if you plan wisely!

situation: driving down the highway during a hevay thunderstorm and a car crash happens in front of me where a car flips over.
dialogue: i was driving down the highway during a heavy thunderstorm and two cars crashed in front of me and one flipped over.
oh my goodness! that is scary! are you alright? did anyone get hurt?
yeah i am alright, i was far enough to steer clear of the chaos. the guy that flipped had to get carried by ambulance, but he did not look very injured. and the other guy was ok.
label: terrified
response: whew! you are lucky! glad to hear everyone was ok.

situation: my dog died in my neighbors electrical fence last night. i am devastated! i do not know what to do.
dialogue: my dog died in my neighbors electrical fence last night. i am devastated! i do not know what to do.
oh no, poor dog i would be devastated too, i love dogs so much.
my heart is broken and i cannot stop crying. i feel so helpless that i could not save her.
label: sad
response: do not beat yourself up over it, it was a very tragic accident but who could've known. he is in a better place now.

situation: my mother-in-law offered to babysit our kids about a month ago.  when the day finally came, she acted like we had never asked her.
dialogue: recently, my wife and i needed a babysitter for the evening, and my mother-in-law offered to watch our kids.
that was nice of her. did everything work out?
no, she forgot.  which, unfortunately, is typical!
label: disgusted
response: oh no! did you guys stillhave a nice evening?

situation: i really like shoes, and i am hoping i can get a pair of yeezy's that are coming out on october.
dialogue: i really enjoy collecting shoes, and i am hoping to get a pair of yeezy's that are restocking this october.
very nice.  how many shoes do you have?
i have around 7 right now
label: hopeful
response: are they all yeezys?

situation: i feel so happy to live out in the country. nature is the most beautiful thing to experience everyday!
dialogue: i feel so happy to live out in the country. nature is the most beautiful thing to experience everyday!
that sounds so nice!  are you very far from grocery stores and stuff?
only about a 30 minute drive. not to close and not to far. but we grow some of our food here and we have cows and chickens too.
label: grateful
response: yeah, that is not too bad at all!  sounds idyllic!

situation: back in highschool when i got my first car, i was so happy to finally drive alone and be free.
dialogue: back in highschool when i got my first car, i was so happy and drove it around for a while and it felt so nice being free to roam.
oh yes.  the first car is amazing
yeah its a great feeling having someone that is yours.
label: joyful
response: yes i remember the freedom that comes with the first car.

situation: i feel anxious when i have to wait for people that are late. why cannot everyone just be on time?
dialogue: i feel anxious when i have to wait for people that are late. why cannot everyone just be on time?
i feel exactly the same way.  people should be more considerate and be on time for the sake of others.
yes totally agree! maybe i should just leave and make them wait. haha
label: annoyed
response: yes, that would certainly give them a taste of their own medicine!

situation: i have been trying to lose some weight and watch my diet.  however, i cannot refuse birthday cake, and ate too much at my dad's party!
dialogue: it is really hard to stay disciplined and watch what you eat.
i agree, it is something i struggle with as well. have you tried an diets you liked?
i have not done anything specific with diets, no.  have you found one that you like?
label: guilty
response: i have tried a few, and i would have to say the one that i liked the most was weight watchers. it is pretty easy to stay on, and the food is usually good. the only big problem is that it gets expensive.

situation: it was my birthday and my whole family threw a party for me after work. it was so unexpected!
dialogue: "it was my birthday and my whole family threw a party for me after work. it was so unexpected!
that is so cool! did they get you anything nice?
they got me a bunch of gift cards to my favorite stores. they are all so wonderful. i love them so much!
label: surprised
response: time to go shoppin!

situation: i missed a lot of work.  it was because i was sick but i do not feel like a team player when i miss work.
dialogue: at the beginning of the year i missed a lot of work.  i was sick but i did not feel like a team player at the time.
aw  i am sorry. are you doing better now?
yeah i am doing much better thanks.  i will for sure be getting a flu shot next year!
label: ashamed
response: that is a good idea. i have not done that in years. i always feel like i barely dodge a bullet by not getting it.

situation: i have to go out of town, i am not looking forward to flying
dialogue: i have to go out of town, i am not looking forward to flying
i feel you, but at least it should be shorter than driving and the odds of a mishap are much lower than regular transportation.
i keep telling myself flying is safe but i am petrified of getting on that plane
label: afraid
response: i see, i think you may consider a tylenol or some type of sleep pill for the flight, to ensure that you do not feel uncomfortable or paranoid during travel.

situation: my father has been such a great father. he is such a hard worker and loves his family so much. he is such a great man.
dialogue: my father has been such a great father. he is such a hard worker and loves his family so much. he is such a great man.
that is awesome. i was always a daddy's boy growing up.
awww, yeah daddy's can be the best! i wish all children could have good daddy's.
label: proud
response: amen. mine was a good man. he taught me a lot of good life lessons.

situation: i have a stuffed animal that my old dog used to lay by.  he is dead now but i still keep that stuffed animal in my room.
dialogue: i have a stuffed animal that my old dog used to lay by/on as a pillow. my dog is dead but i still keep that stuffed animal to remind me of him
i am sorry your dog passed away, i totally understand wanting to keep a momento to remind you of him. was he old when he passed?
he was about 12.  he was my first dog though! he was a sweetheart.  it is nice keeping something to remind me of him.
label: sentimental
response: i am glad you have something that helps keep his memory alive.

situation: i was hoping to get an interview for a position and was told i would at least get that chance.  however, the recruiter did not look at any internal candidates and by the time it was reported they had already hired someone from the outside.
dialogue: i was hoping to get an interview for a higher position and was told i would get that at least.  however, the recruiter did not look at internal candidates and by the time it was reported they had hired someone from the outside.
aw what a sham! did they give any reason why they hired from the outside?
my boss said the recruiter is an idiot and just never looked at internal candidates. it was a bummer but i figure i will look for something else in the company soon
label: devastated
response: well that is a good attitude to have. i do not blame you for being mad. i would be.

situation: i am getting a new car this week! i cannot wait to smell the new leather seats!
dialogue: i am getting a new car this week! i cannot wait to smell the new leather seats!
oh man, that is exciting! do you know what kind?
it is a beautiful 2018 yellow jeep! the car of my dreams! so stoked!
label: excited
response: that is awesome! i love jeeps!  congratulations, that is great news!

situation: a bird fell out of a tree next to my house. i am now the mother and taking care of her. we are developing such a beautiful relationship.
dialogue: a bird fell out of a tree next to my house. i am now the mother and taking care of her. we are developing such a beautiful relationship.
that is so sweet.  what kind of bird is it?
i think it is a love bird. she thinks i am the mother and it is so cool when she walks all over me and comes when i call her. i have never had a pet bird before.
label: faithful
response: aww, i would love to see a video of that.

situation: i met a cow the other day and i went to go pet her. something inside me told me to get away. later that day the owner told me to stay away from her because she is known to attack people.
dialogue: i met a cow the other day and i went to go pet her. something inside me told me to get away. later that day the owner told me to stay away from her because she is known to attack people.
you are lucky the cow did not hurt you.
yes i think so. that probably could have killed me. but i guess it was not my time. i angels saved me.
label: trusting
response: good thing you listened to your gut feeling

situation: i need to go to the grocery store but it is storming outside. not sure if i should go or not.
dialogue: i need to go to the grocery store but it is storming outside. not sure if i should go or not.
hopefully it will stop soon. that is the worst having to get creative with the little food you have on hand.
actually i have no food and i am starving. maybe i should order a pizza. but then the delivery guy will have the same problem.
label: apprehensive
response: well that is what they get paid for. just be sure to tip him well.

situation: i came home yesterday, i found my sofa torn up, let's say this i am not happy with my pet dog
dialogue: i came home yesterday, i found my sofa torn up, let's say this i am not very  happy with my pet dog
uh oh. i bet he knew he was in trouble. did you get him a crate?
i was on the verge of something more serious and probably would have regret it
label: furious
response: yeah, i am glad you did not do anything you would regret. i hope he is better for you in the future.

situation: i am so hurt that my baby goat died. my dogs were playing to rough and killer her. man i should have stopped it sooner. it is all my fault.
dialogue: i am so hurt that my baby goat died. my dogs were playing to rough and killer her. man i should have stopped it sooner. it is all my fault.
oh no! i am so sorry about that. do not blame yourself, animals like to play with each other!
yes but i think i could have avoided it. i am training my dogs now to stay away from the goats. i hope it does not happen again.
label: devastated
response: that sounds like a good plan. you definitely do not want that to happen again. sometimes bad things happen in order for us to learn and avoid it again.

situation: i went fishing with my son a month ago, and did not know how he'd do.  he caught 4 fish and was really excited!
dialogue: i went fishing with my 4 year-old about a month ago.
that sounds great, i can remeber going fishing with my dad at that age. did your 4 year-old have a good time?
he did!  he caught 4 fish all by himself.
label: joyful
response: wow, that is impressive! i am glad he had a good time.

situation: my dog was stung by a bug.  his lip got huge.  it looked pretty funny but i felt so bad for him!
dialogue: my dog was stung by a bug.  his lip got huge and looked really funny but i felt terrible for him!
poor doggy! did you have to take him to the vet?
i did end up taking him in. luckily it was not too serious and he was fine a couple days later.  he looked so sad with his big lip!
label: caring
response: i bet he did, i am glad he is okay though.

situation: my best friend friend helped me through some rough spots with my marriage and job. i am gland he was there for me
dialogue: my best friend friend helped me through some rough spots with my marriage and job. i am gland he was there for me
that is really nice you have a friend like that.that is hard to come by. i hope everything is better for you now.
thank you, i do not know how i will repay him back, i will always be in his debt
label: grateful
response: i am sure he does not expect it but that is a really nice thing he did.

situation: i feel so bad to see so many homeless people on the streets these days. i hope i am never homeless.
dialogue: i feel so bad to see so many homeless people on the streets these days. i hope i am never homeless.
i hope you are not and i am not too! it would be rough living on the streets.
yeah especially when it is snowing outside. can you just imagine having to sleep outside like that . oh! so sad!
label: sentimental
response: it would be terrible in the winter.  i cannot imagine sleeping outside when its freezing

situation: i went out to eat at a new place with my girlfriend last weekend. it was awesome and the food was great.
dialogue: i went out to eat with my girlfriend last week.  it was an awesome atmosphere and the food was great!
that sounds fun! where did you go?
we went to a greek place.  there were belly dancers and a ton of good meats and appetizers. i think we'll check it out again this weekend since it was so fun!
label: content
response: mmmmm, i love greek food! that sounds appetizing! i think i will take my girl there too this week!

situation: as i walk through my house, the rooms are empty, there is no one there for me
dialogue: as i walk through my house, the rooms are empty, there is no one there for me
i am so sorry you feel that way. maybe you should talk to someone you trust. a family member or a friend.
that is the problem there is no one i can talk to or share with
label: lonely
response: i am sorry. you could seek out a professional to talk to. or you could just try meeting some new people.

situation: i have no children but i have a ton of animals. i love them all so much. they are my children.
dialogue: i have no children but i have a ton of animals. i love them all so much. they are my children.
what kinds of pets do you have?
i have chickens, ducks, parrots, cockatiels, budgies, peacocks, guinea pigs, dogs, goats and cows. haha
label: caring
response: oh wow! you did say a ton! i love animals too. wish i lived somewhere i could have more.

situation: when my son was born, i was pretty worried.  we knew that something was not quite right, so we were not sure what to expect.
dialogue: when my son was born, we knew that something was up before he came out.  it was pretty scary.
did he have superpowers?
hah no.  but he did have the cord wrapped around his neck twice, and he'd tied an overhand knot in it, too.
label: afraid
response: that is pretty impressive.

situation: i was in a rush this morning and i dressed my self in stained clothes. i feel so dirty today.
dialogue: i was in a rush this morning and i dressed my self in stained clothes. i feel so dirty today.
oh wow, are you going to be in front of anyone important?
not today. i just feel insecure about it, like everyone is looking at me. it is probably just all in my head.
label: embarrassed
response: usually, you are the one who notices it the most.

situation: my cows are finally pregnant. i cannot wait for my baby calves to be born!
dialogue: my cows are finally pregnant. i cannot wait for my baby calves to be born!
wow, that must be an interesting thing to be involved with. lots of milk too, i presume.
oh, yes! fresh raw milk is so wonderful and one of the best foods we can eat.
label: anticipating
response: very cool, wish i could get into something like that. sounds fun

situation: i miss my old pet dog, i feel so empty without her around
dialogue: i miss my old pet dog, i feel so empty without her around
awww, i understand. dogs are sooo great to be around and they are super friendly.
i know that what makes it harder not having her around, no companionship
label: sad
response: maybe also looking into getting a new dog, i know it is hard, but you can get through it! your friends and family are always there as well.

situation: i am so envious of those that can travel the world and get paid for it.
dialogue: i am so envious of those that can travel the world and get paid for it.
that sounds like such an enjoyable life. if only it was so easy!
yeah, maybe in my next life i guess, haha.
label: jealous
response: haha, that is true. but we have to make the most of this one.

situation: when i was in high school there was a senior i had a crush on..i was a sophomore. i ended up asking her out and got rejected but later in college we actually became pretty good friends.
dialogue: when i was in high school there was a senior i had a crush on and i was a sophomore.  i ended up asking her out but got rejected. later on in college we actually became pretty good friends.
oh man heart breaker. that is good yall are friends though. you never know maybe one day yall will be married
haha, i hope not.my current girlfriend would probably be a little upset! she is a nice person (the one from high school) but i do not think i could ever marry her
label: embarrassed
response: you do not still have any feelings at all for her?

situation: i am learning how sew my own clothes. i am studying hard and i think i will be able to make my first outfit!
dialogue: i am learning how sew my own clothes. i am studying hard and i think i will be able to make my first outfit!
ooh, i have always wanted to learn how to do that. you must be so excited!
yes, i have so many ideas! how cool it would be to not have to buy any more expensive clothes and make my own!
label: confident
response: omg, that would be awesome. i might just have to learn how to do that myself.

situation: i just made a huge feast and now i am excited for all my guests to arrive to my baby shower!
dialogue: i just made a huge feast and now i am excited for all my guests to arrive to my baby shower!
ooo! that is exciting! congrats on your baby! i hope your guests enjoy their time.
thank you! i have so many fun games planned and lots of great food.
label: prepared
response: yay! that sounds like so much fun. baby showers are a great way to bring everyone together.

situation: i trust my own intuitions when it comes to my health.
dialogue: i trust the way my body feels to know if i am generally healthy or not
usually it will let you know if something is wrong. part of how we are designed!
exactly! the human body is interesting!
label: trusting
response: it is, everything has to be balanced just right, or else we feel it.

situation: i went to a restaurant and after i got the bill i realized that i did not have my wallet on me! the manager was yelling at me demanding me to pay before i left.
dialogue: i went to a restaurant and after i got the bill i realized that i did not have my wallet on me! the manager was yelling at me demanding me to pay before i left.
oh no, how did you make things right with the manager. i am sure he is just wanting to get paid.
yes, he did want to get paid but i needed to go home and get my wallet. he got angry with me but what could i do? i had no money with me.
label: furious
response: that is a tough spot to be in, maybe you could of washed dishes for him. or give him your phone for collateral.

situation: i really wanted an oculus rift.  i saved up enough and had to wait about a week before the store got them in stock.
dialogue: i really wanted an oculus rift.  i saved up enough and had to wait about a week before it was in stock at the store
oh man i want that too! did you get it?
i did!  it is by far the coolest thing i have ever bought!
label: anticipating
response: do you use your computer?

situation: i was recently helping my dad with some stuff, and we had to move some heavy things.  he was able to keep up with me pretty well.
dialogue: i had to help my dad move some heavy stuff around this past weekend.
moving, is always such a pain. did it go smoothly at least?
yeah.  he kept up with me pretty well.
label: impressed
response: that is good, glad he was not having too tough a time.

situation: my neighbor dog is always barking, i cannot stand it
dialogue: my neighbor dog is always barking, i cannot stand it
oh man, i cannot stand barking dogs. i wish owners would do something to shut them up.
i know the worst part is my bedroom is near the fence and the dog barks all night
label: annoyed
response: that can make it so hard to sleep at night.

situation: when i was a little girl my favorite childhood character was strawberry shortcake. i miss those days smelling my little figurines that smelled like strawberries.
dialogue: when i was a little girl my favorite childhood character was strawberry shortcake. i miss those days smelling my little figurines that smelled like strawberries.
aw man, childhood is full of good memories! i love the smell of strawberries.
yeah, i also remember having my strawberry shortcake themed birthday party. there were strawberries everywhere! i bet you could guess what flavor the cake and ice cream were,.
label: nostalgic
response: haha, clearly strawberry. sounds like you had an enjoyable childhood!

situation: my neighbor dog barks all day, i like to go over there and tell him where he can put that dog at,
dialogue: my neighbor dog barks all day, i like to go over there and tell him where he can put that dog at,
your neighbor does not do anything about his dogs?
that is the problem, he does nothing, except give me his little mustache smile, one of these days i will wipe that smile off his face
label: angry
response: if it were me, i would call the animal shelter and report possible abuse since the dog does nothing but bark all day poor thing just needs attention and the owner is not taking care of it.

situation: i feel so sad to see the world in the state that it is in but i am confident that times are changing and humanity is actually good.
dialogue: i feel so sad to see the world in the state that it is in but i am confident that times are changing and humanity is actually good.
really depends on the person i think. you cannot have good people without bad people.
yes that is true. the ying and the yang. but i think most people are good though.
label: hopeful
response: agreed!

situation: i had an awesome childhood. i think about it consistently.
dialogue: my childhood was great. i have mainly positive memories of it.
you are very lucky my friend. there are so many children out there that cannot say the same, sadly. but so happy for you!
yeah life ends up pretty dark for tons of people. it is slightly absurd when you think far into it!
label: sentimental
response: i guess it all comes down to karma, if you believe in that stuff... i do.

situation: my wife watched the kids a couple of nights ago so that i could get some projects done.  she'd spent all day with them, so i was very appreciative that she kept them occupied.
dialogue: i decided to try and get some projects knocked out a couple of nights ago, but needed to keep my kids occupied.
what did you end up doing?
luckily, my wife was willing to keep them busy.  even after she had a crazy day!
label: grateful
response: it is good to have a partner.

situation: i came home from work the other night, and my wife had taken to her mother's.  i was not in trouble or anything, but the house felt very empty.
dialogue: my wife took the kids over to her mother's one evening before i got home from work.  i thought it'd be pretty nice to have a quiet house for once.
i have a son, it is definitely nice to have some peace and quiet.
it was for a while, but it was too quiet for me!  i have gotten used to the noise.
label: lonely
response: you must have been very happy when they returned home.

situation: i was recently hoping to get a promotion.  they gave it to someone else.
dialogue: i tried for a promotion at work recently.  it is been a while since i have gotten a raise, so i worked pretty hard at it.
did you get it?
no, they ended up giving it to someone with less experience.
label: sad
response: that is disappointing. i feel sorry for you.

situation: i went to the casino with my brother and all i could do was lose.  the only thing he could do was win.  i was happy for him but i wish i could have joined in the winning a little bit.
dialogue: i went to the casino with my brother and the only thing he could do was win! the only thing i could do was lose.
that sounds like a bummer. hopefully, you did not lose too much.
nope, i am a little careful when i go out there.  it would have been nice to join in on the winning though!
label: jealous
response: yeah, but it is a good thing to hear you did not lose too much. some people put all the money on the line.

situation: i interviewed for a job.  i know i gave great answers to their questions and walked away feeling like i had the job.
dialogue: i interviewed for a job.  i know i gave great answers to their questions and walked away feeling like the job was mine.
hey, that is awesome! i hope you get it. when do you hear?
probably next week sometime. i am really excited!
label: confident
response: well i hope you do. what kind of job is it?

situation: i work in tech support and we often have complicated issues.  there was one recently where they needed to move data but i did some research before it happened and knew exactly what i needed to do to get the data over.
dialogue: i work in tech support.  one issue i was given the details before and got to do research before i worked with the customer.  it was great knowing what to do before it happened.
you must have been relieved you were able to help. did all go as plan?
yeah! i pretty much knew all the steps that i needed to do before everything started and there were not any surprise issues which was awesome.
label: prepared
response: that is awesome! i am glad it went through without a hitch!

situation: my girlfriend just got promoted at her job. i am really glad for her.
dialogue: my girlfriend just got promoted at her job. i am really glad for her.
oh, that is terrific! what a great feeling that is, to be appreciated and valued!
i knew she could and would get the promotion, i feel like i am going to burst
label: proud
response: oh, i love that you are so happy for her! you sound like such a supportive and loving partner!

situation: my girlfriend and i have been working hard on potty training the dog.  she has been doing great but last night she pooped in the house.
dialogue: i have been working on potty training my dog and she has been doing great! last night though she went a ton in the house right after i brought her out.
i also have two older puppies, training takes time and care and love.
it definitely does!  i have one older puppy that i got through potty training.  this one is just taking a little extra time.
label: furious
response: puppies are smart believe it or not, use treats and do not yell or punish for their mistakes. a change of tone and placing them outside works really well.

situation: i was packing up things from my girlfriends house and found her son's lite brite.  it reminded me of my childhood and playing with mine.
dialogue: i was packing up things to move from my girlfriends house and found her son's lite brite.  it reminded me of my childhood and playing with that toy.
i remember the lite brite toy. it was a nice toy to have.
it really was! the toys back then seemed to have lasted a lot longer than the toys now too!
label: nostalgic
response: i agree, the toys now days are made cheaply and of poor quality. everything is about video games.

situation: i had a move a couple weekends ago.  i was really planning on getting everyone done in one weekend.
dialogue: i had a move a couple weekends ago.  i was really planning on getting everything done, or at least moved over, in one weekend.
moving can be stressful for sure, hopefully you had some help?
yeah, the help was great and we did end up getting everything over.  now the fun part is unpacking the boxes!
label: hopeful
response: it is like christmas! only you already know whats in the boxes. the best part about moving is you can have a fresh start on organization.

situation: i had a great weekend with my son.  we did a ton of fun things but at the end of the weekend his attitude changed and he did not want to listen at all.
dialogue: i had a great weekend with my son, we did a ton of fun things.  at the end of the weekend his attitude changed and he did not want to listen at all.
that is not good!  what did you do to try to get him to listen again?
i made a deal that if he went to bed he would get tablet time the next day and if he did not then he would not get any time
label: disappointed
response: i bet that worked!

situation: my dog went number 2 in the house in the middle of the night and ate some of it.  the next morning it threw up everything and it was the worst smelling thing i think i have ever smelled.
dialogue: my dog went number 2 in the middle of the night inside.  the next morning she threw up everything.it was the worst smelling pile of stuff i have ever smelled.
oh man, i am about to eat dinner over here! that is pretty gross. my cat pukes up stuff all the time so i can kind of relate.
sorry about that! yeah, it was a terrible thing to wake up to!
label: disgusted
response: i bet, hope the dog is feeling better though.

situation: i used to have a boxer puppy that was so sweet and adorable.  however,   he was young and during the potty training stage he would poop on the floor and then eat it.  i could smell it but not see it anywhere.
dialogue: i used to have a boxer puppy that was so sweet and adorable.  however he had on issue that i could not stand.
interesting, what was the issue?

well when he was during the potty training stage he would often poop on the floor.   however he would then eat it!   i could smell it but not find it anywhere.   he would come running into the living room wanting to lick you on the face with poop breath!
label: disgusted
response: oh man, that is an issue, i hope he grows out of it

situation: next week my vacation starts. i am really looking forward to it
dialogue: next week my vacation starts. i am really looking forward to it
i bet you cannot wait.  where are going for your vacation?
i always wanted to visit miami, i cannot wait to visit the beach and take in all  the fun
label: excited
response: miami sounds like a great place to go for a vacation.   i wish i was going with you!

situation: at work today, a lady was outright belligerent.  she would not leave me alone!
dialogue: one of my coworkers was outright belligerent today.
that sucks! what were they upset about?
i do not even know!  she does that sometimes, and just badgers you.  i cannot figure out what fires her up.
label: annoyed
response: it sounds like a very challenging environment to work in.

situation: my girlfriend is moving in.  i was pretty calm when we first started talking about it.  now i am excited but there is so much to pack up!
dialogue: my girlfriend is moving in.  i was pretty calm when we first started talking about it.  i am really excited but there is so much to pack up!
that is exciting! when will she be moving in?
in 2 weeks.  it will come up fast, i think that is why i am starting to get a little more nervous.  its not even her, its just the move that will not be fun
label: anxious
response: does she live far away?

situation: we are working on building a house, and keep running into delays.  the guy at the city is completely unhelpful!
dialogue: my wife and i are trying to build a house, and keep running into delays getting the permits.
that sounds very frustrating.
it is!  the guy at the city could care less if he helps us out.
label: angry
response: hopefully you will able to get it all sorted out soon.  i am sure when it is done it will be a beautiful house.

situation: i was home alone and playing a creepy vr game.  it was not really expected to take that creepy of a turn.
dialogue: i was home alone last night playing a vr game.  it took a really creepy turn that i really was not expecting at all.
what happened?

it was a duck hunting game and all of a sudden the dog from the game killed my mom and started coming after me.  i do not know if you've ever tried vr but everything feels so real.  it was pretty scary
label: terrified
response: i have never tried vr, but just imagining that is scaring me away from it.

situation: a job i applied and interview for a couple of months ago offered me the job. it was unexpected.
dialogue: a job i applied and interview for a couple of months ago offered me the job. it was unexpected.
congrats!  how exciting for you.
thank you, when they called, i did not know who it was at first, then it was, wow i got the job
label: surprised
response: that is a long time to hold out hope.  i bet you were shocked.

situation: my husband has been having a hard time finding a job recently. he is been in the final two candidates three times but no luck. he is got another interview on thursday and i just know that he will get it!
dialogue: my husband, i think you've met him, he is been having a hard time finding a job recently. he is been in the final two candidates three times but no luck!
it always takes time. hang in there it will all work out.
well, he is got another interview on thursday. i just know he will get that one!
label: faithful
response: i bet so too!  good luck to you both.

situation: i had to take my brother's advice
dialogue: i needed help with choosing a subject to major and my brother helped
what subject did you choose?
i chose finance and economics
label: trusting
response: nice choice. i guess you have good relationship with your brother.

situation: the officer yelled at the old lady
dialogue: i felt ashamed seeing the police officer yelling at the old lady
why was the officer yelling at her?
she was trying to cross the road and accidentally had her phone fall, the officer thought she was insane
label: ashamed
response: wow, that is unfortunate. i would feel embarrassed for the lady

situation: i have been sick for a week now
dialogue: my mother has been a caring mom since i got ill a week ago
that is so wonderful. i love being cared for when i am ill.
yah, i feel loved so much
label: caring
response: it is an amazing thing to have a loving mother. everyone should show more appreciation to their moms.

situation: the other night i had to walk home alone late from work, i was nervous.
dialogue: i had to walk home from work last night after i got off late at night, it was kind of scary.
sorry about that, you could have taken a taxi
it was a short enough walk, i just stayed aware of my surroundings and got home safe.
label: apprehensive
response: good enough you got home safe

situation: i went through my childhood photos and items i was kind of emotional and nostalgic.
dialogue: today i was looking through my childhood photos and writings, it made me a little emotional and nostalgic.
did you have a good childhood? you must miss a lot of things.
i think i had a good childhood. i love that i have many photos that i ca look back on.
label: sentimental
response: yes. nostalgia is unavoidable when we look back on our youth.

situation: last week i missed class because i was hungover, i needed to attend that class to pass. i failed.
dialogue: i slept through a really important class because i was hungover and i failed because of it. i should've behaved better.
that is unfortunate. but at least you learned from the experience, right?
i sure did. i am just embarrassed that i did that, i am not usually that way. it was out of character for me.
label: ashamed
response: no need to feel ashamed. we all make mistakes and at least you learned your lesson.

situation: i had to take care of my little brother while he was sick.
dialogue: i had to care for my younger brother last week while he was sick. i tried my best to make him as comfortable as possible.
that is nice that you helped him. i am sure he appreciated it!
he did, he is nice and well now. i just know how horrible it is to be sick, it helps to have someone to care for you.
label: caring
response: yes, it really does. i am sure if you get sick, he will remember and do the same for you!

situation: i was in an accident on my way home from work where someone cut me off and it made me slam into another car that in turn slammed into me and i was so mad
dialogue: i once got in a really bad accident on my way home from work and it really upset me
wow! were you hurt? was anyone else hurt?
luckily the only problem i had was my neck was sore for a few weeks but nobody else was hurt
label: furious
response: that is good news at least. i hope you are feeling better now. and do not be hard on yourself, accidents happen.

situation: my child just recently started school. i have been home with him since he was born.  it was hard for me to be okay with someone else taking care of him and doing what was best for him. i am there now and i feel 100% comfortable with him going.
dialogue: hi! i had a great day with my emotions with my child going to school!
oh that is great, its awesome when the kids go off to school each year.
yes this is m child's first year and it was pretty difficult for me to let someone take care of him instead of me. you know how it is! parent life.
label: trusting
response: you will get used to it and begin to appreciate your quiet time, haha.

situation: i was at wal-mart the other night and a man came up to ask me for gas money! i was a bit guarded because he exited a vehicle that had two other men in it staring.   it was weird.
dialogue: i just had a weird experience at wal-mart today!
wal-mart is a place where weirdness always happens. can you tell me what happened, i am dying to know!
well, i was parked pretty close and a guy came up to ask me for gas money!  there was a gas station a small walk away though!
label: apprehensive
response: do you think he was panhandling you for money or a person who really needed it? did you give him money?

situation: i was outside a store in a super cute dress.  i did not realize it would be windy and my dress blew up in front of everyone! including kids! i have never felt so embarrassed and like a horrible person. i have not worn a dress since.
dialogue: i am going to cut to the chase here. just blurt it on. my dress blew up in front of parents and children the other day when it was windy.
that must have been a very windy day!
i wanted to run and hide.  i have not' worn a dress since.
label: ashamed
response: i bet it will teach you.

situation: i felt very good last year when i started going to church again
dialogue: i felt great last year when i started going to church again
i go to church every sunday i love it.
yeah its a great feeling getting back into church !
label: faithful
response: the people you can meet are super.

situation: i felt very happy when a lady offered to pay for my gas when i could not find my wallet
dialogue: i felt very grateful last week when an elderly women paid for my gas
that
yeah its nice when people do kind things like this it does not happen very often now day
label: trusting
response: that is really not thing. i wish more people would do such nice thing. i know that made your day.

situation: when i lived on my own, i found it hard without having any company
dialogue: when i lived on my own, i found it hard without having any company
so you do not like to be alone. i am so sorry that affects you. so what would you do?
i was used to having family or friends around most of the time in my old place, but then i moved away. i had to make new friends which i found very difficult
label: lonely
response: yes, usually when one relocates it is hard to make new friends, but eventually it will happen.

situation: i received interesting gifts on my birthday
dialogue: i love the gifts that i received last week on my birthday
happy birthday. what was your favorite gift?
a pair of shoe
label: content
response: nice. what brand of shoes were they?

situation: i felt a bit sad when i saw an elderly man drop his wallet and a kit picked the wallet up and did not give it back to the man
dialogue: i felt a bit sad last week when i saw an elderly man drop his wallet and a kid picked it up and did not give it back to the man
that is terrible. were you able to identify the kid?
yeah eventually the kid was caught i told the man and he caught him shortly after
label: ashamed
response: i am glad he was able to catch him.
