situation: i was absolutely so sad when i found out that paul walker died. i loved him in the fast & furious movies. i recently saw a trailer for a movie about his life which brought back all the sadness i felt when i found out all those years ago!
dialogue: i saw the movie trailer about paul walker's life today. it made me so sad!
wow, how was it? i have never seen that trailer.
it was just sad. i love paul walker and his movies. i still remember hearing about him passing away in the same way he became famous. in a fast car.
label: devastated
response: aww, that is so sad to hear. he must have made some great movies!

situation: i met my nephew's daughter the other day. i am much of a fan of babies, but she was so sweet.  she adored me.  i felt my heart warm up a little bit being around her.
dialogue: speaking of babies, i got to meet my nephews yesterday!
are they twins?!
yes!  they are so sweet. i do not even like kids and i really felt my heart warm up to them.
label: caring
response: awww! twins seem like a handful but also very exciting at the same time!

situation: the other day i was with my husband shopping.  we were having a great time.until he passed gas. it was so loud. and it actually smelled horrible.  people were staring at us! he did not care, but oh man. i wanted to run and hide.
dialogue: the other day something happened that made me want to run and hide.
oh, i am sorry. what happened?
it did not happen to me directly, but my husband passed gas while we were shopping. everyone was staring.
label: embarrassed
response: i can imagine that you did want to run and hide. sometimes husbands get us into all kinds of situations.

situation: my girlfriend and i were watching a series on netflix. she was not home and i ended up watching a couple episodes ahead of where we were at.
dialogue: my girlfriend and i were watching a series on netflix.  she was not home and i ended up watching a couple episodes ahead of where we were at.
i have been in that situation before. did she find out about it?
she did not say anything but i think she knew.  i mean, i still watched the episodes that she missed with her!
label: guilty
response: well that is all that matters. if she was okay with it. i am sure she was happy watching the episodes with you, even if you had already watched them.

situation: i moved last weekend.  i was really happy once all the boxes were finally moved over and it was all done.
dialogue: i moved last weekend.  i was really happy once everything was done and it went smoothly.
that sounds like a bit of work. are you adjusting to your place now?
yeah, unpacking and all that fun stuff now.  i really like the new place though.
label: joyful
response: that is what is most important. i am glad everything has gone well.

situation: i was envious that my husband got to go to a basketball game and i did not. i am always having to stay home with the kid and i feel like i always get left out of stuff.
dialogue: i am not in a good mood! my husband got to go to a basketball game. i wish i could have too!
oh, i am sorry. why did not you get to go with him?
i have to stay home with our son.  it is hard for us to find a baby sitter for him.
label: jealous
response: oh, that is too bad. i know exactly how you feel. hopefully your husband will watch your son another night so you can go have some fun.

situation: i went to a wedding the other night.  i had on a beautiful fake tan, new dress, and some cute heels. i felt so amazing. it is been a long time since i felt like i was not a slob.
dialogue: i went to a friend's wedding this weekend!
was it a lot of fun?
oh gosh yes. i wore a beautiful dress. i felt so pretty!
label: confident
response: that is great, but you do not have to wear a fancy dress to be beautiful. i am sure you are gorgeous no matter what you wear!

situation: it is nice to have a loving pet , my dog is always there for me
dialogue: it is nice to have a loving pet , my dog is always there for me
what a great feeling! you must love your dog.
i really do, no matter what happens, she will always be by my side
label: faithful
response: she sounds like a great companion.

situation: i started graduate classes today. i have all my binders ready with paper in them.  i also bought some really cute monthly calendars to put in them so i can write down when everything is due. i am ready!
dialogue: hello! i started my graduate classes today.
are you looking forward to it?
yes. i have all my binders ready with paper and a calendar to keep track of stuff.  i am nervous but ready!
label: prepared
response: exciting! i am sure you will do fine.

situation: my doctor did not see in my prescription right!! i needed my medicine a week ago, but they kept messing it up.  i was so angry. i could not see stragiht.
dialogue: i really need to change doctors!
why is that?
he keeps screwing up my prescription!  i have needed it for a week now but they keep sending it to the wrong place or use the wrong name
label: furious
response: wow, that is no good. i hope they get it worked out soon.

situation: i was playing a vr game home alone.  it took a really creepy turn.
dialogue: i was playing a vr game home alone.  it took a really creepy turn towards the end of the game.
i cannot play those kinds of games. too spooky for me.
it did not start off scary but out of nowhere everyone around me was dying and i was home alone with a killer outside the house.  it all just feels so real in vr too.
label: afraid
response: that would keep me up at night.

situation: yesterday i ate a whole big bag of m&ms, i do not feel proud of myself
dialogue: yesterday i ate a whole big bag of m&ms, i do not feel proud of myself
oh my gosh that is insane. well, i am sure you will be able to control your impulses in the future.
i hope so, i was doing so well on my diet but i feel like i failed
label: ashamed
response: i have been there before too. the important thing to remember is that there is always another chance to make it right tomorrow.

situation: we recently got a new puppy. my older dog waits his turn and knows the puppy should go outside to the bathroom first.
dialogue: we recently got a new puppy. my older dog waits his turn and knows the puppy should go outside to the bathroom first.
aww, sounds like he is teaching the puppy. that is so sweet.
it is pretty awesome!  i am impressed that he knows he does not need to be first and the puppy should have priority.
label: impressed
response: yeah, sounds like a pretty smart pup.

situation: my son finally used the toilet by himself last night.  we need to work on his toilet paper usage, though.
dialogue: we have been really struggling with potty training my son.
i do understand, i have a son myself. you just need to be patient and continue trying.
thanks, we are.  he did finally go #2 in the toilet by himself last night, though!
label: proud
response: that is awesome. i am proud of him

situation: i went out with some friends a couple weekends ago and we met a group of girls. one asked for my number but i told her i have a girlfriend and did not give it out.
dialogue: i went out with some friends a couple weekends ago and we met a group of girls. one asked for my number but i told her i have a girlfriend and did not give it out.
gotta risk it for the biscuit
haha, i do not think i could do that to my girlfriend.  i like her too much for a random chick.
label: faithful
response: i feel ya but sometimes temptation is good gets the heart pumping

situation: i have a presentation due this week, i am not looking forward to presenting it in front of others
dialogue: i have a presentation due this week, i am not looking forward to presenting it in front of others
it can be nerve wrecking. i am sure you will do fine, though! have confidence!
i feel like i know the material but i am not sure if i can pull it off in front of others
label: apprehensive
response: you know they say, imagine them in their underwear..i wonder that really works. i am not fond of public speaking either.

situation: i felt very bad when my boss did not approve of my work. it just makes me more motivated to work harder.
dialogue: i felt very bad when my boss did not approve of my work. it just makes me more motivated to work harder.
did you spend a lot of the time on the project?
yes, i feel like i worked really hard and i put in so many hours. i guess it was not good enough.
label: disappointed
response: i would not get discouraged.  maybe talk to your boss and see what you can improve on next time.  i am sure, at least if you have a good boss, they will want you to succeed and guide you in how to do better.

situation: my roommate moved out and soon my girlfriend will move in but right now it is just me in the house.  i do not remember the last time i lived without any roommates.
dialogue: my roommate moved out and soon my girlfriend will move in but right now it is just me in the house. i do not remember the last time i lived without any roommates.
nice! enjoy it! i like living alone. it is so peaceful! i get lonely somtimes but for the most part it is great!
it does feel a little lonely.  it is weird coming home and not really having someone to talk to in person.
label: lonely
response: yeah, but they are all just a phone call away. keep your head up, your girlfriend will be there soon!

situation: i feel so happy when the sunsets are beautiful and i can take the time to watch and relax. it is the best time of the day for me.
dialogue: i feel so happy when the sunsets are beautiful and i can take the time to watch and relax. it is the best time of the day for me.
oh i know, mine too! i love how all the colors change with the setting sun.
yeah, it is such a good time to reflect and meditate on life and stop to enjoy the beauty of this world.
label: content
response: it reminds you of how beautiful life is.

situation: the new guys at work were talking so harshly about my boss.  it was really heartbreaking.  i kept my mouth shut and stayed loyal to him though.
dialogue: man the new guys at work were slandering our boss so bad.
wow, that is rude! he will not last long.
i know right?  i made sure to keep my mouth shut and not add on to what they were saying or doing.
label: faithful
response: yeah, some nerve on that guy. he should be grateful to have a job!

situation: my sister is having another baby! i cannot wait to meet her! this will be her fourth child.
dialogue: my sister is having another baby! i cannot wait to meet her! this will be her fourth child.
oh wow! congrats! how exciting! how far along is she?
only one more month to go. she is about the explode though! glad it is her and not me,.
label: anxious
response: lol right! it is way too hot to be pregnant right now!

situation: there was a random dog in my yard the other day.  i was a bit nervous to get too close to it even though it seemed friendly.
dialogue: there was a random dog in my yard yesterday morning.  he did not look mean but i was not sure i wanted to mess with him.
i have been in that situation before!  it can be scary
it was!  i did not want to chase him off either.  thankfully he just kind of wandered away.
label: apprehensive
response: i am glad it worked out in the end!  i wish people would be more careful with their dogs.

situation: i bought something from the store and the lady gave me the wrong change. she gave me too much change actually. i did not realize until later after i left the store.
dialogue: i bought something from the store and the lady gave me the wrong change. she gave me too much change actually. i did not realize until later after i left the store.
oh, no. did you take it back or keep it
i have not had time to go back yet but i will for sure. i feel bad like as if i did something wrong. i better check my change from now on.
label: ashamed
response: the store might not take it back at this point if it has been to long.

situation: i was riding down the road the other day and passed by a few mimosa trees. the little pink flowers made me think of my childhood house and made me miss my grandmother.
dialogue: so i was driving down the road the other day and passed that stretch of road that has all those mimosa trees.  they were in bloom and man did they stir up some emotions.
that sounds beautiful! what emotions did they bring out of you?
my grandmother kept those trees at our old house.  they super made me miss her and when we used to sit outside on her porch.
label: sentimental
response: i am sorry! what a lovely memory to have of her though. it is good to still have things in your life that remind you of her.

situation: i lost the ring my best friend gave me before he moved out of country.  he had it made just for me and i am just absolutely heartbroken over it.
dialogue: so i lost the ring that my best friend gave me when he moved out of country.  we had matching ones made and it is really breaking my heart.
oh no! that is so sad. i am so sorry, i know you must feel like crap.
it is strange sometimes how we get so attached to material things like this.  i know i really should not but it feels like a piece of me is gone.
label: devastated
response: i understand completely. i have things of my grandfather's that i can never replace.

situation: we recently went on vacation, and we were the only ones on the water one of the days.  we could really fly around the lake and enjoy ourselves!
dialogue: we had a pretty fun family vacation about a month ago.
sweet! where did you go?
we went to a lake not far from here.  we had a ton of fun on the boat . . . nobody else was on the water one of the days!
label: excited
response: that would be awesome to have the whole lake to yourself! my guess is the weather was nice too if you guys got to use the boat most days!

situation: i work in tech support and customers often get mad because they are trying to do something our software cannot do.  they then demand i fix it.
dialogue: i work in tech support.  every once in a while a customer will want our software to do something it either cannot or is not built for.
i have had similar experiences.  what do you end up doing?
i write up feedback for development. it just gets frustrating when they start to demand that i fix it.  i might be good at my job but not good enough to do a code change on the fly.
label: annoyed
response: have you ever had a positive experience from that cycle?

situation: i had to take my dog to the vet yesterday and i had full confidence they would take care of his problems. they are so good there.
dialogue: i had to take my dog to the vet yesterday and i had full confidence they would take care of his problems. they are so good there.
oh no! hope all is well with your dog.
thank you. other than an allergic reaction and a subsequent skin infection all is well. just a couple weeks of meds and a change in diet needed.
label: trusting
response: good to read. always great to find a vet you can trust. looks like you did.

situation: we went out to dinner the other night.  i was expecting it to be awful but it turned out to be okay.  nothing super special or exciting but just okay.
dialogue: so we went out to that new bbq place to eat the other night.
bbq sounds so good right now! how was it?
it was not bad.  it was not earth shattering good either.  everything just weirdly seemed okay.  it was a bit strange.
label: content
response: well that is kind of disappointing. it is always a let down when you go out and it is not is good as you were hoping.

situation: i had a meeting this morning, which is typically pointless. however, they actually followed the agenda and had some meaningful conversations.
dialogue: i really loathe meetings.  they are usually so pointless.
i completely agree. though, i am remote so i am never sitting in the same room as others so i can distract myself ;)
that must be nice . . . i am in person.  however, i actually had a productive meeting this morning.  how novel that was!
label: surprised
response: lol. it kinda is. i moved about 3 hours south of my office a few years ago and since even at the office my work involves connecting to remote data centers it hasn't changed my job any.

situation: i was at the grocery store yesterday and i kept sneezing.  i thought walking through the garden section must have irritated my nose or something.  next thing i know i look down and my nose is bleeding like crazy!
dialogue: oh man.  i was at the store yesterday and my nose just started bleeding like crazy!
that is terrible! what did you do?
i had to bolt out of the store!  i have never been so embarrassed.  lucky for me i had a napkin in my purse so i did not get it everywhere.
label: embarrassed
response: that is good. i am glad your alright.

situation: once in kindergarten, a pair of my underwear got stuck in my shirt and fell out in the middle of the classroom
dialogue: once in kindergarten, a pair of my underwear got stuck in my shirt and fell out in the middle of the classroom.
oh no! that is so sad. you must've been so upset.
i was! i thought i was going to get in trouble
label: embarrassed
response: hopefully you did not and hopefully the other kids did not make fun of you

situation: the other day i was looking at old pictures of a car i use to own. i miss that car.
dialogue: the other day i was looking at old pictures of a car i use to own. i miss that car.
what kind of car was it?
i was an old cadillac, reason i miss it, lot of memories of family and friends riding in it
label: sentimental
response: oh i bet! my husband wants an older car when we can afford it

situation: i just lost my pet dog. i do not know what to do.
dialogue: i just lost my pet dog. i do not know what to do.
oh no! i would be devastated. did he pass, or missing?
i cannot find her anywhere, she is missing, it feels like i have a part of me missing
label: devastated
response: i am so sorry. i am sure you are. i would be devastated if i was in your shoes. does she have a chip? maybe someone will get her to a vet office.

situation: i remember the feeling i had when walking into a room to take a very important exam, without being worried because i knew i was prepared.
dialogue: it was wonderful not having to worry about my most recent exam, knowing i was prepared.
good job! how do you think you did on it?
i know i did well! i studied and felt very prepared when i took it.
label: confident
response: that is a good feeling. time to celebrate before the grind starts all over!

situation: i packed for a long road trip, and had everything i would need to hopefully avoid excessive stops.
dialogue: i packed for a long road trip, and had everything i would need to hopefully avoid excessive stops.
yeah i like going straight to the point too
definitely. nothing worse than dragging out a drive because you did not pack enough food and did not plan bathroom breaks.
label: prepared
response: i like when i get places earlier than expected

situation: i went to the dentist yesterday to have a cavity filled.  i was extremely nervous about going after being told that it was close to my nerve.
dialogue: i had a dentist appointment yesterday.  i hate going to the dentist!
i understand that completely! did you have to get any work done?

yes i had to get a filling in my very back tooth.  the dentist said i had a very deep cavity and to raise my hand if i started to feel anything because it was very close to my nerve.   i was scared the whole time.
label: anxious
response: that sounds scary! i always avoid going to the dentist until i absolutely have to. i know that is pretty bad!

situation: my son would not go to sleep last night.  he kept yelling that he did not want to sleep and would not go into his room
dialogue: my son would not sleep last night.  he kept yelling and would not go into his room.
oh no! i hate when that happens. was he afraid or just did not want to sleep?
he just did not want to sleep. i think he was overtired and trying to fight it at that point.
label: angry
response: ugh, that is the worst. that happens a lot with my son as well. hopefully he was not too cranky today!

situation: my son graduated pre-school.  i know it is not much but its the first step in his life..or at least school career.
dialogue: my son graduated pre-school.  it is not much but its that next step in his school career.
that is wonderful! you must be happy, shows that he is getting bigger, soon it will be college
haha, i hope not too soon!  i was really happy, he is growing pretty fast!
label: proud
response: college is when the tear will start to flow. i love children.

situation: i am going to a beer dabbler this weekend.  it has been a really busy last couple of weeks so it should be awesome to drink and not worry about anything.
dialogue: i am going to a beer dabbler this weekend.  it has been very busy the last couple weeks so i am really looking forward to drinking and relaxing this weekend.
that will be fun. what a great way to relax and unwind
i think so.  i am hoping the weather will be nice and we can all have a great time!
label: excited
response: i saw the weather forecast. we only have a 20% chance of rain so you know how it is here. we'll be good.

situation: i am trying to transition my dog into not sleeping in my room.  the other night he tried following me in and kept scratching at the door.  i know he just wanted to be by me.
dialogue: i am trying to transition my dog into not sleeping in my room.  i know he wants to be by me and i can hear him whining and scratching at the door some nights
that must be hard to do, he wants to be beside you. he is going to miss you.
i know.  it is tough to hear but he needs to be a little more independent and sleep in his own bed too!
label: sad
response: yes he needs to so you would have to ignore him at nights.

situation: i do love my pet doggy, she is a treat to have
dialogue: i do love my pet doggy, she is a treat to have
that is so sweet. what is her name?
angie, i like to give her a warm bath, dress her in her doggy clothes and give her a doggy treat
label: caring
response: i can just imagine she sleeps in your bed sometimes. i love dogs, i would like to have a dog someday.

situation: we just got a new puppy.  my older dog knew to let that one out first when i get home from work.
dialogue: we just got a new puppy.  my older dog knew to let that one out first when i got home from work.
that is very cute, the little one probably could not hold its bladder as long.
definitely not.  i was surprised that he knew to let the little one go first!
label: surprised
response: that was very smart of him, maybe he remembers back to his puppy days.

situation: i used to have my dog in his crate when i left for work.  lately i have been letting him more and more into the house when i have been gone.
dialogue: i used to have my dog in his crate when i left for work.  lately i have been letting him out more and more in the house when i have been gone.
that is good. how is it going?
it is going well!  so far no accidents and he does not appear to have ruined anything.
label: trusting
response: that is great news! it sounds like he is enjoying his new freedom, and was ready for it.

situation: i was driving down the road and i almost hit a dog! i was so close. really scary!
dialogue: i was driving down the road and i almost hit a dog! i was so close. really scary!
i am glad you did not hit the dog!  did he jump out at you suddenly?
yes, he came out of nowhere and i slammed on my brakes. my tires skid across the road.
label: terrified
response: i live out in a rural area where people do not always have control of their dogs.  sometimes those little ankle-biting dogs will start chasing the car and they make a break for the car and it makes one really fearful that you will hit them.

situation: i finished all the ice cream when i was told to leave some for others. i was just so hungry!
dialogue: i finished all the ice cream when i was told to leave some for others. i was just so hungry!
lol, guess you were pretty hungry
yeah, now i am scared somebody will find out. i better go buy some more before anyone gets home. haha
label: guilty
response: yeah, might wanna go replace it

situation: i am the happiest in my life when i am at the ocean. there is just something so special about nature at the ocean for me.
dialogue: i am the happiest in my life when i am at the ocean. there is just something so special about nature at the ocean for me.
that sounds amazing. what is your favorite beach to go to?
i do not really have a favorite. they are all my favorite! but i prefer the beaches that have perfect soft sand with no rocks or anything. like a huge swimming pool!
label: joyful
response: those are the best. especially the white sand crystal clear water beaches.

situation: i saw dubai from the airplane one day, never went into the city, but wow it was a sight to see!
dialogue: i saw dubai from the airplane one day. i never went into the city, but wow, it was a sight to see!
i sure it was beautiful
it looked like another planet or something. very sci-fi. almost scary actually.
label: impressed
response: really, i wouldve never thought that. i have a friend who is in dubai on a teaching assignment

situation: i found out that my neighbors eat turtle meat. how gross!!
dialogue: i found out that my neighbors eat turtle meat. how gross!
yuck, how gross!
yeah, who does that? i have three pet turtles so i better keep a good watch on them.
label: disgusted
response: lol right, they could easily be your neighbors dinner

situation: i felt very sad when i found out that my mother had lung cancer 6 months ago
dialogue: i felt very sad recently when i found out that my mother has cancer
oh my gosh, i am so sorry for your family.
thank you .  shes a fighter i hope she can push through
label: devastated
response: i am sure she can with all the technology and modern medicine now. she is got this!

situation: i do not have many friends and my family lives very far away. i sometimes feel very sad.
dialogue: i do not have many friends and my family lives very far away. i sometimes feel very sad.
why do you live so far from family
it is just where i ended up in life. you know one thing leads to another and your living a whole knew life.
label: lonely
response: i would like a new life. i totally understand

situation: i heard a really loud bang in the middle of the night. the next morning i found out that it was gun shots. omg
dialogue: i heard a really loud bang in the middle of the night. the next morning i found out that it was gun shots. omg
what? that scary
someone was grabbed from their home and brought out to the street and was shot in the foot. guess they wanted to teach him a lesson.
label: afraid
response: wow, a hard lesson

situation: my internet connection keep breaking! how am i going to get all my work done?
dialogue: my internet connection keeps breaking! how am i going to get all my work done?
i understand!  i live in the country and have the same problem.
it always happens when there are electrical storms. it seems to be storm season around here.
label: annoyed
response: yes.  the only company available out here is century link and they just crash randomly all the time.

situation: i feel very blessed that i have been able to live around the world my whole life. now i am settled in one place for awhile.
dialogue: i feel very blessed that i have been able to live around the world my whole life. now i am settled in one place for awhile.
that is very cool. what took you all around the world? what was your favourite place?
my father was in the military so i lived all over the world my first 20 years of life. my favorite place is spain.
label: grateful
response: what interesting stories you must have! i think that would be really neat, but settling down is probably good too.

situation: my guinea pig had 5 babies but all of them died. i do not know why..
dialogue: my guinea pig had 5 babies but all of them died. i do not know why.
that is so sad.  i hate it when pets die.
yeah, it is terrible. i just wish i knew why but oh well. she will have more babies in a couple months.
label: sad
response: yes.  they do like to have lots of  babies

situation: i am going on a trip to peru to visit machu picchu! i cannot sleep because of the anticipation!
dialogue: hello!
i am going on a trip to peru to visit machu picchu! i cannot sleep because of the anticipation!
wow i am so jealous! you lucky dog.
label: excited
response: i hear it is a very spiritual place to be and full of beauty and history.

situation: i had to wait for the cable guy to come install internet and cable in my new house, i was so excited.
dialogue: i just got cable installed in my new house, i was so excited waiting for the cable guy to come!
congrats! did you do it because of football season?
i honestly do not really watch football but i most excited to catch up on some of my favorite tv shows.
label: anticipating
response: cool! whats your favoirite? i like the office.

situation: life seem like it is going pretty good for me. i have no complaints.
dialogue: life seem like it is going pretty good for me, i have no complaints.
same here! i am glad you are doing well!
i am glad you are doing well also. i like my job and i have a loving family, no complaints here.
label: content
response: i hope these feelings last for you!

situation: my dog just had a baby and i did not even know she was pregnant! what!
dialogue: my dog just had a baby and i did not even know she was pregnant! what!
a puppy!  that is so exciting!  are you going to keep it?
i am not sure yet. i already have 4 dogs. i want to because he is so cute!
label: surprised
response: i do not know that i would be able to give it up.  4 is a lot, but what is one more?

situation: my boyfriend is going out with a bunch of people i do not know tonight. but i trust him that he will be a good boy.
dialogue: my boyfriend is going out with a bunch of people i do not know tonight. but i trust him that he will be a good boy.
well i am sure he will be, most guys are. i would never get to  do anything if my girlfriend did not trust me.
yeah. i was in a bad relationship before with a man that was extremely untrustworthy so sometimes i get a bit crazy sometimes.
label: faithful
response: everyone gets jealous, it when you act on unfounded stuff that is the issue.

situation: i get so upset when someone does not agree with what i am doing. i am a grown women and feel i can make good choices for myself.
dialogue: i get so upset when someone does not agree with what i am doing. i am a grown women and feel i can make good choices for myself.
yes sometimes people do stick their noses in where they do not belong
yes, it is like they do not have a life of their own and want to control others lives.
label: angry
response: yes.  especially men who want to mansplain things to you.

situation: by brother won a scratch off sticker lottery ticket! he is giving most of it to charity.
dialogue: by brother won a scratch off sticker lottery ticket! he is giving most of it to charity.
wow!  how much did he win?
he won like $40,000. he is a good man to give it all away to a good cause.
label: proud
response: that is awesome that he gave it away!  maybe good karma will let him win again.

situation: i was driving the other day and my gas tank was super low. i thought i could make it to school in time but decided that running out of gas was the bigger problem.
dialogue: i was driving the other day and my gas tank was super low. i thought i could make it to school in time but decided that running out of gas was the bigger problem.
good choice. you could have broken down and never made it to school.
yeah so true. the funny thing is as i was driving into the gas station my car started to stall because of having zero gas.
label: apprehensive
response: haha! you are super lucky you are smart.

situation: very often i get very emotional when things go wrong. i think more emotional than most people.
dialogue: very often i get very emotional when things go wrong. i think more emotional than most people.
everyone handles stress differently. my anxiety gets so high i sometimes cancel my plans.
i know it is not healthy for the body to get so stressed out but i just cannot help it. maybe i need a therapist.
label: sentimental
response: i go to a psychiatrist and take meds, it just fixes what your body does not make, or do properly. it helps so much.

situation: i made a stupid mistake at work and i got fired. what am i going to do?
dialogue: i made a stupid mistake at work and i got fired. what am i going to do?
oh no! it will be ok. it seems everyone in life has to go through that at least once. everyone gets through it!
yeah, i feel really bad though. it is such a terrible feeling to be rejected like that.
label: devastated
response: sometimes you need those times to make your realize how special having a job is. gives you perspective.

situation: a few weeks ago, my infant son was very sick and he had to go to the hospital. i was nervous about what the doctor would have to say but i had my faith that he would help my son get better. i knew that he would do what he thought was right, and my son did get better!
dialogue: my son was very sick a few weeks ago, enough that he had to go to the hospital! i was nervous about what the doctor would have to say but had faith that he would help my son get better.
i hope everything is fine, how did it turn out?
it turned out fine in the end. i knew the doctor would do what he thought was best and my son did get better!
label: trusting
response: i am happy to hear that, a sick child is always a scary thing.

situation: i am going on a trip next month and i am really excited about it
dialogue: i am going on a trip next month and i am really excited about it
neat. where are you going?
we are driving to florida to visit family. it will be a long drive but that is a part of the fun.
label: anticipating
response: sounds exciting. have fun.

situation: my friend just got a new car and it is the same car i have been wanting ever since it came out.
dialogue: my friend just got a new car and it is the same car i have been wanting ever since it came out
oh wow, are you feeling super envious?
you bet i am! i told him i was driving my car whenever we go out because i do not want to see it,lol.
label: jealous
response: ha ha, i do not blame you! hopefully you can get the car you want soon though.

situation: my dog has been really sick this past week but after going to the vet i truly think he will be just fine.
dialogue: my dog has been really sick this past week but after going to the vet i truly think he will be just fine
i 'm glad to here it will be fine , but what was wrong with it?
he want really weak and had a fever. it was because of an allergy that gave him a severe skin infection.
label: confident
response: i 'm glad you was able to pin point the problem and i hope he stays in good health.

situation: at work i kept on hearing people laughing behind me, when i got to my desk, my coworker pointed out a postage stamp was stuck on back of my head
dialogue: at work i kept on hearing people laughing behind me, when i got to my desk, my coworker pointed out a postage stamp was stuck on back of my head
wow, that is so mean of them to laugh at you! at least someone pointed it out eventually, right?
yeah, but i think my boss even seen it too, i wanted to hide under my desk
label: embarrassed
response: that is embarrasing. but hey, i think the best way to get over moments like those is to just laugh at yourself! do not beat yourself up for it.

situation: my cousin has the perfect life, a loving boyfriend and two beautiful kids. i wish i had that.
dialogue: my cousin has the perfect life, sometimes i am envious of her.
wonderful i bet she is really content if everything is perfect. love to hear that someone is doing well.
i do too, i just wish i had her life at times.
label: jealous
response: i understand but try not to be jealous. good things will come to you to in its own time

situation: i applied for a job promotion. but i will not know if i got it or not until next week
dialogue: i applied for a job promotion. but i will not know if i got it or not until next week
the waiting must be very difficult and nerve wracking.
i know, i am having trouble concentrating at work, i just want to know right now
label: anticipating
response: things like that make me antsy.

situation: i got so many compliments on my new haircut last week. i felt great.
dialogue: after my haircut last week, i have received so many nice compliments!
a new haircut can do wonders! i always feel like a million bucks after.
i was not too sure about it but all the lovely compliments really made me feel good!
label: confident
response: i bet you looked great! those compliments would've made me feel good too!

situation: i was reminiscing on my childhood with my mother.
dialogue: i was just reminiscing with my mother about my childhood.
oh? what specifically were you talking to her about?

my aspirations when i was younger. we had a good laugh when i read in one of my old journals that i wanted to be a teacher when earlier that day i had stated that i could not imagine being a teacher now.
label: nostalgic
response: haha! well, as we mature, we learn so much more about ourselves.

situation: my daughters talked me into going on the ferris wheel at six flags.  i have never liked roller coasters, and i am afraid of heights.   i started crying as they laughed.  it felt like i was going to die!
dialogue: i went to six flags once with my daughters.   i did not want to go as i hate to ride roller coasters and am scared of heights.
haha you are a good father. i hope you can make it through it!
i am a mother not a father silly.  yes i made it through all right, but thought i was going to die!   they had me ride the ferris wheel and i was crying as they were laughing at me.
label: terrified
response: oh my gosh! i am sorry! haha that is funny. atleast you have them a story to always remember.;)

situation: i woke up to there being no toothpaste left, my boyfriend used it all and i had to go to work!
dialogue: today before work when i went to brush my teeth, there was no toothpaste left. my boyfriend used it all!
oh no! so what did you do?!
i was so angry, i had to leave for work very soon. i ended up just asking a neighbor to borrow some. i did not have anytime to buy any before work. i could not afford to be late.
label: furious
response: that is nice of your neighbor! your boyfriend should've told you that there was no toothpaste earlier. maybe there would've been time to get some. but at least you did not go to work with stinky breath, right?

situation: when i was a teenager i had a party at my moms house when they went out of town.   i had friends over and  we were drinking heavily.   we trashed the whole house and when my parents returned they were livid.   i still feel bad about it.
dialogue: i once had a party when i was a teenager.  my parents were out of town.
haha everyone has to do that once. can you tell me a great story about the party?

sure can!   of course you cannot have a party as a teen without alcohol, so needless to say we were all drunk.   we attempted to play darts.   since we were all drunk we missed the board leaving wholes all over the wall.  the house was trashed when my parents returned.  years later i feel bad about it still.
label: guilty
response: hahaha that is funny. i hope you guys are still on good terms. to be honest little holes sounds like an easy fix.

situation: my sister is going on vacation
dialogue: i envy my sister, she is going on vacation in paris
wow, cool. maybe you can ask to tag along?
i will be at work, maybe next time
label: jealous
response: that is too bad. well, at least you have something to work towards and plan as a goal for yourself.

situation: she read the speach out loud
dialogue: my litthe sister read out the speech in my graduation party
that is amazing! how old is she?
she is 9
label: confident
response: wow, that must've been a big thing for both of you.

situation: i am starting my exams on friday next week
dialogue: i will be sitting for my nclex exam on friday
i am sorry i do not know what nclex is but i wish you good luck
its a nursing exam, thank you
label: prepared
response: o ok i hope that everything works out for you

situation: one time there was a stray cat hiding from a dog in my front door
dialogue: one time there was a stray cat hiding from a dog in my front door
wow! did you try to get it out?
yup, i adopted it and he is my pet now!
label: caring
response: that is amazing! he probably loves you so much

situation: i was upset at myself for sleeping in so late this morning
dialogue: i was upset at myself for sleeping in so late this morning
do you feel nice and refreshed though?
yes definitely!
label: ashamed
response: i did the same thing today, so you are not alone in your behavior friend!

situation: i dropped my ipod touch on the bathroom floor. the screen shattered and i went for over a month without music.
dialogue: i dropped my ipod touch on the bathroom floor.
oh no! did it break?
unfortunately yes. the screen shattered and i went for over a month without music.
label: devastated
response: oh, that really stinks. i hope you were able to get another one.

situation: my guinea pig was feeling very sick but i was able to nurse her back to health.
dialogue: my guinea pig was feeling very sick but i was able to nurse her back to health.
did you do some neat doctor stuff on it?
no, i hate giving chemical medicine to my animals. i just kept her on a heating blanket and gave her lots of fresh veggies. she is alright now!
label: caring
response: oh yea that sounds like you did a good job!

situation: after training my dog i feel confident now that he can be around others dogs with out fighting.
dialogue: after training my dog i feel confident now that he can be around others dogs without fighting.
that is good, how long did it take before you go him to this point?
it took about a month. i think it was quicker but i was just too nervous to bring him around others dogs to find out.
label: trusting
response: yeah i understand, it is good that you took him there though

situation: my next door neighbor just bought a mercedes, i wish i can have one.
dialogue: my next door neighbor just bought a mercedes, i wish i can have one.
wow they must be doing well. why do not you try to get one?
really cannot afford one, but the neighbor can, he is always buying expensive stuff, last month he bought a speed boat.
label: jealous
response: sounds wasteful to me. life is not about material things anyway.

situation: last week my kid said some really mean things to me, i thought i raised him better.
dialogue: last week i had a argument with my son, he really said some mean things to me. i thought i raised him better.
yeah sometimes kids say things that they really do not mean in the heat of the momment
it really hurt my feelings. i wish he would've handled it better. i am more disappointed in him lashing out rather than what he said.
label: disappointed
response: well maybe you guys should talk

situation: my roommate cooked some foul smelling meat in our apartment. i almost puked.
dialogue: my roommate cooked some really foul smelling meat last night, i had to leave or i was going to puke.
ugh my neighbors do that sometimes. it is the worst! i think some things should not be allowed to be cooked unless you live alone.
exactly! i had to air out the place for a couple hours after.
label: disgusted
response: ick. hopefully the smell is fully gone now

situation: i used the restroom at a nice restaurant and i had toilet paper stuck to my shoe and did not know it until i left.
dialogue: i used the restroom at a nice restaurant and i had toilet paper stuck to my shoe and did not know it until i left.
oh that is the worst feeling! i hate using the restroom in public as is.
yeah, i wish someone told me at least. they all probably just laughed. haha
label: embarrassed
response: maybe.  for me i just do not want to cause a stranger to be embarassed

situation: i am probably one of the few people in the world that looks forward to winter coming.
dialogue: i am probably one of the few people in the world that looks forward to winter coming.
i am with you, i like it a lot more than summer personally
i can get so much work done indoor and the beauty outside is wonderful. i love winter clothes and all the winter holidays.
label: anticipating
response: i feel that, i hate being hot. in the winter i can be comfy and i can always just put on a jacket if i get too cold, but in the summer it is not that easy.

situation: last summer when i took my drivers test, i was so nervous that i would fail.
dialogue: when you took your driver's test were you nervous?
i was very nervous. i did not know if i would pass or not.
i took mine last summer i was nervous also. my heat was racing the whole time. i was so anxious!
label: anxious
response: did you pass the test?

situation: sometimes i feel envious of those that have money than i do.
dialogue: sometimes i feel envious of those that have money than i do.
i am the same way, i barely make anything compared to a lot of people i know
yeah, and it seems so hard to make money these days, at least for me. maybe i should move to the city where there are more opportunities.
label: jealous
response: i think cities are more expensive, like living costs, so i do not want to live there ether personally

situation: i believed my friend would return my cell phone to me in time
dialogue: i believed my friend would return my cell phone to me in time
i am assuming that he/she did not return it in time. i am sorry.
i accidentally left it at his house and had to message him on facebook and ask him if he could drive it over
label: trusting
response: oh, i understand. did it bring it to you at all?

situation: i am as sure as the sun will rise tomorrow that i will get this job promotion!
dialogue: i am as sure as the sun will rise tomorrow that i will get this job promotion!
that is amazing!  i am really happy for you!
thank you! i have worked so hard for so many years and finally it shows that someone paid attention.
label: confident
response: it sounds like you really deserve it!

situation: i almost got into a car accident last week, it was so scary.
dialogue: last week i almost got into a car accident, i was terrified.
that does sound terrifying , are you feeling better ?
i am but i still think about how things could've been so much different right now if i hadn't swerved just at the right moment.
label: terrified
response: at least your ok, thank god for that

situation: there is a promotion at my job, i think i am going to get it.
dialogue: there is an upcoming promotion at my job, i am sure i am going to get it.
nice, for what position
as a supervisor. i feel that all of my hard work and skill has given me the inside track for this position
label: confident
response: that is pretty great, you must really take the initiative.  good job

situation: i have all my ingredients for my dinner party and now i am getting ready to prepare a feast!
dialogue: i have all my ingredients for my dinner party and now i am getting ready to prepare a feast!
you are much braver than me. i would never host a dinner party. do not feel like i am good at planning, and do not feel like i am interesting enough to talk to a bunch of different people.
yeah, we all have different personalities. but you would come to a dinner party if invited, right?
label: prepared
response: i think, maybe, yeah! it depends on who's there, and if i felt comfortable with the host. if i felt like i had enough people to kind of "rescue me" and who i could talk to at the party if i got anxious and could not talk to strangers, then that'd be alright. other than that, i just kind of do like maybe a group of 4, max

situation: i broke my moms nice crystal figurine, at first i did not want to tell her but i jut had to.
dialogue: i broke one of my mom's crystal figurine, i tried hard not to tell her but in the end i felt so bad i had to tell her.
aw, that is too bad. you did the right thing by telling her though.
yes, she did not even get mad. i still felt so guilty about it though.
label: guilty
response: maybe you could save up and purchase her a new one.

situation: i feel happy to know that god has got my back and i do not have to worry about anything.
dialogue: i feel happy to know that god has got my back and i do not have to worry about anything.
i am right there with you!  god is good and wow, he is been with me through so much hardship.  i am so happy you feel the same way.

oh yes. he is there within all of us and he is the greatest friend we will ever have! he will never let us down. even when we think he has we should only think it is something that i need to learn and he is so caring that he wants to teach me.
label: content
response: yes, we can always count on him to know the bigger picture and have faith that he is working for our good.  hope you have a blessed day!

situation: i miss how we all used to celebrate christmas when i was a child. it was such a warm and cozy time. things are really changing in this high tech modern world.
dialogue: i miss how we all used to celebrate christmas when i was a child. it was such a warm and cozy time. things are really changing in this high tech modern world.
they really have changed. i know exactly how you feel and love thinking back to the time.
yeah, so you remember all those wonderful old christmas movies and all those commercials they played in between. i still have some videos of recordings from the 80's.
label: nostalgic
response: those were awesome! my favorite was the coke commercial at christmas time. so many memories!

situation: i found a large moth inside my cottage. i carefully caught it with a cup and let it go outside; there is no good reason to kill something that will not harm me.
dialogue: in july, i found a large moth inside a cottage that my brother and friends were staying at.
oh fun!  how big was it about?  did it have neat markings on it?
it was as big as a small bird, i was super surprised. it was furry and white all over. i caught it with a cup and let it outside so it can live on!
label: caring
response: i think i saw someone post a picture of those online. maybe it was a lunar moth! what a fun experience!

situation: my sister just gave birth to a healthy beautiful baby girl. i was so happy to meet my niece!
dialogue: my sister gave birth to a beautiful healthy baby girl last week! i was so happy to meet my niece.
what is your nieces name?
amelia, she makes my heart so happy!
label: joyful
response: that is amazing, was it your sisters first baby?

situation: i planted a whole bunch of flower bushes this year. i cannot wait until next spring when my entire garden will be in bloom with so many wonderful colors and smells.
dialogue: i planted a whole bunch of flower bushes this year. i cannot wait until next spring when my entire garden will be in bloom with so many wonderful colors and smells.
it will be amazing!  i should do that too!

yes! i just went to the local nursery and they had so many plants to choose from. i made sure to only choose the ones that had some kind of fragrant smell. i am dreaming of all the flower arrangements i will make next year.
label: hopeful
response: that sounds so great!   i hope your plants grow beautifully!

situation: after feeling depressed for days, i took the time to sit outside in the sun and have a nice chit chat with my mom. the cool breeze felt comforting and completely changed my mood today, i feel good!
dialogue: after feeling depressed for days, i took the time to sit outside in the sun and have a nice chit chat with my mom.
that sounds like the perfect remedy for feeling down. getting out in the sun and outside the house/bed is so good.  i am sorry you are struggling with depression.  i understand.
thank you for your kind words, it means a lot really. and yeah the cool breeze felt so comforting, it completely changed my mood!
label: content
response: i am so glad!  you know what to do to help your body and mind and that is good self-care.  i try to do that as well as meditate and pray in the morning.  really refocuses me.  i am glad you are feeling better!

situation: there might be a hurricane in my area soon. i am worried our house may flood and we may be without power for awhile.
dialogue: there may be a hurricane in my area soon i am kind of scared.
i imagine, are you prepared for it?
not yet, but i will start preparing. i am worried we may lose power or our house may flood.
label: afraid
response: oh yes, last year with huracan irma we went without power for 5 days.

situation: i felt nostalgiac going through old childhood belongings
dialogue: i felt nostalgiac going through old childhood belongings
aw, did it bring back a lot of good memories for you?
yes definitely, it was great
label: sentimental
response: that is awesome. sometimes i wish i could be back in my childhood. maybe if only for a day. ha ha.

situation: i forgot to pay my credit card bill, i am so disappointed with myself.
dialogue: i forgot to pay my credit card bill, i am so disappointed with myself.
i am sure it will be ok. usually if you stay in contact with them and do not blow them off for a long time it will be ok.
yeah but i am usually so meticulous about those things.  i hope they do not charge an overdraft fee.
label: ashamed
response: i would call them. they usually give you some credit for that.

situation: i have a presentation tomorrow. i am ready for it.
dialogue: i have a presentation tomorrow. i am ready for it.
that is good. i assume you have studied hard and are prepared?
for the past two weeks i have bee working on it and this week i have been practicing it
label: prepared
response: good luck! you will do great!

situation: i once called my girlfriend's mother mom by accident. we were only dating for a few months and i felt so awkward but she just laughed it off.
dialogue: i once called my girlfriend's mother mom by accident.

haha, i am sorry but i had a little laugh at that. it reminded me of the time i did that to my teacher in school. i was embarrassed, but it made me feel better to find out that it seems like it is a common thing that happens, since they are female authority figures that you can easily mix up.
exactly, especially since we were only dating for a few months! i felt so awkward but she just laughed it off.
label: embarrassed
response: yeah, she knew what you meant. she probably forgot in two minutes, while you've thought about it for much longer. the best thing to do there is to just show off your sense of humor and ability to make fun of yourself and not take yourself too seriously, which it sounds like maybe you did.

situation: the pigeons keep coming into the house a pooping all over the place!
dialogue: the pigeons keep coming into the house a pooping all over the place!
that is gross, why are they coming in?
well they are actually my pet pigeons. they are the beautiful white ones with a fan tail. but they sometimes like to come inside to see if they can munch on anything.
label: furious
response: you should probably avoid feeding them if you want a clean house.

situation: oh, i am so sad that my family could not come and visit me. i miss them all so much. why is life so busy for everyone these days?
dialogue: oh, i am so sad that my family could not come and visit me. i miss them all so much. why is life so busy for everyone these days?
i sure wish it was not. i live far from my family and they cannot even make time for me to go to them. so i feel for you, it is very sad.
family should come first, right? the people of today are just becoming more isolated and lonely. i wish everyone would wake up!
label: disappointed
response: absolutely first. especially when you do not live close.

situation: i recently had very good customer service from my cable company. i expected them to just fix the problem but they also gave me free services.
dialogue: recently i had a very good customer service experience with my cable company. not only did they fix the problem they gifted me free premium content for a year!
i bet it was not comcast! they would not even give you a cup of water for free.
that is so funny! i was so surprised too but really happy. i might even pay for the services when my free year is up.
label: impressed
response: i am glad you had a nice experience! its difficult to find such a company that cares about its customers!

situation: my dog eat other animals poop. i have seen them eat goat, duck and cow poop. i hope they do not get sick.
dialogue: my dog eats other animals poop. i have seen them eat goat, duck and cow poop. i hope they do not get sick.
oh, wow! that is crazy, have you talked to the vet?
the vet says that this can be normal but to make sure that i give them their worm pills regularly.
label: disgusted
response: i thought it would be normal. good thing to be cautious.

situation: last night there was a terrible thunderstorm. i unplugged all my computers and electronics. then there was a loud bang and i heard my electrical box make a loud click. i think my house was electrocuted!
dialogue: last night there was a terrible thunderstorm. i unplugged all my computers and electronics. then there was a loud bang and i heard my electrical box make a loud click. i think my house was electrocuted!
well it is a good thing you unplugged everything!
yeah! i learned my lesson from experience. we get pretty crazy storms out here.
label: terrified
response: that is a good lesson to learn early, i am glad everything turned out okay for you!

situation: i cannot wait until the weekend is here! i am going skydiving for the first time!
dialogue: i cannot wait until the weekend is here! i am going skydiving for the first time!
that sounds amazing!  but terrifying too
i am not nervous yet but i for sure will be when it is time to jump out of that plane! oh, what am i getting myself into,.
label: anxious
response: i admire you!  i do not think you will regret getting this experience

situation: when i was a kid i used to steal candy from the local 7/11 with my brother. we never got caught from the store but my parents found all the wrappers.
dialogue: when i was a kid i used to steal candy from the local 7/11 with my brother. we never got caught from the store but my parents found all the wrappers hiding in our room.
hahah that is funny. were your parents angry?
yes, they demanded to know where we got the money to buy all that candy. we lied and said it was from a birthday party at school. haha
label: guilty
response: haha did they believe it?

situation: a friend of mine borrowed some video games.  i am confident he will return them intact
dialogue: a friend borrowed some video games of mine
nice, what system do you play on?
xbox primarily, i am hoping he will get everything back in one piece
label: trusting
response: i really enjoy video games as well

situation: my next door neighbor's dog. i cannot stand the barking.
dialogue: i cannot stand my neighbor's dog's barking, its never ending
that is the worst! have you tried talking to your neighbor?
i have, that what makes me so mad, he just smiles at me while i tell him and he does not do anything about it
label: furious
response: you might try contacting the authorities, though i do not know if it would help.

situation: i found some of my old toys that i had passed down to my younger brother today while cleaning up his closet. suddenly i was overcome by wonderful and touching memories.
dialogue: i found some of my old toys that i had passed down to my younger brother today while cleaning up his closet.
thats awesome! its really cool to be able to keep things in the family
it really was! it brought back so many wonderful and touching memories.
label: sentimental
response: did he enjoy the toys

situation: the first time my girlfriend invited me to her father's house, i was super anxious. he mostly speaks french, and although i understand it perfectly i have trouble speaking. he turned out to be super awesome and he never made me feel bad for trying my best!
dialogue: the first time my girlfriend invited me to her father's house, i was super anxious.
yeah that can be nerve racking! how did it go?
he mostly speaks french, and although i understand it perfectly i have trouble speaking. in the end it went well, and he was super easy-going and made me feel like family.
label: anticipating
response: that is good! are you guys close now

situation: i spent hours reviewing notes and job materials to prepare for some trials for a job that i had applied for. i was so ready, and i ended up getting the job!
dialogue: i spent hours reviewing notes and course content to prepare myself for a few trials that a company wanted me to go through.
good job! do you feel pretty prepared?
i felt super prepared and i ended up getting the job just last thursday!
label: confident
response: wowza! congrats! is it a job you can build a career out of.

situation: my friend is so lucky, he always seems to be winning lotteries and gambles of sorts. just last week, he won over $400 playing slot machines, and i really wish that could've been me; i need it.
dialogue: my friend is so lucky, he always seems to be winning lotteries and gambles of sorts.
man. i need some of that luck!
same here. just last week, he won over $400 playing slot machines, and i really wish that could've been me.
label: jealous
response: wow that is awesome! i never win anything like that

situation: i really appreciate an artists talents. it is pretty incredible what beauty they can create.
dialogue: i really appreciate an artists talents. it is pretty incredible what beauty they can create!
i agree! i wish i was able to make things
it is really fun to create things, anyone can do it! but talent i think is a gift from god.
label: impressed
response: for sure you are born with those types of talents!

situation: i was channel surfing and ran across the old batman tv show, brought back memories.
dialogue: i was channel surfing and ran across the old batman tv show, brought back memories.
that is cool! i love flash backs from the past especially when it comes to television. i sometimes watch old shows on youtube that i used to watch as a kid. love it!
same here, i loved watching batman as a kid and could not wait to get home from school to watch it.
label: nostalgic
response: i used to watch the wonder years after school. i love watching it until this very day.

situation: when i was a little girl i would have to wear shoes with holes in it. everyone made fun of me all the time. my family could not afford much.
dialogue: when i was a little girl i would have to wear shoes with holes in it to school. everyone made fun of me all the time. my family could not afford much.
that must have been embarrassing, i hope you were not to traumatized
i think it is a good trauma cause to this day it keeps me working hard for my dreams so that i will never have to be in that place again.
label: ashamed
response: that is good to hear, it was a motivation to succeed, a great character building

situation: i was sad to see my favorite tree had been broken in the storm last week
dialogue: i was sad to see my favorite tree had been broken in the storm last week
aw man that sucks. it must have been a crazy storm.
it was pretty bad but i think the tree was already dying
label: devastated
response: how big was it?

situation: i am very fearful of dying. i know it will come one day, i just hope and pray it does not hurt so bad.
dialogue: i am very fearful of dying. i know it will come one day, i just hope and pray it does not hurt so bad.
you should not think about death whilst you are alive! just live each day to the fullest.
yes you are right but it is hard to not think about it when there is so much death going on around the world and we have to hear about it through the media.
label: afraid
response: yes but death comes to all of us someday. so i think its best we enjoy our life whilst we are blessed with it.

situation: last week a friend of mine told me he would help me work on my car. i had not heard from him all week, but he ended up showing up just as promised.
dialogue: last week i really had to rely on my friend to keep his word.
that is a good test of friendship.  did he keep his word?
yes in the end, he showed up and help me fix my car. i am really glad that he did.
label: trusting
response: it is such a blessing to have good friends on whom you can depend.

situation: next week i find out if i got the promotion at my job. i have my fingers crossed.
dialogue: next week i find out if i got the promotion at my job. i have my fingers crossed.
nice! i hope you get it, i will cross my fingers for you also! do you think you got a good chance?
i do not know, i feel like i have done all i can to get it, but you never know
label: hopeful
response: that is all you can do, but if you worked hard, i am sure you will get it!

situation: last month when i was cleaning out the attic i found a box of old photo albums. it was really good to relive all the old memories.
dialogue: last month cleaning out the attic i found a old box of photo albums that had belonged to my mother.
oh cool. were there any good picture in there?
so many good pictures. it was great reliving all of those old memories, many i had forgotten about.
label: sentimental
response: well that is nice. i am glad they were happy memories for you.

situation: i just got a new haircut, lets say this, i do not like it.
dialogue: i just got a new haircut, lets say this, i do not like it.
oh boy.  i have gotten quite a few of those before.  new hairstylist?
no, same style from my barber who always cuts my hair, for some reason he did a terrible job
label: disappointed
response: that is odd.  i would've told him so and asked for my money back.

situation: i was drinking a glass of milk. when i put the glass back down, a fly was swimming in the milk
dialogue: yesterday, i was drinking a glass of milk. when i put the glass back down, a fly was swimming in the milk
ohhhh, disgusting.  what did you do?
first i did not know what it was, than i realized it was a fly, i was about to throw up
label: disgusted
response: i bet, what a terrible feeling!

situation: i have to give a presentation on monday, i do not think i am ready
dialogue: i have to give a presentation on monday, i do not think i am ready
is there anything that you can do to help prepare yourself?
i think i am ready but it is the waiting  to give it , i just want it to be over
label: anxious
response: yeah i can understand that! id want to get it over with too. the sooner the better

situation: several co-workers said they would not be able to come to work.  i hope we do not have any major assignments to do
dialogue: a few of my co-workers said they'd be absent next week
oh my, i hope that does not mean more workload for you.
yeah, i hope we do not get a ton of work while they are gone
label: apprehensive
response: maybe you should ask for overtime pay just in case you do get more work!

situation: i have to take a plane trip next week, i am not looking forward to it.
dialogue: i have to take a plane trip next week, i am not looking forward to it and i have to take a plane trip next week, i am not looking forward to it.
yeah, flying can be scary.
i know, just the idea of being in a plane up in the sky, scares the bejesus out of me
label: terrified
response: hopefully it is not a long flight.

situation: i left my young daughter with my friend.  i totally trust her though, she will be a great mom someday!
dialogue: i left my young daughter with my friend. i totally trust her though, she will be a great mom someday!
thats awesome that you trust her
yeah she is a great person.  she is a little younger than me.
label: trusting
response: its hard to find good people you can trust with your kids nowadays

situation: one time my cat got ran over by a car
dialogue: one time my cat got ran over by a car
oh no! that is horrible. were you driving?
no, it was some person driving recklessly!
label: sentimental
response: oh gosh that is horrible. i am so sorry that happened to you.

situation: last year in the spring, we got record rainfall and my basement got flooded. many of my childhood things and photo albums were destroyed.
dialogue: last year during the spring, our area got record rainfall. my basement ended up getting flooded and destroying many of my childhood things and keepsakes.
that is the worst! because now you will be freaking out trying to think of the things you may not even remember whether or not could have been there. that must be an anxious feeling.
it really is, it just sucks losing all of those things. they were like my connection to the past.
label: devastated
response: yeah, i am not quite a hoarder or a packrat when it comes to those things, but i do get sentimental with some physical objects. if i lost them, i would feel like it would be an itch i could not scratch, because i could not replace what i lost. hopefully you can work past it somehow.

situation: i am at peace with myself after taking a nice hot shower
dialogue: i am at peace with myself after taking a nice hot shower
oh man, that is the best feeling in the world. getting out of a shower especially if its into clean freshly laundered sheets.
yes! i feel like a new person!
label: content
response: it is such a wonderful feeling, i should take a shower soon too.

situation: saturday and bad income
dialogue: what kind of saturday is this, i mean sure it is a relaxing one but damn i really blew it on the budget plan
how did you you go over your budget?
i spend it like maniac i am so disappointed in myself.
label: sad
response: i hope you can have better self-control in the future.

situation: 5 days eft
dialogue: i really really cannot wait! next week is the week! i finally get to see my love
awww. that is good news!
i know! i am so happy about this! and i really cannot wait, we are going to go on a cable car too
label: excited
response: how long has it been seen youve seen each other?

situation: coffee finished
dialogue: i am just absolutely mind boggled, i just brought the coffee 3 days ago! and it is already finished! what
oh gosg. do you have some greedy roommates or something?
just greedy? more than that, who the hell finishes a whole 500g of coffee in 3 days !
label: surprised
response: hahahaa good point. maybe try hiding your groceries.

situation: my baby girl
dialogue: have you ever had that one person who never ever disappoints you?
yea i have
me too, she is recently going through a lot and despite all that, she is working hard everyday for us and i am just so happy and lucky to have her
label: proud
response: thats great, happy for yo

situation: my baby is not home today
dialogue: ever just feel so isolated in a room and alone? what a weird day
literally me right now actually
same, it is just such a slow day too, but one thing that is making me hopeful is tht next week i am going to travel to see fiance
label: lonely
response: must be nice to have someone that loves you

situation: did not submit my work on time
dialogue: i am truly utterly worthless, i could not even submit my work on time
what is going on with your work?
i had an assignment to submit but i did not submit it on time, i am so disappointed in myself
label: ashamed
response: you can do better next time i believe in you!

situation: death
dialogue: i am so looking forward to the day we pass from this world and go to heaven
ouch.  why?
because  i am a very faithful person and i trust in my god!
label: faithful
response: oh i see.  very interesting that your faith makes you want to die though.

situation: tomorrow is my first university day and i am very nervous
dialogue: tomorrow is my first university day and i am very nervous
its not so bad, it can be intimidating but you just need to figure out the campus layout and classes but its very smooth from there
i hope i will not get lost but i am so bad with that, i always get lost.
label: apprehensive
response: once you figure the way it just becomes routine

situation: in the universe
dialogue: whenever you feel so hopeless, so distance and you feel like nothing ever matters, just remember to trust in the universe, for it has a plan for you
you are so right, did you read that somewhere?
no, i just came up with this philosophy while facing an existential dilemma
label: trusting
response: that is cool, have you studied any philosophy in school?

situation: i am grateful for my life.
dialogue: do you ever just feel so grateful that you are alive?
yes, i feel that every day.
it is the most amazing feeling ever right? it feels like the universe gives us everything.
label: content
response: i wish people understood how precious life really is.

situation: i destroyed my laptop the other day
dialogue: i threw my laptop the other day and i already regret it
why did you throw your laptop?
because i was very pissed off, i was not able to work .
label: devastated
response: sometimes i lose my temper like that too.

situation: lost league of legends game
dialogue: 3-3, final game decides it all, final game till promotion, time ticking, palms sweating, final minute and just as we are about to win it all, to finally reach that noble masters rank, my team mate fails to make the correct decision and we lose, it all just crumbles to the ground like rocks falling from the sky, my dream gone
wow that is vivid, what game was this?
league of legends, my other addiction, other than my fiance
label: devastated
response: ah yes league, love hate relationship with that game but after 4 years it can really still tilt me more and more

situation: i was super late for my meeting on tuesday
dialogue: i was super late for my meeting on tuesday , i got so embarrassed
oh no, i hope it was not an important meeting.
it was actually, and because of the traffic i could not make it
label: embarrassed
response: sorry to hear that, were they understanding about it?

situation: my wife is sick and i am taking good
dialogue: my wife has been very sick recently and i am making the soup that is famous with our family recipe and she is slowly getting better
i am sorry your wife is sick.  what kind of soup is it?
it is called lentil soup and we make it a special way with cumin spice and love
label: caring
response: that sounds quite delicious if i must say.

situation: old images from the past wall
dialogue: ever feel so full of emotions when looking at old pictures?
yeah.  reminds me of the good old days!
for me it is when you get more than just nostalgia, when you get sad, happy and sentimental
label: sentimental
response: yeah same here.  i remember one time awhile back i took some pictures of when the aliens landed in my backyard.   that was some good times!

situation: upcoming events scare me to death
dialogue: i am just so scared of what is going to happen in the future, i need to make money, have a house, own a car, and other materialistic good because  i am a person of the 21st century and i cannot afford any of this so i need to get a job, but all these jobs are paying me next to nothing despite my masters degree in computer science, what to do?

yikes, that is a tough one and i can definitely feel your pain on the job market. i think either network your way to a higher pay job (depends on connections) or possibly go back to school to a doctorate or certain specialist degrees.
ummm? excuse me? do you know people earn a lot from computer science, it is not my degree for sure, it is this corrupt world we live in that is the problem
label: apprehensive
response: yes but the market is quite flooded with cs degree holders. it is hard to get something unless you are specialized i think. unfortunately i do not see society changing any time soon.

situation: with life
dialogue: life is beautiful is not it?
life is the most beautiful thing.
are you happy with the way things are? i am enjoying every second
label: content
response: i live every day like it is my last.

situation: i was suppose to be the one to go first
dialogue: i hate when that happens, i was suppose to be the on who was first, who was suppose to go first in the line, but instead my friend ended up going first
waiting in line is the worst.
but it was in the line for university classes, i am so jealous
label: jealous
response: i hope you got your classes.

situation: my abilities, worked on kmeans algorithm
dialogue: i feel like there is nothing that i cannot do, i feel so powerful!  and smart! i just implemented a kmeans algorithm with my own method
sounds like you are pretty confident in yourself!
yup i am !  so so confident and i think this is a good trait to have
label: confident
response: i agree that it is as well. in most situations, it can work to one's benefit.

situation: who keeps taking my bloody shoes
dialogue: feelsbadman, some one in this absurd family ! who keeps on taking my bloody shoes!
i do not understand what you are trying to tell me. is this a joke?
no, i am angry! imagine every morning you wake and someone in your family takes your shoes because they want to make you angry
label: furious
response: why would they want to do that?

situation: walking past my old house
dialogue: it sure does bring back a lot of fond memories as you go for a walk past your old neighbourhood
i can imagine the flood of emotions.
yup, many memories from the past, the good, the bad
label: nostalgic
response: i hope it was worth visiting.

situation: for the upcoming social event
dialogue: pen, check, notepad, check! i am going to kill this social event today! i am going to leave 30mins earlier too
sounds like you are prepared. i like the confident attitude. go get them!
i will sure do that, it is going to be fun too, do you go to social events?
label: prepared
response: i would love to come with you to yours., i just invited myself.

situation: working hard but  feeling like not going anywhere
dialogue: i do not know how to feel, i have been working so hard the past few months but i feel like i am not getting anywhere, still at the same place as i was
i completely understand. maybe you need a vacation to recharge the batteries.
maybe, but i also need a plan because if i continue like this, i will not get anywhere for reals
label: disappointed
response: are you looking for a new job?

situation: can i do it alone?
dialogue: can i really do everything alone? i just feel so useless
that is not true i am sure. do you have any friends to hang out with?
no, i do not like people, they make me lose more hope in the plane
label: anxious
response: i can understand. maybe connect with some like-minded people online?

situation: vomited all over the couch
dialogue: last week my friends and i ordered pizza while at their house, after an hour of eating the pizza i pucked everywhere on his couch, i feel so bad and grossed out
ewww that is gross!  did you help clean it up?  and what was in that pizza anyway??
god knows what was in that pizza, but i helped clean and the mess was still showing, but he said it was not a problem
label: disgusted
response: he seems like a good friend.

situation: scared so much for the future
dialogue: everything seems to be everywhere, i am just scared out of my mind of the future
the future certainly can be scary.
are you not scared of the future?
label: terrified
response: i am curious for what the future holds.

situation: ate all the cake
